
-----title
西安（长安） (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8d77691af14845a6a7870ec4b78a5412_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8d77691af14845a6a7870ec4b78a5412");'><span id='8d77691af14845a6a7870ec4b78a5412_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=792')">787-792年</a>，1-6岁</div><div id='8d77691af14845a6a7870ec4b78a5412' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=787&endYear=787')">787年</a>　生于西京万年县安邑坊，乃李吉甫次子，庶出，其父李吉甫年三十岁，时任太常博士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=788&endYear=788')">788年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=789&endYear=789')">789年</a>　父李吉甫此时约为屯田员外郎兼太常博士，为宰相李泌、窦参所器重。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=790&endYear=790')">790年</a>　不详。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=791&endYear=791')">791年</a>　父李吉甫转驾部员外郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年</a>　父李吉甫坐窦参党，贬明州员外长史，时年三十五。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='9f1bf23cd5684c0ca22f5616a8103516_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9f1bf23cd5684c0ca22f5616a8103516");'><span id='9f1bf23cd5684c0ca22f5616a8103516_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=808')">805-808年</a>，19-22岁</div><div id='9f1bf23cd5684c0ca22f5616a8103516' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　父李吉甫为饶州刺史，李德裕随父居饶州。八月，李吉甫由饶州召入为考功郎中、知制诰，十二月，为中书舍人，充翰林学士。李德裕随父入京。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=806&endYear=806')">806年</a>　父李吉甫为中书舍人、翰林学士，十二月，加银青光禄大夫。李德裕居京，不愿应科举，未入仕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=807&endYear=807')">807年</a>　父李吉甫拜相，为中书侍郎、同平章事，封赞皇侯。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=808&endYear=808')">808年</a>　二月，父李吉甫进封赵国公。九月，李吉甫为宦官所抑，出镇扬州，授淮南节度使。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='50cb4755da7a432e9af81c11997f136c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("50cb4755da7a432e9af81c11997f136c");'><span id='50cb4755da7a432e9af81c11997f136c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=816')">811-816年</a>，25-30岁</div><div id='50cb4755da7a432e9af81c11997f136c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=811&endYear=811')">811年</a>　正月，父李吉甫再次拜相，李德裕随父入京。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=812&endYear=812')">812年</a>　父李吉甫为相，李德裕居京。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=813&endYear=813')">813年</a>　父李吉甫为相，下诏赠其父官，并与其子一官，李德裕即以荫补校书郎，与集贤校书王起有诗唱和。因父居相位，为避嫌，李德裕于本年或稍后辞去校书郎，出外为方镇幕府从事，具体不详。作品：《七言九韵雨中自秘书省访王三侍御，知早入朝，便入集贤。侍御任集贤校书，及升柏台，又与秘阁相对。同院张学士，亦余特厚，故以诗赠之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此年，李德裕或许出外。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=814&endYear=814')">814年</a>　十月丙午，父李吉甫卒，赠司空。李德裕开始守制。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=815&endYear=816')">815-816年</a>　李德裕丁父忧，守制。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='af0f4c811ea44441ab364b29514f4eca_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("af0f4c811ea44441ab364b29514f4eca");'><span id='af0f4c811ea44441ab364b29514f4eca_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=822')">819-822年</a>，33-36岁</div><div id='af0f4c811ea44441ab364b29514f4eca' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　李德裕在河东军幕，为河东节度使掌书记。五月，随张弘靖入朝，除监察御史。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=820&endYear=820')">820年</a>　正月庚子，宪宗为宦官所杀，穆宗立。闰正月，李德裕为翰林学士，二月加屯田员外郎。秋夜有感作诗。作品：《长安秋夜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷三。本年作《吐绶鸟词》与刘禹锡往来，词已佚。）</span><div id='poem_30192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长安秋夜</a><span class='authorDate'>（820年）</span><span class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_30192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30192'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30192'>内宫<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作官）</span>传诏问戎机，载笔金銮夜始归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30192'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_30192", 30192, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>万户千门</span>皆寂寂，月中清露点朝衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30192'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_30192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_30192'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(30192)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　本年仍为翰林学士，正月，上疏言驸马不得至要官私第。二月，元稹为翰林学士，与李德裕、李绅相善，时称“三俊”。二月，沈传师迁中书舍人，李德裕与其善，自此之后，多有唱和。三月，李德裕为考功郎中，依前知制诰、翰林学士。十一月戊午，试制科举人，制词为李德裕起草。作品：《驸马不许至要官私第状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373950' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373950' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373950?labeling=true' target='_blank'>驸马不许至要官私第状</a><span class='authorDate'>（821年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373950")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373950_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373950'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373950'>臣伏见国朝故事。驸马缘是亲密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373950_comment'></div>并不合与朝廷要官往来。玄宗开元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373950_comment'></div>禁止尤切。臣访闻近日驸马公至宰相及要官私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373950_comment'></div>此辈无他才伎可以延接。惟是漏泄禁密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373950_comment'></div>交通中外。群情所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373950_comment'></div>以为甚毙。其朝官素是杂流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373950_comment'></div>则不妨来往。若职在清列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373950_comment'></div>岂可知闻。伏望宣示宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373950_comment'></div>其驸马诸亲。自今已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373950_comment'></div>有公事任至中书见宰相。此外更不得至宰相及台省要官宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373950_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1373950_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=821&endYear=821')">821年</a>　本年仍为翰林学士，李德裕撰《杜元颍平章事制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《唐大诏令集》卷四七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　正月二十九日加翰林学士承旨，二月四日迁中书舍人，二月十九日改御史中丞，三月，荐故东都留守李憕子源为谏议大夫。任御史中丞时，荐引崔琯为御史知杂。由于李逢吉排挤，九月，李德裕由御史中丞出为润州刺史、浙西观察使。辟李蟾为观察判官，辟郑亚为幕府从事。本年在润州纳徐盼为妾。作品：《荐处士李源表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集补遗。）</span><div id='poem_1373813' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373813' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373813?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荐处士李源表</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373813")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373813_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373813'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373813'>臣伏见贾谊云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373813_comment'></div>守圉捍敌之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373813_comment'></div>诚死城郭封疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373813_comment'></div>故曰圣人有金城者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373813_comment'></div>此物此志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373813_comment'></div>自天宝之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373813_comment'></div>俗尚浮华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373813_comment'></div>士罕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1373813", 1373813, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>仗义</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373813_comment'></div>人怀苟免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373813_comment'></div>至有弃城郭委符节者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373813_comment'></div>其身不以为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373813_comment'></div>当代不以为非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373813_comment'></div>臣恐风俗既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373813_comment'></div>纪纲皆废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373813_comment'></div>此当今之急务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373813_comment'></div>教化所宜先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373813_comment'></div>臣访闻处士李源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373813_comment'></div>即故礼部尚书东都留守赠司徒忠烈公憕之少子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373813_comment'></div>天与贞孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373813_comment'></div>嗣兹忠烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373813_comment'></div>以父死国难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373813_comment'></div>哀缠终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373813_comment'></div>自司农寺主簿绝心禄仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373813_comment'></div>垂五十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373813_comment'></div>放怀山泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373813_comment'></div>罕至人落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373813_comment'></div>暨于衰暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373813_comment'></div>多依慧林佛寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373813_comment'></div>以其本憕别业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373813_comment'></div>就寓残生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373813_comment'></div>从僧住持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373813_comment'></div>不举烟爨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373813_comment'></div>随僧一食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373813_comment'></div>以至五十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373813_comment'></div>嗜欲靡窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373813_comment'></div>精粗同众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373813_comment'></div>寺之旧殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373813_comment'></div>则憕之寝堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373813_comment'></div>源过必敬趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373813_comment'></div>未尝登践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373813_comment'></div>其端心执孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373813_comment'></div>无有不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373813_comment'></div>忘形患苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373813_comment'></div>绝意贪缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373813_comment'></div>迎斥浮虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373813_comment'></div>就专志节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373813_comment'></div>则孰能挺操不易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373813_comment'></div>沉身无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373813_comment'></div>处薄自颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373813_comment'></div>终老弥笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373813_comment'></div>且憕之忠烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373813_comment'></div>实冠古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373813_comment'></div>当逆羯屠陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373813_comment'></div>飙驱响从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373813_comment'></div>而憕抗节誓心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373813_comment'></div>约义同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373813_comment'></div>居朝守位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373813_comment'></div>抵刃就终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373813_comment'></div>臣节之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373813_comment'></div>繇憕益劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373813_comment'></div>而源名销迹灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373813_comment'></div>徵访不加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373813_comment'></div>实主于居方之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373813_comment'></div>历政之阙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373813_comment'></div>况源尝守沉默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373813_comment'></div>不语是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373813_comment'></div>或心交静求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373813_comment'></div>理契深要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373813_comment'></div>一言开析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373813_comment'></div>百虑洗然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373813_comment'></div>致君阜时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373813_comment'></div>指象如见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373813_comment'></div>抱此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1373813", 1373813, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>贞用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373813_comment'></div>弃于清朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373813_comment'></div>臣窃为陛下深惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373813_comment'></div>伏乞就授一官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373813_comment'></div>召赴京阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373813_comment'></div>仍以事迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373813_comment'></div>宣付史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373813_comment'></div>则圣代有求贤之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373813_comment'></div>朝廷美得材之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373813_comment'></div>憕之贞烈如存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373813_comment'></div>源之承荷不坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373813_comment'></div>忠孝之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373813_comment'></div>并集憕门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373813_comment'></div>光嗣德于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373813_comment'></div>激为臣于千古。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1373813_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='32fe200e624e4ec89f08435f94ec52fc_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>，43岁</div><div id='32fe200e624e4ec89f08435f94ec52fc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　八月，李德裕由浙西观察使召入为兵部侍郎。九月，出李德裕为义成节度使。离京赴滑州时，礼部郎中、兼集贤殿学士刘禹锡有诗送行。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='0aff3d486fb44a7e8f5afecf3f6a5c46_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0aff3d486fb44a7e8f5afecf3f6a5c46");'><span id='0aff3d486fb44a7e8f5afecf3f6a5c46_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=834')">833-834年</a>，47-48岁</div><div id='0aff3d486fb44a7e8f5afecf3f6a5c46' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　二月，李德裕以兵部尚书守本官同中书门下平章事，七月，拜中书侍郎。入相之后，即对朝政进行改革，出李宗闵之党杨虞卿、杨汝士等人于外，进用李回、沈传师等人。禁抑两淮大贾。七月，李德裕请将刘从谏由泽潞徙宣武，文宗不从。八月，李德裕奏请进士应通经术，停诗赋试。又言诸王应出阁为诸州上佐等。李德裕于今明年内主持修撰《大和辨谤略》，书成奏上，并作序。作品：《大和新修辨谤略序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集补遗。）</span>《忆平泉山居赠沈吏部》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373999' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373999' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373999?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太和新修辨谤略序</a><span class='authorDate'>（833年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373999")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373999_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373999'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373999'>臣闻行险而言□上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373999_comment'></div>非谓谤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373999_comment'></div>是实之所招也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373999_comment'></div>蹈仁而被诬者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373999_comment'></div>非巳所召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373999_comment'></div>是盗之所憎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373999_comment'></div>夫理身绝嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373999_comment'></div>人臣止谤之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373999_comment'></div>虏受不纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373999_comment'></div>人君辨谤之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373999_comment'></div>然则正者邪之所仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373999_comment'></div>直者曲之所矫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373999_comment'></div>有能为不才所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373999_comment'></div>有功为无庸所嫉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373999_comment'></div>四者苟立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373999_comment'></div>四谤必随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373999_comment'></div>况伪必乱真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373999_comment'></div>佞实似智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373999_comment'></div>铄金之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373999_comment'></div>不谋而同唱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373999_comment'></div>成雷之蚊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373999_comment'></div>未响而先合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373999_comment'></div>以群阴而蔽孤阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373999_comment'></div>以众比而排独立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373999_comment'></div>结其祸患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373999_comment'></div>咸本谤言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373999_comment'></div>莫不巧中于隐伏之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373999_comment'></div>善成于疑似之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373999_comment'></div>忠贤被之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373999_comment'></div>无以自辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373999_comment'></div>亦良可哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373999_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下体乾坤简易之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373999_comment'></div>合日月无私之照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373999_comment'></div>视听自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373999_comment'></div>神明其化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373999_comment'></div>恶淫哇之乱听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373999_comment'></div>疾紫色之眩目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373999_comment'></div>堲其谗说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373999_comment'></div>常咏格言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373999_comment'></div>臣等将顺天聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373999_comment'></div>缀缉旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373999_comment'></div>发东观藏书之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373999_comment'></div>得元和辨谤之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373999_comment'></div>辞过万言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373999_comment'></div>书成十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373999_comment'></div>以其广而寡要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373999_comment'></div>繁则易芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373999_comment'></div>方镜情伪之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373999_comment'></div>尤资详略之当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373999_comment'></div>遂再加研考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373999_comment'></div>所以理昔贤被诬之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373999_comment'></div>表前王善鉴之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373999_comment'></div>实愿视则倚衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373999_comment'></div>居则宥坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373999_comment'></div>绝其根蘖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373999_comment'></div>永杜其来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373999_comment'></div>必也视之于未形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373999_comment'></div>鉴之于无象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373999_comment'></div>方夏后盘盂之诫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373999_comment'></div>比周王玉几之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373999_comment'></div>测深虑远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373999_comment'></div>取为殷鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373999_comment'></div>使播扬有所消其象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373999_comment'></div>萋菲无以成其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373999_comment'></div>忠臣得纳其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373999_comment'></div>武臣得尽其力矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373999_comment'></div>于是徵之周秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373999_comment'></div>覃及圣代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373999_comment'></div>必极精简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373999_comment'></div>有合箴规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373999_comment'></div>特立新编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373999_comment'></div>裁成三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373999_comment'></div>谨缮写封进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373999_comment'></div>臣等上奉宸谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373999_comment'></div>竭其钻仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373999_comment'></div>敢不虔序圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373999_comment'></div>冠于篇首云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1373999_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_30287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30287' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年1月</a>　正月，李德裕奏请罢进士名单先呈宰相以定取舍之旧例，有《请罢呈榜奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集补遗。）</span><div id='poem_1373815' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373815' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373815?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请罢呈榜奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373815")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373815_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373815'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373815'>旧例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373815_comment'></div>进士未放榜前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373815_comment'></div>礼部侍郎遍到宰相私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373815_comment'></div>先呈及第人名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373815_comment'></div>谓之呈榜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373815_comment'></div>比闻多有改换。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373815_comment'></div>颇致流言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373815_comment'></div>宰相稍有寄情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373815_comment'></div>有司固无畏忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373815_comment'></div>取士之滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373815_comment'></div>莫不繇斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373815_comment'></div>将务责成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373815_comment'></div>在于不挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373815_comment'></div>既无取舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373815_comment'></div>岂必预知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373815_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373815_comment'></div>今年便任有司放榜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373815_comment'></div>更不得先呈臣等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373815_comment'></div>仍向后便为定例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373815_comment'></div>如有固违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373815_comment'></div>御史纠举。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1373815_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年9月</a>　九月，李德裕进所撰《御臣要略》及《次柳氏旧闻》作品：《次柳氏旧闻序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集补遗。）</span><div id='poem_1373996' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373996' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373996?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次柳氏旧闻序</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373996")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373996_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373996'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373996'>太和八年秋八月乙酉。上于紫宸殿听政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373996_comment'></div>宰臣涯以下奉职事。上顾谓宰臣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373996_comment'></div>故内臣高力士终始事迹。试为言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373996_comment'></div>臣涯谨奏云。上元中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373996_comment'></div>使臣柳芳得罪窜黔中。时力士亦从事巫州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373996_comment'></div>因与周旋。力士以旧尝司史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373996_comment'></div>为芳言先时禁中事。皆芳所不能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373996_comment'></div>而芳亦有质疑者。芳默识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373996_comment'></div>及还。编次其口语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373996_comment'></div>号曰问高力士说。上曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373996_comment'></div>令访史氏取其事书之。臣涯等既奉诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373996_comment'></div>乃诣芳孙度支员外璟询事。璟曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373996_comment'></div>某祖芳前从力士问。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1373996", 1373996, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>覼缕</span>未竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373996_comment'></div>复著唐历。采摭义数尤相近者以传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373996_comment'></div>其录或秘不敢宣。或怪奇非编录所宜及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373996_comment'></div>不以传。今按求其书甚实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373996_comment'></div>臣德裕亡父先臣与芳子吏部郎冕开元初俱为尚书郎。后官亦俱东出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373996_comment'></div>道相与语。遂及高力士说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373996_comment'></div>且曰。彼皆目睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373996_comment'></div>非出传闻。信而有徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373996_comment'></div>可为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1373996", 1373996, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>实录</span>。先臣每为臣言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373996_comment'></div>臣伏念所臆授凡有十七事。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1373996", 1373996, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>岁祀</span>久更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373996_comment'></div>遗稿不传。臣德裕非黄琼之练习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373996_comment'></div>愧史迁之该博。唯次旧闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373996_comment'></div>惧失其传。不足以备大君之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373996_comment'></div>谨录如左。以补史官之缺云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373996_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1373996_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年10月</a>　十月，李德裕罢执政，出为山南西道节度使。未行，改兵部尚书。十一月，终为李宗闵等所排，复出为浙西观察使。冬，撰文咏犀带。作品：《通犀带赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373706' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373706' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373706?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通犀带赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373706")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373706_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373706'>客有以通犀带示予者。嘉其珍物。古人未有词赋。因抒此作。盖尽其美焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373706_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373706'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373706'>君子以良玉比德。岂不以温润而近人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373706_comment'></div>惟骇鸡之至宝。亦含章而可珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373706_comment'></div>包黄中之粹色。发奇彩之彬彬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373706_comment'></div>芝草绕葩而猎叶。烟霞异状而轮囷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373706_comment'></div>虽复孕元兔于月魄。隐青鸾于镜尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373706_comment'></div>顾霄汉之悠远。怅工人之弗真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373706_comment'></div>匠者以其灵可御邪。光能远烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373706_comment'></div>剪截本末。发挥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1373706", 1373706, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>藻缛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373706_comment'></div>砥若砺金。剸如切玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373706_comment'></div>析以为带。加之盛服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373706_comment'></div>御之则祔<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作附）</span>身。褫之则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1373706", 1373706, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>韫椟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373706_comment'></div>似达人之卷舒。不专玩乎掌握。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373706_comment'></div>矧乎白璧虽美。尚不掩瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373706_comment'></div>何兹物之无玷。岂待莹而增华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373706_comment'></div>温兮如玉气舒虹。粲兮若晨光烁霞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373706_comment'></div>彼廓落之繁饰。谅无足以称嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373706_comment'></div>若乃名山岑寂。珍图谲诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373706_comment'></div>柳谷则麟马粲然。扶风则鱼龙隐起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373706_comment'></div>徒有象而无施。故虽奇而莫拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373706_comment'></div>然则美服珍玩。近于祸机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373706_comment'></div>虞公灭而垂棘返。壮武残而龙剑飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373706_comment'></div>先哲所以闻象则服。防患则微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373706_comment'></div>经侯委佩而去。宣子辞环以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373706_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1373706_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年10月</a>　十月，李德裕罢执政，出为山南西道节度使。未行，改兵部尚书。十一月，终为李宗闵等所排，复出为浙西观察使。冬，撰文咏鼓吹乐。作品：《鼓吹赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373707' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373707?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鼓吹赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373707")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373707_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373707'>鼓吹本轩皇因出师而作。前代将相。有功则假之。今藩阃皆备此乐。余往岁剖符金陵。有童子六七人。皆于此艺特妙。每曲宴奏之。及再至江南。并逾弱冠。悲流年之倏忽。忆前欢而悽怆。乃为此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373707_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373707'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373707'>追昔吴会之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373707_comment'></div>思为卫霍之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373707_comment'></div>怀瀚海而发愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373707_comment'></div>想狼居而在望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373707_comment'></div>厌桑濮之遗音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373707_comment'></div>感箫鼓之悲壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373707_comment'></div>每闻兹乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373707_comment'></div>心焉犹尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373707_comment'></div>爰有侲童<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注出西京赋）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373707_comment'></div>㯋秀含聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373707_comment'></div>思虑未敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373707_comment'></div>专和发中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373707_comment'></div>繁会曲折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373707_comment'></div>变态不穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373707_comment'></div>交簻烁电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373707_comment'></div>挥手成风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373707_comment'></div>或累发而碎隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373707_comment'></div>或徐弁而从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373707_comment'></div>管孤引以嘒嘒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373707_comment'></div>鼓轻投而逢逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373707_comment'></div>若乃清景妍和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373707_comment'></div>嘉客来萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373707_comment'></div>登高台而互动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373707_comment'></div>对芳树而并吹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373707_comment'></div>见鹏鹗之争厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373707_comment'></div>耸壮士之愤气<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注鹏鹗争壮士怒皆鼓吹曲名）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373707_comment'></div>忽疑翔雁叫于寒烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373707_comment'></div>胡沙蔽于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373707_comment'></div>其始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373707_comment'></div>若伐木丁丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373707_comment'></div>响连青冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373707_comment'></div>喧禽万族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373707_comment'></div>声应崖谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373707_comment'></div>其纵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373707_comment'></div>狠羊斗角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373707_comment'></div>奔兕相触。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373707_comment'></div>转石振于崩溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373707_comment'></div>燎野焚于寒竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373707_comment'></div>其终也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373707_comment'></div>如风飙暂息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373707_comment'></div>万籁皆肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373707_comment'></div>天地霁而雷霆收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373707_comment'></div>川波静而鱼龙伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373707_comment'></div>昔我往矣。<div id='poem_sentence_45_1373707_comment'></div>突而弁兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373707_comment'></div>谅昔人之多感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373707_comment'></div>睹移柳而兴悽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373707_comment'></div>惜岁年之易往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373707_comment'></div>叹亲好之常暌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373707_comment'></div>于是勉其成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373707_comment'></div>再命迭作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373707_comment'></div>念所思而不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373707_comment'></div>慨悲翁之萧索<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注所思悲翁并曲名）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373707_comment'></div>音岂殊于今昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373707_comment'></div>情自有于哀乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373707_comment'></div>乃知孔将比于鸣蛙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373707_comment'></div>陆反思于唳鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373707_comment'></div>彼衰退于忧伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373707_comment'></div>并荣华之昭灼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1373707_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='8c194b2cbea24dd7931195b894e4cea4_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=846')">840-846年</a>，54-60岁</div><div id='8c194b2cbea24dd7931195b894e4cea4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年9月</a>　九月，李德裕入京为相，向武宗进言为政之要。李德裕子李烨与郑氏结婚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　李德裕入京为相后，以宰相名义写信给李执方，令李执方劝说何重霸（何重顺）效忠朝廷。作品：《宰相与李执方书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373988' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373988_comment'></div>起授翰垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373988_comment'></div>推体国之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373988_comment'></div>动遵朝典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373988_comment'></div>罄守藩之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373988_comment'></div>终保令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373988_comment'></div>遽此沦亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373988_comment'></div>深可悼惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373988_comment'></div>闻以监军朝觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373988_comment'></div>贵安物情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373988_comment'></div>军府事权令后嗣勾当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373988_comment'></div>本于忠顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373988_comment'></div>固匪循私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373988_comment'></div>伏以圣上君临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373988_comment'></div>惟新景化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373988_comment'></div>施王者之号令。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1373988_comment'></div>不可轻易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373988_comment'></div>旋观臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373988_comment'></div>岂惜恩荣。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1373988_comment'></div>圣上恩深悼往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373988_comment'></div>义在安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373988_comment'></div>以司徒之尽忠。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1373988_comment'></div>必有令图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373988_comment'></div>只在邻近将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373988_comment'></div>成其美志。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1373988_comment'></div>朝廷制置之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373988_comment'></div>难于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373988_comment'></div>李师道兵锋物力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373988_comment'></div>某等状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1373988_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　李德裕曾任西川节度使，著《西南备边录》十三卷，约于本年进上。作品：《进西南备边录状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1373884' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1373884_comment'></div>国之仇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373884_comment'></div>南蛮自经负恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373884_comment'></div>常怀反侧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1373795_comment'></div>虽未悉虚实。良深震悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373795_comment'></div>我国家与卿等本国。代结姻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373795_comment'></div>久为亲戚。协德同心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373795_comment'></div>常为诸蕃所羡。故得边候不耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373795_comment'></div>封疆晏然。卿等忽领师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373795_comment'></div>漠南屯集。又数至天德侵掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373795_comment'></div>颇扰边人。聚师无名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373795_comment'></div>忠义俱失。既乖旧好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373795_comment'></div>未知存亡。故遣使臣魏谟往谕朕意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373795_comment'></div>卿宜备陈诚款。不得虚词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374070_comment'></div>贞明六朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374070_comment'></div>德宗时弱冠筮仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374070_comment'></div>风仪夙成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374070_comment'></div>帝欲分绮季之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374070_comment'></div>翼皇储之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374070_comment'></div>于是暂离武帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374070_comment'></div>出侍龙楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374070_comment'></div>赞兰英结佩之馨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374070_comment'></div>规桐叶剪圭之戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374070_comment'></div>此则史册之保护也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374070_comment'></div>帝欲秩出纳之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374070_comment'></div>纠梯航之贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374070_comment'></div>于是副宏羊而实天库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374070_comment'></div>佐安国而裨水衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374070_comment'></div>此又孔仅之方略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374070_comment'></div>帝欲具饰车旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374070_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1374070", 1374070, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>宣明</span>衣服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374070_comment'></div>公于是典其寮寀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374070_comment'></div>重立规模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374070_comment'></div>叠烟霞以散王侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374070_comment'></div>卷虹霓而给后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374070_comment'></div>卿霭施彰于五辂。<div id='poem_sentence_69_1374070_comment'></div>公于是秩视玉钤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374070_comment'></div>荣加金钮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374070_comment'></div>以奇谋而协上将。<div id='poem_sentence_245_1374070_comment'></div>舆论钦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1374070_comment'></div>始去禁卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1374070_comment'></div>万夫涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1374070_comment'></div>逮总天厩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1374070_comment'></div>六闲允釐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1374070_comment'></div>尽瘁事国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1374070_comment'></div>形神久疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1374070_comment'></div>监视诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1374070_comment'></div>琴书自怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1374070_comment'></div>金印组绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1374070_comment'></div>去之若遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1374070_comment'></div>陶径潘园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1374070_comment'></div>优游在斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1374070_comment'></div>长庆六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1374070_comment'></div>诏树丰碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1374070_comment'></div>上将刻字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1374070_comment'></div>文以好辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1374070_comment'></div>后十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1374070_comment'></div>荩臣其萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1374070_comment'></div>原阡松槚兮霜露已滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1374070_comment'></div>苑池台榭兮榛芜可悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1374070_comment'></div>睹尘根兮空嗟蔓草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1374070_comment'></div>篆贞珉兮攸愧色丝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_268_1374070_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，三月壬申，李德裕等奏请尊宪宗皇帝不迁庙。作品：《请尊宪宗章武孝皇帝为不迁庙状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十。）</span><div id='poem_1373957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373957?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请尊宪宗章武孝皇帝为不迁庙状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373957")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373957'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373957'>右。臣等伏闻开成中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373957_comment'></div>文宗尝顾问宰臣。欲褒崇宪宗功德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373957_comment'></div>其时宰臣。莫能推顺美之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373957_comment'></div>明尊祖之义。臣等至愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373957_comment'></div>窃所叹息。伏思国家受命二百二十五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373957_comment'></div>列圣之功德。区宇之广大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373957_comment'></div>王化之盛兴。礼乐之备具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373957_comment'></div>过殷周远矣。而未有中兴不迁之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373957_comment'></div>臣等所以夙夜发愤也。礼祖有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373957_comment'></div>宗有德。夏之祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373957_comment'></div>经传无闻。殷则一祖三宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373957_comment'></div>成汤为始祖。太甲为太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373957_comment'></div>大戊为中宗。武丁为高宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373957_comment'></div>刘歆曰。天子七庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373957_comment'></div>苟有功德则宗之。所以劝帝者功德博矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373957_comment'></div>故周公作无逸。举殷之三宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373957_comment'></div>以劝成王。汉景帝诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373957_comment'></div>孝文皇帝德厚侔天地。利泽施四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373957_comment'></div>庙乐不称。朕甚惧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373957_comment'></div>其为孝文皇帝庙为昭德之舞。以明休德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373957_comment'></div>然后祖宗之功德。施于万代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373957_comment'></div>其与丞相列侯中二千石礼官具礼仪奏焉。丞相申屠嘉等奏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373957_comment'></div>功莫大于高皇帝。德莫盛于孝文皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373957_comment'></div>高皇帝庙宜为帝者太祖之庙。孝文皇帝庙宜为帝者太宗之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373957_comment'></div>天子宜代代献祖宗之庙。又汉宣帝诏曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373957_comment'></div>夙夜惟念孝武皇帝躬履仁义。选明将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373957_comment'></div>讨不服。功德茂盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373957_comment'></div>不能尽宣。而庙乐未称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373957_comment'></div>其议奏。有司奏请尊孝武为世宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373957_comment'></div>奏盛德文始五行之舞。天子代代献此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373957_comment'></div>则子孙褒崇祖宗之明据也。自天宝以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373957_comment'></div>兵宿中原。强侯缔交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373957_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1373957", 1373957, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>髋髀</span>甚众。贡赋不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373957_comment'></div>刑政自出。包荒含垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373957_comment'></div>以至于贞元。德宗惩奉天之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373957_comment'></div>厌征伐之事。戎臣优以不朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373957_comment'></div>终老于外。其卒则以幕吏将校代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373957_comment'></div>故长武城在王畿之内。斥逐主将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373957_comment'></div>河中居股肱之郡。坐邀符节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373957_comment'></div>韦皋因备边之势。自擅灵关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373957_comment'></div>李锜窃煮海之资。专制泽国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373957_comment'></div>而两河蕃镇。或仓猝易帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373957_comment'></div>甚于奕棋。或陆梁弄兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373957_comment'></div>同于拒辙。宪宗摅祖宗之宿愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373957_comment'></div>举升平之典法。始命将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373957_comment'></div>顺天行诛。元年僇惠琳暨辟锜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373957_comment'></div>季年枭元济及师道。其他或折简而召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373957_comment'></div>或执圭请觐。献其名城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373957_comment'></div>割其爱子。不可遍举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373957_comment'></div>岂有去天下之害。不享其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373957_comment'></div>致生人之安。不受其报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373957_comment'></div>臣伏见元和初议迁庙之礼。而史官称中宗不得号中兴之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373957_comment'></div>凡非我失之。自我复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373957_comment'></div>谓之中兴。汉光武晋元帝是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373957_comment'></div>臣等窃思此议。实所未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373957_comment'></div>中宗朝自以政事多衅。权移后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373957_comment'></div>所以未得称为中兴。恐议者复以此为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373957_comment'></div>夫兴业之与隆道。事实不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373957_comment'></div>汉光武再造邦家。不失旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373957_comment'></div>晋元帝虽在江左。亦能纂绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373957_comment'></div>此乃王业中兴。可谓有功矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373957_comment'></div>殷高宗躬行大孝。求贤俾乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373957_comment'></div>周宣王微而后兴。衰而复盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373957_comment'></div>此乃王道中兴。可谓有德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373957_comment'></div>故诗云。车攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373957_comment'></div>宣王复古也。宣王能内修政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373957_comment'></div>外攘夷狄。复文武之境土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373957_comment'></div>又蒸民。美宣王任贤使能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373957_comment'></div>周室中兴焉。又江汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373957_comment'></div>美宣王能兴衰拨乱。命召公平淮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373957_comment'></div>又汉书宣帝赞曰。功光祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373957_comment'></div>业垂后嗣。可谓中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373957_comment'></div>侔德殷宗周宣之美。若皆如汉光武晋元帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373957_comment'></div>则殷宗周宣。并不得称中兴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373957_comment'></div>臣等伏思任贤使能。内修政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373957_comment'></div>平淮夷之叛。复祖宗之土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373957_comment'></div>皆宪宗有之。所谓隆道中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373957_comment'></div>与殷高宗周宣王汉宣帝侔德矣。臣等敢遵古典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373957_comment'></div>请尊宪宗章武孝皇帝为百代不迁之庙。上以昭陛下大孝之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373957_comment'></div>广贻谟之训。下以表臣等思古之愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373957_comment'></div>申欲报之诚。如合圣心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373957_comment'></div>伏望令诸司清望官四品以上尚书两省御史台与礼官参议闻奏。谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373957_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1373957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，撰写赠裴度为太师制。作品：《赠裴度太师制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1373752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠裴度太师制</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373752")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373752'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373752'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373752_comment'></div>尧之旧臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373752_comment'></div>伯益显庸于舜禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373752_comment'></div>周之元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373752_comment'></div>召公流美于成康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373752_comment'></div>永惟其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373752_comment'></div>是属良相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373752_comment'></div>裴度始以谋策除害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373752_comment'></div>佐烈祖之中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373752_comment'></div>终以忠贞立朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373752_comment'></div>毗累圣之鸿业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373752_comment'></div>经纬之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373752_comment'></div>华皓不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373752_comment'></div>功勋烂然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373752_comment'></div>图史<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1373752", 1373752, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>煇焯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373752_comment'></div>奸邪所忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373752_comment'></div>臲卼于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373752_comment'></div>暨氛雾既开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373752_comment'></div>鱼水将叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373752_comment'></div>条风孰见其喜愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373752_comment'></div>零雨皆美其来归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373752_comment'></div>未践明庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373752_comment'></div>遽婴沉痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373752_comment'></div>威凤莫翔于旧沼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373752_comment'></div>虚舟常往于夜川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373752_comment'></div>殂谢之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373752_comment'></div>朋党异议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373752_comment'></div>赠典不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373752_comment'></div>人情郁然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373752_comment'></div>属告类上元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373752_comment'></div>涣流大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373752_comment'></div>载怀先正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373752_comment'></div>宜有褒崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373752_comment'></div>宠既极于维师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373752_comment'></div>恩有加于在昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373752_comment'></div>岂必望酂侯之垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373752_comment'></div>方念茂功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373752_comment'></div>过梁道之祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373752_comment'></div>乃思遗美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373752_comment'></div>以兹为劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373752_comment'></div>可不务乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1373752_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，暮春，撰赋咏牡丹。作品：《牡丹赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373734' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373734' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373734?labeling=true' target='_blank'>牡丹赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373734")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373734_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373734'>余观前贤之赋草木者多矣。靡不言托植之幽深。采斸之莫致。风景之妍丽。追赏之欢愉。至于体物。良有未尽。惟牡丹未有赋者。聊以状之。仆射十一丈蔚为儒宗。词赋之首。声气所感。或能相和。又见陈思王赋序。多言命王粲刘桢继作。今亦效之。邀侍御裴舍人同作。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373734_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373734'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373734'>青阳既暮。鴳鴠已鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373734_comment'></div>念兰若之方歇。叹桃李之阴成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373734_comment'></div>惟翠华之艳爚。倾百卉之光英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373734_comment'></div>抽翠柯以布素。粲红芳而发荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373734_comment'></div>其始也。碧海霄澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373734_comment'></div>骊珠跃出。深波晓霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373734_comment'></div>丹萍吐实。焕神龙之衔烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373734_comment'></div>皎若木之并日。其盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373734_comment'></div>若紫芝连叶。鸳雏比翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373734_comment'></div>夺珠树之鲜辉。掩非烟之奇色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373734_comment'></div>倏忽摛锦。纷葩似织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373734_comment'></div>其落也。明艳未褫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373734_comment'></div>红衣如脱。朱草柯折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373734_comment'></div>珊瑚枝碎。霞既烁而转妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373734_comment'></div>红欲消而犹綷。尔乃独含芳意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373734_comment'></div>幽怨残春。将独立而倾国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373734_comment'></div>虽不言兮似人。观其露彩犹泫<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作泣）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373734_comment'></div>日华初照。煜其晨葩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373734_comment'></div>情若微笑。色虽美而自艳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373734_comment'></div>类河滨之窈窕。逮乎的皪含景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373734_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1373734", 1373734, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>离披</span>向风。铅华春而思荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373734_comment'></div>兰泽晚而光融。情放纵以自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373734_comment'></div>凝若焕之冶容。既而华艳恍惚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373734_comment'></div>繁华遽毕。惊宝雉之乍回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373734_comment'></div>想江而复出。望献珰之玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373734_comment'></div>俄以蔽光。感怀佩之川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373734_comment'></div>怅然如失。客顾余曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373734_comment'></div>勿谓淑美难久。徂芳不留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373734_comment'></div>彼妍华之阅世。非人寿之可俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373734_comment'></div>君不见龙骧闬闳。池台御沟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373734_comment'></div>堂挹山林。峰连翠楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373734_comment'></div>有百岁之芳丛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。无昔日之通侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373734_comment'></div>岂暇当飞藿之时。始嗟零落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373734_comment'></div>且欲同树萱之意。聊自忘忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373734_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1373734_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373734'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_31_1373734_0'>⑴ 原注今京师精舍甲第犹有天宝中牡丹在</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373734_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，请增谏议大夫等品秩。作品：《请增谏议大夫等品秩状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十一。）</span><div id='poem_1373966' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373966' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373966?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请增谏议大夫等品秩状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373966")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373966_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373966'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373966'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373966_comment'></div>据大唐六典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373966_comment'></div>隋氏门下省置谏议大夫七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373966_comment'></div>从四品下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373966_comment'></div>今正五品上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373966_comment'></div>自大历二年升门下中书侍郎为正三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373966_comment'></div>两省遂阙四品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373966_comment'></div>建官之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373966_comment'></div>有所未备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373966_comment'></div>谨按左氏传云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373966_comment'></div>衮职有阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373966_comment'></div>惟仲山甫补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373966_comment'></div>能补过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373966_comment'></div>仲山甫则周之大臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373966_comment'></div>汉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373966_comment'></div>汲黯称愿出入禁闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373966_comment'></div>补过拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373966_comment'></div>后汉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373966_comment'></div>张衡为侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373966_comment'></div>尝居帷幄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373966_comment'></div>从容讽谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373966_comment'></div>拾遗左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373966_comment'></div>皆大臣之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373966_comment'></div>故其秩峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373966_comment'></div>其任重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373966_comment'></div>则君敬其言而用其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373966_comment'></div>况謇谔之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373966_comment'></div>宜用老成之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373966_comment'></div>秩不优崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373966_comment'></div>则难用耆德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373966_comment'></div>其谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373966_comment'></div>望依隋氏旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373966_comment'></div>升为从四品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373966_comment'></div>分为左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373966_comment'></div>以备两省四品之阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373966_comment'></div>向后与丞郎出入迭用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373966_comment'></div>以重其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373966_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1373966'>御史中丞/右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373966_comment'></div>中丞为大夫之贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373966_comment'></div>缘大夫秩崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373966_comment'></div>官不常置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373966_comment'></div>中丞常为宪台之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373966_comment'></div>今九寺少卿及秘书少监国子司业京兆少尹等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373966_comment'></div>并省寺之贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373966_comment'></div>皆为四品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373966_comment'></div>惟御史中丞官业虽至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373966_comment'></div>品秩未崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373966_comment'></div>望升为从四品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373966_comment'></div>为大夫之贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373966_comment'></div>令不隔品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373966_comment'></div>亦为丞郎出入迭用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373966_comment'></div>以重其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373966_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1373966'>以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373966_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373966_comment'></div>缘事关朝廷典制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373966_comment'></div>须行之可久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373966_comment'></div>必在博尽群议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373966_comment'></div>询谋佥同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373966_comment'></div>望令两省御史台五品以上尚书省四品以上太子太保太常卿参议闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373966_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1373966_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，为武宗母宣懿皇太后祔陵庙撰状。作品：《宣懿皇太后祔陵庙状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十。）</span><div id='poem_1373959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373959?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣懿皇后祔陵庙状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373959")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373959'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373959'>奉宣。宣懿皇太后祔光陵同元宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373959_comment'></div>及不移福陵只祔庙。何者为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373959_comment'></div>商量奏来者。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373959_comment'></div>臣等伏以园寝已安。神道贵静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373959_comment'></div>光陵因山久固。仅二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373959_comment'></div>福陵近又修崇。足彰严奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373959_comment'></div>今若再因合祔。须启二陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373959_comment'></div>或虑圣灵不安。未合先旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373959_comment'></div>又以阴阳避忌。亦有所疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373959_comment'></div>不移福陵。实合礼意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373959_comment'></div>伏以照临在天。光灵未远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373959_comment'></div>合食清庙。于礼无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373959_comment'></div>足以申陛下大孝之心。表先后昭配之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373959_comment'></div>既遵旧典。尤惬众情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373959_comment'></div>臣等商量。祔太庙不移福陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373959_comment'></div>实为允便。臣等不任感切之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373959_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1373959_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，为武宗母宣懿皇太后祔太庙撰状。作品：《宣懿皇太后祔太庙制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1373742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宣懿皇太后祔太庙制</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373742")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373742'>门下。朕近因载诞之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373742_comment'></div>展承颜之庆。太皇太后谓朕曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373742_comment'></div>天子之孝。莫大于丕承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373742_comment'></div>人伦之义。莫重于嗣续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373742_comment'></div>穆宗睿圣文惠孝皇帝厌代已久。星霜屡迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373742_comment'></div>祢宫旷合食之礼。惟帝深濡露之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373742_comment'></div>宣懿皇太后长庆之际。德冠后宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373742_comment'></div>夙表沙麓之祥。实茂河洲之范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373742_comment'></div>先朝恩礼之重。中壶莫偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373742_comment'></div>况诞我嗣君。缵承昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373742_comment'></div>已协华于先帝。方延祚于后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373742_comment'></div>思广贻谋。庶宏博爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373742_comment'></div>爰遵旧典。以慰孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373742_comment'></div>当以宣懿皇太后祔太庙穆宗睿圣文惠孝皇帝之室。率是彝训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373742_comment'></div>其敬承之。朕祗奉慈旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373742_comment'></div>载深感咽。宣示中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373742_comment'></div>咸使闻知。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373742_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1373742_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，八月，李德裕撰《赐回鹘嗢没斯特勒等诏书》，并遣使张贾，济粮和好。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐回鹘嗢没斯特勒等诏书</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373765")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373765'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373765'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373765_comment'></div>回鹘嗢没斯特勒那颉啜特勒颉于伽思于解亦阿耽于思莫贺达于宰相伊难朱密伽谛略摩咄将军谛略等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373765_comment'></div>天德军递所奏表至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373765_comment'></div>再三省览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373765_comment'></div>忧属良深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373765_comment'></div>彼蕃自忠义毗伽可汗以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373765_comment'></div>代为亲邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373765_comment'></div>连降爱主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373765_comment'></div>恩礼特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373765_comment'></div>古今莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373765_comment'></div>朕君临万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373765_comment'></div>抚育殊方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373765_comment'></div>苟有未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373765_comment'></div>则宜来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373765_comment'></div>况特勒等乃祖乃父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373765_comment'></div>归诚累朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373765_comment'></div>昨遣嗣泽王溶吊册先可汗回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373765_comment'></div>始闻卿国中丧乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373765_comment'></div>诸部乖离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373765_comment'></div>救患恤邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373765_comment'></div>岂忘令典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373765_comment'></div>方图镇抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373765_comment'></div>以命使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373765_comment'></div>今又知坚昆等五族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373765_comment'></div>深入凌虐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373765_comment'></div>可汗被害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373765_comment'></div>公主及新可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373765_comment'></div>播越他所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373765_comment'></div>未归城邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373765_comment'></div>特勒等力不能制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373765_comment'></div>思存远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373765_comment'></div>相率遁逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373765_comment'></div>万里归命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373765_comment'></div>又知欲奉公主朝觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373765_comment'></div>忠谋不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373765_comment'></div>已逾大漠之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373765_comment'></div>同五原之塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373765_comment'></div>发此单使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373765_comment'></div>布其赤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373765_comment'></div>言念艰危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373765_comment'></div>恻然轸叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373765_comment'></div>料卿等皆英酋贵族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373765_comment'></div>羁寓沙场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373765_comment'></div>怀土之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373765_comment'></div>如何可处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373765_comment'></div>岂非欲讨除外寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373765_comment'></div>匡复本蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373765_comment'></div>抱此至忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373765_comment'></div>托于大援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373765_comment'></div>但缘未知指的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373765_comment'></div>难便听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373765_comment'></div>又虑边境守臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373765_comment'></div>见卿忽至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373765_comment'></div>或怀疑阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373765_comment'></div>不副朕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373765_comment'></div>故遣鸿胪卿张贾驰往安抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373765_comment'></div>朕既奖卿忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373765_comment'></div>报以信诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373765_comment'></div>虽隔塞垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373765_comment'></div>已如相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373765_comment'></div>卿须深明朕衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373765_comment'></div>尽吐所怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373765_comment'></div>一一言于使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373765_comment'></div>令其速还闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373765_comment'></div>伫闻诚愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373765_comment'></div>续有指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373765_comment'></div>必当副彼急难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373765_comment'></div>固不惜于事力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373765_comment'></div>勉于谋度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373765_comment'></div>用保忠勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373765_comment'></div>秋热。<div id='poem_sentence_72_1373765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，八月，田牟等请许攻打回鹘，武宗不许，李德裕撰状。作品：《论田牟请许党项仇复回鹘嗢没斯部落事状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论田牟请许党项雠复回鹘嗢没斯部落事状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年8月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373902'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373902'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373902_comment'></div>臣等虽不习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1373902", 1373902, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>兵钤</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373902_comment'></div>昧于边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373902_comment'></div>然酌其物理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373902_comment'></div>情实可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373902_comment'></div>伏希圣慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373902_comment'></div>特赐详览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373902_comment'></div>比者陛下常虑回鹘国中离散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373902_comment'></div>未是实情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373902_comment'></div>今据我阿尼伊难珠合等书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373902_comment'></div>此閒更无活处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373902_comment'></div>即是实耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373902_comment'></div>又回鹘安孝顺云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373902_comment'></div>赤心宰相问汉国中看你回鹘好无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373902_comment'></div>足知依倚大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373902_comment'></div>意甚勤恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373902_comment'></div>今若许田牟徇党项贪利之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373902_comment'></div>不自量力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373902_comment'></div>犯必死之虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373902_comment'></div>绝归款之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373902_comment'></div>事捷亦损耗甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373902_comment'></div>大亏恩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373902_comment'></div>不成则永为边患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373902_comment'></div>取笑四夷。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1373902_comment'></div>远人慕义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373902_comment'></div>曾未犯边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373902_comment'></div>自六月至今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373902_comment'></div>殊非体国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373902_comment'></div>此不可二也。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，秋，感叹光阴，作《秋声赋》，与吏部尚书王起、太子宾客分司东都的刘禹锡唱和。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373733?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋声赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373733")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373733_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373733'>昔潘岳寓直骑省。因感二毛。遂作秋兴赋。况余百龄过半。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373733_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373733'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373733'>承明三入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373733_comment'></div>发已皓白<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注自中书舍人及今三参掖垣）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373733_comment'></div>清秋可悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373733_comment'></div>尚书十一丈鹓掖上寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373733_comment'></div>人文大匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373733_comment'></div>聊为此作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373733_comment'></div>以俟知音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373733_comment'></div>露华肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373733_comment'></div>天气晶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373733_comment'></div>碧空无氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373733_comment'></div>霁海清明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373733_comment'></div>当其时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373733_comment'></div>草木阴虫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373733_comment'></div>皆有秋声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373733_comment'></div>自虚无而响作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373733_comment'></div>由寂寞而音生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373733_comment'></div>始萧瑟于林野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373733_comment'></div>终混合于太清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373733_comment'></div>出哀壑而愤起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373733_comment'></div>临悲谷而怨盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373733_comment'></div>朔雁听而增逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373733_comment'></div>孤猿闻而自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373733_comment'></div>此声也。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373733_comment'></div>感君子之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373733_comment'></div>况乎临淄藻思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373733_comment'></div>薛县英名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373733_comment'></div>遽兴华屋之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373733_comment'></div>预想曲池之平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373733_comment'></div>见霜鸿之晓征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373733_comment'></div>既慷慨而谁诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373733_comment'></div>独汍澜而流缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373733_comment'></div>虽复苏门傲世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373733_comment'></div>秦青送行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373733_comment'></div>讵能写自然之天籁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373733_comment'></div>究吹万之清泠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373733_comment'></div>客有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1373733", 1373733, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>贞词</span>浏湸。<div class='inline'
