"Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>漏卮</span>之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373733_comment'></div>文同蟠木之精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373733_comment'></div>聊染翰以写意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373733_comment'></div>期报之以瑶琼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1373733_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，闰九月，张贾巡边使回，李德裕请遣使慰抚回鹘嗢没斯部落，并济以粮，撰《请赐回鹘嗢没斯等物状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请赐回鹘嗢没斯等物诏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373830")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373830_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373830'>右。比者只待张贾使回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373830_comment'></div>今到已数日。须早发遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373830_comment'></div>缘回鹘已入边界。未测多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373830_comment'></div>天德兵力寡少。须务怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373830_comment'></div>伏以自古御戎。只有二道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373830_comment'></div>一是厚加抚慰。二是以力驱除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373830_comment'></div>此事利害较然。前古皆有明效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373830_comment'></div>汉宣帝厚抚呼韩。代享其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373830_comment'></div>边境六十年无事。汉武力制匈奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373830_comment'></div>海内疲弊。生人减半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373830_comment'></div>今嗢没斯若不稍加恩意。令尽欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373830_comment'></div>须至以力驱除。必恐永为边患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373830_comment'></div>假使其众残破。摧伏不难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373830_comment'></div>亦须先加以恩。不令疑贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373830_comment'></div>古人云。将欲取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373830_comment'></div>必固与之。正谓此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373830_comment'></div>臣等商量。纵不与粮食接借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373830_comment'></div>其赐物不可太薄。若止于只赐特勒宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373830_comment'></div>实恐发遣未得。须是稍令优厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373830_comment'></div>于朝廷若无费损。可以保全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373830_comment'></div>朝野群情。皆望如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373830_comment'></div>伏希圣慈。特赐察纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373830_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1373830_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，闰九月，张贾巡边使回，李德裕请遣使慰抚回鹘嗢没斯部落，并济以粮，又奉敕撰《赐回鹘嗢没斯等诏》，劝其拥立新可汗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐回鹘嗢没斯等诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373766")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373766'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373766'>敕。回鹘嗢没斯特勒那颉啜特勒悉勿啜特勒乌离思特勒赤心宰相等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373766_comment'></div>张贾等回。知卿等欲远赴阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373766_comment'></div>自申忠。眷言深志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373766_comment'></div>岂忘予怀。闻卿等本国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373766_comment'></div>顷因饥荒。遂至离散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373766_comment'></div>亲属内叛。诸部外侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373766_comment'></div>新立可汗。犹未安定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373766_comment'></div>既是国中所奉。则为卿等君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373766_comment'></div>古人云。未有仁而遗其亲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373766_comment'></div>义而后其君者。想卿等本心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373766_comment'></div>必思推戴。况回鹘代雄朔漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373766_comment'></div>威服诸蕃。今已破伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373766_comment'></div>足堪悲愤。若皆自争雄长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373766_comment'></div>不顾其君。各据一隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373766_comment'></div>必更衰弱。深虑从此之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373766_comment'></div>为诸蕃所轻。与卿等本国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373766_comment'></div>代结婚亲。久修邻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373766_comment'></div>每念于此。良用恻然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373766_comment'></div>与卿等为谋。须务远大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373766_comment'></div>莫若自相率励。同奉可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373766_comment'></div>兴复本蕃。再图强盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373766_comment'></div>朕欲召卿赴阙。亲谕此怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373766_comment'></div>又恐可汗闻知。谓朕幸其艰危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373766_comment'></div>因有招纳。盖欲深全国体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373766_comment'></div>兼为卿等避嫌。以此思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373766_comment'></div>难遂于请。卿等宜早归本国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373766_comment'></div>不更滞留。卿等表请器甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373766_comment'></div>朕君临万国。非止一蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373766_comment'></div>祖宗旧章。不敢逾越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373766_comment'></div>国家未曾赐诸蕃器甲。卿等亦合备知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373766_comment'></div>若一处开恩。必自兹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1373766", 1373766, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>援例</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373766_comment'></div>朔州般次。旧例须待可汗遣驼马迎圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373766_comment'></div>方令进发。可汗信使未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373766_comment'></div>难于遣行。今有赐物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373766_comment'></div>具在别录。以卿等率先向发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373766_comment'></div>特示优恩。缘新立可汗未受朝廷册命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373766_comment'></div>数降使至卿等部落。亦恐非宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373766_comment'></div>所有赐赉。止于此度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373766_comment'></div>想卿等明识。深谅朕怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373766_comment'></div>便令高品魏敬休宣谕。想宜知悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373766_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1373766_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，闰九月，李德裕主张添兵于太原，加强防御，以防吐蕃侵袭。作品：《请于太原添兵备状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373887' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请于太原添兵备状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373887")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373887'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373887'>右。缘嗢没斯等本国残破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373887_comment'></div>未有所归。逗留塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373887_comment'></div>今已岁周。虽近有恩赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373887_comment'></div>喻其归还。然本蕃未宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373887_comment'></div>时属寒冱。马畜羸乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373887_comment'></div>必难首途。回鹘和好多年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373887_comment'></div>忠效久著。虽在边境之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373887_comment'></div>计无侵轶之虞。臣等所虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373887_comment'></div>吐蕃变诈多端。不可测度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373887_comment'></div>或谓朝廷方备北虏。未暇西防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373887_comment'></div>或云嗢没斯招米点汗回鹘。乘此机势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373887_comment'></div>谋陷丰州。缘元和十三年已曾此来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373887_comment'></div>不可无备。太原兵额虽存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373887_comment'></div>皆被军将放却散诸处。缓急点集至难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373887_comment'></div>臣等商量。请发陈许步军三千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373887_comment'></div>郑滑步军三千人。令至太原屯集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373887_comment'></div>如北边有警。则大同军正当贼路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373887_comment'></div>足应事机。如河西有虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373887_comment'></div>便令取岚石路过河。至亦近便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373887_comment'></div>况两道人心忠义。徵发不难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373887_comment'></div>只如一年防秋。无所损费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373887_comment'></div>臣等询于物议。皆愿有此堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373887_comment'></div>伏惟圣明。特赐允纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373887_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1373887_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年10月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，闰九月，幽州军乱，逐节度使，李德裕措施处置。作品：《论幽州事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，九月，幽州军乱，十月，李德裕再次论幽州事。作品：《论幽州事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，闰九月，李德裕作书与义昌节度使、沧州刺史刘约，劝其效忠朝廷，助平幽州军乱。作品：《宰相与刘约书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373989?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宰相与刘约书</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373989")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373989'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373989'>张判官至。奉问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373989_comment'></div>具承情旨。尚书以幽蓟频有叛乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373989_comment'></div>志在澄清。远陈嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373989_comment'></div>益见忠恳。况先侍中累代继美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373989_comment'></div>功德在人。尚书自按邻封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373989_comment'></div>日彰惠政。想彼人情瞻望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373989_comment'></div>芬若椒兰。圣上天纵英明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373989_comment'></div>文武并用。正是忠良报国之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373989_comment'></div>将帅展力之时。圣意又以幽蓟一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373989_comment'></div>频害节将。惩其污俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373989_comment'></div>未欲加恩。张绛固须首变乱风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373989_comment'></div>恭俟朝旨。若拟作三军章表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373989_comment'></div>坐望兵符。窃料圣情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373989_comment'></div>未必允许。倘不早图良计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373989_comment'></div>先效赤诚。计不日之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373989_comment'></div>必又致变。闻彼军大将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373989_comment'></div>多是旧人。感先侍中深恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373989_comment'></div>聆尚书美政。导其善意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373989_comment'></div>必合遵承。且望密遣腹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373989_comment'></div>大布诚信。令张绛自求多福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373989_comment'></div>以保永安。若能请朝廷命帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373989_comment'></div>举尚书领镇。便自归阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373989_comment'></div>必不失二蕃金吾。若欲外任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373989_comment'></div>即商量宋亳大郡。便与亚相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373989_comment'></div>军中兼与二十万疋物充赏。大将以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373989_comment'></div>皆酬以官荣。令此一军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373989_comment'></div>永为朝廷心腹。倘不思大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373989_comment'></div>姑务因循。即三数月间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373989_comment'></div>且不问着。既未降朝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373989_comment'></div>何以保安。望尚书审更筹度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373989_comment'></div>早施方略。必不可费国家财力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373989_comment'></div>致他日兴师。倘成此功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373989_comment'></div>永光史策。张判官到后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373989_comment'></div>且详观事势。密自揣摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373989_comment'></div>可之与否。速望报示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373989_comment'></div>不宣。某等状上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373989_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1373989_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年10月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，十月，张绛自请为节度使，为张仲武所诛杀，幽州军乱平定，武宗欲加恩，李德裕令符澈与幽州大将张仲武书，意加恩时且须挫其气，先作书，观其报答词理，再做定夺。作品：《请令符澈与幽州大将书状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373941' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373941?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请令符澈与幽州大将书状</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373941'>右。访闻张仲武是幽州大将张朝先之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373941_comment'></div>沈勇有谋。陛下纵欲加恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373941_comment'></div>亦须且挫其气。又幽州旬月之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373941_comment'></div>移易三人。因此翻覆多端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373941_comment'></div>亦要令其知愧。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373941_comment'></div>且望令符澈与大将已下一书。观其报答词理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373941_comment'></div>足以知其情。出邻道节将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373941_comment'></div>于国体无亏。其书白谨同封进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373941_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1373941_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年10月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，十月，李德裕代符澈拟与幽州大将张仲武书，劝其主动谢罪朝廷，别请戎帅。作品：《代符澈与幽州大将书意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span><div id='poem_1373981' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373981' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373981?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代符澈与幽州大将书意</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373981")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373981_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373981'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373981'>某月日。河东节度使符澈致书幽州大将周都衙以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373981_comment'></div>比闻海内之论。幽州师有纪律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373981_comment'></div>人怀义心。河朔诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373981_comment'></div>以为模楷。今之所睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373981_comment'></div>异于是矣。窃知大将以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373981_comment'></div>初上表举陈行恭。寻又举张绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373981_comment'></div>皆云文武全才。军情悦服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373981_comment'></div>今又不容张绛。斥逐而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373981_comment'></div>取舍之间。苍黄骤变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373981_comment'></div>且举棋不定。春秋所讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373981_comment'></div>远近闻之。莫不𠷣笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373981_comment'></div>旬月之内。移易三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373981_comment'></div>不可谓师有纪律矣。不俟朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373981_comment'></div>专自树置。不可谓人怀义心矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373981_comment'></div>今思顿雪前耻。再取美名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373981_comment'></div>莫若谢罪朝廷。别请戎帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373981_comment'></div>如此则一军盛美。千古流芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373981_comment'></div>澈忝在近邻。素钦风仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373981_comment'></div>辄陈鄙见。实谓良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373981_comment'></div>幸大将等三思。不至疑惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373981_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1373981_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年10月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约十月，李德裕上奏劝谏武宗不宜数出游猎。作品：《论游幸状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，十一月初，李德裕请遣使至嗢没斯处，寻访太和公主下落。十一月，崔郸出为剑南西川节度使，李德裕有诗送之。作品：《请遣使访问太和公主状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请遣使访问太和公主状</a><span /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373888'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373888'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373888_comment'></div>伏以元和中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373888_comment'></div>回鹘累请和亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373888_comment'></div>宪宗不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373888_comment'></div>至长庆初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373888_comment'></div>穆宗以北虏代结姻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373888_comment'></div>中国无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373888_comment'></div>边境晏然。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373888_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373888_comment'></div>望令苗镇将一二十轻骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373888_comment'></div>若嗢没斯便受朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373888_comment'></div>固表恭顺之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373888_comment'></div>若辞拒此行。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1373888_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年12月14日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，十一月，乌介以太和公主名义遣使入朝，欲借唐之振武以居公主与可汗。十二月十四日，李德裕作《遣王会等安抚回鹘制》，请遣使王会抚慰，赈米二万斛，但不许借振武城，并劝其与唐保持和好。<span id='poem_sentence_1_1373969_comment'></div>九宫贵神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373969_comment'></div>实司水旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373969_comment'></div>功佐上帝。<div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年1月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，正月上旬，论祀九宫贵神。作品：《论九宫贵神合是大祠状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十一。）</span><div id='poem_1373970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373970?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论九宫贵神合是大祠状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373970")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373970_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373970'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373970'>右。既经两朝亲祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373970_comment'></div>必是祈请有徵。伏以自太和以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373970_comment'></div>水旱愆候。陛下常忧稼穑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373970_comment'></div>每念蒸人。臣等所以上副圣心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373970_comment'></div>以修坠礼。伏见太和三年礼官御史等状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373970_comment'></div>或言纵司水旱兵荒。品秩不过列宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373970_comment'></div>今者五星悉是从祀。日月犹在中祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373970_comment'></div>又云太一天一。此九神于天地犹子男也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373970_comment'></div>窃观其意。皆是以星辰不合比于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373970_comment'></div>曾不知统而言之。则为天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373970_comment'></div>而在天成象。自有尊卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373970_comment'></div>谨按后魏五均志。大辰第二星盛而常明者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373970_comment'></div>为天皇露寝。大帝常居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373970_comment'></div>始由道奥而陈变通之迹。又天皇大帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373970_comment'></div>其精耀魄宝。盖万神之秘图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373970_comment'></div>与河洛之命纪皆禀焉。此则上帝是星之明据也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373970_comment'></div>天一掌八气九精之政令。以佐天极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373970_comment'></div>微明而有常。则阴阳序而大运兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373970_comment'></div>太一掌十有六神之法度。以辅人极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373970_comment'></div>微明而得中。则神人和而王道平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373970_comment'></div>又北斗有衡权二星。天一太一参居其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373970_comment'></div>所以财成天工。辅相神道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373970_comment'></div>若一槩以列宿论之。实为乖谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373970_comment'></div>又按汉书。天神贵者天一太一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373970_comment'></div>佐曰五帝。古者天子以春秋祭太一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373970_comment'></div>则列于祀典。其来久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373970_comment'></div>今五帝犹为大祀。则太一岂宜降礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373970_comment'></div>稍重其祀。固为得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373970_comment'></div>刘向言祖宗所立神祇旧位。诚未易动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373970_comment'></div>又曰古今异制。经无明文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373970_comment'></div>至尊至重。难以疑说正也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373970_comment'></div>以刘向博通。尚难改作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373970_comment'></div>况臣等学不究于天人。礼尤懵于祀典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373970_comment'></div>妄为参酌。恐未得中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373970_comment'></div>伏望更令太常卿与礼官详定。庶获明据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373970_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1373970_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年1月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，正月己亥，进位司空，上表辞让，举太常卿王起自代。作品：《让司空后举太常卿王起自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1373904' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373904_comment'></div>常参官上后三日举一人自代者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373904_comment'></div>昔东汉以陈蕃为三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373904_comment'></div>其上表曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373904_comment'></div>不𠌤不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373904_comment'></div>率由旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373904_comment'></div>臣不如太常胡广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373904_comment'></div>臣伏见前件官五朝旧老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373904_comment'></div>一代名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373904_comment'></div>孔门四科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373904_comment'></div>实居其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373904_comment'></div>皋陶九德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373904_comment'></div>无不备包。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373904_comment'></div>实非饰请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373904_comment'></div>所冀虞邱无蔽贤之咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373904_comment'></div>臧文免窃位之讥。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，回鹘乌介可汗又向唐朝廷求粮，并称借振武城居住，二月，李德裕撰《赐回鹘书意》，称城不可借，其余酌予应允。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373791' id='poem_sentence_26_1373791_comment'></div>及安存摩尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373791_comment'></div>寻勘退浑党项劫掠等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373791_comment'></div>并当应接处置。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年2月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，二月，李德裕奏上《条疏太原以北边备事宜状》，主张增兵防守，采取积极防御措施。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>条疏太原以北边备事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373942")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373942_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373942'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373942_comment'></div>云州之北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373942_comment'></div>并是散地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373942_comment'></div>备御之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373942_comment'></div>系把头烽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373942_comment'></div>今符澈虽修缮已毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373942_comment'></div>把头烽内并未添兵镇守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373942_comment'></div>事同虚设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373942_comment'></div>恐不应机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373942_comment'></div>未废把头烽以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373942_comment'></div>把头烽内旧有军镇数处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373942_comment'></div>自废把头烽后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373942_comment'></div>并合抽却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373942_comment'></div>望令巡边使速与符澈计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373942_comment'></div>却抽旧兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373942_comment'></div>依前制置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373942_comment'></div>如旧兵已少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373942_comment'></div>即于太原城下及閒处抽兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373942_comment'></div>其与山东接处及西北镇兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373942_comment'></div>不在抽限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373942_comment'></div>如更要筑堡城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373942_comment'></div>亦委逐便制置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373942_comment'></div>三受降城相去四百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373942_comment'></div>自置天德军及振武节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373942_comment'></div>其东受降城中并在腹内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373942_comment'></div>都无大段兵马镇守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373942_comment'></div>就中中受降城不过三五十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373942_comment'></div>古城摧断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373942_comment'></div>都不修筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373942_comment'></div>今虏众在阴山之北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373942_comment'></div>山中尽有过路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373942_comment'></div>若突出山南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373942_comment'></div>便入二城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373942_comment'></div>即天德振武当时隔断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373942_comment'></div>其中受降城本是突厥拂云祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373942_comment'></div>最是要地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373942_comment'></div>今天德人力不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373942_comment'></div>望令太原振武共出三千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373942_comment'></div>速与修筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373942_comment'></div>便令镇守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373942_comment'></div>即天德形势自壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373942_comment'></div>虏骑不敢窥边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373942_comment'></div>东受降城缘是近年新筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373942_comment'></div>城内无水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373942_comment'></div>城外取金河水充饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373942_comment'></div>又于城西门掘一二十井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373942_comment'></div>若被围守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373942_comment'></div>即须困蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373942_comment'></div>今筑月城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373942_comment'></div>护取井水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373942_comment'></div>其张仁愿旧城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373942_comment'></div>颇当要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373942_comment'></div>张惟清错奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373942_comment'></div>恐黄河侵坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373942_comment'></div>先贤制置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373942_comment'></div>皆有神灵保持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373942_comment'></div>废来二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373942_comment'></div>基址依旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373942_comment'></div>园蔬树木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373942_comment'></div>至今尽在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373942_comment'></div>隔河便是胜州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373942_comment'></div>相去数里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373942_comment'></div>望委巡边使与刘沔计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373942_comment'></div>如何却复旧城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373942_comment'></div>至为稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373942_comment'></div>以前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373942_comment'></div>臣等伏以回鹘在边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373942_comment'></div>切须有备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373942_comment'></div>边备既壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373942_comment'></div>制置不难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373942_comment'></div>访问利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373942_comment'></div>大约如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373942_comment'></div>要切须得使臣专往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373942_comment'></div>自验机宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373942_comment'></div>谨具条疏如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373942_comment'></div>其间条疏不尽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373942_comment'></div>望委巡边使与所在节度使商量闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373942_comment'></div>谨具于前条疏应接天德讨逐回鹘事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373942_comment'></div>请速降中使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373942_comment'></div>赍敕至云朔天德已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373942_comment'></div>宣谕生熟退浑及党项诸部落等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373942_comment'></div>待天德交锋后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373942_comment'></div>任随便出军讨逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373942_comment'></div>如得羊马钱物奴婢等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373942_comment'></div>任便本主自收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373942_comment'></div>官中更不寻问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373942_comment'></div>仍据杀戮回鹘多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373942_comment'></div>别议优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373942_comment'></div>自古出师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373942_comment'></div>皆有副贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373942_comment'></div>以防主将有故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373942_comment'></div>便须得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373942_comment'></div>石雄骁勇善战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373942_comment'></div>当今无敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1373942_comment'></div>望授天德军都防御副使兼马步都知兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1373942_comment'></div>助田牟攻讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1373942_comment'></div>仍勒乘递赴天德军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1373942_comment'></div>回鹘药罗葛元政马价绢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1373942_comment'></div>望且勒留在振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1373942_comment'></div>令中使与忠顺同检点收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1373942_comment'></div>如田牟已用兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1373942_comment'></div>其药罗葛元政便望委忠顺收录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1373942_comment'></div>如请归降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1373942_comment'></div>仍作般次送付太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1373942_comment'></div>除首领外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1373942_comment'></div>委刘沔且散配仪沁岚石等州去塞远处安置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1373942_comment'></div>并官给粮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1373942_comment'></div>如不肯降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1373942_comment'></div>即须收系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1373942_comment'></div>待后处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1373942_comment'></div>其赵进用等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1373942_comment'></div>亦望诏刘沔收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1373942_comment'></div>其首领于公馆安置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1373942_comment'></div>长行等散配诸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1373942_comment'></div>田牟都似不晓兵机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1373942_comment'></div>奏状已出三千人拒回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1373942_comment'></div>计其兵数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1373942_comment'></div>必是全军尽出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1373942_comment'></div>忽有不利。<div id='poem_sentence_127_1373942_comment'></div>是戎虏所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1373942_comment'></div>攻城围守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1373942_comment'></div>戎虏所短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1373942_comment'></div>方可逐便讨除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373899_comment'></div>或兴王旧邦。或陪京近地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373899_comment'></div>州县之职。人合为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373899_comment'></div>只缘俸禄寡薄。官同比远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373899_comment'></div>元和六年闰十二月十二日及元和七年十二月二十四日敕。河中凤翔鄜坊邠州易定等道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373899_comment'></div>令户部加给俸料钱。共当六万二千五百贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373899_comment'></div>吏曹出得平留官数百员。时议以为至当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373899_comment'></div>自后访闻户部所给零碎。兼不及时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373899_comment'></div>观察使以为虚折。皆别将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373899", 1373899, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>破用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373899_comment'></div>徒有加给。不及官人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373899_comment'></div>近地好官。依前比远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373899_comment'></div>伏望今日以后。户部却与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373899", id='poem_sentence_12_1373899_comment'></div>随月加给官人。不得别将<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1373899", 1373899, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>破用</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373899_comment'></div>如有违越。观察判官远贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373899_comment'></div>观察使奏取进止。又选人官成后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373899_comment'></div>皆于城中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1373899", 1373899, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>举债</span>。到任填还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373899_comment'></div>致其贪求。罔不由此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373899_comment'></div>其今年河东陇州鄜坊邠州新授比远官等。望许连状相保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373942_comment'></div>颇当要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373942_comment'></div>张惟清错奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373942_comment'></div>恐黄河侵坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373942_comment'></div>先贤制置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373942_comment'></div>皆有神灵保持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373942_comment'></div>废来二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373942_comment'></div>基址依旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373942_comment'></div>园蔬树木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373942_comment'></div>至今尽在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373942_comment'></div>隔河便是胜州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373942_comment'></div>相去数里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373942_comment'></div>望委巡边使与刘沔计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373942_comment'></div>如何却复旧城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373942_comment'></div>至为稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373942_comment'></div>以前件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373942_comment'></div>臣等伏以回鹘在边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373942_comment'></div>切须有备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373942_comment'></div>边备既壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373942_comment'></div>制置不难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373942_comment'></div>访问利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373942_comment'></div>大约如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373942_comment'></div>要切须得使臣专往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373942_comment'></div>自验机宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373942_comment'></div>谨具条疏如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373942_comment'></div>其间条疏不尽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373942_comment'></div>望委巡边使与所在节度使商量闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373942_comment'></div>谨具于前条疏应接天德讨逐回鹘事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373942_comment'></div>请速降中使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373942_comment'></div>赍敕至云朔天德已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373942_comment'></div>宣谕生熟退浑及党项诸部落等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373942_comment'></div>待天德交锋后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373942_comment'></div>任随便出军讨逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373942_comment'></div>如得羊马钱物奴婢等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373942_comment'></div>任便本主自收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373942_comment'></div>官中更不寻问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373942_comment'></div>仍据杀戮回鹘多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373942_comment'></div>别议优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373942_comment'></div>自古出师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373942_comment'></div>皆有副贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373942_comment'></div>以防主将有故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373942_comment'></div>便须得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373942_comment'></div>石雄骁勇善战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373942_comment'></div>当今无敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1373942_comment'></div>望授天德军都防御副使兼马步都知兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1373942_comment'></div>助田牟攻讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1373942_comment'></div>仍勒乘递赴天德军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1373942_comment'></div>回鹘药罗葛元政马价绢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1373942_comment'></div>望且勒留在振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1373942_comment'></div>令中使与忠顺同检点收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1373942_comment'></div>如田牟已用兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1373942_comment'></div>其药罗葛元政便望委忠顺收录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1373942_comment'></div>如请归降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1373942_comment'></div>仍作般次送付太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1373942_comment'></div>除首领外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1373942_comment'></div>委刘沔且散配仪沁岚石等州去塞远处安置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1373942_comment'></div>并官给粮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1373942_comment'></div>如不肯降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1373942_comment'></div>即须收系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1373942_comment'></div>待后处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1373942_comment'></div>其赵进用等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1373942_comment'></div>亦望诏刘沔收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1373942_comment'></div>其首领于公馆安置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1373942_comment'></div>长行等散配诸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1373942_comment'></div>田牟都似不晓兵机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1373942_comment'></div>奏状已出三千人拒回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1373942_comment'></div>计其兵数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1373942_comment'></div>必是全军尽出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1373942_comment'></div>忽有不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1373942_comment'></div>城内岂免空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1373942_comment'></div>马上驰突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1373942_comment'></div>是戎虏所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1373942_comment'></div>攻城围守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1373942_comment'></div>戎虏所短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1373942_comment'></div>田牟只合坚守城垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1373942_comment'></div>以俟救兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1373942_comment'></div>望速诏田牟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1373942_comment'></div>辄不得出兵野战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1373942_comment'></div>待诸处兵至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1373942_comment'></div>方可逐便讨除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_137_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1373942_comment'></div>回鹘马军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1373942_comment'></div>难于支敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1373942_comment'></div>依林守险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1373942_comment'></div>须用弓弩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1373942_comment'></div>望于浙西取弩手四百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1373942_comment'></div>宣州取弩手三百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1373942_comment'></div>令从河曲路赴天德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1373942_comment'></div>如所在逢回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1373942_comment'></div>便令把隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1373942_comment'></div>及依丛林射马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1373942_comment'></div>河曲路与天德直对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1373942_comment'></div>兼经历盐夏等州所在要处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1373942_comment'></div>便堪应急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1373942_comment'></div>到天德后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1373942_comment'></div>权取田牟指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1373942_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1373942_comment'></div>嗢没斯诚款虽未知真伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1373942_comment'></div>然早要别加官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1373942_comment'></div>纵使不诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1373942_comment'></div>亦是反间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1373942_comment'></div>且要奖其忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1373942_comment'></div>为讨伐之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1373942_comment'></div>令远近诸蕃知朝廷只是责可汗犯顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1373942_comment'></div>非是要灭回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1373942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_162_1373942'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1373942_comment'></div>回鹘既之粮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1373942_comment'></div>又累年劳苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1373942_comment'></div>人心易动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1373942_comment'></div>必可招降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1373942_comment'></div>望且遣田牟速招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1373942_comment'></div>降者许以优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1373942_comment'></div>如有降虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1373942_comment'></div>旋给粮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1373942_comment'></div>递过太原取优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1373942_comment'></div>不得留在天德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1373942_comment'></div>以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1373942_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1373942_comment'></div>若待天德奏到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1373942_comment'></div>已恐不及事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1373942_comment'></div>望付翰林各撰密诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1373942_comment'></div>令中使向前审详事势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1373942_comment'></div>如已接战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1373942_comment'></div>便须准此处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1373942_comment'></div>如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1373942_comment'></div>其石雄便须今日降敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1373942_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_183_1373942'></div><div id='poem_sentence_183_1373942_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年4月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，四月，再次上疏请赐幽州张仲武诏，令其与契丹等同驱逐回鹘。作品：《奏回鹘事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见陆心源《唐文拾遗》）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，回鹘嗢没斯部归唐，李德裕代皇帝撰书回复可汗请求粮食牛羊与送归嗢没斯事。作品：《赐回鹘可汗书意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373792?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐回鹘可汗书意</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373792")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373792'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373792'>杨观至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373792_comment'></div>览表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373792_comment'></div>欲求粮食牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373792_comment'></div>粮食已许自巳马价绢就振武和籴三千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373792_comment'></div>缘中国以农为本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373792_comment'></div>最贵耕牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373792_comment'></div>百姓所蓄无多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373792_comment'></div>常断屠杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373792_comment'></div>羊则产于北土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373792_comment'></div>不出中华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373792_comment'></div>惟塞上蕃浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373792_comment'></div>各有畜牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373792_comment'></div>朝廷未尝徵率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373792_comment'></div>务使安存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373792_comment'></div>今之所求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373792_comment'></div>难允来意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373792_comment'></div>又所请束缚嗢没斯送归者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373792_comment'></div>嗢没斯比自投边将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373792_comment'></div>屡献诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373792_comment'></div>自本国破亡之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373792_comment'></div>奔迸先至塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373792_comment'></div>不随可汗公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373792_comment'></div>已是二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373792_comment'></div>虑彼猜嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373792_comment'></div>自怀忧惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373792_comment'></div>穷迫归命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373792_comment'></div>望朕保持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373792_comment'></div>未尝有交构之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373792_comment'></div>离间两国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373792_comment'></div>前可汗已缘失制驭之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373792_comment'></div>无兼爱之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373792_comment'></div>侵扰诸蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373792_comment'></div>肆为暴虐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373792_comment'></div>所以亲属内叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373792_comment'></div>部落外离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373792_comment'></div>国破家残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373792_comment'></div>实由于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373792_comment'></div>今可汗失地远客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373792_comment'></div>危难之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373792_comment'></div>尤须追悔前非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373792_comment'></div>以安反侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373792_comment'></div>若又仁爱不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373792_comment'></div>骨月相残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373792_comment'></div>可汗左右信臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373792_comment'></div>谁敢自保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373792_comment'></div>朕统万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373792_comment'></div>非止一蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373792_comment'></div>未附者须务怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373792_comment'></div>归诚者因宜存抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373792_comment'></div>倘徇可汗之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373792_comment'></div>殊乖覆育之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373792_comment'></div>今已特许归降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373792_comment'></div>止于存其种族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373792_comment'></div>必不别有任使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373792_comment'></div>授以腹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373792_comment'></div>在可汗不失恩慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373792_comment'></div>于朝廷免亏信义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373792_comment'></div>岂不两全事体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373792_comment'></div>深叶良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373792_comment'></div>况前代以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373792_comment'></div>尽有故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373792_comment'></div>汉朝呼延邪单于塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373792_comment'></div>其下大将乌厉屈乌厉温敦并来降附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373792_comment'></div>汉宣帝封以列侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373792_comment'></div>又国初颉利可汗之破败也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373792_comment'></div>降者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373792_comment'></div>酋豪首领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373792_comment'></div>至朝廷皆拜将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373792_comment'></div>仅百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373792_comment'></div>无不抚纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373792_comment'></div>想可汗深明朕意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373792_comment'></div>勿更再论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373792_comment'></div>摩尼教天宝以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373792_comment'></div>中国禁断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373792_comment'></div>自累朝缘回鹘敬信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373792_comment'></div>始许兴行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373792_comment'></div>江淮数镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373792_comment'></div>皆令阐教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373792_comment'></div>近各得本道申奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373792_comment'></div>缘自闻回鹘破亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373792_comment'></div>奉法因兹懈怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373792_comment'></div>蕃僧在彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373792_comment'></div>稍似无依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373792_comment'></div>吴楚水乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373792_comment'></div>人性嚣薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373792_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_85_1373792", 1373792, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>信心</span>既去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373792_comment'></div>翕习至难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373792_comment'></div>且佛是大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373792_comment'></div>尚随缘行教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373792_comment'></div>与苍生缘尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373792_comment'></div>终不力为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373792_comment'></div>朕深念异国远僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373792_comment'></div>欲其安堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373792_comment'></div>且令于两都及太原信向处行教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373792_comment'></div>其江淮诸寺权停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373792_comment'></div>待回鹘本土安宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373792_comment'></div>即却令如旧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1373792_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，回鹘嗢没斯部归唐，五月，唐授其为左金吾大将军、怀化郡王，并与其部众米、绢等，以其所部归义军，回鹘嗢充军使，改名李思忠，随唐军征讨乌介。作品：《授嗢没斯可特进行左金吾卫大将军员外置仍封怀化郡王制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span>《授历支特勒以下官制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span>《论嗢没斯特勒等状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span>《论嗢没斯下将士二千六百一十八人赐号状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span>《授嗢没斯检校工部尚书兼归义军使制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span>《请赐嗢没斯枪旗状》<span </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373736")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373736_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373736'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373736'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373736_comment'></div>昔秩訾献筹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373736_comment'></div>归忠于大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373736_comment'></div>日逐避祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373736_comment'></div>纳款于明庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373736_comment'></div>宣帝嘉其一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373736_comment'></div>宠以优礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373736_comment'></div>或存故王之印绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373736_comment'></div>或赐归德之美名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373736_comment'></div>爰举旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373736_comment'></div>式崇新命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373736_comment'></div>回鹘嗢没斯特勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373736_comment'></div>倜傥慕义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373736_comment'></div>深沉有谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373736_comment'></div>駃騠之生超千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373736_comment'></div>鸷鹗之击厉九秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373736_comment'></div>属献款诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373736_comment'></div>布于边将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373736_comment'></div>寻执丑虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373736_comment'></div>不遗君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373736_comment'></div>戢其馁殍之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373736_comment'></div>曾靡秋毫之犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373736_comment'></div>旋观所履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373736_comment'></div>大节甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373736_comment'></div>朕与回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373736_comment'></div>代结和亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373736_comment'></div>久敦邻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373736_comment'></div>念其乖乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373736_comment'></div>义在固存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373736_comment'></div>莫若抚其酋豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373736_comment'></div>显其大顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373736_comment'></div>使诸蕃知我招携之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373736_comment'></div>更逾往昔之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373736_comment'></div>仍加带砺之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373736_comment'></div>俾授爪牙之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373736_comment'></div>服兹休宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373736_comment'></div>可不敬哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1373736_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373738' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373738' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373738?labeling=true' "poem_title_1373738")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373738_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373738'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373738'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373738_comment'></div>国家与回鹘久修邻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373738_comment'></div>重以姻亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373738_comment'></div>视其酋豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373738_comment'></div>犹吾赤子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373738_comment'></div>属本蕃乖乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373738_comment'></div>种落未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373738_comment'></div>君长之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373738_comment'></div>自相疑阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373738_comment'></div>穷而归款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373738_comment'></div>得不抚宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373738_comment'></div>况尔等生戴斗之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373738_comment'></div>精能贯日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373738_comment'></div>负射雕之艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373738_comment'></div>气乃凌云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373738_comment'></div>忠而善谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373738_comment'></div>勇则能断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373738_comment'></div>率其骁骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373738_comment'></div>来附北边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373738_comment'></div>愿削衽以图全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373738_comment'></div>且櫜弓而俟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373738_comment'></div>矢其一志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373738_comment'></div>之死靡他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373738_comment'></div>既投我以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373738_comment'></div>则招之以礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373738_comment'></div>昔徐卢款塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373738_comment'></div>即受汉封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373738_comment'></div>比能入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373738_comment'></div>仍疏魏爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373738_comment'></div>今则解其被毳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373738_comment'></div>荣以彯缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373738_comment'></div>爰嘉介石之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373738_comment'></div>式宠衔珠之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373738_comment'></div>秺侯忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373738_comment'></div>可保于克终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373738_comment'></div>安上子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373738_comment'></div>方期于必贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373738_comment'></div>勉兹师律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373738_comment'></div>为我信臣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1373738_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373926' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373926?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论嗢没斯特勒等状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373926")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373926_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373926'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373926'>右。自回鹘近边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373926_comment'></div>人情疑恐。圣化所感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373926_comment'></div>威德克宣。果得嗢没斯望阙归心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373926_comment'></div>率徒效命。必在优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373926_comment'></div>昭示四方。使戎狄远闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373926_comment'></div>皆感恩信。望速降中使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373926_comment'></div>宣慰嗢没斯特勒及王子等。并多揽将军共七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373926_comment'></div>望各内赐锦䌽银器。其嗢没斯下兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373926_comment'></div>望赐米五十石。度支给绢三千疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373926_comment'></div>以户部物充。度支速差正纲般送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373926_comment'></div>仍许不分散部落。待委知事情续议制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373926_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1373926_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373927' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373927' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373927?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论嗢没斯下将士二千六百一十八人赐号状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373927")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373927_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373927'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373927'>右。嗢没斯下将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373927_comment'></div>既与衣粮。又加冠带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373927_comment'></div>赐其军号。实壮边声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373927_comment'></div>抚循其人。莫切于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373927_comment'></div>臣等商量。望赐号归义军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373927_comment'></div>仍望翰林赐敕书。宣示嗢没斯下归义军将士等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373927_comment'></div>其嗢没斯望且令兼充归义军使。如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373927_comment'></div>便添入加工部尚书制宣行。仍与中书门下敕牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373927_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1373927_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373737' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373737' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373737?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授嗢没斯检校工部尚书兼归义军使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373737")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373737_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373737'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373737'>敕。回鹘代雄绝漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373737_comment'></div>名振北蕃。而乃厌金革之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373737_comment'></div>慕朝廷之礼。愿袭冠带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373737_comment'></div>思睹汉仪。蝉蜕自致于洁清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373737_comment'></div>豹变独蔚其文彩。不有豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373737_comment'></div>孰启壮图。嗢没斯禀气阴山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373737_comment'></div>降精斗极。生知忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373737_comment'></div>神授兵钤。自强之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373737_comment'></div>隐如敌国。卫上之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373737_comment'></div>森若戈矛。果能因乱布诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373737_comment'></div>睹几立节。深叶怀柔之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373737_comment'></div>不因告谕之词。昔者取士殊邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373737_comment'></div>秦能致霸。得贤异壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373737_comment'></div>晋实用材。是用优以宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373737_comment'></div>处之权贵。褒纳忠之显效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373737_comment'></div>锡归义之美名。俾建旆于新军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373737_comment'></div>示绝席于诸将。勉修臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373737_comment'></div>服我官常。可检校工部尚书兼左金吾卫大将军同正充归义军使怀化郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373737_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373737_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请赐嗢没斯枪旗状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373929")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373929_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373929'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373929'>右。嗢没斯既加军号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373929_comment'></div>甚壮边城。锡以牙旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373929_comment'></div>尤彰宠异。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373929_comment'></div>望依神策诸城镇使例。赐以旗两口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373929_comment'></div>豹尾两对。器仗并刀一副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373929_comment'></div>令中使押领宣赐。如以中使行速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373929_comment'></div>赍持稍难。其枪旗令于太原节度使下拣新好者充赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373929_comment'></div>亦稳便。谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373929_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1373929_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373910' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373910' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373910?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣示嗢没斯等冠带讫图状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373910")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373910_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373910'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373910'>伏以汉宣帝时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373910_comment'></div>呼韩单于来朝京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373910_comment'></div>然待以客礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373910_comment'></div>未备汉仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373910_comment'></div>至后汉建武二十六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373910_comment'></div>单于慕先人之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373910_comment'></div>归心中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373910_comment'></div>光武修祖宗之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373910_comment'></div>柔服北边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373910_comment'></div>因其称藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373910_comment'></div>始加冠带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373910_comment'></div>厥后绵历五代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373910_comment'></div>仅及千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373910_comment'></div>惟闻征伐之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373910_comment'></div>莫睹来廷之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373910_comment'></div>伏惟陛下功高汉后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373910_comment'></div>威服穷荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373910_comment'></div>不劳六月之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373910_comment'></div>坐俟七旬之格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373910_comment'></div>故得嗢没斯誓心向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373910_comment'></div>稽首归忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373910_comment'></div>自献刑马之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373910_comment'></div>仍酌留犁之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373910_comment'></div>永励臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373910_comment'></div>以保塞垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373910_comment'></div>今则荣以彯缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373910_comment'></div>解其衣毳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373910_comment'></div>簪笏就列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373910_comment'></div>威仪可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373910_comment'></div>推劲悍之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373910_comment'></div>岂劳戴鹖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373910_comment'></div>服礼义之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373910_comment'></div>宁比冠鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373910_comment'></div>鉴于丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373910_comment'></div>益表神化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373910_comment'></div>臣等谬参枢近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373910_comment'></div>获睹成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373910_comment'></div>欢忭之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373910_comment'></div>倍万常品。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1373910_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，回鹘嗢没斯部归唐，李德裕奉召撰《异域归忠传》表其功，并撰序。作品：《异域归忠传序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373997' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373997' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373997?labeling=true' target='_blank'>异域归忠传序</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373997")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373997'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373997'>会昌二年四月甲申。回鹘大将勒嗢没斯率其国特勒宰相尚书将军凡十二人大首领三十七人骑士二千一百六十八人内附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373997_comment'></div>制授嗢没斯特进检校工部尚书左金吾卫大将军同正。封怀化郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373997_comment'></div>其酋帅遍加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>戎秩</span>。赐之金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373997_comment'></div>于是穹庐之长。尽识汉仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373997_comment'></div>左衽之人。咸被王泽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373997_comment'></div>臣闻书载率服。美大舜之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373997_comment'></div>诗列既平。显周宣之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373997_comment'></div>暨汉宣帝。亦单于慕义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373997_comment'></div>呼韩来朝。历纪数千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373997_comment'></div>称者三代。则知非常之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373997_comment'></div>必待非常之君。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>诚契</span>感通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373997_comment'></div>斯为难遇。伏惟仁圣文武至神大孝皇帝绍高祖太宗之神武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373997_comment'></div>慕玄宗宪宗之远略。英才天纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373997_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>武节</span>霆驰。静深之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373997_comment'></div>渊然若海。先定之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373997_comment'></div>屹然若山。自嗢没斯归款朔边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373997_comment'></div>注心魏阙。制置大略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373997_comment'></div>尽出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>宸算</span>。汉高从善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373997_comment'></div>能用六奇。光武<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>揣情</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373997_comment'></div>坐知千里。诸将无搴旗之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373997_comment'></div>群臣乏借箸之筹。夫天以信而成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373997_comment'></div>地以定而载物。惟大君懋一德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373997_comment'></div>法两仪。故能怀异俗之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373997_comment'></div>盛中兴之业。嗢没斯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373997_comment'></div>回鹘之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>贵酋</span>也。夙禀正性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373997_comment'></div>生知大义。识倚伏之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373997_comment'></div>明祸福之机。回鹘运属天亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373997_comment'></div>岁久不稔。畜产大耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373997_comment'></div>国邑为虚。流亡遍于沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373997_comment'></div>僵仆被于草莽。由是国之将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373997_comment'></div>各率支兵。或入西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373997_comment'></div>或归诸部。惟嗢没斯精诚上达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373997_comment'></div>天诱其衷。拔自狼居之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373997_comment'></div>愿拜龙颜之主。封章沥恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373997_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1373997", 1373997, "Clauses/68/Comments/0")'>指日誓心</span>。不夺之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373997_comment'></div>介如石矣。先是有赤心宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373997_comment'></div>桀傲乱常。颇为边患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373997_comment'></div>嗢没斯潜布诚款于天德军使田牟。暴其罪状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373997_comment'></div>枭首以徇。归大国明也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373997_comment'></div>戴圣君忠也。去乱邦智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373997_comment'></div>执丑虏义也。具此四美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373997_comment'></div>是谓诚臣。昔仲尼知曾参孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373997_comment'></div>因为陈君臣父子之义。以著孝经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373997_comment'></div>今圣主以嗢没斯忠。爰采武功贞烈之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373997_comment'></div>以为归忠传。则圣人善诱之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373997_comment'></div>又何以加于此乎。乃集秦汉以来至圣朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373997_comment'></div>去绝域归中国。以名节自著功业保忠者三十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373997_comment'></div>勒成上下两卷。其不自献款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373997_comment'></div>无迹可称者。今并不载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373997_comment'></div>臣又闻为善者天报之以福。为不善者天报之以殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373997_comment'></div>神道昭晰。应如影响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373997_comment'></div>嗢没斯方欲保大节。成大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373997_comment'></div>宜乎佩服斯文。以为鉴戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373997_comment'></div>臣备位台铉。获奉睿谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373997_comment'></div>受诏序事。冠于篇首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373997_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1373997_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373912'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373912'>奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373912_comment'></div>卿所进异域归忠传两卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373912_comment'></div>宜写赐嗢没斯序中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373912_comment'></div>仍云奉敕撰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373912_comment'></div>臣才识浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373912_comment'></div>学艺空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373912_comment'></div>轻黩宸严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373912_comment'></div>方怀兢惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373912_comment'></div>岂望圣慈宏贷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373912_comment'></div>特假宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373912_comment'></div>颁赐归国之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373912_comment'></div>仍荣奉敕之字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373912_comment'></div>草木承雨露之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373912_comment'></div>皆被鲜辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373912_comment'></div>烟霞照日月之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373912_comment'></div>尽成䌽缋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373912_comment'></div>顾臣璅陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373912_comment'></div>获奉殊恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373912_comment'></div>竹帛垂荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373912_comment'></div>传于不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373912_comment'></div>不任荷恩感戴之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373912_comment'></div>今既奉敕撰序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373912_comment'></div>与臣自进不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373912_comment'></div>序中已改两处讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373912_comment'></div>谨同封进上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373912_comment'></div>如允圣意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373912_comment'></div>伏望宣付中书门下。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1373912_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，回鹘嗢没斯部归唐，有《异域归忠传》表其功，帝有赏，李德裕谢赐锦彩银器。作品：《谢赐锦彩银器状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_1373922' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373922' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373922?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐锦䌽银器状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373922")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373922_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373922'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373922'>中使田献锷至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373922_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373922_comment'></div>赐臣前件锦䌽银器等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373922_comment'></div>臣伏闻虞舜舞干而苗人来格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373922_comment'></div>周穆徂征而荒服不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373922_comment'></div>即知王者之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373922_comment'></div>莫大于耀德戢兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373922_comment'></div>安人柔远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373922_comment'></div>伏以陛下圣德广运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373922_comment'></div>神武照临。<div class='inline'
