class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373922_comment'></div>而边鄙乂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373922_comment'></div>臣愿以鸿猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373922_comment'></div>播于蕃帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373922_comment'></div>因缀古今之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373922_comment'></div>庶坚忠义之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373922_comment'></div>岂意慈容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373922_comment'></div>厚加宠锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373922_comment'></div>班行耸听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373922_comment'></div>里闬生光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373922_comment'></div>非止阖门之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373922_comment'></div>实增后代之价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373922_comment'></div>仰惭恩覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373922_comment'></div>倍积兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373922_comment'></div>臣不任忻忭感戴之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1373922_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，回鹘嗢没斯部归唐，五月，唐授其为左金吾大将军、怀化郡王，并与其部众米、绢等，以其所部归义军，回鹘嗢充军使，改名李思忠，随唐军征讨乌介。作品：《奉宣嗢没斯所请落下马价绢便赐与可汗稳便否奏来者状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span>《论嗢没斯家口等状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论嗢没斯所请落下马价绢赐与可汗状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373932")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373932'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373932'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373932_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373932_comment'></div>赐可汗甚全国体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373932_comment'></div>望付翰林赐可汗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373932_comment'></div>得嗢没斯表称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373932_comment'></div>在本分马价绢并合落下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373932_comment'></div>请充进奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373932_comment'></div>以可汗本国破残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373932_comment'></div>久在边陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373932_comment'></div>此已量与嗢没斯以下本分马价绢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373932_comment'></div>便赐可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373932_comment'></div>兼望赐嗢没斯诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373932_comment'></div>奖其忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373932_comment'></div>缘卿率众归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373932_comment'></div>若又落下马价绢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373932_comment'></div>恐可汗与卿结怨转深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373932_comment'></div>事体之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373932_comment'></div>亦虑非便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373932_comment'></div>以卿等所请奏进奉马价绢回赐可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373932_comment'></div>所冀部落早退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373932_comment'></div>令卿等各保安谧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373932_comment'></div>望约此意处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373932_comment'></div>寔为允惬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1373932_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373930' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373930' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373930?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论嗢没斯家口等状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373930")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373930_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373930'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373930'>右。嗢没斯既加军号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373930_comment'></div>请留家口在太原安置。与诸弟等若处先登者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373930_comment'></div>臣等商量。嗢没斯赤诚向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373930_comment'></div>极力捍边。请遣宗族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373930_comment'></div>尽归内地。非惟绝其顾望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373930_comment'></div>足以坚彼斗心。望诏刘沔义忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373930_comment'></div>于云朔等州。拣一空閒城垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373930_comment'></div>兼与随事造土屋。其嗢没斯及爱耶勿宰相等家口等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373930_comment'></div>即与别造壮净屋宇安置。其应归汉家口等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373930_comment'></div>大口每月给米三㪷充粮食。委度支供军使逐月支给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373930_comment'></div>仍委刘沔差汉兵勾当防援。不得令侧近部落侵扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373930_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1373930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，张仲武破回鹘某部，李德裕奏请归送俘虏回乡。作品：《奏张仲武寄回鹘生口驼马状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_1373897' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373897' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373897?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张仲武寄回鹘生口驼马状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373897")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373897_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373897'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373897'>右。臣等旧读实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373897_comment'></div>不至遗忘。伏思累圣以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373897_comment'></div>未有此例。谨按左传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373897_comment'></div>诸侯不相遗俘。昔鲁受齐俘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373897_comment'></div>见讥左氏。诸侯尚为非礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373897_comment'></div>况在台臣。臣等忝备钧衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373897_comment'></div>须谨绳墨。若苟受私遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373897_comment'></div>不守旧章。则何以上戴圣君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373897_comment'></div>仪刑百辟。伏望圣恩尽许却还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373897_comment'></div>从此便为故事。仍望许臣与一书报答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373897_comment'></div>令其深谕国体。其书草续撰进上以闻。<div class='inline' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373979")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373979_comment'></div>未得般次归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373979_comment'></div>不知今日推明日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373979_comment'></div>回鹘闻此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373979_comment'></div>尽头闷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373979_comment'></div>国家富有四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373979_comment'></div>岂惜微细资财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373979_comment'></div>比在京交付药罗葛九政<span class='inlineComment2'>（药罗葛氏也）</span>之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373979_comment'></div>已不管领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373979_comment'></div>只缘可汗都无定所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373979_comment'></div>来去不常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373979_comment'></div>又无大段驼马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373979_comment'></div>自取般次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373979_comment'></div>恐诸蕃劫夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373979_comment'></div>须稍安详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373979_comment'></div>欲令送至东北岭外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373979_comment'></div>忽虑万一散失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373979_comment'></div>又以词语见尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373979_comment'></div>望依前自遣驼马般运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373979_comment'></div>此令兵马护送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373979_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373979_comment'></div>嗢没斯王子不合亲近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373979_comment'></div>我国家统御四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373979_comment'></div>皆同赤子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373979_comment'></div>倘顺于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373979_comment'></div>尽合绥怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373979_comment'></div>如天地之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373979_comment'></div>无不覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373979_comment'></div>如江海之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373979_comment'></div>无不包容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373979_comment'></div>况嗢没斯是先可汗子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373979_comment'></div>今可汗兄弟穷而归命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373979_comment'></div>尤所矜怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373979_comment'></div>若弃其款诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373979_comment'></div>何以柔远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373979_comment'></div>回鹘须自愧不恤兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373979_comment'></div>令其不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373979_comment'></div>更欲追寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373979_comment'></div>是何道理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373979_comment'></div>彼酋长如迫于饥渴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373979_comment'></div>愿归国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373979_comment'></div>优待之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373979_comment'></div>必与嗢没斯无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373979_comment'></div>想知朝廷眷遇回鹘之深也。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373979_comment'></div>朝廷岂有所惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373979_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373979_comment'></div>回鹘往前蕃人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373979_comment'></div>易动难安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373979_comment'></div>不可制得。<div id='poem_sentence_63_1373979_comment'></div>岂肯敬贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373979_comment'></div>忠顺边将粗才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373979_comment'></div>性本愚直。<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373934'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373934'>右。臣等昨日已于延英面奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373934_comment'></div>请太原振武天德各加兵备。向后不更往来救援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373934_comment'></div>伏蒙圣恩许臣等以进状。请更徵发陈许徐汝襄阳等兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373934_comment'></div>今回鹘虽已抽退。康志亮称退浑走捉岚石等州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373934_comment'></div>臣等料其必归灵夏。又河曲党项向与回鹘有雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373934_comment'></div>至河冰合时。深虑可汗出过河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373934_comment'></div>兼与吐蕃连结。则为患不细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373934_comment'></div>深要防虞。其所徵诸道兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373934_comment'></div>恐不可停。须要及冰未合时前各到所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373934_comment'></div>谨特具闻奏。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373934_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1373934_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月10日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约八月十日左右，李德裕请密诏论回鹘事宜。作品：《请密诏塞上事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_1373903' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373903?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请密诏塞上事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年8月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373903")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373903_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373903'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373903'>一。据太原奏事官孙俦称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373903_comment'></div>昨来回鹘到横水栅杀戮军人百姓。今抽在释迦泊东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373903_comment'></div>约西去可汗三百里。未知此回鹘是那颉特下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373903_comment'></div>为复是可汗遣来。今且须以此回鹘为罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373903_comment'></div>云不受可汗指挥。擅自劫掠边界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373903_comment'></div>请密诏刘沔与仲武计会。先经略此贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373903_comment'></div>如可以讨逐。事亦有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373903_comment'></div>摧此一支。可汗必自知惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373903_comment'></div>一。比闻公主与可汗常别居帐幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373903_comment'></div>每见汉使。亦是别见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373903_comment'></div>望密诏刘沔与忠顺守志。每有使去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373903_comment'></div>即令将密意。看<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373903", 1373903, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>方便</span>说谕公主知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373903_comment'></div>亲庙子孙。只合死生为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373903_comment'></div>常须作计自拔。归投国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373903_comment'></div>不合与可汗同行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1373903", 1373903, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>扰乱</span>边界。如万一迎得公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373903_comment'></div>亦不得便令赴阙。须且留在边上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373903_comment'></div>制置回鹘。纵力不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373903_comment'></div>只要假公主名号。制服蕃人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373903_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1373903'>一。又虑回鹘于山林安置老弱家口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373903_comment'></div>将精兵逼近城栅。搅扰百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373903_comment'></div>如有此事。即须坚壁清野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373903_comment'></div>不得与战。其小城堡兵力薄少不堪固守处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373903_comment'></div>并望抽入大城。回鹘纵得小城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373903_comment'></div>亦无用处。即别选骁将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373903_comment'></div>潜出兵掠其家口辎重。此最是制胜之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373903_comment'></div>右。谨件如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373903_comment'></div>望各赐密诏。潜令以此为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373903_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1373903_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月15日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约八月十五日，李德裕代皇帝拟书与回鹘可汗，以怀柔之意，劝回鹘与唐朝廷交好。作品：《赐回鹘可汗书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷五。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月15日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约八月十五日，李德裕代皇帝拟书与太和公主，请其劝诫回鹘可汗与唐朝廷交好。作品：《赐太和公主诏书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐太和公主敕书</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373794'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373794_comment'></div>姑远嫁绝域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373794_comment'></div>二十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373794_comment'></div>跋履险难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373794_comment'></div>备罹屯苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373794_comment'></div>朕每念于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373794_comment'></div>良用惘然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373794_comment'></div>恭惟太皇太后春秋已高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373794_comment'></div>慈爱深厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373794_comment'></div>比者望姑朝谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373794_comment'></div>再叙悲欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373794_comment'></div>倏已岁暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373794_comment'></div>寂无音耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373794_comment'></div>想姑见旧国之城邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373794_comment'></div>能不销魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373794_comment'></div>望汉将之旌麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373794_comment'></div>必当流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373794_comment'></div>今朔风既至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373794_comment'></div>霰雪已零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373794_comment'></div>绝国萧条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373794_comment'></div>固难久处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373794_comment'></div>旃墙罽幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373794_comment'></div>何以御冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373794_comment'></div>肉饭酪浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373794_comment'></div>且非适口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373794_comment'></div>朕抚临万宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373794_comment'></div>子育群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373794_comment'></div>一物未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373794_comment'></div>终食三叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373794_comment'></div>况姑累年漂泊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373794_comment'></div>何日忘怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373794_comment'></div>想姑高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373794_comment'></div>必是悬鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373794_comment'></div>姑承宗庙之馀庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373794_comment'></div>为王室之懿亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373794_comment'></div>先朝割爱降婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373794_comment'></div>义宁家国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373794_comment'></div>谓回鹘必能御侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373794_comment'></div>安静塞垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373794_comment'></div>使边人子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373794_comment'></div>不见兵革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373794_comment'></div>射猎者不敢西向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373794_comment'></div>畏轩辕之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373794_comment'></div>今回鹘所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373794_comment'></div>甚不循理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373794_comment'></div>蕃浑是朕之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373794_comment'></div>百姓牛羊亦国家所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373794_comment'></div>因依汉地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373794_comment'></div>遂至蕃孳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373794_comment'></div>回鹘托以私仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373794_comment'></div>恣为侵掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373794_comment'></div>每马首南向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373794_comment'></div>姑得不畏高祖太宗之威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373794_comment'></div>欲侵掠边疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373794_comment'></div>姑得不思太皇太后之慈爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373794_comment'></div>为其国母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373794_comment'></div>足得指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373794_comment'></div>若回鹘能不禀命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373794_comment'></div>则是弃绝姻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373794_comment'></div>今日以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373794_comment'></div>不得以姑为词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373794_comment'></div>若恃我为亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373794_comment'></div>禀姑教令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373794_comment'></div>则须便自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1373794", 1373794, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>戢敛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373794_comment'></div>以继旧欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373794_comment'></div>想姑以朕此书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373794_comment'></div>喻彼将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373794_comment'></div>令其知分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373794_comment'></div>更不徇非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373794_comment'></div>塞外祁寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373794_comment'></div>且无丝纩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373794_comment'></div>朕每御裘服。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373740'>自古军制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373740_comment'></div>必有佐贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373740_comment'></div>逮至汉氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373740_comment'></div>亦循旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373740_comment'></div>既得将材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373740_comment'></div>乘其乖乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373740_comment'></div>遂投迹于殊邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373740_comment'></div>加以怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373740_comment'></div>竟归心于上国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373740_comment'></div>而又推诚所奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373740_comment'></div>果协良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373740_comment'></div>每获异谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373740_comment'></div>必来献款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373740_comment'></div>旋观深志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373740_comment'></div>可为竭情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373740_comment'></div>昔戎狄请盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373740_comment'></div>良由孟乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373740_comment'></div>呼韩率服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373740_comment'></div>始自秩訾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373740_comment'></div>言念茂功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373740_comment'></div>所宜异等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373740_comment'></div>因其请族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373740_comment'></div>锡以嘉名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373740_comment'></div>汉锡秺侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373740_comment'></div>尚采祭天之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373740_comment'></div>魏亲程昱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373740_comment'></div>用畴捧日之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373740_comment'></div>宠以貂珰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373740_comment'></div>冠于裨校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373740_comment'></div>服兹新命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373740_comment'></div>宜保厥终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373740_comment'></div>可检校右散骑常侍兼归义军副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373740_comment'></div>仍赐姓李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373740_comment'></div>名宏顺。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1373740_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月18日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，八月十八日，李德裕论回鹘某小首领石诫直。作品：《论回鹘石诫直状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1373935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论回鹘石诫直状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年8月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373935")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373935'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373935'>右。自两日来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373935_comment'></div>臣等窃闻外议云。石诫直久在京城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373935_comment'></div>事无巨细。靡不谙悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373935_comment'></div>昨缘收入鸿胪。惧朝廷处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373935_comment'></div>内求奉使。意在脱身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373935_comment'></div>又云。石诫直先有两男逃走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373935_comment'></div>必是已入回鹘。料其此去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373935_comment'></div>岂肯尽心。臣等伏以自可汗在边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373935_comment'></div>已使苗缜王会杨观三度告谕。又曾领常照安鲁卿同往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373935_comment'></div>逗留塞上。终不悛心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373935_comment'></div>石诫直是一卑微首领。岂能有所感寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373935_comment'></div>况自今夏以来。两度点检摩尼回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373935_comment'></div>又宠待嗢没斯至厚。恐诫直之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373935_comment'></div>必怀疑怨。此去岂止于无益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373935_comment'></div>实虑生奸。伏望速诏刘沔所在勒回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373935_comment'></div>实为允惬。仍望兼赐崔巨元诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373935_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1373935_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月20日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，八月二十日，李德裕代刘沔与回鹘宰相书，劝其与唐朝廷交好。作品：《代刘沔与回鹘宰相颉于伽思书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span><div id='poem_1373978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373978?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代刘沔与回鹘宰相颉于伽思书</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年8月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373978")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373978'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373978'>会昌三年八月二十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373978_comment'></div>大唐河东节度使检校右仆射刘沔致书于九姓回鹘颉于相公阁下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373978_comment'></div>曩者回鹘因延陀之乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373978_comment'></div>归心中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373978_comment'></div>太宗亲幸灵武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373978_comment'></div>纳彼降人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373978_comment'></div>置瀚海都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373978_comment'></div>列于内地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373978_comment'></div>爰初封植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373978_comment'></div>自我深恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373978_comment'></div>回鹘立国立家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373978_comment'></div>莫非唐德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373978_comment'></div>皇帝自闻回鹘乖乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373978_comment'></div>继以灾荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373978_comment'></div>为纥扢斯所攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373978_comment'></div>国已残灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373978_comment'></div>可汗率伤痍之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373978_comment'></div>席捲而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373978_comment'></div>朝廷遣告谕之使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373978_comment'></div>毂击于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373978_comment'></div>诚宜恭听诏命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373978_comment'></div>渐归漠南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373978_comment'></div>国家得以施拯救之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373978_comment'></div>成招携之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373978_comment'></div>昔呼韩单于亦以离乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373978_comment'></div>归附汉廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373978_comment'></div>定计之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373978_comment'></div>则遣子入侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373978_comment'></div>款塞之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373978_comment'></div>又来朝京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373978_comment'></div>既得为臣之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373978_comment'></div>实展外藩之敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373978_comment'></div>然后汉家拥护出塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373978_comment'></div>救恤加恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373978_comment'></div>况回鹘累代称藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373978_comment'></div>久修臣礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373978_comment'></div>只合先请朝谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373978_comment'></div>自陈艰危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373978_comment'></div>太和公主是帝室爱女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373978_comment'></div>太皇太后夙所钟念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373978_comment'></div>可汗亦宜遂其情礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373978_comment'></div>便遣入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373978_comment'></div>虽皇帝不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373978_comment'></div>当勤固请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373978_comment'></div>为可怜之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373978_comment'></div>陈自托之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373978_comment'></div>岂不感明主之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373978_comment'></div>塞华夷之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373978_comment'></div>则我之救恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373978_comment'></div>无所愧怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373978_comment'></div>而乃睥睨边城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373978_comment'></div>桀骜自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373978_comment'></div>邀求过望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373978_comment'></div>如在本蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373978_comment'></div>遐迩之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373978_comment'></div>无不惊叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373978_comment'></div>今又深入边境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373978_comment'></div>残虐生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373978_comment'></div>以退浑为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373978_comment'></div>侵暴未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373978_comment'></div>黎庶伏窜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373978_comment'></div>莫敢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1373978", 1373978, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>定居</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373978_comment'></div>秋稼盈畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373978_comment'></div>不遑收刈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373978_comment'></div>夫欲求大国之援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373978_comment'></div>继姻好之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373978_comment'></div>当务交欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373978_comment'></div>岂宜如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373978_comment'></div>来书又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373978_comment'></div>蕃人易动难安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373978_comment'></div>加忿怒后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373978_comment'></div>不可制得。<div id='poem_sentence_73_1373978_comment'></div>举国将相遗骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373978_comment'></div>弃于草莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373978_comment'></div>累代可汗坟墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373978_comment'></div>隔在天涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373978_comment'></div>固宜泣血枕戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373978_comment'></div>尝胆思报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373978_comment'></div>大雪冤耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373978_comment'></div>告谢幽魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373978_comment'></div>回鹘忿怒之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373978_comment'></div>合施于彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373978_comment'></div>而欲灭弃仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373978_comment'></div>逞志中华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373978_comment'></div>天地神祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373978_comment'></div>岂容此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373978_comment'></div>诗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373978_comment'></div>刚亦不吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373978_comment'></div>柔亦不茹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373978_comment'></div>回鹘以纥扢斯之强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1373978_comment'></div>又戎子驹支将预晋盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1373978_comment'></div>执政以有二心数于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1373978_comment'></div>驹支乃自称不侵不叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1373978_comment'></div>何恶能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1373978_comment'></div>执政嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1373978_comment'></div>遽命即事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1373978_comment'></div>今相公以伟才宏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1373978_comment'></div>匡弼可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1373978_comment'></div>既无秩訾之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1373978_comment'></div>谨于事大。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373937'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373937_comment'></div>缘回鹘犹在云州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373937_comment'></div>颇扰边境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373937_comment'></div>据二州踪迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373937_comment'></div>必无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1373937", 1373937, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>深远</span>之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373937_comment'></div>所虑边上奸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373937_comment'></div>走投回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373937_comment'></div>为其设计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373937_comment'></div>令在云朔等州断天德振武驿路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373937_comment'></div>切须有备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373937_comment'></div>防患未萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373937_comment'></div>望速令度支差使于河西路潜为准拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373937_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373937_comment'></div>元和八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373937_comment'></div>回鹘回过碛南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373937_comment'></div>取柳谷路打吐蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373937_comment'></div>天德防御使周怀义奏到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373937_comment'></div>朝廷未测其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373937_comment'></div>人情无不忧恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373937_comment'></div>臣德裕先臣奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373937_comment'></div>请自夏州至天德复置废馆十一所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373937_comment'></div>以通急驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373937_comment'></div>又请发夏州兵士五百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373937_comment'></div>于故经略军应接驿路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373937_comment'></div>兼护党项。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373937_comment'></div>臣等未知此路旧馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373937_comment'></div>今已废毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373937_comment'></div>为复犹有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373937_comment'></div>望赐忠顺诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373937_comment'></div>于此路量事再修旧馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373937_comment'></div>以通天德奏事驿路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373937_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1373937'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373937_comment'></div>访闻麟胜两州中间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373937_comment'></div>地名富谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373937_comment'></div>人至殷繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373937_comment'></div>盖藏甚实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373937_comment'></div>望令度支拣干事有才人充和籴使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373937_comment'></div>及秋收就此和籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373937_comment'></div>于所在贮蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373937_comment'></div>且以和籴为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373937_comment'></div>兼令与节度使潜计会设备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373937_comment'></div>如万一振武不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373937_comment'></div>便改充天德军运粮使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373937_comment'></div>胜州隔河去东受降城十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373937_comment'></div>自东受降城至振武一百三十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373937_comment'></div>此路有粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373937_comment'></div>东可以壮振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373937_comment'></div>西可以救天德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373937_comment'></div>所冀先事布置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373937_comment'></div>即免临时劳扰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1373937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约八月下旬，李德裕上疏建议振武地区刘沔于要害处添兵防御回鹘。作品：《论振武以北事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1373936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论振武以北事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373936")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373936'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373936'>右。缘回鹘牙帐渐移向东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373936_comment'></div>去振武疆界稍近。今以草青马壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373936_comment'></div>深虑有意窥边。望令刘沔于云伽关及边界要害添兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373936_comment'></div>严加警备。先令郑许陈滑两道兵马于代州就粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373936_comment'></div>今缘把头烽北一川皆是散地。若回鹘万一驰突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373936_comment'></div>更无重兵备御。则退浑部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373936_comment'></div>先被破伤。太原北境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373936_comment'></div>不免骚扰。望付翰林赐刘沔诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373936_comment'></div>令酌量事机。审探回鹘情伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373936_comment'></div>更于把头烽北添置。令速详利害闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373936_comment'></div>如蒙允许。伏望约此意撰诏处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373936_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1373936_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年8月27日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，八月二十七日，李德裕上疏建议驱逐回鹘。作品：《驱逐回鹘事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1373938' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373938_comment'></div>臣等累日商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373938_comment'></div>且如八月九日<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_3_1373938_comment'></div>更令刘沔遣使告谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373938_comment'></div>待至来春回鹘人马<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1373938", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373938_comment'></div>易为施力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373938_comment'></div>臣等思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373938_comment'></div>量为得计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373938_comment'></div>若如此可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373938_comment'></div>即幽州兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373938_comment'></div>望且令于本界<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1373938", 1373938, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>屯集</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1373938_comment'></div>入太原界后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373938_comment'></div>即须供出界粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373938_comment'></div>未有用处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373938_comment'></div>日费殊广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373938_comment'></div>恐度支物力供馈不办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373938_comment'></div>若虑冰合后回鹘更有驰突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373938_comment'></div>事当及早驱逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373938_comment'></div>即速为计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373938_comment'></div>至十月已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373938_comment'></div>寒冻转甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373938_comment'></div>恐施力不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373938_comment'></div>须便三五日内方及事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_content_1373939'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373939'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373939_comment'></div>议状云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373939_comment'></div>选将练卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373939_comment'></div>未甚得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373939_comment'></div>今缘边节镇将下群守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373939_comment'></div>谁人最不称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373939_comment'></div>文武班中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373939_comment'></div>谁人堪任将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373939_comment'></div>须指陈其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373939_comment'></div>不得泛言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373939_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373939_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373939_comment'></div>守御要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373939_comment'></div>未甚有备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373939_comment'></div>犄角之设不相应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373939_comment'></div>辅车之谋不相依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373939_comment'></div>今何处置兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373939_comment'></div>即为要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373939_comment'></div>何处加备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373939_comment'></div>即为相应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373939_comment'></div>并须指言去处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373939_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1373939'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373939_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373939_comment'></div>来即驱逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373939_comment'></div>去亦勿追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373939_comment'></div>昨所令集议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373939_comment'></div>出师驱逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373939_comment'></div>去亦勿追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373939_comment'></div>如此相守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373939_comment'></div>何时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1373939", 1373939, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>得了</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373939_comment'></div>军粮日有所费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373939_comment'></div>边境终无安宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373939_comment'></div>此最关取舍大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373939_comment'></div>须便堪行用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373939_comment'></div>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373939_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373939_comment'></div>部落能自攻讨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373939_comment'></div>不须止遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373939_comment'></div>而边上诸蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373939_comment'></div>多者一二千帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373939_comment'></div>少者力又不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373939_comment'></div>各有家口畜产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373939_comment'></div>常自护惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373939_comment'></div>昨者回鹘暂到云州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373939_comment'></div>诸蕃奔逃不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373939_comment'></div>杂虏既无统一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373939_comment'></div>谁肯尽心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373939_comment'></div>今欲将何部落讨逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373939_comment'></div>亦须指言去处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373939_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1373939'>一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373939_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373939_comment'></div>各敕边将遣自招收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373939_comment'></div>其远征戍卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373939_comment'></div>请渐令抽罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373939_comment'></div>此事朝廷非不素知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373939_comment'></div>只缘去年将江淮六道衣粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373939_comment'></div>召募天德官健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373939_comment'></div>仅经一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373939_comment'></div>更无一人应募。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373939_comment'></div>李忠顺请自招召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373939_comment'></div>经半年只得六百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373939_comment'></div>塞上守备处召得一二千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373939_comment'></div>都未济事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373939_comment'></div>戍卒如何抽罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373939_comment'></div>亦须更别陈方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373939_comment'></div>以前谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373939_comment'></div>昨所降敕旨云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373939_comment'></div>且须切应事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373939_comment'></div>不得更为虚论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373939_comment'></div>今详议状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373939_comment'></div>并未切事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373939_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373939_comment'></div>望令牛僧孺与夷行同议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373939_comment'></div>仔细分析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373939_comment'></div>两日内闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373939_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_75_1373939_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年9月7日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，九月七日，李德裕再次对集议驱逐回鹘未尽事宜进行议论。作品：《牛僧孺等奏敕公卿集议须便施行其中有未尽处须更令分析谨连如前状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1373940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>牛僧孺等奉敕公卿集议须便施行其中有未尽处须更令分析谨连如前</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373940'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373940_comment'></div>臣等伏详公卿所议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373940_comment'></div>犹未切要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373940_comment'></div>状云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373940_comment'></div>边将不闻以攻守之术上闻朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373940_comment'></div>则将略可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373940_comment'></div>又诸道徵兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373940_comment'></div>其数不少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373940_comment'></div>乌合之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373940_comment'></div>号令不齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373940_comment'></div>又近者回鹘攻劫云州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373940_comment'></div>渐入内地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373940_comment'></div>节级城守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373940_comment'></div>莫能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1373940", 1373940, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>式遏</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373940_comment'></div>亦未见邻近堡栅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373940_comment'></div>首尾救援者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373940_comment'></div>窃详此意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373940_comment'></div>只自见大段形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373940_comment'></div>实未切事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373940_comment'></div>朝廷比来待遇回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373940_comment'></div>惟推恩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373940_comment'></div>谕其职分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373940_comment'></div>便自退归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373940_comment'></div>所徵戍兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373940_comment'></div>只令守备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373940_comment'></div>都未尝有攻讨之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373940_comment'></div>昨来回鹘迫于饥困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373940_comment'></div>至云州劫夺牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373940_comment'></div>已为侵暴事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373940_comment'></div>须与城栅斗敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373940_comment'></div>兵法所谓疾雷不及掩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373940_comment'></div>便云莫能<span id='poem_sentence_32_1373940_comment'></div>堡栅既无重兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373940_comment'></div>合须自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373940_comment'></div>令其首尾救援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373940_comment'></div>亦是虚谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373940_comment'></div>自古所云乌合之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373940_comment'></div>皆谓临时召募。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373940_comment'></div>未经训习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373940_comment'></div>如韩信驱市人而战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373940_comment'></div>即是乌合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373940_comment'></div>陈许淄青等兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373940_comment'></div>并是节制之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373940_comment'></div>久经战伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373940_comment'></div>但令一处指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373940_comment'></div>自然号令齐一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373940_comment'></div>固不可谓之乌合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373940_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373940_comment'></div>汉兵远袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373940_comment'></div>恐遗虏擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373940_comment'></div>兵法云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373940_comment'></div>善用兵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373940_comment'></div>致人之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373940_comment'></div>不可自致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373940_comment'></div>所谓致人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373940_comment'></div>是令其自来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373940_comment'></div>况虏骑倏忽以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373940_comment'></div>疾如风电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373940_comment'></div>固不合将兵远袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373940_comment'></div>今可以计者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373940_comment'></div>缘其有家口辎重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373940_comment'></div>不离汉境二三百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373940_comment'></div>远去未得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373940_comment'></div>既有定所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373940_comment'></div>便可为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373940_comment'></div>魏武破乌丸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373940_comment'></div>李靖擒颉利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373940_comment'></div>皆用此计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373940_comment'></div>公卿等都不议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373940_comment'></div>亦似未见形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373940_comment'></div>非令集议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373940_comment'></div>只缘问驱逐守备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373940_comment'></div>二计何先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373940_comment'></div>今既云守备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373940_comment'></div>过冬方图进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373940_comment'></div>斯为上策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373940_comment'></div>便可施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373940_comment'></div>即与昨来加刘沔招抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373940_comment'></div>且令告谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373940_comment'></div>理亦相近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373940_comment'></div>恐不暇更有访问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373940_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1373940_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，九月上旬，李德裕撰制，正式任命对回鹘作战的主帅，并令刘沔等采集蕃马，充实军备，沿边兵马做好准备。作品：《授刘沔招抚回鹘使制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷三。）</span>《授张仲武东面招抚回鹘使制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1373747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373747?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授刘沔招抚回鹘使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373747'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373747'>昔东汉中夏既宁。匈奴饥馑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373747_comment'></div>臧宫请命将临塞。图刻石之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373747_comment'></div>光武报云。柔能制刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373747_comment'></div>弱能制强。且传闻之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373747_comment'></div>常多失实。虽灭大寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373747_comment'></div>不如息人。朕每览前史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373747_comment'></div>为之兴叹。又以大舜修德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373747_comment'></div>有苗归心。周穆徂征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373747_comment'></div>荒服不至。固存取乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373747_comment'></div>在择良图。回鹘顷以本国荐饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373747_comment'></div>种落贰。纥扢斯乘其衰乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373747_comment'></div>遂覆危巢。既焚老上之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373747_comment'></div>尽剪名王之族。可汗失地远客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373747_comment'></div>来附塞垣。朕言念姻亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373747_comment'></div>不忘勋力。谕以呼韩款塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373747_comment'></div>汉氏旧章。戎不乱华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373747_comment'></div>国之大典。且分兵食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373747_comment'></div>救彼饥人。令归漠南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373747_comment'></div>方议赈赡。属可汗久婴沉痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373747_comment'></div>酋长异心。虽随畜荐居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373747_comment'></div>固无定所。而控弦深入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373747_comment'></div>颇亦渝盟。边将戎臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373747_comment'></div>屡抗其疏策。藩浑部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373747_comment'></div>咸请其驱除。朕以王者之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373747_comment'></div>以全取胜。匈奴见短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373747_comment'></div>嘉娄敬之善筹。马邑设权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373747_comment'></div>戒王恢之兵首。推诚含垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373747_comment'></div>亦以踰时。况朔野冱寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373747_comment'></div>有皲瘃之患。阴山径路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373747_comment'></div>多曲折之艰。宜以德绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373747_comment'></div>岂劳兵卒。某官刘沔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373747_comment'></div>久临沙漠。颇识虏情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373747_comment'></div>既启十乘之行。必致六骡之遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373747_comment'></div>委之告谕。方俟成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373747_comment'></div>可守本官充招抚回鹘使。如不自改悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373747_comment'></div>终须<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1373747", id='poem_sentence_0_1373741'>敕。新授金紫光禄大夫检校太子宾客使持节都督银州诸军事兼银州刺史充本州押蕃落使及度支银州监牧马副使何清朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373741_comment'></div>汉用骆甲。则灌婴副于骑将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373741_comment'></div>魏得关羽。则张辽挟以前驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373741_comment'></div>故能挫强楚之锋芒。取颜良于麾盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373741_comment'></div>尔夙负智勇。备尝艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373741_comment'></div>精诚发而石开。志气作而虹贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373741_comment'></div>朕以思忠仗义倜傥。秉心坚正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373741_comment'></div>且闻誓剪雠寇。不以贼遗君父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373741_comment'></div>委之兵柄。庶展拘原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373741_comment'></div>举骇电之锋。期于尽敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373741_comment'></div>得射雕之骑。未足称功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373741_comment'></div>宜勉一心。成予九伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373741_comment'></div>俾参环卫。用壮军声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373741_comment'></div>可检校太子宾客兼左卫将军侍御史。散官如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373741_comment'></div>仍领河东道蕃浑兵马赴振武界。取思忠指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373741_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1373741_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年9月27日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，九月二十七日，李德裕撰状论李思忠下蕃骑。作品：《李思忠下蕃骑状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十四。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373946'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373946_comment'></div>臣等访闻退浑与回鹘久为雠怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373946_comment'></div>恐合势后不与思忠叶心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373946_comment'></div>或别生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373946_comment'></div>须令遂泰审与刘沔商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373946_comment'></div>如有可疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373946_comment'></div>即便假发遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373946_comment'></div>其兴唐感义奉诚等军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373946_comment'></div>及契苾退浑等部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373946_comment'></div>先各有本管都使都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373946_comment'></div>须令部领自去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373946_comment'></div>即得兵将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373946_comment'></div>各相谙识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373946_comment'></div>易于指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373946_comment'></div>望付翰林赐刘沔忠顺遂泰等诏处分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1373946_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河东奏请留沙陀马军状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年10月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373947")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373947'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373947'>右。思忠本请蕃骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373947_comment'></div>缘言语相通。易于指使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373947_comment'></div>若令易定兵去。恐不相当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373947_comment'></div>魏楚又称。向北进军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373947_comment'></div>每头军事须得蕃兵一二百骑引行。若全令抽却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373947_comment'></div>进军不得。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373947_comment'></div>沙陀兵望许刘沔量留一半。其一半依前令与思忠合势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373947_comment'></div>如蒙俞允。望赐刘沔诏处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373947_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1373947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年10月8日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，十月八日，李德裕撰状请何清朝等分领李思忠下蕃兵。作品：《请何清朝等分领李思忠下蕃兵状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_1373948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请何清朝等分领李思忠下蕃兵状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年10月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373948")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373948'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373948'>右。臣等前日商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373948_comment'></div>令契苾通等不受思忠指挥。何清朝分领部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373948_comment'></div>临事取思忠指挥。昨日奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373948_comment'></div>恐契苾通等不受思忠指挥。不要分领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373948_comment'></div>臣等亦有深虑。不敢不再陈论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373948_comment'></div>沙陁部落比在太原衙内。性至循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373948_comment'></div>于人情狎熟。不令别人管领亦得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373948_comment'></div>所虏退浑。昨者张献节才欲责罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373948_comment'></div>便疑为恶。忽恐思忠制御不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373948_comment'></div>却自因此生事。契苾通本自蕃中王子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373948_comment'></div>先在蔚州。且遣分领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373948_comment'></div>必上下情通。更无所虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373948_comment'></div>又思忠虽志诚效顺。然使用之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373948_comment'></div>亦未可独任。汉将分领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373948_comment'></div>事亦得宜。契苾通等虽是蕃人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373948_comment'></div>任使已熟。切更诫励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373948_comment'></div>岂敢不顺思忠。臣等所见如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373948_comment'></div>伏望圣明裁断。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373948_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373829_comment'></div>惟临机决策。不免迟疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373829_comment'></div>兵书云。用兵只闻拙速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373829_comment'></div>不闻巧迟。深恐过为慎重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373829_comment'></div>渐失事机。望赐刘沔诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373829_comment'></div>比缘回鹘未为扰侵。且务绥怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373829_comment'></div>今既杀戮边人。驱劫牛马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373829_comment'></div>频已有诏。速令驱除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373829_comment'></div>自度便宜。临机应变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373829_comment'></div>不得过怀疑虑。皆待指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373829_comment'></div>朝廷既假以使名。令为诸将节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373829_comment'></div>边境之事。皆以责成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373829_comment'></div>向后或要移营进军。一切自取机便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373829_comment'></div>不必皆候进止。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373829_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1373829_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年11月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约十一月左右，李德裕撰制授郑朗等左谏议大夫。作品：《授郑朗等左谏议大夫制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373760'>敕。予欲左右前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373760_comment'></div>皆得正人。朝夕交戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373760_comment'></div>儆予之阙。所以分左右而备箴谏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373760_comment'></div>思见大儒骨鲠。白首耆艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373760_comment'></div>论议通古今。喟然动众心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373760_comment'></div>所以增其秩而厚其禄也。朝散大夫守谏议大夫兼宏文馆学士上柱国郑朗等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373760_comment'></div>皆以贞正守道。列于左掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373760_comment'></div>从容讽谏。每竭嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373760_comment'></div>况朗璜近因陛见。乃能庭争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373760_comment'></div>执以言责。本于志诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373760_comment'></div>期尔尽规。致予无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373760_comment'></div>拾遗左右。汲黯之愿已谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373760_comment'></div>禄赐愈多。贡禹之诚当励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373760_comment'></div>勉思厥职。无忝优思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373760_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373760_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373844_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373844_comment'></div>缘可汗移营。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373844_comment'></div>河中地闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373844_comment'></div>马军有朔方旧法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373844_comment'></div>今当回鹘衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373844_comment'></div>亦要及时驱逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373844_comment'></div>事有应变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373844_comment'></div>不可惮烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373844_comment'></div>仍望赐绢一千八百匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373844_comment'></div>内三百匹充职掌人优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373844_comment'></div>以户部物充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373844_comment'></div>度支差纲发遣。<div class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373768")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373768_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373768'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373768'>敕刘沔等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373768_comment'></div>自回鹘本国残破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373768_comment'></div>寄命北边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373768_comment'></div>朕以其艰难之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373768_comment'></div>常效勋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373768_comment'></div>平宁之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373768_comment'></div>结以姻亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373768_comment'></div>义切怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373768_comment'></div>情深兼爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373768_comment'></div>亦既转粟赈救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373768_comment'></div>降使抚循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373768_comment'></div>示信推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373768_comment'></div>朕无所愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373768_comment'></div>而狼顾塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373768_comment'></div>鼠首云中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373768_comment'></div>闻有备虽暂移营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373768_comment'></div>稍乘隙复来近塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373768_comment'></div>察其情计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373768_comment'></div>殊未归还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373768_comment'></div>朕祗荷丕图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373768_comment'></div>抚临万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373768_comment'></div>守祖宗之法制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373768_comment'></div>思黎庶之乂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373768_comment'></div>岂可蓄虺穴于塞垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373768_comment'></div>养虿毒于怀袖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373768_comment'></div>乘其驰突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373768_comment'></div>必欲驱除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373768_comment'></div>昔晋侯报楚之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373768_comment'></div>避子玉于三舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373768_comment'></div>先轸背秦之惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373768_comment'></div>覆孟明于二崤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373768_comment'></div>安国庇人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373768_comment'></div>大义斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373768_comment'></div>卿宜遣使告谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373768_comment'></div>明示朕怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373768_comment'></div>如或迟留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373768_comment'></div>尚为巧诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373768_comment'></div>即须犄角相应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373768_comment'></div>临以兵威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373768_comment'></div>勉务良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373768_comment'></div>副兹委遇。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1373768_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约年底，李德裕代刘沔与回鹘宰相书，劝其归顺唐朝廷。作品：《代刘沔与回鹘宰相书意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span><div id='poem_1373980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373980?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代刘沔与回鹘宰相书意</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373980")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373980'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373980'>纥扢斯专使将军踏布合祖达千⿺<span class='inlineComment2'>（辶葛）</span>悉禾亥义判官元因娑拽汗阿已时等七人至天德上表云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373980_comment'></div>破灭回鹘之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373980_comment'></div>收得皇帝女公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373980_comment'></div>缘与大唐本是同姓之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373980_comment'></div>固不敢留公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373980_comment'></div>差都吕施合将军送至南朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373980_comment'></div>至今不知信息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373980_comment'></div>不知得达大唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373980_comment'></div>为复被奸人中路隔绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373980_comment'></div>缘此使不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373980_comment'></div>今出四十万兵寻觅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373980_comment'></div>若被别人留连不放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373980_comment'></div>请子细报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373980_comment'></div>即差人就彼寻觅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373980_comment'></div>上天入地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373980_comment'></div>终须觅得送公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373980_comment'></div>使若入吐蕃国去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373980_comment'></div>即至吐蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373980_comment'></div>皇帝自览表章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373980_comment'></div>颇深轸念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373980_comment'></div>缘与回鹘可汗久修邻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373980_comment'></div>加以姻亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373980_comment'></div>艰难之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373980_comment'></div>常展勋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373980_comment'></div>情义至重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373980_comment'></div>休戚是同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373980_comment'></div>今纥扢斯雠怨可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373980_comment'></div>兼求公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373980_comment'></div>必虑大兴兵甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373980_comment'></div>纠合诸蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373980_comment'></div>长驰南行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373980_comment'></div>直至塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373980_comment'></div>今可汗人众饥馑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373980_comment'></div>兵数无多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373980_comment'></div>强敌倘来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373980_comment'></div>将何御捍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373980_comment'></div>非惟大唐之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373980_comment'></div>救助至难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373980_comment'></div>兼恐边城之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373980_comment'></div>因此罹患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373980_comment'></div>可汗须与将相熟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373980_comment'></div>早务良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373980_comment'></div>依倚侧近山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373980_comment'></div>深自藏匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373980_comment'></div>且送公主归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373980_comment'></div>以避责言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373980_comment'></div>且纥扢斯虽来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373980_comment'></div>足得免祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373980_comment'></div>又踏布合祖云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373980_comment'></div>纥扢斯即移就合罗川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373980_comment'></div>居回鹘旧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373980_comment'></div>兼以得安西北庭达怛等五部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373980_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373980_comment'></div>昨者二千骑送踏布合祖至碛北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373980_comment'></div>令累路逢着回鹘即杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373980_comment'></div>踏布自本国至天德西城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373980_comment'></div>更不逢着回鹘一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373980_comment'></div>无可杀戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373980_comment'></div>又恐回鹘与吐蕃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1373980", 1373980, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>通信</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373980_comment'></div>已令兵马把断三河口道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373980_comment'></div>则筹略兵马之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373980_comment'></div>揣度可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373980_comment'></div>且兴废在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373980_comment'></div>否泰有运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373980_comment'></div>纥扢斯以寡为众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373980_comment'></div>以弱为彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373980_comment'></div>岂止人谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373980_comment'></div>固是天赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373980_comment'></div>古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373980_comment'></div>大福不再来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373980_comment'></div>盖以天亡之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373980_comment'></div>终难再振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373980_comment'></div>若欲且依黑车子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373980_comment'></div>延引岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373980_comment'></div>不惟雄豪所耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373980_comment'></div>实亦诸蕃轻笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373980_comment'></div>倘纥扢斯逼逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373980_comment'></div>则黑车子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373980_comment'></div>焉可保信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373980_comment'></div>不如早归大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373980_comment'></div>自保安全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373980_comment'></div>顺天命以去危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373980_comment'></div>恃姻好而求福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373980_comment'></div>皇帝宠待存恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373980_comment'></div>必更加恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373980_comment'></div>辄献良箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373980_comment'></div>幸垂采纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373980_comment'></div>恐要见纥扢斯表本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373980_comment'></div>今亦录往。</div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1373980_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=842&endYear=842')">842年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约本年，李德裕撰制授徐商礼部员外郎。作品：《授徐商礼部员外郎制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1373758' id='poem_sentence_1_1373758_comment'></div>其所全活。不闻大贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373758_comment'></div>犹诚感幽神。庆流苗裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373758_comment'></div>矧乃徂往以淑问。尝为理官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373758_comment'></div>属政在吕宗。谋倾王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373758_comment'></div>将相陷辟。忠良受诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373758_comment'></div>而深念群狱之冤。固拒诏使。<div class='inline' id='poem_allusion_30271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30271'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30271'>后学方成市，吾师又<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_1_30271'>洞天应<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_30271", 30271, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>不夜</span>，源树秪如春<span class='inlineComment2'>（此并述桃源事）</span>。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30271'>无因握石髓，及<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作分）</span>与养生人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30271'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_30271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_30271'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_30271_0'>⑴
