href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年1月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，正月十一日，石雄等大破回鹘乌介部，迎太和公主归唐，二奏捷至，李德裕奉宣撰《讨回鹘制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1373749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>讨回鹘制</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373749")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373749'>门下。夫天之所废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373749_comment'></div>难施继绝之恩。人之所弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373749_comment'></div>当用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1373749", 1373749, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>侮亡</span>之道。朕每思前训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373749_comment'></div>岂忘格言。回鹘比者自恃兵强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373749_comment'></div>久为桀鷔。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1373749", 1373749, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>凌虐</span>诸部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373749_comment'></div>结怨近邻。黠戛斯潜师<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1373749", 1373749, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>彗扫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373749_comment'></div>穹庐瓦解。种族尽膏于原野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373749_comment'></div>区落遂至于荆榛。今可汗亡逃失国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373749_comment'></div>窃号自立。远逾沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373749_comment'></div>寄命边陲。朕深念衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373749_comment'></div>寻加赈恤。每陈章表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373749_comment'></div>多诈谀之词。接我使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373749_comment'></div>如全盛之日。无伤禽哀鸣之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373749_comment'></div>有困兽犹斗之心。去岁潜入朔川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373749_comment'></div>大掠牛马。今春掩袭振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373749_comment'></div>逼近城池。可汗皆自率劲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373749_comment'></div>首为寇盗。不耻破败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373749_comment'></div>莫顾姻亲。河东节度使刘沔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373749_comment'></div>料敌伐谋。乘机制胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373749_comment'></div>发胡貊之骑。以为前锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373749_comment'></div>搴翎侯之旗。弋彼在穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373749_comment'></div>短兵鏖于帐下。元恶轶于彀中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373749_comment'></div>况乘匪六骡。众才一旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373749_comment'></div>储粮已竭。计日可擒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373749_comment'></div>太和公主居处不同。情义久绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373749_comment'></div>怀土多畏。亟闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1373749", 1373749, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>黄鹄</span>之歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373749_comment'></div>失位自伤。宁免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1373749", 1373749, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>绿衣</span>之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373749_comment'></div>念其羁苦。常轸朕心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373749_comment'></div>今者脱于豺狼。再见宫阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373749_comment'></div>上以摅宗庙之宿愤。次以慰太皇太后之深慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373749_comment'></div>永言归宁。良用欣感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373749_comment'></div>其回鹘既已破灭。义在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1373749", 1373749, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>剪除</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373749_comment'></div>宜令诸道兵马使并同进讨。河东立功将士以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373749_comment'></div>优厚赏给。续次条疏处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373749_comment'></div>应在京外宅及东都修功德回鹘。并勒冠带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373749_comment'></div>各配诸道收管。其回鹘及摩尼等庄宅钱物等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373749_comment'></div>并委功德使与御史台京兆府各差精强干事官点检收录。不得容诸色职掌人及坊市富人辄有影占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373749_comment'></div>如有犯者。并当极法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373749_comment'></div>钱物纳官。摩尼等僧委中书门下即时条疏闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373749_comment'></div>于戏。昔汉宣帝值匈奴乖乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373749_comment'></div>推亡固存。呼韩单于国归命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373749_comment'></div>入朝保塞。汉后所以有拥护之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373749_comment'></div>郅支单于背叛礼义。伤毁威重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373749_comment'></div>汉史所以明可诛之罪。二虏祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373749_comment'></div>皆自取焉。四夷百蛮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373749_comment'></div>宜以为鉴。布告中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373749_comment'></div>深体朕怀。主者施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373749_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1373749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年1月25日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，正月二十五日，李德裕撰状请发兵歼灭乌介余部。作品：《请更发兵山外邀截回鹘状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div id='poem_1373822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请更发兵山外邀截回鹘状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年1月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373822")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373822'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373822'>右。缘回鹘既已讨除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373822_comment'></div>须令殄灭。今可汗穷蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373822_comment'></div>正可枭擒。万一透入黑车子部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373822_comment'></div>必恐延引岁月。劳师费财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373822_comment'></div>望速诏忠顺。令进军于山外黑车子去路邀截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373822_comment'></div>恐振武军马数少。其李思忠下沙陀五百骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373822_comment'></div>易定军马一千骑。便令何清朝押领同去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373822_comment'></div>如至阴山。北蕃知回鹘犹在旧处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373822_comment'></div>便令从北进军取背。则前后受敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373822_comment'></div>必无所逃。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373822_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1373822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年1月30日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，正月三十日，李德裕再撰状请发兵歼灭乌介余部。作品：《殄灭回鹘事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div id='poem_1373823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殄灭回鹘事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年1月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373823")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373823'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373823_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373823_comment'></div>回鹘衰残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373823_comment'></div>取之在速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373823_comment'></div>一切须令三月已前事了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373823_comment'></div>陛下若欲早见功效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373823_comment'></div>须激劝人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373823_comment'></div>自古用兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373823_comment'></div>皆悬赏格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373823_comment'></div>以此誓众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373823_comment'></div>人必轻生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373823_comment'></div>今因景度等往幽州太原振武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373823_comment'></div>望三道各赐敕书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373823_comment'></div>如兵马使已下大将取得可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373823_comment'></div>便授金吾小将军及大郡刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373823_comment'></div>赏钱一万贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373823_comment'></div>如取得宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373823_comment'></div>便授兼御史大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373823_comment'></div>赏钱五千贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373823_comment'></div>若是小将军长行取得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373823_comment'></div>白身授兼御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373823_comment'></div>赏并准此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373823_comment'></div>今可汗与宰相只有四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373823_comment'></div>直依此酬赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373823_comment'></div>只用二万五千贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373823_comment'></div>比一月供军所费五分之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373823_comment'></div>如此即得义知劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373823_comment'></div>黠虏无逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373823_comment'></div>伏望出自宸衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373823_comment'></div>早赐明敕处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373823_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373823_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年1月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，正月，李德裕上奏建议不必限定进士及第人数，并重申礼部录取进士名单不须先向宰相府第呈榜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，二月，黠戛斯王遣使来唐，献马二匹，李德裕代皇帝撰书与黠戛斯王，以示交好。作品：《与黠戛斯王书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》畿辅本补遗。）</span><div id='poem_1373798' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373798' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373798?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与黠戛王书</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373798")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373798_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373798'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373798'>皇帝敬问黠戛王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373798_comment'></div>时及阳和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373798_comment'></div>想比佳适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373798_comment'></div>注吾合素等至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373798_comment'></div>省表并进马事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373798_comment'></div>具悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373798_comment'></div>国王阴山雄劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373798_comment'></div>朔野英雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373798_comment'></div>包智略以周身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373798_comment'></div>推诚明而有众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373798_comment'></div>声高夷落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373798_comment'></div>威重藩疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373798_comment'></div>专遣使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373798_comment'></div>远献名马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373798_comment'></div>向化之诚既展。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373798_comment'></div>输忠之效颇明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373798_comment'></div>临轩省章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373798_comment'></div>辍食嘉叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373798_comment'></div>眷言忠荩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373798_comment'></div>宁忘寝兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373798_comment'></div>顷于贞观中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373798_comment'></div>彼国常奉朝贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373798_comment'></div>亦授官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373798_comment'></div>宠赐而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373798_comment'></div>尔后但讶音耗久乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373798_comment'></div>不知中为回鹘所隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373798_comment'></div>及览来表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373798_comment'></div>方嘉壮图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373798_comment'></div>蓄锐多年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373798_comment'></div>乘机大举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373798_comment'></div>快雪冤愤。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1373798_comment'></div>国家之山河不间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373798_comment'></div>既为邻境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373798_comment'></div>遂阅贡章。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1373798_comment'></div>特遣专使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373798_comment'></div>送归阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373798_comment'></div>虽闻行至中途。<div id='poem_sentence_42_1373798_comment'></div>推之和宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373798_comment'></div>远同族之讥嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373798_comment'></div>厚亲邻之恩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373798_comment'></div>贤明如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373798_comment'></div>愧慰难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373798_comment'></div>回鹘顷以失国为词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373798_comment'></div>塞相托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373798_comment'></div>朕以勋亲是念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373798_comment'></div>拯恤屡加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373798_comment'></div>曾不知恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373798_comment'></div>渐开稔恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373798_comment'></div>贱弃公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373798_comment'></div>侵暴平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373798_comment'></div>日寻干戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373798_comment'></div>时窃牛马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373798_comment'></div>朕为全旧好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373798_comment'></div>不下明诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373798_comment'></div>岁月滋深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373798_comment'></div>边防将倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373798_comment'></div>各用长策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373798_comment'></div>继彰殊勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373798_comment'></div>焚帐幕而公主归还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373798_comment'></div>透网罗而元恶逃遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373798_comment'></div>顾其馀类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373798_comment'></div>何所寄生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373798_comment'></div>国王远闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373798_comment'></div>想同深慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373798_comment'></div>然犹恐奔窜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373798_comment'></div>尚有凶奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373798_comment'></div>又虑侵彼封疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373798_comment'></div>将复雠怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373798_comment'></div>国王亦须严为备拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373798_comment'></div>善设机谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373798_comment'></div>同务讨除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373798_comment'></div>尽其根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373798_comment'></div>无贻后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373798_comment'></div>勉继前修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373798_comment'></div>亲仁善邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373798_comment'></div>惟彼与此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373798_comment'></div>勿谓遐远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373798_comment'></div>常存寤思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373798_comment'></div>因注吾合素回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373798_comment'></div>且先诏示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373798_comment'></div>其他礼命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373798_comment'></div>续专遣使宣慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373798_comment'></div>想宜知悉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1373798_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年2月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约二月，黠戛斯王纥扢斯可汗遣使送归太和公主，李德裕致书可汗。作品：《与纥扢斯可汗书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1373796' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373796' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373796?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与纥扢斯可汗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373796")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373796_comment'></div>时属载阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373796_comment'></div>想彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1373796", 1373796, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>休泰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373796_comment'></div>朕抚临万宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373796_comment'></div>子育群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373796_comment'></div>思致洽和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373796_comment'></div>用臻至理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373796_comment'></div>将军踏布合祖等至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373796_comment'></div>鉴表具知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373796_comment'></div>可汗生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1373796", 1373796, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>戴斗</span>之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373796_comment'></div>居寒露之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373796_comment'></div>智谋精果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373796_comment'></div>材志沉雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373796_comment'></div>威动龙荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373796_comment'></div>声驰象魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373796_comment'></div>眷言丕绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373796_comment'></div>深用注怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373796_comment'></div>我太宗文皇帝圣德高于百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373796_comment'></div>英材轶于千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373796_comment'></div>内定诸夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373796_comment'></div>外服百蛮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373796_comment'></div>贞观四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373796_comment'></div>西北蕃君长诣阙顿颡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373796_comment'></div>请上尊号为天可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373796_comment'></div>是后降玺书西北蕃君长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373796_comment'></div>皆称皇帝为天可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373796_comment'></div>临统四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373796_comment'></div>实自兹始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373796_comment'></div>暨贞观六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373796_comment'></div>太宗遣使臣王义宏至可汗本国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373796_comment'></div>将命镇抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373796_comment'></div>贞观二十一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373796_comment'></div>可汗本国君长身自入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373796_comment'></div>太宗授左屯卫将军坚昆都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373796_comment'></div>至天宝末年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373796_comment'></div>朝贡不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373796_comment'></div>则可汗祖先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373796_comment'></div>已受我国家恩德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373796_comment'></div>计可汗国中遗老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373796_comment'></div>必自流传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373796_comment'></div>朕缵奉丕图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373796_comment'></div>思申旧好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373796_comment'></div>比闻天宝以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373796_comment'></div>为回鹘所隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373796_comment'></div>久阻诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373796_comment'></div>回鹘自谓天骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373796_comment'></div>罔修仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373796_comment'></div>肆行残忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373796_comment'></div>凌虐诸蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373796_comment'></div>知可汗代为仇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373796_comment'></div>果能报复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373796_comment'></div>灭其国邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373796_comment'></div>皆已立君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373796_comment'></div>驱彼酋渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373796_comment'></div>尽逾沙漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373796_comment'></div>茂功壮节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373796_comment'></div>近代无俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373796_comment'></div>回鹘当中国伐叛之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373796_comment'></div>尝展勋力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373796_comment'></div>列圣嘉其大顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373796_comment'></div>累降姻亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373796_comment'></div>今失国亡逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373796_comment'></div>寄于塞上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373796_comment'></div>只合早归穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373796_comment'></div>受朕抚循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373796_comment'></div>而乃转自鸱张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373796_comment'></div>益怀狼顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373796_comment'></div>在阴山之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373796_comment'></div>诱惑小蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373796_comment'></div>乘我无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373796_comment'></div>即来侵掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373796_comment'></div>恣为边患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373796_comment'></div>今已四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373796_comment'></div>朕大徵甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373796_comment'></div>久欲除剪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373796_comment'></div>比令幽州太原两道节度使皆充招抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373796_comment'></div>以示绥怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373796_comment'></div>望其悛心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373796_comment'></div>犹务含育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373796_comment'></div>而凌蔑公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373796_comment'></div>频拟伤残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373796_comment'></div>驰突边城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373796_comment'></div>敢谋盗窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373796_comment'></div>近太原节度使刘沔不胜其忿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373796_comment'></div>潜出偏师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373796_comment'></div>乘其诪张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373796_comment'></div>使袭牙帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373796_comment'></div>虏众大溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373796_comment'></div>穹庐尽焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373796_comment'></div>元恶伤残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373796_comment'></div>脱身潜窜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373796_comment'></div>已取得太和公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373796_comment'></div>即至阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373796_comment'></div>回鹘残兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373796_comment'></div>不满千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373796_comment'></div>散投山谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373796_comment'></div>旬日之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373796_comment'></div>必合枭禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373796_comment'></div>朕再见公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1373796_comment'></div>良用欣慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1373796_comment'></div>可汗既为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1373796", 1373796, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>雠怨</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1373796_comment'></div>须尽歼夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1373796_comment'></div>倘留馀烬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1373796_comment'></div>必生后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1373796_comment'></div>想远闻庆快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1373796_comment'></div>当惬素心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1373796_comment'></div>闻可汗受氏之源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1373796_comment'></div>与我同族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1373796_comment'></div>汉北平太守材气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1373796_comment'></div>天下无双。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1373796_comment'></div>结发事边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1373796_comment'></div>控弦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_111_1373796", 1373796, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>贯石</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1373796_comment'></div>自后子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1373796_comment'></div>多习武略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1373796_comment'></div>代为将门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1373796_comment'></div>至嫡孙都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1373796_comment'></div>提精卒五千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1373796_comment'></div>深入大漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1373796_comment'></div>单于举国来敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1373796_comment'></div>莫敢抗威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1373796_comment'></div>身虽陷没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1373796_comment'></div>名震蛮貊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1373796_comment'></div>我国家承北平太守之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1373796_comment'></div>可汗又是都尉苗裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1373796_comment'></div>以此合族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1373796_comment'></div>尊卑可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1373796_comment'></div>昨闻太和公主为可汗兵众所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1373796_comment'></div>可汗以同姓之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1373796_comment'></div>使遣归还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1373796_comment'></div>有以见可汗秉礼义之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1373796_comment'></div>重亲邻之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1373796_comment'></div>朕深用感叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1373796_comment'></div>至于涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1373796_comment'></div>公主寻为回鹘劫夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1373796_comment'></div>久不归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1373796_comment'></div>可汗所遣使臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1373796_comment'></div>皆被诛戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1373796_comment'></div>朕言念伤痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1373796_comment'></div>至今不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1373796_comment'></div>昨见可汗表求访公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1373796_comment'></div>使公主上天入地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1373796_comment'></div>必须觅得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1373796_comment'></div>今边将愤惋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1373796_comment'></div>已立奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1373796_comment'></div>回鹘罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1373796_comment'></div>计日可致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1373796_comment'></div>即当显戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1373796_comment'></div>以谢可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1373796_comment'></div>况回鹘夷灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1373796_comment'></div>种族必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1373796_comment'></div>与可汗便为邻国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1373796_comment'></div>各保旧疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1373796_comment'></div>继好息人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1373796_comment'></div>事同一体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1373796_comment'></div>从此边陲罢警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1373796_comment'></div>弓矢载櫜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1373796_comment'></div>必当诸部服从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1373796_comment'></div>皆怀健羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1373796_comment'></div>知我两国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1373796_comment'></div>永为宗盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1373796_comment'></div>想可汗明智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1373796_comment'></div>自有良算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1373796_comment'></div>故令太仆卿兼御史中丞赵蕃持节充使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1373796_comment'></div>以答深诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1373796_comment'></div>质于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1373796_comment'></div>用存大信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1373796_comment'></div>朕言不贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1373796_comment'></div>可不勉欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1373796_comment'></div>又自古外蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1373796_comment'></div>皆须因中国册命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1373796_comment'></div>然后可弹压一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1373796_comment'></div>今欲册命可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1373796_comment'></div>特加美号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1373796_comment'></div>缘未知可汗之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1373796_comment'></div>且遣谕怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1373796_comment'></div>待赵蕃回日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1373796_comment'></div>别命使展礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1373796_comment'></div>以申和好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1373796_comment'></div>彼间将相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1373796_comment'></div>并存问之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1373796_comment'></div>遣书指不多及。</div><div id='poem_sentence_180_1373796_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年2月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，二月底，李德裕进黠戛斯朝贡图传。作品：《进黠戛斯朝贡图传状》<span showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373913?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣示进黠戛斯朝贡图深惬于怀状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373913'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373913'>今日款义行深至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373913_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373913_comment'></div>卿所进图传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373913_comment'></div>深惬于怀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373913_comment'></div>伏以陛下大化神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373913_comment'></div>百蛮震叠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373913_comment'></div>故远夷慕义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373913_comment'></div>万里来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373913_comment'></div>诚宜图以丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373913_comment'></div>录于编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373913_comment'></div>传之千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373913_comment'></div>以燀威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373913_comment'></div>臣学术空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373913_comment'></div>文艺浅薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373913_comment'></div>辄为传序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373913_comment'></div>莫究圣功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373913_comment'></div>陛下遽纳微诚。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373913_comment'></div>不任荷恩感戴之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1373913_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373998' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373998' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373998?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黠戛斯朝贡图传序</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373998")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373998'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373998'>昔越裳贡雉。荐于宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373998_comment'></div>西旅献獒。陈以典训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373998_comment'></div>所以感其至而戒其初也。仁圣文武至神大孝皇帝御历之四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373998_comment'></div>天瑞灿烂。王道<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>昭焯</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373998_comment'></div>五材并用。六辔斯柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373998_comment'></div>布政宣室。以张<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>神化</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373998_comment'></div>振兵朔野。以耀威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373998_comment'></div>故得天晬而清。日晏而明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373998_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>虫螟</span>不生。嘉谷以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373998_comment'></div>中宇既安。四夷来庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373998_comment'></div>由是龙荒君长黠戛斯。遣使注吾合素等上表献良马二疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373998_comment'></div>绝大漠而贡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>赤诚</span>。涉流沙而沾赭汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373998_comment'></div>非至德所感。孰能臻于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373998_comment'></div>皇帝以前有鸾旗。焉用骥騄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373998_comment'></div>不贵龙友。唯驾鼓车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373998_comment'></div>乃命其使见于内殿。赐以珍膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373998_comment'></div>锡之文锦。谨按故相魏国公贾耽所撰古今四夷述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373998_comment'></div>黠戛斯者。本坚昆国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373998_comment'></div>贞观二十一年。其酋长入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373998_comment'></div>授以将军印。拜坚昆都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373998_comment'></div>逮于天宝季年。朝贡不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373998_comment'></div>暨中国多难。为回鹘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>隔碍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373998_comment'></div>黠戛斯忿其桀骜。乘彼荐饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373998_comment'></div>于是破龙庭。焚罽幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373998_comment'></div>萧条万里。地无种落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373998_comment'></div>始得出重泉而见白日。披氛雾而睹青天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373998_comment'></div>臣伏见太宗谓群臣曰。南荒西域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373998_comment'></div>自远而至。其故何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373998_comment'></div>宰臣房玄龄对曰。殊域来朝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373998_comment'></div>中国乂安。帝德遐被所致也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373998_comment'></div>太宗曰。向中国不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373998_comment'></div>亦何缘而至。朕睹此怀惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373998_comment'></div>何者。昔秦始皇并吞六国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373998_comment'></div>汉武帝威加戎狄。今殊方异类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373998_comment'></div>无远不宾。窃比秦汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373998_comment'></div>想无多愧。亦欲传之子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373998_comment'></div>念二王之末途。朕所以不能不惧耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373998_comment'></div>臣伏思太宗往日之惧。致我唐百代之隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373998_comment'></div>则圣祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>诒谋</span>。可谓深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373998_comment'></div>此太宗所以永保鸿名。为受命之祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373998_comment'></div>陛下所以丕承王业。为中兴之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373998_comment'></div>岂不宜哉。天旨以贾耽有陈平镇抚之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373998_comment'></div>得充国通知之敏。其所述作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373998_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/86/Comments/0")'>该明</span>古今。乃诏太子詹事韦宗卿秘书少监吕述往莅宾馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373998_comment'></div>以展<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/88/Comments/0")'>私觌</span>。稽合同异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373998_comment'></div>覼缕阙遗。传胡貊兜离之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373998_comment'></div>载山川曲折之状。条贯周备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373998_comment'></div>文理<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1373998", 1373998, "Clauses/94/Comments/0")'>洽通</span>。臣伏以贞观初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373998_comment'></div>中书侍郎颜师古上言。昔周武王天下太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373998_comment'></div>远国归款。周史乃集其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373998_comment'></div>为王会篇。今万国来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373998_comment'></div>蛮𡗝率服。实可图写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373998_comment'></div>请撰为王会图。有诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373998_comment'></div>臣辄因韦宗卿吕述所纪异闻。饰以绘事。<div class='inline' id='poem_1373759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授狄兼谟兼益王傅郑柬之兼益王府长史制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373759'>敕。古者圣人之教子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373759_comment'></div>皆妙选天下之端士。以卫翼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373759_comment'></div>汉代梁王好书。则以贾谊经纬之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373759_comment'></div>推明其志。淮阳好政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373759_comment'></div>则以元成礼让之节。镇静其浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373759_comment'></div>前王令猷。百代良法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373759_comment'></div>况朕建立元子。锡之奥区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373759_comment'></div>朱邸初开。黄发是宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373759_comment'></div>以兼谟慷慨纳说。有爰丝正席之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373759_comment'></div>以柬之取舍俟时。有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1373759", 1373759, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>贡禹弹冠</span>之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373759_comment'></div>皆行不苟合。诚无暗欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373759_comment'></div>历职有声。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373759", 1373759, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>居正</span>无挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373759_comment'></div>举其素行。擢在首僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373759_comment'></div>尔宜广德义之风。明孝爱之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373759_comment'></div>俾其严于问寝。敬不绝驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373759_comment'></div>化与心成。中道若性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373759_comment'></div>服我休命。可不慎欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373759_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1373759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年2月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，二月，李德裕撰制，授元晦谏议大夫。作品：《授元晦谏议大夫制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1373757' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373757")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373757'>敕。昔汲黯薄淮阳守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373757_comment'></div>愿出入禁闼。补过拾遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373757_comment'></div>则谏诤之任。实资谅直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373757_comment'></div>我求其比。今得正人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373757_comment'></div>吏部郎中元晦。往在内廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373757_comment'></div>尝感先顾。奋发忠恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373757_comment'></div>不私形骸。俯伏青蒲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373757_comment'></div>至于雪涕。数共工之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373757_comment'></div>不蔽圣聪。辨垣平之诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373757_comment'></div>益张文德。近因旌别邪正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373757_comment'></div>宰弼上言。以鲁公藏罟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373757_comment'></div>莫如置革于左右。汉后辑槛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373757_comment'></div>孰若列游于公卿。是用命尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373757_comment'></div>登于文陛。尔其副我宠擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373757_comment'></div>不替初心。勿沽小名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373757_comment'></div>以枉大节。勉服官业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373757_comment'></div>期于有终。可谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373757_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1373757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约三月，李德裕撰状，讨论袭击回鹘事宜。作品：《讨袭回鹘事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约三月，李德裕撰有关李靖破突厥事，并请将《李靖传》诏示刘沔。作品：《李靖传事状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div id='poem_1373824' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373824")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373824'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373824'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373824_comment'></div>臣等伏见李靖再破颉利可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373824_comment'></div>方始擒得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373824_comment'></div>望付翰林录李靖传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373824_comment'></div>诏示刘沔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373824_comment'></div>晓谕云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373824_comment'></div>比者未取却公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373824_comment'></div>与回鹘接战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373824_comment'></div>朝廷力稍不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373824_comment'></div>舍之即易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373824_comment'></div>今既取却公主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373824_comment'></div>又与回鹘接战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373824_comment'></div>即须剪除令尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373824_comment'></div>不得遗生后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373824_comment'></div>兼令拣退浑沙陀共三千骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373824_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1373824", 1373824, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>枞枞</span>排比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373824_comment'></div>兼晒取三千人十日乾粮及乾蒸饼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373824_comment'></div>闻塞上五百钱买得一头牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373824_comment'></div>亦令约人数晒取牛肉乾脯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373824_comment'></div>且如此排比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373824_comment'></div>待景度幽州使回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373824_comment'></div>令刘沔专差信实军将至景度数探问事情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373824_comment'></div>如仲武便肯出兵讨袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373824_comment'></div>即须且让仲武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373824_comment'></div>不得争功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373824_comment'></div>如仲武不□词言悠慢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373824_comment'></div>未有去思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373824_comment'></div>即须及塞草未青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373824_comment'></div>虏马羸弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373824_comment'></div>便令蕃军掩袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373824_comment'></div>必见成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373824_comment'></div>其李靖传事谨奏上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373824_comment'></div>伏希圣明采纳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1373824_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，约三月，李德裕代皇帝撰旨，令归义军士分散属诸道节度团练收管。作品：《停归义军敕旨》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1373803' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373803_comment'></div>李思忠首率蕃兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373803_comment'></div>归诚向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373803_comment'></div>念其忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373803_comment'></div>特许来朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373803_comment'></div>而又久慕华风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373803_comment'></div>愿留京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373803_comment'></div>俾参环卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373803_comment'></div>用报勋庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373803_comment'></div>其归义军使宜停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373803_comment'></div>将士等同叶义心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373803_comment'></div>所宜优宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373803_comment'></div>况闻诸道军镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373803_comment'></div>皆置马军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373803_comment'></div>选择蕃浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373803_comment'></div>尤不易得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373803_comment'></div>缘此将健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373803_comment'></div>久工骑射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373803_comment'></div>颇出常伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373803_comment'></div>列于牙旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373803_comment'></div>足壮戎阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373803_comment'></div>宜分诸道节度使团练收管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373803_comment'></div>便给本道衣粮。<div class='inline' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，三月，李德裕追论维州事，请追赠悉怛谋官。作品：《论太和五年八月将故维州城归降准诏却执送本蕃就戮人吐蕃城副使悉怛谋状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十二。）</span>《赠故蕃维州城副使悉怛谋制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span>《谢赠故蕃维州城副使悉怛谋状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_1373893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373893?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论太和五年八月将故维州城归降准诏却执送本蕃就僇人吐蕃城副使悉怛谋状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373893")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373893'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373893'>右。臣顷蒙先朝授剑南西川节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373893_comment'></div>其悉怛谋虽是吐蕃酋长。久乐皇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373893_comment'></div>将彼坚城。降臣当道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373893_comment'></div>臣差行维州刺史虞藏俭。便领兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373893_comment'></div>入据其城。飞章以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373893_comment'></div>先帝惊喜。其时与臣仇者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373893_comment'></div>望风疾臣。遽兴疑言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373893_comment'></div>上罔宸听。以为与吐蕃盟约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373893_comment'></div>不可背之。必恐将此为词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373893_comment'></div>侵犯郊境。遂诏臣却还此城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373893_comment'></div>兼执送悉怛谋等。令彼自僇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373893_comment'></div>复降中使。迫促送还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373893_comment'></div>昔白起杀降。终于杜邮致祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373893_comment'></div>陈汤见按。是为郅支报仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373893_comment'></div>感叹前事。愧心终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373893_comment'></div>今者幸逢英主。忝被台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373893_comment'></div>辄敢追论。伏希省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373893_comment'></div>且维州据高山绝顶。三面临江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373893_comment'></div>在戎虏平州之冲。是汉地入边之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373893_comment'></div>初河陇尽殁。惟此州独存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373893_comment'></div>吐蕃潜将妇人。嫁与此州门者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373893_comment'></div>二十年后。两男长成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373893_comment'></div>窃开垒门。引兵而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373893_comment'></div>遂为所灭。号曰无忧城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373893_comment'></div>从此得并力于西边。更无虞于南路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373893_comment'></div>凭陵近甸。旰食累朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373893_comment'></div>贞元中。韦皋以经略河湟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373893_comment'></div>此城为始。尽锐万旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373893_comment'></div>急攻数年。吐蕃爱惜既甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373893_comment'></div>遣其舅论莽热来救。雉堞高峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373893_comment'></div>临冲难及于层霄。鸟径屈蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373893_comment'></div>猛士多糜于石。莫展公输之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373893_comment'></div>空擒莽热而还。及南蛮负恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373893_comment'></div>扫地驱劫。臣初到西蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373893_comment'></div>众心未安。外扬国威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373893_comment'></div>中缉边备。其维州熟臣信令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373893_comment'></div>乃送款与臣。臣告之以须俟奏报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373893_comment'></div>冀探情伪。其悉怛谋等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373893_comment'></div>寻帅城兵。并州印甲仗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373893_comment'></div>塞途相继。空垒来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373893_comment'></div>臣即大出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1373893", 1373893, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>牙兵</span>。受其降礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373893_comment'></div>南蛮在列。莫敢仰视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373893_comment'></div>况西山八国。隔在此州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373893_comment'></div>比带使名。都成虚语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373893_comment'></div>诸久苦蕃中徵役。愿作王人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373893_comment'></div>自维州降后。皆云但得臣信牒帽子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373893_comment'></div>便相率内属。其蕃界合水栖鸡等城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373893_comment'></div>既失险阻。自须抽归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373893_comment'></div>可减八处镇兵。坐收千馀里旧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373893_comment'></div>臣见此有莫大之利。为恢复之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373893_comment'></div>所以面许奏闻。各加酬赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373893_comment'></div>臣自与锦袍金带。禺俟朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373893_comment'></div>且吐蕃维州未降以前一年。犹围逼鲁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373893_comment'></div>以此言之。岂守盟约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373893_comment'></div>况臣未尝用兵攻取。彼自感化来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373893_comment'></div>又沮议之人。岂思事实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373893_comment'></div>犬戎迟钝。土旷人稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373893_comment'></div>每欲乘秋犯边。皆须数岁聚食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373893_comment'></div>臣得维州逾月。未有一使入疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373893_comment'></div>自此之后。方应破胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373893_comment'></div>岂有虑其复怨。鼓此浮词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373893_comment'></div>臣受降之初。指天为誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373893_comment'></div>宁忍将三百馀人性命。弃信偷安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373893_comment'></div>累表陈论。乞垂矜舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373893_comment'></div>答诏严切。竟令执还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373893_comment'></div>加以体被三木。舆于竹畚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373893_comment'></div>及将即路。冤叫呼天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373893_comment'></div>将吏对臣。无不陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373893_comment'></div>其部送者。更遭蕃帅讥诮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373893_comment'></div>既以降彼。何须送来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373893_comment'></div>乃却将此降人。戮于汉界之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373893_comment'></div>恣行残忍。用固携离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373893_comment'></div>至乃掷其婴孩。承以枪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373893_comment'></div>臣闻楚灵诱杀蛮子。春秋明讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373893_comment'></div>周文收送邓叔。简册深鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373893_comment'></div>况乎大国。负此异族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373893_comment'></div>塞忠之路。快凶虐之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373893_comment'></div>从古以来。未有此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373893_comment'></div>伏惟仁圣文武至诚大孝皇帝陛下振睿圣之宏图。得怀徕之上策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373893_comment'></div>故南蛮申请朝之愿。北虏效款塞之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373893_comment'></div>臣实痛惜悉怛谋等。举城向化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373893_comment'></div>解辫归义。而未加昆邪之爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373893_comment'></div>不赏庶其之功。翻以忠爱受屠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373893_comment'></div>为仇雠所快。身遭此酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373893_comment'></div>名又不彰。职由愚臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373893_comment'></div>陷此非罪。虽时更一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373893_comment'></div>而运属千年。所以具陈根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373893_comment'></div>不惮繁细。冀蒙睿鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373893_comment'></div>追奖忠魂。伏乞宣付中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373893_comment'></div>各加褒赠。冀华夷感德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373893_comment'></div>幽显伸冤。警既往之倖心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373893_comment'></div>激将来之峻节。臣无任恳愿之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373893_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1373893_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠故蕃维州城副使悉怛谋制</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373756'>敕。兵家之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373756_comment'></div>地有必争。远则汉氏之得阴山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373756_comment'></div>匈奴恸哭。近则张愿之城河外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373756_comment'></div>朔边底宁。乃眷维州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373756_comment'></div>实为险隘。有金汤之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373756_comment'></div>居襟带之冲。没为戎疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373756_comment'></div>垂六十载。故蕃维州城副使悉怛谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373756_comment'></div>尝解辫发。献其垒垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373756_comment'></div>议臣托以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373756", 1373756, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>和盟</span>。沮其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373756_comment'></div>寻令束缚。归戮虏庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373756_comment'></div>彼获甘心。且无噍类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373756_comment'></div>昔常山临代。为全赵之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373756", 1373756, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>宝符</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373756_comment'></div>河西绝羌。断西戎之右臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373756_comment'></div>弃兹要害。用长寇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373756_comment'></div>至今蜀人。言必流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373756_comment'></div>岂陈汤之专命。由匡衡之废忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373756_comment'></div>言念始谋。久罹幽枉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373756_comment'></div>爰加宠赠。用慰贞魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373756_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373756_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373914' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373914'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373914'>伏以远夷率服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373914_comment'></div>大国绥怀。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373914_comment'></div>空壁求降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373914_comment'></div>据其款诚。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373914_comment'></div>受降之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373914_comment'></div>臣与其盟诅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373914_comment'></div>力不能救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373914_comment'></div>心实怀惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373914_comment'></div>运属圣明。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1373914_comment'></div>岂望听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373914_comment'></div>陛下用周文之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373914_comment'></div>已同葬骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373914_comment'></div>念汧城之枉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373914_comment'></div>仍赐策书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373914_comment'></div>臣忝补钧衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373914_comment'></div>尝居戎帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373914_comment'></div>仰感元造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373914_comment'></div>倍百群情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373914_comment'></div>臣不任荷恩感戴之至。</div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373780_comment'></div>城府空虚。杨弁糺合征师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373780_comment'></div>众才一旅。追逐主帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373780_comment'></div>擅领兵权。寻诏近地行营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373780_comment'></div>量抽兵马。便令剪扑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373780_comment'></div>计日枭夷。缘镇州地接土门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373780_comment'></div>最为便近。已诏元逵出师五千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373780_comment'></div>为向南诸军声援。顾兹小寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373780_comment'></div>未足劳卿大军。缘何清朝下河水官健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373770_comment'></div>朕必遣旧德重望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373770_comment'></div>委之抚循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373770_comment'></div>刘稹厚加爵赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373770_comment'></div>别有任用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373770_comment'></div>如妄自制置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373770_comment'></div>邀求宠荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373770_comment'></div>国家典法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373770_comment'></div>亦难宽宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373770_comment'></div>泽潞一镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373770_comment'></div>与卿事体不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373770_comment'></div>勿为子孙之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373770_comment'></div>欲存辅车之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373770_comment'></div>但能显立功效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373770_comment'></div>自然福及后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373770_comment'></div>勉务良图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373770_comment'></div>副兹委遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373770_comment'></div>高秩厚禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373770_comment'></div>无所⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（惨吝）</span>焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1373770_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年5月2日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，五月初二日，李德裕上表，奏请朝臣集议对刘稹之处置，大多朝臣主张妥协，李德裕主张讨伐。作品：《论昭义三军请刘稹勾当军务状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373825'>右。伏以元和中李师道自擅一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373825_comment'></div>久为桀逆。及王师压境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373825_comment'></div>天网四陈。刘悟颇识转祸之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373825_comment'></div>乃有纳忠之效。朝廷奖其归命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373825_comment'></div>宠遇优渥。待以信臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373825_comment'></div>委之雄镇。从谏因父殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373825_comment'></div>自总兵权。属宝历中政务因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373825_comment'></div>事归苟且。与其符节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373825_comment'></div>以紊国章。然犹恭守诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373825_comment'></div>咨诹善道。亦修觐礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373825_comment'></div>一至阙庭。骤陟台阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373825_comment'></div>实非公议。爰自近岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373825_comment'></div>颇聚甲兵。招致亡命之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373825_comment'></div>遂成逋逃之薮。怵于邪说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373825_comment'></div>自谓雄豪。及寝疾弥留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373825_comment'></div>罔思臣节。又令纪纲旧校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373825_comment'></div>诱动军情。树置騃童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373825_comment'></div>再图兵柄。陛下以泽潞元宗历试旧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373825_comment'></div>有上党古□风俗和平。人心忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373825_comment'></div>艰难以后。多用儒臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373825_comment'></div>又以刘悟功著先朝。欲全其宗族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373825_comment'></div>特令供奉官薛士干宣谕。示以圣情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373825_comment'></div>而将校继有表章。未从明命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373825_comment'></div>臣等伏思刘悟以师道之逆。亲自枭夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373825_comment'></div>诚合示一军大顺之源。置子孙于无过之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373825_comment'></div>而乃继师道覆车之轨。袭怙乱之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373825_comment'></div>此而可容。孰不可忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373825_comment'></div>固须广询廷议。以尽群情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373825_comment'></div>臣等商量。望令两省御史台并文官四品以上武官三品以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373825_comment'></div>于尚书省集议奏。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373825_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373825_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年5月13日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，五月十三日，朝廷下制讨伐刘稹，李德裕奉宣撰《讨刘稹制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1373744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373744'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373744'>门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373744_comment'></div>定天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373744_comment'></div>致风俗于大同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373744_comment'></div>安生人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373744_comment'></div>齐法度于画一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373744_comment'></div>虽晋之栾赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373744_comment'></div>家有旧勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373744_comment'></div>汉之韩黥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373744_comment'></div>身为佐命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373744_comment'></div>至于干纪乱律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373744_comment'></div>罔不枭夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373744_comment'></div>禁暴除残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373744_comment'></div>古今大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373744_comment'></div>故昭义节度刘悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373744_comment'></div>顷居海岱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373744_comment'></div>尝列爪牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373744_comment'></div>属师道阻兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373744_comment'></div>王师问罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373744_comment'></div>三面开网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373744_comment'></div>一境离心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373744_comment'></div>乘此危机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373744_comment'></div>遂能归命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373744_comment'></div>宪宗嘉其诚款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373744_comment'></div>授以南燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373744_comment'></div>穆宗待以腹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373744_comment'></div>委之上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373744_comment'></div>招致死士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373744_comment'></div>固护一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373744_comment'></div>逮于末年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373744_comment'></div>已亏臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373744_comment'></div>刘从谏生禀戾气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373744_comment'></div>幼习乱风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373744_comment'></div>因跋扈之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373744_comment'></div>以专封壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373744_comment'></div>恃纪纲之律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373744_comment'></div>以袭兵符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373744_comment'></div>暂展执圭之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373744_comment'></div>终无上绶之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373744_comment'></div>隙驹为喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373744_comment'></div>魏豹始务于绝河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373744_comment'></div>井蛙自居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373744_comment'></div>孙述颇闻于恃崄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373744_comment'></div>诱受亡命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373744_comment'></div>妄作妖言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373744_comment'></div>中伺朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373744_comment'></div>潜图左道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373744_comment'></div>接壤戎帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373744_comment'></div>屡奏阴谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373744_comment'></div>顾苕卵之可矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373744_comment'></div>岂泉鱼之自察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373744_comment'></div>暨乎沉痼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373744_comment'></div>曾靡哀鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373744_comment'></div>犹驻将尽之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373744_comment'></div>恣行邪僻之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373744_comment'></div>罔惑旧校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373744_comment'></div>树立狡童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373744_comment'></div>中使挟医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373744_comment'></div>莫睹其朝服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373744_comment'></div>近臣衔命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373744_comment'></div>不入于垒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373744_comment'></div>逆节甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373744_comment'></div>人神共弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373744_comment'></div>其赠官及先所授官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373744_comment'></div>并刘稹在身官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373744_comment'></div>并宜削夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373744_comment'></div>成德军节度使王元逵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373744_comment'></div>魏博节度使何宏敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373744_comment'></div>或姻连王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373744_comment'></div>或任重藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373744_comment'></div>恳陈一志之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373744_comment'></div>愿扬九伐之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373744_comment'></div>吴汉任职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373744_comment'></div>受诏而初无办严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373744_comment'></div>卜式朴忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373744_comment'></div>未战而义形于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373744_comment'></div>况成德军尝以骁骑横冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373744_comment'></div>首破朱滔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373744_comment'></div>士气方酣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373744_comment'></div>再回鲁阳之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373744_comment'></div>鼓音不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373744_comment'></div>三周不注之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373744_comment'></div>魏博军亦以大旆涉河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373744_comment'></div>竟歼师道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373744_comment'></div>建十二州之旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373744_comment'></div>以列降人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373744_comment'></div>削六十年之厉阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373744_comment'></div>尽归王化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373744_comment'></div>士贾馀勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373744_comment'></div>军有雄心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373744_comment'></div>必能禀酂侯之指纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373744_comment'></div>成葛亮之心伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373744_comment'></div>咨汝二帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373744_comment'></div>朕尤注怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373744_comment'></div>成德军节度镇冀深赵等州观察处置等使金紫光禄大夫检校司徒兼镇州大都督府长史御史大夫驸马都尉云骑尉元逵宜守本官充北面招讨泽潞使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373744_comment'></div>馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373744_comment'></div>魏博等州节度观察处置等使银青光禄大夫检校户部尚书兼镇州大都督府长史御史大夫上柱国何宏敬守本官充东面招讨泽潞使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373744_comment'></div>馀如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373744_comment'></div>潞府曩者烈祖在藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373744_comment'></div>先天启圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1373744_comment'></div>符瑞昭晰。<div id='poem_sentence_101_1373744_comment'></div>金石刻于代邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1373744_comment'></div>实为可封之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1373744_comment'></div>久为仁寿之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1373744_comment'></div>艰难以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1373744_comment'></div>颇著诚节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1373744_comment'></div>并赦而不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1373744_comment'></div>昭义军旧大将等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1373744_comment'></div>如能舍逆效顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1373744_comment'></div>以州郡兵众归降者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1373744_comment'></div>必厚加封赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1373744_comment'></div>如能擒送刘稹者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1373744_comment'></div>别受土地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1373744_comment'></div>以振勋庸。<div id='poem_sentence_120_1373744_comment'></div>亦加爵赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1373744_comment'></div>刘悟下郓州旧将校子孙及刘从谏近招致将士等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1373744_comment'></div>喻以善道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1373744_comment'></div>宜听朕言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1373744_comment'></div>凡秉义立名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1373744_comment'></div>须明大顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1373744_comment'></div>未有忠于所奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1373744_comment'></div>上悖君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1373744_comment'></div>昔郤至有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1373744_comment'></div>受君之禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1373744_comment'></div>是以聚党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1373744_comment'></div>有党而争命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1373744_comment'></div>罪孰大焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1373744_comment'></div>田横能得士心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1373744_comment'></div>人多致命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1373744_comment'></div>伏于海岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1373744_comment'></div>莫敢猖狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1373744_comment'></div>及汉高召之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1373744_comment'></div>奔走向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1373744_comment'></div>岂尝违拒汉使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1373744_comment'></div>留止田横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1373744_comment'></div>唯慕殉以成仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1373744_comment'></div>不相挺而作乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1373744_comment'></div>故得其主殁延殊宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1373744_comment'></div>光显令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1373744_comment'></div>尔等既有义心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1373744_comment'></div>宜思改悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1373744_comment'></div>如能感喻刘稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1373744_comment'></div>束身归朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1373744_comment'></div>必当待之如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1373744_comment'></div>特与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_151_1373744", 1373744, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>洗雪</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1373744_comment'></div>尔等旧校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1373744_comment'></div>亦并甄酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1373744_comment'></div>仍委陈夷行刘沔王茂元各务进兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1373744_comment'></div>同力攻讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1373744_comment'></div>其诸道进军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1373744_comment'></div>并不得焚烧庐舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1373744_comment'></div>发掘丘墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1373744_comment'></div>擒执百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1373744_comment'></div>以为俘囚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1373744_comment'></div>桑麻田苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1373744_comment'></div>皆许本户为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1373744_comment'></div>罪止元恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1373744_comment'></div>务安生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1373744_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1373744_comment'></div>戒朕以祖宗之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1373744_comment'></div>不可私一族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1373744_comment'></div>刑赏之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1373744_comment'></div>所以正万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1373744_comment'></div>宜用甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1373744_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　时李德裕在京为相，五月中下旬，李德裕代何弘敬、李彦佐等撰书与泽潞军将书，晓谕诸将勿从刘稹为逆。作品：《代弘敬与泽潞军将书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷八。）</span>《代彦佐与泽潞三军书》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373982'>昨览大将等陈情表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373982_comment'></div>未知迷复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373982_comment'></div>颇事游词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373982_comment'></div>宏敬任忝专征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373982_comment'></div>兼许招谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373982_comment'></div>思欲布朝廷大信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373982_comment'></div>解彼深疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373982_comment'></div>指事而言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373982_comment'></div>更无文饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373982_comment'></div>只如公等本使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373982_comment'></div>疾病绵惙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373982_comment'></div>既以上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373982_comment'></div>便须请监军权知兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373982_comment'></div>以俟朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373982_comment'></div>岂有表章未发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373982_comment'></div>邪计已萌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373982_comment'></div>遽遣刘稹衙内决事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373982_comment'></div>不令常侍父疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373982_comment'></div>既亏子道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373982_comment'></div>深累国章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373982_comment'></div>远近闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373982_comment'></div>无不骇听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373982_comment'></div>姜崟四月十三日到城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373982_comment'></div>至二十三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373982_comment'></div>圣上惊异此事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373982_comment'></div>要知端的。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373982_comment'></div>遂令追问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373982_comment'></div>冀得实情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373982_comment'></div>姜崟状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373982_comment'></div>四月六日大衙宅内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1373982", 1373982, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>小听</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373982_comment'></div>实见本使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373982_comment'></div>至八日晚后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373982_comment'></div>刘稹传本使处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373982_comment'></div>令入城请医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373982_comment'></div>并不见本使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373982_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373982_comment'></div>女婿李方四月五日降职至十将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373982_comment'></div>妹婿王再晟被发遣山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373982_comment'></div>充邯郸镇佐军虞候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373982_comment'></div>崟见女婿辈皆被降黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373982_comment'></div>遂怀忧惧。<div id='poem_sentence_67_1373982_comment'></div>军人闻此消息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373982_comment'></div>且言故使尚未薨背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373982_comment'></div>事已如此。<div id='poem_sentence_94_1373982_comment'></div>始终恩礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373982_comment'></div>可谓无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373982_comment'></div>公等须知罪恶贯盈。<div
