class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373983'>自天宝以后。兵起山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373983_comment'></div>惟泽潞一军。不亏臣节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373983_comment'></div>李司徒抱玉以元勋上将。初领戎韬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373983_comment'></div>李相公抱真武略忠诚。复总戎柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373983_comment'></div>教习步射。振起军声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373983_comment'></div>为列镇之雄。皆李公之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373983_comment'></div>及说谕太尉武俊。首破朱滔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373983_comment'></div>击韩师于武安。屋瓦皆振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373983_comment'></div>剪符寇于淮服。草木皆兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373983_comment'></div>六十年间。忠名尚在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373983_comment'></div>及李相公殂谢。朝廷以王尚书虔休代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373983_comment'></div>追李缄令居丧东洛。一军受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373983_comment'></div>莫敢借留。致泽潞功勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373983_comment'></div>成泽潞节义。迩代节相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373983_comment'></div>谁继李公。彼军尚不顾私恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373983_comment'></div>以隳王制。岂有从谏跋扈既久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373983_comment'></div>忠孝无闻。于彼一军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373983_comment'></div>有何恩泽。若委心泽潞将校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373983_comment'></div>即不合别置纪纲。以劫胁人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373983_comment'></div>自图身计。奈何拒君亲之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373983_comment'></div>从逆乱之谋。近者卢从史首鼠两端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373983_comment'></div>贪狼成性。包隐奸慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373983_comment'></div>逗留兵机。彼大将乌司徒与王宪等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373983_comment'></div>因事图之。寻就束缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373983_comment'></div>破朱滔之功未朽。擒从史之效又彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373983_comment'></div>诚动上元。忠贯白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373983_comment'></div>一军盛美。可不惜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373983_comment'></div>比闻从谏志在猖狂。招致亡命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373983_comment'></div>逆人亲党。游客布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373983_comment'></div>皆在公宴之中。列于大将之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373983_comment'></div>一军愤愧。固已积年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373983_comment'></div>岂可舍累代之美名。忘近岁之深耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373983_comment'></div>将性命家族。以徇騃童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373983_comment'></div>生为不忠之人。死为不臣之鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373983_comment'></div>彦佐忝受明命。总彼成师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373983_comment'></div>感叹之怀。寝食忘次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373983_comment'></div>愿将忠素。宣布皇恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373983_comment'></div>俟彼英豪。见几而作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373983_comment'></div>爵秩荣宠。身自取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373983_comment'></div>岂得临难因循。为人受祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373983_comment'></div>勉思奇策。以副深心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373983_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1373983_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年6月4日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，六月四日，李德裕加司徒，作《加司徒请停册礼状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1373905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>加司徒请停册礼状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年6月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373905")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373905'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373905'>臣伏见今月二十二日制书。制授臣司徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373905_comment'></div>仍令所司择日备礼册命者。臣窃位妨贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373905_comment'></div>允宜黜免。圣慈宥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373905_comment'></div>擢授中台。跼蹐惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373905_comment'></div>若临泉谷。伏以明庭授册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373905_comment'></div>上路乘轩。岂可以腼冒之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373905_comment'></div>再尘清庙。不称之服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373905_comment'></div>重列天衢。为众目之所嗤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373905_comment'></div>致处士之横议。臣且自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373905_comment'></div>况在周行。又以伐叛之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373905_comment'></div>所宜务简。炎蒸之候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373905_comment'></div>不可劳人。伏见太和四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373905_comment'></div>裴度受司徒平章事。固辞册礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373905_comment'></div>竟获允从。既有近例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373905_comment'></div>足得循守。伏望陛下察臣恳款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373905_comment'></div>皆自至诚。册命之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373905_comment'></div>特赐停罢。臣不任哀恳屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373905_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1373905_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年6月5日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，六月五日，李德裕奏请商议李彦佐于翼城招降事宜。作品：《李彦佐翼城驻军事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div id='poem_1373826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373826?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李彦佐翼城驻军事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年6月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373826'>右。彦佐即至翼城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373826_comment'></div>计贼中军人百姓必有归降来者。彦佐务推恩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373826_comment'></div>必尽绥怀。臣等深虑贼中潜奸人诈为降附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373826_comment'></div>人数渐广。必有异谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373826_comment'></div>臣等商量。望付翰林诏示彦佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373826_comment'></div>如有百姓归降。量事优恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373826_comment'></div>各令复业。如军归降者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373826_comment'></div>亦须各有优赏。便令将朝廷意旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373826_comment'></div>转相招诱。逐旋疏理处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373826_comment'></div>不得留在翼城。如军人已归降者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373826_comment'></div>不许却入贼中。即望于界上别立一营令屯集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373826_comment'></div>委彦佐拣干事军将别将三五百人主领。仍不与器械。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373826_comment'></div>并不得令在晋绛界内屯集。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373826_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1373826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年6月19日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，六月十九日，李德裕奏请使泽潞四面节度使知汉朝故事，不得接受刘稹在穷途时投降。作品：《请赐泽潞四面节度使状》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年7月17日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，七月十七日，李德裕奏请令攻刘稹诸军，七月十八日后数日，鉴于李彦佐逗留不进，请诏书切责，并请以石雄代李彦佐。作品：《赐彦佐诏意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_13_1373773_comment'></div>朕以石雄近摧丑虏。已著威名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373773_comment'></div>久在徐州。谙练士卒。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，七月下旬，李德裕撰制，授王元逵平章事。作品：《授王元逵平章事制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1373750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授王元逵平章事制</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373750")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373750'>门下。古之命帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373750_comment'></div>必重其名。假三事之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373750_comment'></div>允万夫之望。故韩信以丞相击魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373750_comment'></div>樊哙以相国伐燕。克成<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1373750", 1373750, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>茂功</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373750_comment'></div>赏抑有典。成德节度使镇冀深赵等州观察处置兼充北面行营招讨泽潞等使金紫光禄大夫检校司徒兼镇州大都督府长史御史大夫驸马都尉云骑尉王元帅逵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373750_comment'></div>生禀忠厚。天资信诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373750_comment'></div>奇正得于心机。严庄表于师律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373750_comment'></div>去病之略。无假孙吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373750_comment'></div>翁归之才。实备文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373750_comment'></div>属狡童逆命。自固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1373750", 1373750, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>穴巢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373750_comment'></div>果能扬义声以载驰。繇直道而先奋。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年8月15日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，八月十五日，鉴于诸将士观望不前，李德裕奏请令李彦佐、刘沔下部每三二千人为一团，以团为单位，有罪责成都头，使将士得以效命。作品：《论彦佐刘沔下诸道客军状》<span id='poem_sentence_1_1373834_comment'></div>茂元兵力寡少。颇似危急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373834_comment'></div>若贼势更甚。便要退守怀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373837_comment'></div>朝廷固合诛夷。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373837_comment'></div>因处分边事。望赐仲武书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373837_comment'></div>谕以深意。要云从谏入觐之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373837_comment'></div>与郑注交结。因缘货贿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373837_comment'></div>滥授钧衡。及归镇后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373837_comment'></div>又与李训结托。所谋狂险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373837_comment'></div>中外具悉。自训注夷灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373837_comment'></div>心不自安。颇恃甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373837_comment'></div>转怀悖慢。先朝夕虽优宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373837_comment'></div>中实怀疑。及从谏疾病之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373837_comment'></div>曾无诚。昨遣中使临问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373837_comment'></div>兼借名医。矫托异端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373837_comment'></div>竟不相见。便树置刘稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373837_comment'></div>令将校继献章表。不待朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373837_comment'></div>便令继袭。以泽潞一镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373837_comment'></div>有启圣旧宫。艰难以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373837_comment'></div>多用文吏。如抱真首创军募于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373837_comment'></div>兼有大功。身殁之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373837_comment'></div>其子皆赴京阙。比谓刘稹愚騃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373837_comment'></div>迫于军情。望其管惜家门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373837_comment'></div>稍能悛悔。频敢驰突晋绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373837_comment'></div>侵轶河阳。近李丕投降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373837_comment'></div>及魏博收平恩县。得刘稹榜帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373837_comment'></div>并已进来。皆呼官军为贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373837_comment'></div>逢著即须痛杀。悖逆如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373837_comment'></div>天地不容。想卿远闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373837_comment'></div>应当奋激。卿宜速谕诸藩部落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373837_comment'></div>同灭可汗。卿但北边立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373837_comment'></div>刘稹必当自溃。策勋命赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373837_comment'></div>以卿一道为先。卿深体此怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373837_comment'></div>兼示将校。如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373837_comment'></div>望付翰林约此意。撰诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373837_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1373837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年9月4日</a>　时李德裕在京为相，九月四日，李德裕撰状请授王宰为河阳行营诸军攻讨使，罢王茂元军权。作品：《请授王宰兼行营诸军攻讨使状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373838'>右。缘王茂元虽是将家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373838_comment'></div>久习吏事。深入攻讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373838_comment'></div>非其所长。访闻东畿自闻狂寇侵轶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373838_comment'></div>尚未安定。茂元纵得痊复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373838_comment'></div>且要留镇河阳。行营诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373838_comment'></div>须便有所委。茂元疾虽加重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373838_comment'></div>朝廷亦免他虞。前月二十九日延英面奉圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373838_comment'></div>亦以两道节度同在一处非便。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373838_comment'></div>望授王宰兼行营诸军攻讨使。如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373838_comment'></div>望加刘沔张仲武招抚使例降黄敕处分。未审可否。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373745_comment'></div>伏灌夫之勇。河内雄屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373745_comment'></div>委寇恂之忠。各用所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373745_comment'></div>昔韩信建旗。出井陉之隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373745_comment'></div>邓艾束马。越阴平之艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373751_comment'></div>召自极边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373751_comment'></div>既而亚夫会兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373751_comment'></div>驰六乘之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373751_comment'></div>庶乎马武力战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373751_comment'></div>为众军之锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373751_comment'></div>朕以彦佐早升大将之坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373751_comment'></div>久服上公之衮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373751_comment'></div>资其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1373751", 1373751, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>硕望</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373751_comment'></div>任以指踪。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论石雄请添兵状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373839")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373839'>右。访闻冀氏去潞州最近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373839_comment'></div>才二百里已下。于此进兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373839_comment'></div>最当要害。翼城亦是大路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373839_comment'></div>须备贼奔冲。石雄虽兵数已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373839_comment'></div>终是分张处广。□须初允所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373839_comment'></div>方可责其成功。今缘西备蕃戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373839_comment'></div>边镇不可抽减。向东抽发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373839_comment'></div>又不及几。访闻奏事军将张宏庆云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373839_comment'></div>陈许徐泗兵初到行营。军外子弟有一万人已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373839_comment'></div>缘未有战陈。闻不得已稍却归本道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373839_comment'></div>今犹有少壮堪充战卒五六千人。皆是父子兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373839_comment'></div>人心齐一。临时使用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373839_comment'></div>绝胜诸军。冀氏去贼最近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373839_comment'></div>石雄又至骁勇。假其兵力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373839_comment'></div>事必速成。陛下方集大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373839_comment'></div>不可更惜小费。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373839_comment'></div>望赐石雄义逸诏。令与陈许徐泗军外子弟各召二千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373839_comment'></div>并须拣少壮有武艺堪入战阵者充。仍望约陈许长行制度支权给衣粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373839_comment'></div>徐泗缘有酱菜。望以两处兵马皆在行营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373839_comment'></div>事体须同。不可独给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373839_comment'></div>如蒙允许。望速赐诏示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373839_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1373839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年10月</a>　时李德裕在京为相，河东节度使刘沔与幽州节度使张仲武不协，十月，移刘沔为义成节度使，李德裕代皇帝撰诏，劝勉其与石雄、王宰合力征讨刘稹。作品：《赐刘沔诏意》<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373774_comment'></div>古者有必胜之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373774_comment'></div>无必胜之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373774_comment'></div>欲立奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373774_comment'></div>实在谋帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373774_comment'></div>朕所以求鸷鹗于累百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373774_comment'></div>得飞将于无双。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373774_comment'></div>总率诸军。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373774_comment'></div>盘丈八之矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373774_comment'></div>果能荡寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373774_comment'></div>启十乘之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373774_comment'></div>举必贵谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373774_comment'></div>动资持重。<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373840'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373840'>右。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1373840_comment'></div>生口四十人内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373840_comment'></div>几人是赤头郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373840_comment'></div>圣意以元逵之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373840_comment'></div>不欲更问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373840_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373840_comment'></div>缘薄仲荣是贼之心腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373840_comment'></div>必尽知谋计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373840_comment'></div>终要遣使出城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373840_comment'></div>勘问贼中兵马多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373840_comment'></div>诸界布置防备何处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373840_comment'></div>今欲入兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373840_comment'></div>何处最当要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373840_comment'></div>兼问贼中人情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373840_comment'></div>还思归顺否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373840_comment'></div>直对镇州押衙军将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373840_comment'></div>仔细勘问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373840_comment'></div>不要回避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373840_comment'></div>必得事情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373840_comment'></div>因此不妨便知生口赤头郎数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373840_comment'></div>元逵知勘赤头郎贼中事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373840_comment'></div>必不疑虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373840_comment'></div>因此兼勘河阳魏博生口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373840_comment'></div>以此参验必知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1373841_comment'></div>臣等苟有所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373841_comment'></div>则合上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373841_comment'></div>远则韩信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373971_comment'></div>仍望永为常式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373971_comment'></div>未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373971_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373971_comment'></div>伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1373971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年1月1日</a>　时李德裕在京为相正月初一，河东横水栅都将杨弁作乱，逐河东节度使李石，据太原，并与刘稹相通。正月初四，李德裕上《论刘稹送款与李石状》，谓刘稹乃缓兵之计，不应受降，且请令诸道从速进兵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十五。）</span><div id='poem_1373843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论刘稹送款与李石状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373843")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373843'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373843'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373843_comment'></div>臣等得李石状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373843_comment'></div>刘稹潜有款诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373843_comment'></div>伏以王师压境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373843_comment'></div>已是六月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373843_comment'></div>贼军累经侵轶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373843_comment'></div>颇肆猖狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373843_comment'></div>今事势穷困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373843_comment'></div>人心思变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373843_comment'></div>因此请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373843_comment'></div>冀逭灵诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373843_comment'></div>望诏李石且与李恬书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373843_comment'></div>不得云已与奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373843_comment'></div>但遣将兵属直界首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373843_comment'></div>方敢上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373843_comment'></div>以此邀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373843_comment'></div>更观旬月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373843_comment'></div>仍望诏元逵宏敬王宰石雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373843_comment'></div>便令齐入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373843_comment'></div>切料旬朔之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373843_comment'></div>必有变生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373843_comment'></div>今馈运之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373843_comment'></div>计至春末并足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373843_comment'></div>如二月以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373843_comment'></div>尚未殄灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373843_comment'></div>然后议纳其款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373843_comment'></div>事亦不迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373843_comment'></div>如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373843_comment'></div>望付翰林各赐诏处分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1373843_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年1月4日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。正月初四，李德裕撰《赐李石诏意》，令其对付刘稹，或劝降，或进军。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年1月4日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。正月初四，李德裕代李石与刘稹书，意在劝降。作品：《代李石与刘稹书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373984?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代李石与刘稹书</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年1月4日）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373984_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373984'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373984'>贾群至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373984_comment'></div>承二十八日书诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373984_comment'></div>承郎君自知愆负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373984_comment'></div>思保生全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373984_comment'></div>望阙披诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373984_comment'></div>祈天请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373984_comment'></div>远述迷复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373984_comment'></div>聊慰石怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373984_comment'></div>以石思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373984_comment'></div>郎君为子为臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373984_comment'></div>忠孝并弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373984_comment'></div>居丧求袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373984_comment'></div>阻命专权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373984_comment'></div>数遣乱军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373984_comment'></div>侵轶邻境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373984_comment'></div>比者河阳晋绛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373984_comment'></div>未有重兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373984_comment'></div>侵犯颜行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373984_comment'></div>屡焚庐舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373984_comment'></div>又疆场之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373984_comment'></div>收得彼管簿书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373984_comment'></div>皆呼官军为贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373984_comment'></div>来即痛杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373984_comment'></div>可谓悖言肆口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373984_comment'></div>逆节滔天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373984_comment'></div>今欲自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373984_comment'></div>诚为善意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373984_comment'></div>伏思圣上屈累朝之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373984_comment'></div>实亦至难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373984_comment'></div>在将相等怀忿惋之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373984_comment'></div>岂宜延纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373984_comment'></div>然须得实事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373984_comment'></div>并见忠诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373984_comment'></div>则圣上矜贷有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373984_comment'></div>群臣陈请有路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373984_comment'></div>惟有尽率国属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373984_comment'></div>面缚来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373984_comment'></div>石即驰诣界首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373984_comment'></div>亲自受纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373984_comment'></div>然后承诏解缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373984_comment'></div>送赴阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373984_comment'></div>则在朝公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373984_comment'></div>岂有异议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373984_comment'></div>临境将帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373984_comment'></div>皆得息词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373984_comment'></div>如拟先求解兵。<div id='poem_sentence_47_1373984_comment'></div>以偷顷刻之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373984_comment'></div>苟怀是心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373984_comment'></div>谁敢保信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373984_comment'></div>累剪叛臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373984_comment'></div>至于事迫计穷。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373984_comment'></div>今欲行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373984_comment'></div>必恐非计。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373984_comment'></div>只在诚信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373984_comment'></div>如未从鄙见。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373984_comment'></div>时不可失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373984_comment'></div>幸少详思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373984_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373984_comment'></div>石白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1373984_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年1月5日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。正月初五、六日，李德裕上《论刘稹状》，言虽有太原杨弁之乱，刘稹必不可恕，并奏请督促诸道行营进兵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373864' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373864' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373864?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论刘稹状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年1月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373864")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373864_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373864'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373864'>右。臣适见度支报状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373864_comment'></div>王宰已似纳其情款。发使之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373864_comment'></div>不以先闻。便受表章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373864_comment'></div>欲自擅招抚之功。昔韩信破田荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373864_comment'></div>李靖擒颉利。皆是纳降之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373864_comment'></div>潜兵掩袭。只可令王宰失信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373864_comment'></div>岂可损朝廷武威。建立奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373864_comment'></div>实在今日。必不可以太原小扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373864_comment'></div>失此事机。缘内养寻常充使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373864_comment'></div>恐节将未便承禀。伏望降供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373864_comment'></div>今日便赴行营。自首进军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373864_comment'></div>掩其无备。兼许三军倘立殊勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373864_comment'></div>必比诸军倍加赏赐。如刘稹已出潞府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373864_comment'></div>须令全家面缚。兼郭谊刘公直张谷陈扬庭李仲京等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373864_comment'></div>面缚即受领。如刘稹自来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373864_comment'></div>却令送回。辄不敢受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373864_comment'></div>兼要降供奉官至晋绛行营。密谕石雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373864_comment'></div>若王宰已纳刘稹。即石雄无功可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373864_comment'></div>累经大阵。自当矢石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373864_comment'></div>垂成之际。须自取奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373864_comment'></div>便看齐入。勿失此便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373864_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1373864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年1月5日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。正月初五、六日，李德裕上《宰相与王宰书》，论刘稹罪状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373990' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373990' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373990?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宰相与王宰书</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年1月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373990")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373990_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373990'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373990'>近闻游奕使更收得刘稹章表。窃以王太尉武俊有安国之大勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373990_comment'></div>藏于清庙。至于孙承宗阻命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373990_comment'></div>在镇犹遣亲弟承恭自太原诣张相上表祈哀。宪宗不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373990_comment'></div>旋又遣男知感知信入朝。属淄青殄灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373990_comment'></div>因制使杨仆射检得文案。方知危害武相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373990_comment'></div>本在淄青。承宗无盗杀之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373990_comment'></div>方获昭雪。今刘稹父子无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373990_comment'></div>皆负重衅。既不诣尚书面缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373990_comment'></div>又不遣家属祈哀。置章表于衢路之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373990_comment'></div>望朝廷降非常之泽。悖慢无礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373990_comment'></div>前古未闻。游奕将不便毁除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373990_comment'></div>寔恐非是。况杨弁遣亲侄入潞州潜通情计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373990_comment'></div>刘稹并不擒送。又石会关将杨珍却还石会关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373990_comment'></div>兼投贼界。刘稹便敢受纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373990_comment'></div>已加兵固守。比令逆将贾群送表至太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373990_comment'></div>少傅李相公奏闻。旋属军中有变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373990_comment'></div>竟未有进止处分。杨弁潜送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373990_comment'></div>贾群却归。刘稹亦便受领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373990_comment'></div>狡童逆状如此。不知进表何为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373990_comment'></div>昔汉宣帝将图霍禹。名臣张敞云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373990_comment'></div>不合明诏自亲其文。只合明诏以恩不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373990_comment'></div>群臣以义固争。今将帅大臣容其章表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373990_comment'></div>即是私惠归于臣下。不赦在于朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373990_comment'></div>事体之间。交恐不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373990_comment'></div>切虑尚书以疆场之事。皆须上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373990_comment'></div>惟此事抑而不奏。未为至当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373990_comment'></div>望向后更有章表。便令将校所在焚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373990_comment'></div>惟面缚而来。然后可受领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373990_comment'></div>辄此披陈。幸垂鉴纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373990_comment'></div>不宣。某等上状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373990_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373990_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年1月17日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。正月十七日数日后，李德裕代皇帝撰诏与张仲武，议对付杨弁事宜。作品：《赐张仲武诏意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1373780' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373780_comment'></div>众才一旅。追逐主帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373780_comment'></div>擅领兵权。寻诏近地行营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373780_comment'></div>量抽兵马。便令剪扑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373780_comment'></div>计日枭夷。缘镇州地接土门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373780_comment'></div>最为便近。已诏元逵出师五千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373780_comment'></div>为向南诸军声援。顾兹小寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373780_comment'></div>未足劳卿大军。缘何清朝下河水官健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373780_comment'></div>曾经杨弁将领。久与乱军同处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373780_comment'></div>恐其自思家属。因此摇心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373780_comment'></div>宜速与卿本道都头密意动静。与清朝计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373780_comment'></div>掎角相应。如万一清朝官健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373780_comment'></div>禁戢不定。抽归太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373780_comment'></div>已令<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1373780", 1373780, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>把绝</span>雁门。遏其归路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373780_comment'></div>卿便须出军掩袭。勿遣漏失凶徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373780_comment'></div>每事与清朝商量。务从权便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373780_comment'></div>应机在速。不更待奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373780_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1373780_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。鉴于王宰屯兵不进，李德裕建议将刘沔由滑州调至河阳，在王宰军后，激使王宰攻泽州，二月二十五日，李德裕撰《赐刘沔诏意》,后数日，撰《赐王宰诏意》，再次督责其进军。<span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373800_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373800'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373800'>敕石雄。晋绛密迩王畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373800_comment'></div>地当襟带。自卿与将士等扼其险要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373800_comment'></div>勇冠诸军。捍彼奔冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373800_comment'></div>为我砥柱。每刻期深入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373800_comment'></div>屡挫狂锋。批抗捣虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373800_comment'></div>导游刃。永言勋绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373800_comment'></div>岂忘于怀。昔商伐鬼方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373800_comment'></div>三年乃剋。周公东征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373800_comment'></div>三年不归。宪宗平淮西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373800_comment'></div>文宗定沧海。士不解甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373800_comment'></div>或三四年。想卿等久在戎行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373800_comment'></div>心经此役。且士之生代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373800_comment'></div>本为功名。仗义从军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373800_comment'></div>固当殉命。居平则孝养父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373800_comment'></div>成长则子孙。衣食所资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373800_comment'></div>无非国力。有事则投袂而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373800_comment'></div>负甲先登。抚养之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373800_comment'></div>惟此为报。今者才近半岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373800_comment'></div>未曰劳师。功在垂成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373800_comment'></div>往无不捷。将士等各宜感励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373800_comment'></div>成此功名。上党既平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373800_comment'></div>天下无事。从此永安家室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373800_comment'></div>不复征行。近者杨弁首为猖狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373800_comment'></div>扇惑乱卒。今则身膏齐斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373800_comment'></div>戮及妻拿。生为不忠之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373800_comment'></div>兼赐优赏。卿等便须鼓行而进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373800_comment'></div>径入贼界下营。从此驻军。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373845'>右。臣等近访闻贼中之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373845_comment'></div>只待林木阴合。以老王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373845_comment'></div>如此迁延。必恐过夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373845_comment'></div>伏见元和中宪宗缘淮西久未成功。遣尚书右丞许孟容至行营宣慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373845_comment'></div>令面诘责光颜重允。累取光颜等及大将以下状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373845_comment'></div>皆请一个月内并贼。自后不敢逗留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373845_comment'></div>累破大城栅。宪宗又令梁守谦往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373845_comment'></div>遂破郾城。续令裴度去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373845_comment'></div>竟破淮蔡。去秋李回唯至魏镇两道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373845_comment'></div>王宰石雄并未有制使宣慰。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373845_comment'></div>望令李回至天井冀氏宣慰。兼取王宰石雄及诸军都头两道大将等状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373845_comment'></div>令具破贼期限闻奏。如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373845_comment'></div>望令乘递早发。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373845_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1373845_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。三月上旬，李德裕代皇帝撰诏与王宰，督促进军。作品：《赐王宰诏意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年3月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。三月上旬，李德裕代皇帝撰诏与石雄，督促进军。作品：《赐石雄诏意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1373774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐石雄诏意</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373774'>敕石雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373774_comment'></div>古者有必胜之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373774_comment'></div>无必胜之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373774_comment'></div>欲立奇功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373774_comment'></div>实在谋帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373774_comment'></div>朕所以求鸷鹗于累百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373774_comment'></div>得飞将于无双。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373774_comment'></div>总率诸军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373774_comment'></div>以临贼境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373774_comment'></div>况卿受尺一之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373774_comment'></div>初无办严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373774_comment'></div>盘丈八之矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373774_comment'></div>果能荡寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373774_comment'></div>眷言勋绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373774_comment'></div>深注余怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373774_comment'></div>近闻从谏时百姓相惊云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373774_comment'></div>卿以七千兵至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373774_comment'></div>数告于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373774_comment'></div>魄兆于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373774_comment'></div>今天策向晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373774_comment'></div>已及成军之候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373774_comment'></div>龙骧建旆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373774_comment'></div>必叶渡江之谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373774_comment'></div>旧史昭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373774_comment'></div>冥符可验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373774_comment'></div>加以天道在乎西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373774_comment'></div>顺岁有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373774_comment'></div>福星焕乎龙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373774_comment'></div>为国大庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373774_comment'></div>勉宏方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373774_comment'></div>契此休徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373774_comment'></div>昔钟会以二十万兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373774_comment'></div>顿于剑阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373774_comment'></div>邓艾才一万众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373774_comment'></div>直抵城都。<div id='poem_sentence_36_1373774_comment'></div>知卿能办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373774_comment'></div>故谕此怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373774_comment'></div>然闻卿每自履军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373774_comment'></div>常先士卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373774_comment'></div>既为轻敌。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373774_comment'></div>至于小阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373774_comment'></div>不可自行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373774_comment'></div>张辽单身入昌狶家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373774_comment'></div>魏武责曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373774_comment'></div>此非大将法。<div id='poem_sentence_58_1373774_comment'></div>举必贵谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373774_comment'></div>动资持重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373774_comment'></div>报国在于平贼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1373763_comment'></div>森其礼干。得备严之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373763_comment'></div>既蝉蜕丹水。鹏抟赤霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373985_comment'></div>曾不再旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373985_comment'></div>果就擒缚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373985_comment'></div>僇于都市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373985_comment'></div>罪及妻孥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373985_comment'></div>公等睹此祸机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373985_comment'></div>得不深戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373985_comment'></div>李丕中丞能全劲节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373985_comment'></div>自拔乱邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373985_comment'></div>曾未一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373985_comment'></div>骤历三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373985_comment'></div>已分茆土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373985_comment'></div>为国功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373985_comment'></div>公等见其光荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373985_comment'></div>得不健羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373985_comment'></div>成败利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373985_comment'></div>昭然可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373985_comment'></div>祸福无门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373985_comment'></div>行之即是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373985_comment'></div>钧所以不引古事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373985_comment'></div>不饰虚词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373985_comment'></div>直指目前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373985_comment'></div>易于取信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373985_comment'></div>公等倘枭戮刘稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373985_comment'></div>自建功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373985_comment'></div>大则别领将旄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373985_comment'></div>次则不失符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373985_comment'></div>身受爵禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373985_comment'></div>福及子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373985_comment'></div>去危就安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373985_comment'></div>事同反掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373985_comment'></div>又得戎旅解甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373985_comment'></div>黎庶归耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373985_comment'></div>老幼无焚灼之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373985_comment'></div>闾井得宴安之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373985_comment'></div>再洽恩化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373985_comment'></div>岂不美哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373985_comment'></div>先布至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373985_comment'></div>各当信纳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1373985_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373986' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373986' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373986?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代李丕与郭谊书</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373986")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373986_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373986'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373986'>夏首初热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373986_comment'></div>伏惟十三叔动止万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373986_comment'></div>丕自归朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373986_comment'></div>颇获优宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373986_comment'></div>三领大郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373986_comment'></div>荣列中司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373986_comment'></div>想十三叔远闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373986_comment'></div>必深喜慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373986_comment'></div>顷岁寓游上党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373986_comment'></div>与主公素未相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373986_comment'></div>十三叔剪拂提携。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373986_comment'></div>遂叨右职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373986_comment'></div>寻蒙见哀羁旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373986_comment'></div>申以婚姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373986_comment'></div>托系援于高门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373986_comment'></div>实光荣于鄙族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373986_comment'></div>每怀恩遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373986_comment'></div>刻骨铭肌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373986_comment'></div>去年初投国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373986_comment'></div>便蒙圣上于三殿召对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373986_comment'></div>此时丕具奏云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373986_comment'></div>臣是十三叔遣密归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373986_comment'></div>先布款诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373986_comment'></div>十三叔久受刘家厚恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373986_comment'></div>未忍便弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373986_comment'></div>留待挟持不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373986_comment'></div>势力稍衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373986_comment'></div>必擒剪军中恶人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373986_comment'></div>率先归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373986_comment'></div>圣上深赐信纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373986_comment'></div>已记十三叔姓名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373986_comment'></div>自后缘丕除授忻州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373986_comment'></div>去彼疆界遥远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373986_comment'></div>常抱深恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373986_comment'></div>无由自申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373986_comment'></div>今蒙改授晋州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373986_comment'></div>兼充右尚书副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373986_comment'></div>密迩封壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373986_comment'></div>瞻望不遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373986_comment'></div>若不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1373986", 1373986, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>披露</span>赤诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373986_comment'></div>实负姻好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373986_comment'></div>回鹘可汗士马已尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373986_comment'></div>一身归投黑车子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373986_comment'></div>近黠戛斯国王遣将军百馀人入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373986_comment'></div>请发本国兵四十万众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373986_comment'></div>袭逐可汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373986_comment'></div>擒送京阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373986_comment'></div>又西蕃赞普近亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373986_comment'></div>新立赞普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373986_comment'></div>才年十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373986_comment'></div>国中至今未定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373986_comment'></div>两蕃宰相以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373986_comment'></div>进表请托附大唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373986_comment'></div>今国家边塞底宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373986_comment'></div>八表无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373986_comment'></div>须将国力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373986_comment'></div>平殄五州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373986_comment'></div>除有司馈运之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373986_comment'></div>圣上不惜内府金帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373986_comment'></div>频以出赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373986_comment'></div>又诸道兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373986_comment'></div>微有损伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373986_comment'></div>即徵兵填替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373986_comment'></div>必作数年讨伐之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373986_comment'></div>十三叔自料形势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373986_comment'></div>必当坐见危亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373986_comment'></div>幸因丕在邻近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373986_comment'></div>朝廷委信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373986_comment'></div>必须早图功效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373986_comment'></div>自取宠荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373986_comment'></div>保衰老之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373986_comment'></div>全一门之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373986_comment'></div>书名竹帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373986_comment'></div>岂不美哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373986_comment'></div>丕只在冀氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373986_comment'></div>相去咫尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373986_comment'></div>只要十三叔有一明据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373986_comment'></div>得圣上密知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373986_comment'></div>此状到后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373986_comment'></div>且望惠数行手示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373986_comment'></div>潜布忠款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373986_comment'></div>丕便遣人进上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373986_comment'></div>必请密诏安存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373986_comment'></div>此事石尚书并不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373986_comment'></div>丕指天誓心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373986_comment'></div>达此诚意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373986_comment'></div>幸垂延纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373986_comment'></div>不至迟疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373986_comment'></div>祸机在身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373986_comment'></div>岂得顾望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373986_comment'></div>古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373986_comment'></div>晏安鸩毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373986_comment'></div>不可怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373986_comment'></div>盖以偷安比于鸩毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373986_comment'></div>切望思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373986_comment'></div>临楮零涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373986_comment'></div>此情何极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373986_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373986_comment'></div>丕再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1373986_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年4月5日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。四月五日，李德裕奏《魏城入贼路状》，商议进军路线。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373848' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373848' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373848?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏城入贼路状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年4月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373848")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373848_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373848'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373848'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373848_comment'></div>伏以馈运支计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373848_comment'></div>本约至五月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373848_comment'></div>今若五月未平小寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373848_comment'></div>即须便过盛暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373848_comment'></div>臣等夙夜思虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373848_comment'></div>切要改张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373848_comment'></div>石雄西面险阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373848_comment'></div>须得王宰义忠深入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373848_comment'></div>方可进军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373848_comment'></div>榆社兵甲未足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373848_comment'></div>天井固难独入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373848_comment'></div>以此故遂成因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373848_comment'></div>访闻魏城绝当要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373848_comment'></div>向南十二里至狗脊岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373848_comment'></div>虽有小山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373848_comment'></div>并无险阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373848_comment'></div>二十五里便至武乡县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373848_comment'></div>直抵潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373848_comment'></div>便是平川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373848_comment'></div>臣等访问王逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373848_comment'></div>须得一万精兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373848_comment'></div>方可前进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373848_comment'></div>今侧近更无徵兵处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373848_comment'></div>远处又不及事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373848_comment'></div>望降中使与石雄商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373848_comment'></div>便将义武步兵万人就义武马军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373848_comment'></div>兼沙陀马军五百就榆社沙陀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373848_comment'></div>此外于中武部兵及河中衙队共拣七千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373848_comment'></div>通约似仅一万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373848_comment'></div>并榆社宣武兖海义武马军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373848_comment'></div>都是一万五千精兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373848_comment'></div>足得济事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373848_comment'></div>取魏武路直入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373848_comment'></div>旬月必见成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373848_comment'></div>冀氏翼城犹有一万八千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373848_comment'></div>但令保险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373848_comment'></div>又守城寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373848_comment'></div>权差供奉一人监领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373848_comment'></div>待石雄得武乡后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373848_comment'></div>即令冀氏翼城诸寨兵马齐进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373848_comment'></div>与石雄合军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373848_comment'></div>仍委石雄与李丕同商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373848_comment'></div>如此稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373848_comment'></div>即须排比今月中旬末赴魏城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373848_comment'></div>事贵神速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373848_comment'></div>不得漏泄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1373848_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年4月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。四月，李德裕与王起在故集贤张学士厅怀旧有感，作诗。作品：《仆射相公偶话》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_30190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仆射相公偶话于故集贤张学士厅写得德裕与仆射旧唱和诗其时和者五人惟仆射与德裕皆列高位凄然怀旧辄献此诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30190")'>李德裕</a></span><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年4月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约四月，李德裕怀旧有感，作无题诗。作品：《无题》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_30191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>无题</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30191")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_30191_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_30191'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2965, "poem_allusion_30191")'>向子赋</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_30191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30191'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30191'>松倚苍崖老，兰临碧洞<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作涧）</span>衰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30191_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30191'>不劳邻舍篴，吹起旧时悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30191_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30191'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_30191_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约本年夏，李德裕进所撰与黠戛斯书。作品：《进所撰黠戛斯书状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span>《进所撰黠戛斯可汗书状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1373974' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373974' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373974?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进所撰颉戛斯可汗书状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373974")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373974_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373974'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373974'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373974_comment'></div>奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373974_comment'></div>令臣于书内添坚昆事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373974_comment'></div>缘未审知颉戛斯的是坚昆之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373974_comment'></div>恐须粗言梗槩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373974_comment'></div>未可明书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373974_comment'></div>今已依宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373974_comment'></div>添改其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373974_comment'></div>有词意未尽处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373974_comment'></div>亦更加添。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373974_comment'></div>臣学识空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373974_comment'></div>文理浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373974_comment'></div>再陈严扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373974_comment'></div>伏积兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373974_comment'></div>谨连封进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1373974_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约本年夏，李德裕代皇帝致书黠戛斯可汗，言交好意。作品：《与黠戛斯可汗书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1373797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与黠戛斯可汗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373797")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373797'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373797'>皇帝敬问黠戛斯可汗。温仵合将军至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373797_comment'></div>览书及所献马百匹鹘十联。具悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373797_comment'></div>可汗特禀英姿。生知雄略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373797_comment'></div>奋扬威武。底定龙荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373797_comment'></div>扫回鹘之穹居。报怨以直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373797_comment'></div>护公主之罽幕。事大以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373797_comment'></div>又遣贵族信臣。载驰朔漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373797_comment'></div>名马鸷鸟。远涉流沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373797_comment'></div>既展同姓之亲。克副怀柔之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373797_comment'></div>眷言勋绩。深慰予衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373797_comment'></div>朕护奉丕图。抚宁万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373797_comment'></div>岂望化孚有截。致殷汤来享之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373797_comment'></div>实恐德未遍覆。愧汉宣兼临之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373797_comment'></div>况与彼国壤隔内外。非正朔所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373797_comment'></div>礼既不施。政岂宜及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373797_comment'></div>但以惜可汗宗盟之国。愿保先名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373797_comment'></div>为可汗宏远之谋。须除后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373797_comment'></div>所以具古今祸福。往谕至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373797_comment'></div>昔呼韩邪单于以郅支尚存。国难未靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373797_comment'></div>称蕃事汉。福及子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373797_comment'></div>后汉单于比以大父。依汉而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373797_comment'></div>继袭其号。上书款塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373797_comment'></div>永愿藩蔽漠南。遂致朔塞底宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373797_comment'></div>烽燧永息。近则回鹘结大国之援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373797_comment'></div>雄长北蕃。诸部率从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373797_comment'></div>莫敢不服。一隅安乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373797_comment'></div>百有馀年。此事昭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373797_comment'></div>可汗所睹。况今回鹘种类未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373797_comment'></div>介居蕃汉之间。爰及黑车子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373797_comment'></div>久畏其威。素服其信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373797_comment'></div>虑彼再振。常持两端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373797_comment'></div>须令小蕃知朕亲厚可汗。弃绝回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373797_comment'></div>实在和好分定。内附约盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373797_comment'></div>则邪计奸谋。无由而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373797_comment'></div>故欲显加册命。昭示万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373797_comment'></div>况登里可汗回鹘旧号。是国家顷年所赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373797_comment'></div>非回鹘自制此名。今回鹘国已破亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373797_comment'></div>理当嫌避。朕以可汗先祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373797_comment'></div>往在贞观。身自入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373797_comment'></div>太宗授以左卫将军坚昆都督。朕思欲继太宗之旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373797_comment'></div>彼亦宜遵先祖之明诚。便以坚昆为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373797_comment'></div>施于册命。更加美号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373797_comment'></div>以表懿亲。况坚者不朽之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373797_comment'></div>昆者有后之称。示不忘本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373797_comment'></div>岂不美欤。朕昨命礼部尚书郑肃等与彼使臣面陈大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373797_comment'></div>温仵合将军等皆谕朕旨。愿言结成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373797_comment'></div>岂必契径路之金。举留犁之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373797_comment'></div>保兹诚信。固在厥初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373797_comment'></div>顷者回鹘至塞上。请国家精兵十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373797_comment'></div>送至漠北。渐归本蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373797_comment'></div>又请借汉界一城。养育疲羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373797_comment'></div>以图兴复。朕以可汗之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373797_comment'></div>尽不听从。今回鹘是国家叛臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373797_comment'></div>为可汗雠敌。须去根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373797_comment'></div>方保永安。是天亡之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373797_comment'></div>易于攻取。古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373797_comment'></div>天与不取。反受其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373797_comment'></div>可汗须乘此机便。早务芟夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373797_comment'></div>回鹘未灭以前。可汗勿以饮食为甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373797_comment'></div>弋猎为乐。励兵秣马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373797_comment'></div>不可暂闲。所恨隔在诸蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373797_comment'></div>国家难于同力。倘更近塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373797_comment'></div>岂复稽诛。又恐馀孽归降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373797_comment'></div>可汗未能尽戮。纳有罪之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373797_comment'></div>受逋逃之臣。倘收吾憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373797_comment'></div>必开边隙。此则蕃养虺毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373797_comment'></div>自生厉阶。前年回鹘宰相等向汉使云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373797_comment'></div>李靖擒颉利后。国中只有三二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373797_comment'></div>便郤兴复。虽在危困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373797_comment'></div>尚尔张皇。可汗深察此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373797_comment'></div>岂得不虑。又闻合罗川回鹘牙帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373797_comment'></div>未尽毁除。想其怀土之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373797_comment'></div>必有思归之志。速要平其区落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373797_comment'></div>无使孑遗。既表成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373797_comment'></div>彼当绝望。可汗已摅积年之愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373797_comment'></div>自为一代之雄。至于居处服章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373797_comment'></div>皆宜变革。焉得安于所习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373797_comment'></div>姑务因循。则何以震耀北方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373797_comment'></div>弹压诸部。朕抚有中夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373797_comment'></div>爱育生灵。常恐百姓未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373797_comment'></div>一物失所。岂愿更广威略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373797_comment'></div>遥制要荒。但缘与可汗方保和盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373797_comment'></div>义同忧乐。纤微之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373797_comment'></div>皆欲备言。想可汗与将相筹谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373797_comment'></div>副兹诚意。此使到日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373797_comment'></div>必谅朕心。即宜速遣报章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373797_comment'></div>此当遣重臣册命。夏热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373797_comment'></div>想可汗休泰。将相以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373797_comment'></div>并存问之。遣书指不多及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373797_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_89_1373797_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。王起由左仆射同平章事，充山南西道节度使，李德裕与其有唱和。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年6月4日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。六月四日，李德裕撰状云已至暑热，天井、冀氏军须坚守，不得与战。作品：《天井冀氏行营状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373849?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天井冀氏行营状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年6月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373849")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373849'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373849'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373849_comment'></div>昨者初夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373849_comment'></div>频请进军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373849_comment'></div>所冀未热之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373849_comment'></div>便见次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373849_comment'></div>今炎毒已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373849_comment'></div>迫促稍难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373849_comment'></div>殷宗伐鬼方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373849_comment'></div>周公东征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373849_comment'></div>皆三年乃尅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373849_comment'></div>淮蔡沧景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373849_comment'></div>亦经四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373849_comment'></div>王者之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373849_comment'></div>以全取胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373849_comment'></div>急攻则狂贼得计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373849_comment'></div>稍缓则贼势日穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373849_comment'></div>况出内库货财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373849_comment'></div>以资军食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373849_comment'></div>计量馈运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373849_comment'></div>必及冬间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373849_comment'></div>缘两道皆有供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373849_comment'></div>非惟节将心不敢安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373849_comment'></div>难于择便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373849_comment'></div>亦恐营栅甚暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373849_comment'></div>不易祇供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373849_comment'></div>望赐诏各令且回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373849_comment'></div>兼诏示王宰石雄亦不可稍缓之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373849_comment'></div>但云时方炎暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373849_comment'></div>恐供奉在彼有妨戎事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373849_comment'></div>任卿自择便利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373849_comment'></div>不得安閒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373849_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约五六月间，李德裕着重整顿朝廷内部机构，精简官员。作品：《请准兵部依开元二年军功格置跳荡及第一第二功状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373850' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373850?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请准兵部依开元二年军功格置跳荡及第一第二功状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373850")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373850'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373850'>开元格临阵对寇矢石未交先锋挺入陷坚突众贼徒因而破败者为跳荡：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373850'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373850_comment'></div>开元中酬跳荡功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373850_comment'></div>止于武官及勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373850_comment'></div>比今日流例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373850_comment'></div>即事校簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373850_comment'></div>其立跳荡功与格文相当者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373850_comment'></div>不问军将官健白身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373850_comment'></div>便望授监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373850_comment'></div>如已是御史者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373850_comment'></div>超两资授宪官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373850_comment'></div>已至常侍大夫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373850_comment'></div>临时别望优与处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373850_comment'></div>其先锋第一功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373850_comment'></div>如有官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373850_comment'></div>便授检校将军卿监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373850_comment'></div>累官至宾客者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373850_comment'></div>即授御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373850_comment'></div>其第二功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373850_comment'></div>无官者授<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作擢）</span>检校少卿监及中郎将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373850_comment'></div>累官至宾客者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373850_comment'></div>即与御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373850_comment'></div>开元格跳荡功破贼阵不满万人所叙不得过十人若万人以上每一千人听加一人其先锋第一功所叙不得过二十人第二功所叙不得过四十人：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1373850'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373850_comment'></div>三等立功人数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373850_comment'></div>请依开元格收叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373850_comment'></div>如过此数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373850_comment'></div>并望落下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373850_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1373850'>开元格招得一万人已上其头首一人准跳荡功例一千人已上准第一等例贼数不满千人量差等处分：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1373850'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373850_comment'></div>若依旧格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373850_comment'></div>难有此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373850_comment'></div>今望招得一千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373850_comment'></div>便准跳荡例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373850_comment'></div>五百人准第一等例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373850_comment'></div>五百人以下节级处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373850_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1373850'>开元格每获一生酬获人绢十疋：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1373850'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373850_comment'></div>缘并无军将官健等第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373850_comment'></div>稍似不备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373850_comment'></div>今请获贼都头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢三百疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373850_comment'></div>获正兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢一百五十疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373850_comment'></div>获副兵马使都虞候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢一百疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373850_comment'></div>都虞候以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373850_comment'></div>仍并别酬官爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373850_comment'></div>如是官健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373850_comment'></div>仍优与职名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373850_comment'></div>获贼十将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢七十疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373850_comment'></div>获贼副将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢三十疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373850_comment'></div>获贼赤头郎及刘稹新召宅内突将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢十疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373850_comment'></div>获贼长行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373850_comment'></div>赏绢三疋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373850_comment'></div>如是土团练乡夫之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373850_comment'></div>不在此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373850_comment'></div>每获生口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373850_comment'></div>便望令所获人对中使点勘上历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373850_comment'></div>不得令有虚妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373850_comment'></div>其赏给时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373850_comment'></div>亦望令中使自对面分付。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373850_comment'></div>以前件开元格如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373850_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373850_comment'></div>缘比来大阵酬赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373850_comment'></div>只是十将以上得官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373850_comment'></div>其副将已上至长行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373850_comment'></div>并无甄录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373850_comment'></div>今但与格文相当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373850_comment'></div>即便酬官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373850_comment'></div>所冀尽沾渥泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373850_comment'></div>又缘每阵获生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373850_comment'></div>并有优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373850_comment'></div>今据开元旧格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373850_comment'></div>等级加恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373850_comment'></div>如此则颁赏有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373850_comment'></div>人心知劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373850_comment'></div>如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373850_comment'></div>望各赐诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373850_comment'></div>仍封赏格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373850_comment'></div>令榜示三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373850_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1373850_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年6月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。六月，李德裕奏请令吏部郎中柳仲郢裁减州县官佐冗吏，由此得罪权贵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月1日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。闰七月一日，李德裕奏请将石雄所进文书诏示王宰及守度等。作品：《奉宣石雄所进文书欲勘问宜商量奏来状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373851' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373851' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373851?labeling=true'
