class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373851'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373851_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373851_comment'></div>贺意比因杨弁作乱之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373851_comment'></div>已涉贼中言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373851_comment'></div>究其踪迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373851_comment'></div>必非循良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373851_comment'></div>深知王宰不知为其诖误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373851_comment'></div>若不寻问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373851_comment'></div>旬月后王宰的自知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373851_comment'></div>见朝廷隐忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373851_comment'></div>必怀忧负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373851_comment'></div>又不一度明辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373851_comment'></div>石雄转有所疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373851_comment'></div>望付封晋绛所进贼中文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373851_comment'></div>诏示王宰及守度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373851_comment'></div>对王宰追贺意勘问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373851_comment'></div>如审有潜报踪由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373851_comment'></div>便就行营按军令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373851_comment'></div>如涉暧昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373851_comment'></div>即令王宰差使押领送上都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373851_comment'></div>其游奕差替闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373851_comment'></div>仍望诏示石雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373851_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1373851_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。闰七月中旬，李德裕撰状多篇，多方探听昭义内部虚实及其用兵策略，以便采取对策，并奏请催促进军。作品：《论镇州奏事官高迪陈意见二事状》<span target='_blank'>论镇州奏事官高迪陈意见二事状<span class='inlineComment2'>（请官军回避偷兵处不战）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（844年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373866")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373866'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373866'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373866_comment'></div>高迪称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373866_comment'></div>贼中更无他计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373866_comment'></div>只是潜抽兵并向一处排阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373866_comment'></div>引官军索战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373866_comment'></div>官军即须探知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373866_comment'></div>若攻城寨来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373866_comment'></div>即要与战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373866_comment'></div>如不来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373866_comment'></div>并不要将兵逼逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373866_comment'></div>缘偷兵并来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373866_comment'></div>停住三日不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373866_comment'></div>即须却归本处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373866_comment'></div>但三四数度不与战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373866_comment'></div>即贼知官军觉其情计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373866_comment'></div>自然丧气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373866_comment'></div>如此不得便宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373866_comment'></div>后必军人别有变故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373866_comment'></div>每度出军排阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373866_comment'></div>官军便逼逐与斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373866_comment'></div>皆是落贼奸计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373866_comment'></div>一度小得便宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373866_comment'></div>后知官军三个月疮痍未复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373866_comment'></div>即撤兵又向别处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373866_comment'></div>切要王宰石雄义忠常密遣细作探知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373866_comment'></div>侦知诸处抽兵来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373866_comment'></div>即不要战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373866_comment'></div>知抽兵却兵虚处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373866_comment'></div>即入兵攻讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373866_comment'></div>但常如此支敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373866_comment'></div>万万不落便宜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。闰七月中旬，李德裕撰状多篇，多方探听昭义内部虚实及其用兵策略，以便采取对策，并奏请督促进军。作品：《赐王元逵何弘敬诏意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约闰七月中旬，李德裕撰状论与任畹、李丕议讨刘稹事宜。作品：《任畹李丕与臣状共三道》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373868?labeling=true' target='_blank'>任畹李丕与臣状共三道</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373868")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373868'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373868'>右。臣缘小寇未殄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373868_comment'></div>前月末与河中留后任畹委曲。令转问李丕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373868_comment'></div>有何方略。一一条疏报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373868_comment'></div>今得任畹书。并封送李丕状两道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373868_comment'></div>并谨封进。其李丕状一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373868_comment'></div>论请依前取黄泽岭路。断贼要害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373868_comment'></div>臣近访知魏城路。又狗脊岭东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373868_comment'></div>经五月十四日阵破。贼掘坑堑至深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373868_comment'></div>必恐进兵不得。古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373868_comment'></div>战不胜。则易地而处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373868_comment'></div>伏望密诏义忠朝清。潜移兵取黄泽路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373868_comment'></div>掩其不备。得否令子细筹度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373868_comment'></div>如可去。便候进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373868_comment'></div>事贵神速。须务至密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373868_comment'></div>机计倘漏。还备堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373868_comment'></div>其一状请令诸军各赍十日乾粮。深入过险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373868_comment'></div>此亦是用奇之计。伏望约此意赐石雄王逢诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373868_comment'></div>令如此排比。石雄就河府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373868_comment'></div>王逢就绛州。各晒乾粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373868_comment'></div>缘日色犹烈。数日可致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373868_comment'></div>兼各赐度支侧近军粮米一二千石。尤冀集事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373868_comment'></div>臣缘寇孽未剪。每得四远文状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373868_comment'></div>皆愿一一上闻。频渎宸严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373868_comment'></div>不任惶惕。伏望留中不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373868_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373868_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。闰七月中旬，李德裕撰状多篇，多方探听昭义内部虚实及其用兵策略，以便采取对策，并奏请催促进军。作品：《续得高文端贼中事宜四状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>续得高文端贼中事宜四状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373869")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373869'>高文端称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373869_comment'></div>直下打泽州城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373869_comment'></div>恐损官军兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373869_comment'></div>缘贼兵原有一万五千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373869_comment'></div>常出一半已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373869_comment'></div>于四面山谷埋伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373869_comment'></div>待官军打城困乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373869_comment'></div>即四面齐来救援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373869_comment'></div>恐落贼奸计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373869_comment'></div>其陈许军请过乾河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373869_comment'></div>北逼泽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373869_comment'></div>更下一寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373869_comment'></div>城寨连接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373869_comment'></div>更筑鹿项夹城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373869_comment'></div>但从一面起手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373869_comment'></div>围绕泽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373869_comment'></div>每日常须大兵排阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373869_comment'></div>四面抵敌贼救兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373869_comment'></div>贼心危急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373869_comment'></div>恐被围合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373869_comment'></div>必有大战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373869_comment'></div>待贼军退败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373869_comment'></div>乘势便收泽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373869_comment'></div>如此则不损官军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373869_comment'></div>免落奸计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373869_comment'></div>伏望依此诏示王宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373869_comment'></div>请令王逢进军取贼固镇两寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373869_comment'></div>但两岭上排阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373869_comment'></div>直抵贼固镇寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373869_comment'></div>当川亦须著兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373869_comment'></div>亦抵贼寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373869_comment'></div>缘固镇两寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373869_comment'></div>四面悬崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373869_comment'></div>官军便打。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373869_comment'></div>必恐损人难收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373869_comment'></div>其贼寨更无井水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373869_comment'></div>尽吃泉水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373869_comment'></div>在寨东南涧内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373869_comment'></div>约一里已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373869_comment'></div>但逼贼寨三两日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373869_comment'></div>绝其取水路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373869_comment'></div>贼军无水可吃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373869_comment'></div>即须拔寨退走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373869_comment'></div>官军便可进固镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373869_comment'></div>东十五里是青龙寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373869_comment'></div>在岭北侧上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373869_comment'></div>四面并是悬崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373869_comment'></div>取水亦在寨外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373869_comment'></div>还依固镇寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373869_comment'></div>绝其取水路即是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373869_comment'></div>青龙寨东去沁州十五里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373869_comment'></div>城寨至牢固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373869_comment'></div>贼兵约一千五百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373869_comment'></div>内五百人土军团练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373869_comment'></div>全安庆自领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373869_comment'></div>伏望依此诏示王逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373869_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_56_1373869'>长桥贼都头王钊约将一万兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373869_comment'></div>今在洺州城内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373869_comment'></div>缘刘稹处置却失天井关都头薛茂卿一门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373869_comment'></div>又处置却邢洺两州救援兵马使谈朝清兄弟三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373869_comment'></div>王钊自此疑惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373869_comment'></div>刘稹差亲器仗官贾少遇追王钊入潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373869_comment'></div>并不伏追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373869_comment'></div>官健一时叫阚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373869_comment'></div>王钊已持两端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373869_comment'></div>必不肯为刘稹用命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373869_comment'></div>本是潞州子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373869_comment'></div>见有兄弟数人在军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373869_comment'></div>材能最出于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373869_comment'></div>若招降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373869_comment'></div>至多必恐顾惜家口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373869_comment'></div>又官健投降后为诸军所杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373869_comment'></div>亦恐非愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373869_comment'></div>惟密将意与王钊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373869_comment'></div>令将一万人却入潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373869_comment'></div>处置得刘稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373869_comment'></div>别与一道节度使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373869_comment'></div>兼与检校高官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373869_comment'></div>更别赐钱物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373869_comment'></div>高文端云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373869_comment'></div>官健受苦日久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373869_comment'></div>朝夕难过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373869_comment'></div>家属尽在潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373869_comment'></div>若遣回军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373869_comment'></div>必皆情愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373869_comment'></div>臣恐宏敬不知王钊不伏刘稹追呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373869_comment'></div>伏望专降中使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373869_comment'></div>密赐诏示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373869_comment'></div>令依此速致意与王钊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373869_comment'></div>取其回意闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373869_comment'></div>河朔多冀邑人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373869_comment'></div>若遣传意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373869_comment'></div>计合必达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373869_comment'></div>臣问高文端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373869_comment'></div>贼中谁人作急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373869_comment'></div>高文端云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373869_comment'></div>潞州城内即有郭谊王协张谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1373869_comment'></div>向外即刘公直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1373869_comment'></div>臣先得元龟状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1373869_comment'></div>刘公直曾事王晏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1373869_comment'></div>平常依倚于王宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1373869_comment'></div>伏望诏王宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1373869_comment'></div>令百方将意与刘公直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1373869_comment'></div>若肯回戈却取刘稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1373869_comment'></div>亦许别与重官酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1373869_comment'></div>仍别赐钱物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1373869_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_106_1373869'>以前谨具如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1373869_comment'></div>昨日高文端到宅辞臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1373869_comment'></div>因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_108_1373869", 1373869, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>子细</span>问得贼中事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1373869_comment'></div>兼共商量计策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1373869_comment'></div>皆似可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1373869_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1373869_comment'></div>谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_112_1373869_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约七月中旬，李德裕代石雄与刘稹书，劝其归降。作品：《代石雄与刘稹书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373987' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373987' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373987?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代石雄与刘稹书</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373987")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373987_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373987'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373987'>雄白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373987_comment'></div>比者牙<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本有内字）</span>兵马使弃累代之勋业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373987_comment'></div>为四海之罪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373987_comment'></div>寄命网罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373987_comment'></div>坐待夷灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373987_comment'></div>将谓迫于将校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373987_comment'></div>未遂本心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373987_comment'></div>今则将校尽离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373987_comment'></div>军心日骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373987_comment'></div>若不见几而作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373987_comment'></div>必恐受僇于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373987_comment'></div>昨打暮宿寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373987_comment'></div>收得文书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373987_comment'></div>陈许游奕使贺意密报云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373987_comment'></div>官军二十五日齐进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373987_comment'></div>雄牒报王尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373987_comment'></div>请勘虚实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373987_comment'></div>近得王尚书报云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373987_comment'></div>追到贺意勘责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373987_comment'></div>款称曾在昭义效职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373987_comment'></div>与彼军游奕使唐再清情分至深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373987_comment'></div>每因游奕相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373987_comment'></div>彼此说军中密事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373987_comment'></div>并已承伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373987_comment'></div>王尚书便已按军令讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373987_comment'></div>贺意又款称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373987_comment'></div>唐再清隔乾河密说云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373987_comment'></div>朝廷若与郎君节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373987_comment'></div>须从西面来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373987_comment'></div>若从南面来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373987_comment'></div>缘刘公直心怀两端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373987_comment'></div>必恐自取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373987_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373987_comment'></div>二郎疾病绝重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373987_comment'></div>命在朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373987_comment'></div>军中已别有准拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373987_comment'></div>不久即是王人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373987_comment'></div>忠武军何必苦相杀伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373987_comment'></div>又收得彼处投降军将高文端等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373987_comment'></div>皆云回西诸寨兵马商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373987_comment'></div>欲立安全庆替兵马使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373987_comment'></div>文端等不愿更事全庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373987_comment'></div>所以归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373987_comment'></div>雄虽久在行间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373987_comment'></div>不与先相公交接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373987_comment'></div>然俱是河朔军将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373987_comment'></div>臭味略同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373987_comment'></div>将睹覆亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373987_comment'></div>不无深惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373987_comment'></div>今圣上方示大信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373987_comment'></div>以安危疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373987_comment'></div>倘能自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373987_comment'></div>必舍罪衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373987_comment'></div>况两面主兵大将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373987_comment'></div>皆有贼心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373987_comment'></div>事迫图全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373987_comment'></div>必自救祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373987_comment'></div>兵马使若不早决大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373987_comment'></div>束身归降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373987_comment'></div>更欲迁延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373987_comment'></div>即无所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373987_comment'></div>凉风已至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373987_comment'></div>白露将凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373987_comment'></div>弓劲马豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373987_comment'></div>视险如砥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373987_comment'></div>粮储丰足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373987_comment'></div>器甲精坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373987_comment'></div>并是诸道强兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373987_comment'></div>近方抽到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373987_comment'></div>士皆宿饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373987_comment'></div>人有斗心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373987_comment'></div>大兵一交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373987_comment'></div>立见焦烂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373987_comment'></div>辄申愚虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373987_comment'></div>幸纳至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373987_comment'></div>不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373987_comment'></div>雄白。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1373987_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年7月25日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。闰七月二十五日，刘稹之邢州守将裴向、邢州刺史崔嘏降于王元逵，后数日，洛、磁二州亦降，昭义之山东三州平。八月十一日，镇、魏奏山东三州平，李德裕请以卢弘止为三州留后，以防王元逵、何弘敬请占三州之地。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约八月十一日到十五日，李德裕撰状令天井、冀氏坚守城寨，不得与战。作品：《天井冀氏事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373870' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373870' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373870?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天井冀氏事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373870")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373870_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373870'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373870'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373870_comment'></div>臣昨日晚见镇州奏事官高迪云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373870_comment'></div>向前已曾向臣言军中密事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373870_comment'></div>今更有切事要言于臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373870_comment'></div>请不令王助知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373870_comment'></div>今山东三州归降已平了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373870_comment'></div>天井冀氏却须令坚守城寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373870_comment'></div>不得与战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373870_comment'></div>不二十日内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373870_comment'></div>必自生变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373870_comment'></div>缘贼已穷蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373870_comment'></div>不可更逼著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373870_comment'></div>恐其计穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373870_comment'></div>必为济河焚舟之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373870_comment'></div>一人敌十人之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373870_comment'></div>官军与战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373870_comment'></div>必恐不利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373870_comment'></div>若万一小衄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373870_comment'></div>却恐延贼旬月之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373870_comment'></div>缘临洺已投魏博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373870_comment'></div>当道兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373870_comment'></div>过来不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373870_comment'></div>请召宏敬速拨兵取临洺路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373870_comment'></div>便扼武安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373870_comment'></div>潞府知山东兵来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373870_comment'></div>必枭擒刘稹向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373870_comment'></div>臣伏见高迪之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373870_comment'></div>至忠至切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373870_comment'></div>伏望速赐宏敬王宰石雄诏处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373870_comment'></div>谨密状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373870_comment'></div>伏望留中不出。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约八月十一日到十五日，李德裕撰状论洛州事宜。作品：《洛州事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373834' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373834' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373834?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论河阳事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373834")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373834_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373834'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373834'>右。缘河阳奏事官高从真到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373834_comment'></div>称十八日陈后遍山遍谷。尽是贼军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373834_comment'></div>茂元兵力寡少。颇似危急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373834_comment'></div>若贼势更甚。便要退守怀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373834_comment'></div>非惟损挫威声。必恐惊动东洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373834_comment'></div>皆由魏博未有陈战。陈彦佐又隔深山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373834_comment'></div>所以并力南攻。不得不虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373834_comment'></div>自元和以来。贼中用众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373834_comment'></div>皆取军寡弱处。即并兵用力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373834_comment'></div>一处不敌后。即移向他处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373834_comment'></div>计王宰排比。已有次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373834_comment'></div>倘遣全军便发。救援河阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373834_comment'></div>不止捍蔽洛京。足以临制魏博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373834_comment'></div>如恐全军费损馈运。计王宰必见先锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373834_comment'></div>望今日降中使赐诏。令宜发先锋五千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373834_comment'></div>便赴河阳。所冀免落奸计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373834_comment'></div>事机至切。不可更迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373834_comment'></div>如蒙允许。望赐茂元王宰行敏诏处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373834_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373834_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。八月，郭谊杀刘稹，遣使奉表降于王宰。八月十五日，王宰奏闻其事。约八月十六、十七日，李德裕代皇帝撰敕，表达坚决以武力惩办刘稹、郭谊等人。并请诏石雄率军七千人马入潞州。作品：《赐潞州军人敕书意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1373801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373801?labeling=true' "poem_title_1373801")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373801'>刘稹乳臭騃童。未有所识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373801_comment'></div>皆是郭谊王协。幸其昏弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373801_comment'></div>矫托军情。妄献表章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373801_comment'></div>欲求继袭。志在肆行祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373801_comment'></div>自擅兵权。称感从谏之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373801_comment'></div>誓同生死。及见山东三郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373801_comment'></div>皆已归降。事迫势穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373801_comment'></div>归恶刘稹。令其一门受戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373801_comment'></div>便欲自取宠荣。不义不忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373801_comment'></div>古无其比。朕以诱陷刘稹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373801_comment'></div>皆是此二人。贩卖图全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373801_comment'></div>义难容舍。已令泽潞冀氏两路遣军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373801_comment'></div>只取郭谊王协及同恶之类。其他军人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373801_comment'></div>一切不问。仍各有优赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373801_comment'></div>后从敕处分。如两道兵马未到以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373801_comment'></div>有忠义之士先非同恶者。能自擒戮郭谊等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373801_comment'></div>所与优赏。并同裴问王钊例处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373801_comment'></div>已诏石雄王宰。到彼不令侵扰军人百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373801_comment'></div>如秋毫有犯。便按军法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373801_comment'></div>各宜勉思机计。共保忠诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373801_comment'></div>勿受奸人扇动。妄生疑忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373801_comment'></div>互相告报。咸使明知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373801_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1373801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。八月二十八日，李德裕加太尉、卫国公。约八月下旬，李德裕多次撰表辞让、谢恩。作品：《让太尉第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十八。）</span>《让太尉第三表》<span target='_blank'>让太尉第二表<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373809")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373809_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1373809_0'>① 原注第一表舍人撰不录同日更进此表</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373809'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373809'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373809_comment'></div>臣今日已进让表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373809_comment'></div>惊宠之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373809_comment'></div>不遑启处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373809_comment'></div>再陈恐恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373809_comment'></div>实惧为烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373809_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373809_comment'></div>伏见国初已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373809_comment'></div>授此官惟有七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373809_comment'></div>尚父子仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373809_comment'></div>犹以恳辞而免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373809_comment'></div>近者智兴载义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373809_comment'></div>皆超拜太傅太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373809_comment'></div>只缘朝廷重惜此官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373809_comment'></div>裴度守司徒十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373809_comment'></div>竟不迁授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373809_comment'></div>以臣僭越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373809_comment'></div>必致颠挤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373809_comment'></div>况臣既无汗马之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373809_comment'></div>涓尘莫效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373809_comment'></div>又有负薪之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373809_comment'></div>旷废至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373809_comment'></div>唯陛下宠以美名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373809_comment'></div>荣皆过实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373809_comment'></div>而臣腼颜自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373809_comment'></div>窃位偷安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373809_comment'></div>非止获朝野之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373809_comment'></div>实恐受神明之谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373809_comment'></div>辄披丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373809_comment'></div>犹冀听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373809_comment'></div>伏望息罢新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373809_comment'></div>且守旧秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373809_comment'></div>不任祈恩迫切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1373809_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让太尉第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373810")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373810'>臣某言。臣闻庙器不盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373810_comment'></div>周公戒其必覆。马力已竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373810_comment'></div>颜氏知其必颠。臣窃感之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373810_comment'></div>以忧以蹙。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373810_comment'></div>昔子文避禄。竟之逃死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373810_comment'></div>冶廑辞卿。迫于惧祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373810_comment'></div>伏以上公亢极。本待勋臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373810_comment'></div>其间或授时贤。皆是元老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373810_comment'></div>臣既非耆艾。又乏战功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373810_comment'></div>奉宸算而曾靡运筹。假英威而未尝推毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373810_comment'></div>有何劳效。蒙此殊荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373810_comment'></div>夙夜自思。至今战汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373810_comment'></div>伏见广德二年九月十七日。代宗授尚父汾阳王此官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373810_comment'></div>三让而免。至大历十四年闰五月三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373810_comment'></div>德宗再申前命。重授尚父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373810_comment'></div>不许陈让。三载而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373810_comment'></div>臣窃思尚父十五馀年得延光宠。岂非牢让而致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373810_comment'></div>□骘所持。昨者恭惟圣奖至深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373810_comment'></div>恩义加等。祗受典册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373810_comment'></div>未敢固辞。臣伏念齿发虽雕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373810_comment'></div>心力犹壮。实愿赞陛下升平之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373810_comment'></div>见万方仁寿之期。东封告成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373810_comment'></div>大典咸备。然后散金娱老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373810_comment'></div>归守丘园。贪全盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373810_comment'></div>不忍自促。所以再陈恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373810_comment'></div>上渎皇明。竭至敬而不敢繁文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373810_comment'></div>陈至诚而不为饰让。心恳词直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373810_comment'></div>度获听从。伏望特追新恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373810_comment'></div>却守旧秩。臣不任恳迫屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373810_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1373810_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请改封卫国公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373906")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373906'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373906'>臣今日蒙恩进封赵国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373906_comment'></div>承命哀惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373906_comment'></div>不任感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373906_comment'></div>臣亡父先臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373906_comment'></div>宪宗宠封赵国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373906_comment'></div>先臣与嫡子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373906_comment'></div>嫡孙中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373906_comment'></div>小名三赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373906_comment'></div>意在传嫡嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373906_comment'></div>不及支庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373906_comment'></div>臣前年恩例进封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373906_comment'></div>合是赵郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373906_comment'></div>臣以中之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373906_comment'></div>改就中山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373906_comment'></div>臣亡祖先臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373906_comment'></div>曾居卫州汲县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373906_comment'></div>竟以汲县解进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373906_comment'></div>倘蒙圣恩改封卫国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373906_comment'></div>遂臣私诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373906_comment'></div>庶代受殊荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373906_comment'></div>免违先志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373906_comment'></div>如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373906_comment'></div>谨奉状奏闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373906_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373919?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢恩加特进阶改封卫国公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373919")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373919_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373919'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373919'>奉今月二十七日敕。臣封卫国公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373919_comment'></div>仰戴天慈。获遂私恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373919_comment'></div>以感以泣。荣惕载深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373919_comment'></div>伏以支庶嗣侯。虽存故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373919_comment'></div>元成以兄有谴。乃绍扶阳之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373919_comment'></div>耿霸以父属爱。遂继牟平之爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373919_comment'></div>开元中。苏颋特封许国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373919_comment'></div>亦无袭字。然地居嫡长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373919_comment'></div>受则无嫌。伏思亡父先臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373919_comment'></div>开国全赵。亡兄已经继袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373919_comment'></div>未得传孙。臣每念贻谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373919_comment'></div>岂宜不正。若苟安殊宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373919_comment'></div>实愧幽明。辄罄愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373919_comment'></div>果蒙听察。况卫国疆畛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373919_comment'></div>密迩丛台。先祖之所成名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373919_comment'></div>由兹光大。微孙得以启土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373919_comment'></div>实谓至荣。祗奉宠章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373919_comment'></div>益惭非据。不任荷恩感戴之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373919_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373919_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。八九月间，李德裕撰文颂皇帝功德。作品：《仁圣文武至神大孝皇帝真容赞并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷一。）</span>《进真容赞状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1374057' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374057' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374057?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仁圣文武至神大孝皇帝真容赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374057")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1374057_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374057'>仁圣文武至神大孝皇帝御极之五载。气应天和。德感人心。朝廷四方。咸一于正。以精荡祲。以道胜残。故得风雨时若。螽螟岁息。销蓬孛为休气。驱戎狄为怀人。北荒坚昆。重译而至。厥有窘伐凭阻。弄兵陆梁。韦顾既伐。夙沙自缚。武功既成。休德昭明。前古未闻百王莫致之事。皆葳蕤于图谍矣。皇上以为大禹叙九畴。敬五事。岂不曰貌恭则庄。视明则正。予欲作绘傅照。审其仪形。且夫圣人潜心于天。以通神明。先定其神。而万物理矣。昔之访具茨。期姑射。在此而已矣。况乎广成之戒抱一。元元之去多欲。予所贵道。良谓是矣。岂眩夫系风之言。奇彼淖冰之术。从偓佺之所珍。遗尧舜之令名也哉。于是图轻素。写良金。拟鉴形于止水。若凝视于清镜。五彩既彰。穆穆皇皇。居列仙之馆。近元祖之光。盖以昭燕翼之谋。显丕承之德矣。臣闻古之至圣。必有奇相。是以黄熊之瑞。应于龙体。赤精之符。协于图表。颀然而长。文王所以王天下也。体貌多奇。汉高所以威海内也。然则绘事之微。极于惟肖。至于天光晬清。日华明润。非可图也。庶彷佛焉。末臣奉诏。敢飏言曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1374057_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374057'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374057'>唐运中兴，天授大君。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1374057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1374057'>轩耀其武，尧焕其文。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1374057_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373852' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373852?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论赤头赤心健儿等状</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年9月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373852")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373852_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373852'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373852'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373852_comment'></div>健儿等敢同元恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373852_comment'></div>久抗王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373852_comment'></div>比屋皆诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373852_comment'></div>未足塞责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373852_comment'></div>然以此军忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373852_comment'></div>未尝失节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373852_comment'></div>艰难已后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373852_comment'></div>频立战功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373852_comment'></div>赤头赤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373852_comment'></div>皆是贼妄立此名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373852_comment'></div>以张声势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373852_comment'></div>未必人皆敢勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373852_comment'></div>生死一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373852_comment'></div>所虑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1373852", 1373852, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>玉石俱焚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373852_comment'></div>善恶同弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373852_comment'></div>诏王宰石雄义逸国亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373852_comment'></div>许其自相糺出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373852_comment'></div>如是郓州父兄子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373852_comment'></div>及从谏处招到凶恶将健等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373852_comment'></div>乘用兵后为刘稹出死力战斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373852_comment'></div>先犯官军毁骂行营节度使者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373852_comment'></div>任自推出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373852_comment'></div>即免累及平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373852_comment'></div>伏料如此号令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373852_comment'></div>必不敢容蔽凶党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373852_comment'></div>其合诛戮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373852_comment'></div>亦自甘心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373852_comment'></div>昭示四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373852_comment'></div>称朝廷吊人伐罪之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373852_comment'></div>如蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373852_comment'></div>望付翰林约此意诏示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373852_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1373852_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。九月中，李德裕代皇帝撰敕诛郭谊、张谷等。作品：《诛郭谊等敕》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷九。）</span>《诛张谷等告示中外敕》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373788' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373788' class='poemTitle href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373788")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373788_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373788'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373788'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373788_comment'></div>理髋髀者不可以芒刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373788_comment'></div>图蔓草者必绝乎本根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373788_comment'></div>故前代陈甲兵以正其刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373788_comment'></div>伐钟鼓以声其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373788_comment'></div>爰用重典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373788_comment'></div>庶清乱邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373788_comment'></div>逆贼郭谊等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373788_comment'></div>狐鼠之妖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373788_comment'></div>依邱穴而自固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373788_comment'></div>牛羊之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373788_comment'></div>得水草而逾凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373788_comment'></div>久从叛臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373788_comment'></div>首负逆气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373788_comment'></div>顷自刘从谏背德反义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373788_comment'></div>掩贼藏奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373788_comment'></div>稽其怙乱之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373788_comment'></div>无非亲吏之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373788_comment'></div>刘公直安全庆等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373788_comment'></div>各凭地险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373788_comment'></div>屡抗王师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373788_comment'></div>每肆悖言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373788_comment'></div>靡怀革面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373788_comment'></div>吴寇将败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373788_comment'></div>周邱尚务于陆梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373788_comment'></div>陇坁向平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373788_comment'></div>王揵犹称于必死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373788_comment'></div>况郭谊王协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373788_comment'></div>闻邢洺归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373788_comment'></div>惧义旅覆巢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373788_comment'></div>卖孽童以图全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373788_comment'></div>据坚城而请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373788_comment'></div>擐甲以祈于抚纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373788_comment'></div>要君以盖其前愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373788_comment'></div>天地神祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373788_comment'></div>所难容舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373788_comment'></div>昔伍被诣吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373788_comment'></div>不免就诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373788_comment'></div>延岑出降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373788_comment'></div>终亦夷族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373788_comment'></div>致之大辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373788_comment'></div>无所愧怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373788_comment'></div>郭谊王协刘公直安全庆李道德李佐尧刘武德董可武各宜处斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373788_comment'></div>其馀反党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373788_comment'></div>各从别敕处分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1373788_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373789?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诛张谷等告示中外敕</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373789'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373789'>敕。顷者刘从谏与李训郑注结刎颈之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373789_comment'></div>济其奸谋。以图不轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373789_comment'></div>张皇兵力。胁制朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373789_comment'></div>自擅一方。外为三窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373789_comment'></div>张谷陈扬庭等。皆凶险无行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373789_comment'></div>狡诈多端。比在京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373789_comment'></div>人皆嫌恶。自知险薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373789_comment'></div>无地庇身。投迹戎藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373789_comment'></div>寄命从谏。久怀怨望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373789_comment'></div>得肆阴谋。或妄设妖言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373789_comment'></div>成其逆志。或伪草章表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373789_comment'></div>饰以悖词。既无礼于君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373789_comment'></div>曾不愧于天地。自朕君临万宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373789_comment'></div>姑务含容。而怙乱益坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373789_comment'></div>包藏未息。诱受亡命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373789_comment'></div>招聚逆徒。志犹恃于金汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373789_comment'></div>心不利于王室。近又敢为狂计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373789_comment'></div>挟助孽童。污我忠义之军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373789_comment'></div>叶其豺豕之党。神之所弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373789_comment'></div>人得而诛。逆贼刘稹弟曹九满郎君郎姊四娘五娘堂兄洪卿汉卿周卿堂弟鲁卿匡尧等张谷并男涯涯男解愁陈扬庭弟宣力男丑奴张溢并男欢郎三宝等门客甄戈伎术人郑谂蒋谠逆贼李训兄仲京郭行馀男台王涯侄孙与韩约男茂章茂实王璠男圭并就昭义枭斩讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373789_comment'></div>夫为善者天报以福。为恶者天报以殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373789_comment'></div>今沴气既消。逆节咸服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373789_comment'></div>方布和于四海。庶息患于五兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373789_comment'></div>宣示中外。各令知悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373789_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373789_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_26_1373991_comment'></div>犹投放四罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373991_comment'></div>天下乃定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373991_comment'></div>且以近事明之。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年9月18日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。九月十八日，李德裕撰状论尧山县，主张对下层军士采取安抚之策。作品：《论尧山县状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373853' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373853_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373853'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373853'>右。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1373855_comment'></div>破害疲氓。望委吏部于今年选人中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373855_comment'></div>拣干济曾有绩效人。稍优一两任注拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373855_comment'></div>所冀刺史得主兵权。免受牵制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373855_comment'></div>官人皆由选择。可委缉绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373855_comment'></div>既无军头干侵。自然得施教化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373855_comment'></div>臣等商量如前。未审可否。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373933_comment'></div>驱逐不迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373933_comment'></div>恐刘沔撰书叙朝廷意不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373933_comment'></div>今且驻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373933_comment'></div>更审候事势。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373920'>伏奉今月十二日制书。授臣散官特进者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373920_comment'></div>伏以汉氏之制。勋望<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1373920", 1373920, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>优隆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373920_comment'></div>则位加特进。服以文冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373920_comment'></div>列侍清祠。荣亚三台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373920_comment'></div>品居第二。自非学深张禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373920_comment'></div>功重窦融。则何以膺是宠章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373920_comment'></div>允兹瞻望。臣器本凡薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373920_comment'></div>才在下中。遭逢圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373920_comment'></div>谬忝枢务。近者展采清庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373920_comment'></div>祗事圆丘。获亲日月之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373920_comment'></div>已惊殊宠。又沐云霄之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373920_comment'></div>更荷新恩。虽臣陨身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373920_comment'></div>岂能上报。惟冀饮冰效节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373920_comment'></div>介石存诚。居若对于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373920_comment'></div>动罔𠌤于风雨。保其一志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373920_comment'></div>少答鸿私。不任荷恩惕惧之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373920_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1373920_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。春，李德裕进所撰黠戛斯书。作品：《进所撰黠戛斯书状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。春，李德裕奉旨撰书与黠戛斯。作品：《与黠戛斯书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1373797' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373797' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373797?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与黠戛斯可汗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373797")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373797_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373797'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373797'>皇帝敬问黠戛斯可汗。温仵合将军至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373797_comment'></div>览书及所献马百匹鹘十联。具悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373797_comment'></div>可汗特禀英姿。生知雄略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373797_comment'></div>奋扬威武。底定龙荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373797_comment'></div>扫回鹘之穹居。报怨以直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373797_comment'></div>护公主之罽幕。事大以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373797_comment'></div>又遣贵族信臣。载驰朔漠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373797_comment'></div>名马鸷鸟。远涉流沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373797_comment'></div>既展同姓之亲。克副怀柔之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373797_comment'></div>眷言勋绩。深慰予衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373797_comment'></div>朕护奉丕图。抚宁万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373797_comment'></div>岂望化孚有截。致殷汤来享之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373797_comment'></div>实恐德未遍覆。愧汉宣兼临之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373797_comment'></div>况与彼国壤隔内外。非正朔所加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373797_comment'></div>礼既不施。政岂宜及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373797_comment'></div>但以惜可汗宗盟之国。愿保先名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373797_comment'></div>为可汗宏远之谋。须除后患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373797_comment'></div>所以具古今祸福。往谕至怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373797_comment'></div>昔呼韩邪单于以郅支尚存。国难未靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373797_comment'></div>称蕃事汉。福及子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373797_comment'></div>后汉单于比以大父。依汉而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373797_comment'></div>继袭其号。上书款塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373797_comment'></div>永愿藩蔽漠南。遂致朔塞底宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373797_comment'></div>烽燧永息。近则回鹘结大国之援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373797_comment'></div>雄长北蕃。诸部率从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373797_comment'></div>莫敢不服。一隅安乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373797_comment'></div>百有馀年。此事昭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373797_comment'></div>可汗所睹。况今回鹘种类未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373797_comment'></div>介居蕃汉之间。爰及黑车子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373797_comment'></div>久畏其威。素服其信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373797_comment'></div>虑彼再振。常持两端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373797_comment'></div>须令小蕃知朕亲厚可汗。弃绝回鹘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373797_comment'></div>实在和好分定。内附约盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373797_comment'></div>则邪计奸谋。无由而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373797_comment'></div>故欲显加册命。昭示万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373797_comment'></div>况登里可汗回鹘旧号。是国家顷年所赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373797_comment'></div>非回鹘自制此名。今回鹘国已破亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373797_comment'></div>理当嫌避。朕以可汗先祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373797_comment'></div>往在贞观。身自入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373797_comment'></div>太宗授以左卫将军坚昆都督。朕思欲继太宗之旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373797_comment'></div>彼亦宜遵先祖之明诚。便以坚昆为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373797_comment'></div>施于册命。更加美号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373797_comment'></div>以表懿亲。况坚者不朽之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373797_comment'></div>昆者有后之称。示不忘本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373797_comment'></div>岂不美欤。朕昨命礼部尚书郑肃等与彼使臣面陈大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373797_comment'></div>温仵合将军等皆谕朕旨。愿言结成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373797_comment'></div>岂必契径路之金。举留犁之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373797_comment'></div>保兹诚信。固在厥初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373797_comment'></div>顷者回鹘至塞上。请国家精兵十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373797_comment'></div>送至漠北。渐归本蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373797_comment'></div>又请借汉界一城。养育疲羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373797_comment'></div>以图兴复。朕以可汗之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373797_comment'></div>尽不听从。今回鹘是国家叛臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373797_comment'></div>为可汗雠敌。须去根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373797_comment'></div>方保永安。是天亡之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373797_comment'></div>易于攻取。古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373797_comment'></div>天与不取。反受其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373797_comment'></div>可汗须乘此机便。早务芟夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373797_comment'></div>回鹘未灭以前。可汗勿以饮食为甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373797_comment'></div>弋猎为乐。励兵秣马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373797_comment'></div>不可暂闲。所恨隔在诸蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373797_comment'></div>国家难于同力。倘更近塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373797_comment'></div>岂复稽诛。又恐馀孽归降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373797_comment'></div>可汗未能尽戮。纳有罪之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373797_comment'></div>受逋逃之臣。倘收吾憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373797_comment'></div>必开边隙。此则蕃养虺毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373797_comment'></div>自生厉阶。前年回鹘宰相等向汉使云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373797_comment'></div>李靖擒颉利后。国中只有三二十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373797_comment'></div>便郤兴复。虽在危困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373797_comment'></div>尚尔张皇。可汗深察此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373797_comment'></div>岂得不虑。又闻合罗川回鹘牙帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373797_comment'></div>未尽毁除。想其怀土之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373797_comment'></div>必有思归之志。速要平其区落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373797_comment'></div>无使孑遗。既表成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373797_comment'></div>彼当绝望。可汗已摅积年之愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373797_comment'></div>自为一代之雄。至于居处服章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373797_comment'></div>皆宜变革。焉得安于所习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373797_comment'></div>姑务因循。则何以震耀北方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373797_comment'></div>弹压诸部。朕抚有中夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373797_comment'></div>爱育生灵。常恐百姓未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373797_comment'></div>一物失所。岂愿更广威略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373797_comment'></div>遥制要荒。但缘与可汗方保和盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373797_comment'></div>义同忧乐。纤微之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373797_comment'></div>皆欲备言。想可汗与将相筹谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373797_comment'></div>副兹诚意。此使到日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373797_comment'></div>必谅朕心。即宜速遣报章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373797_comment'></div>此当遣重臣册命。夏热。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373797_comment'></div>想可汗休泰。将相以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373797_comment'></div>并存问之。遣书指不多及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373797_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_89_1373797_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年2月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。二月，李德裕奉旨撰状，云百官不得于京城置庙。作品：《奉宣今日以后百官不得于京城置庙状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十。）</span><div id='poem_1373963' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373963' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373963?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉宣今日以后百官不得于京城置庙状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年2月）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373963_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373963'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373963'>右。伏见礼记云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373963_comment'></div>君子将营宫室。宗庙为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373963_comment'></div>厩库为次。宫室为后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373963_comment'></div>又韦彤五礼精义对曰。古之制庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373963_comment'></div>必中门之外。吉凶大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373963_comment'></div>皆告而行。所以亲而尊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373963_comment'></div>不自专也。今令城外置庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373963_comment'></div>稍异礼文。书于史策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373963_comment'></div>必亏圣政。伏以朱雀门至明德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373963_comment'></div>凡有九坊。其长兴坊是皇城南第三坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373963_comment'></div>便有朝官私庙。实则逼近宫闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373963_comment'></div>自威远军向南三坊。俗称围外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373963_comment'></div>地至閒僻。人鲜经过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373963_comment'></div>于此置庙。无所妨碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373963_comment'></div>臣等商量。今日以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373963_comment'></div>皇城南六坊内不得起私庙。其朱雀街缘是南郊御路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373963_comment'></div>至明德门夹街两面坊及曲江侧近。亦不得置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373963_comment'></div>馀围外深僻坊。并无所禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373963_comment'></div>所贵不违礼意。感悦人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373963_comment'></div>臣等频奉圣旨。有事许再三论奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373963_comment'></div>辄罄所见。庶裨聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373963_comment'></div>谨具奏闻。伏候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373963_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1373963_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年2月23日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。二月二十三日，李德裕撰状，命刘濛为巡边使，赴幽州、太原、天德、振武等地，以待秋季黠戛斯击回鹘。作品：《巡边使刘濛状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373857?labeling=true' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373785_comment'></div>海内无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373785_comment'></div>方欲永櫜弓矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373785_comment'></div>保乂生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373785_comment'></div>国远开边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373785_comment'></div>诚非朕志。<div id='poem_sentence_74_1373785_comment'></div>入寇要津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373785_comment'></div>各要知兵马多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373785_comment'></div>何人主领。<div id='poem_sentence_79_1373785_comment'></div>乘此危机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373785_comment'></div>必易为计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373785_comment'></div>多设反间。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373819'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373819_comment'></div>臣等伏见公主上表称妾李者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373819_comment'></div>伏以臣妾之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373819_comment'></div>取其贱称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373819_comment'></div>家人之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373819_comment'></div>即宜区别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373819_comment'></div>因循旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373819_comment'></div>恐未为得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373819_comment'></div>臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373819_comment'></div>今日以后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373819_comment'></div>公主上表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373819_comment'></div>从大长公主以下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373819_comment'></div>并望令称某邑公主第几女上表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373819_comment'></div>仍不令称妾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373819_comment'></div>所冀臣子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373819_comment'></div>因此正名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373819_comment'></div>郡主县主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373819_comment'></div>亦望准此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373819_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373819_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年7月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。七月，撰状论潞府事宜。作品：《潞府事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>潞州事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373874")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373874'>右。臣伏见报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373874_comment'></div>兵马不肯发赴振武。闭城叫反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373874_comment'></div>古人云。败军之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373874_comment'></div>没世不复。今潞府乘破败之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373874_comment'></div>又失天险。只是惮于征役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373874_comment'></div>岂敢更为逆命。亦恐是卢钧姑息太过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373874_comment'></div>军人知其畏懦。因此生心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373874_comment'></div>然亦须及其事初。预为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373874_comment'></div>臣比见叛乱之地。皆是制置太迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373874_comment'></div>及朝廷徵发。贼已处处设备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373874_comment'></div>兵法云。疾雷不及掩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373874_comment'></div>又云。用兵只闻拙速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373874_comment'></div>不闻巧迟。去春杨弁便是速讨之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373874_comment'></div>旬日而平。望赐王宰密诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373874_comment'></div>令府城下拣四千人。枞枞排比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373874_comment'></div>如已闻作乱。不要更待诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373874_comment'></div>令一千人守石会关。令三千人取仪州路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373874_comment'></div>把断武安。缘军粮兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373874_comment'></div>多在山东。但遣邢州不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373874_comment'></div>自然驻旬月不得。邢洺之心未可保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373874_comment'></div>亦望密诏王纵温士□各令自守。不得出兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373874_comment'></div>惟要于武安路太原兵马遥为声援。最切在令山东断绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373874_comment'></div>即立可诛剪。纵万一无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373874_comment'></div>不妨且赐密诏。王宰先知石雄勇于赴敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373874_comment'></div>计亦知警急。必便泽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373874_comment'></div>亦要赐泽州诏。守并须用河阳兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373874_comment'></div>不得用昭义旧人。亦要赐恭甫诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373874_comment'></div>知有警急。发马步一千人赴晋州屯集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373874_comment'></div>以防越轶。臣思虑所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373874_comment'></div>不敢不便奏闻。伏望留中不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373874_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。七、八月间，敕并省佛寺，令僧尼还俗，八月七日，李德裕撰表云当时佛寺建筑奢华，劳民伤财，故应禁佛。作品：《贺废毁诸寺德音表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷二十。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_0_1373812'>臣某等伏奉今日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373812_comment'></div>拆寺兰若共四万六千六百馀所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373812_comment'></div>还俗僧尼并奴婢为两税户共约四十一万馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373812_comment'></div>得良田约数千顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373812_comment'></div>其僧尼令隶主客户大秦穆护袄二十馀人并令还俗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373812_comment'></div>臣闻仲尼祖述尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373812_comment'></div>宪章文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373812_comment'></div>大宏圣道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373812_comment'></div>以黜异端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373812_comment'></div>末季以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373812_comment'></div>斯道久废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373812_comment'></div>不遇大圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373812_comment'></div>孰能拯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373812_comment'></div>臣某等中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373812_comment'></div>伏以三王之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373812_comment'></div>皆垂拱而理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373812_comment'></div>不可得而言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373812_comment'></div>厥后周美成康汉称文景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373812_comment'></div>至化深厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373812_comment'></div>大道和平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373812_comment'></div>人自禀于孝慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373812_comment'></div>俗必臻于仁寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373812_comment'></div>岂尝有外夷之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373812_comment'></div>玷中夏之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373812_comment'></div>东汉楚王英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373812_comment'></div>始盛桑门之馔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373812_comment'></div>沦于左道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373812_comment'></div>桓帝更增犀盖之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373812_comment'></div>归于乱政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373812_comment'></div>斯教未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373812_comment'></div>至东晋因吴人之佻薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373812_comment'></div>千有馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373812_comment'></div>伏惟仁圣文武章天成功神德明道大孝皇帝陛下明绍于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373812_comment'></div>粹合于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373812_comment'></div>黜霸图而功盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373812_comment'></div>入圣学而德优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373812_comment'></div>常欲天下之动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373812_comment'></div>咸贞于一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373812_comment'></div>以一言之蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373812_comment'></div>思必无邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373812_comment'></div>先定宸心。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年8月11日</a>　时李德裕在京为相。八月十一日，李德裕请赐密诏与石雄，论昭义军事。作品：《昭义军事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_1373858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昭义军事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年8月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373858")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373858'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373858'>右。今日见石雄报状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373858_comment'></div>卢钧因出城至斐村送兵马。步军遂回旗劫掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373858_comment'></div>以此知卢钧都不晓戎事。从前发遣兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373858_comment'></div>节度使不合出子城。诸城门亦合先布腹心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1373858", 1373858, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>把捉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373858_comment'></div>闻昭义军中畏惧石雄稍甚。如军乱未定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373858_comment'></div>且要石雄提挈精卒。自至泽州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373858_comment'></div>移牒索乱军头首。如送出首恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373858_comment'></div>其馀不问。计必当无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373858_comment'></div>如指挥未定。且要分五百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373858_comment'></div>兼拣好将。镇守端氏城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373858_comment'></div>其端氏城是刘从谏近年修筑。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1373858", 1373858, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>非常</span>牢固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373858_comment'></div>去年刘稹阻命。安全庆军元在端氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373858_comment'></div>所以敢扰西界。今若分兵镇守端氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373858_comment'></div>即翼城尽无可虞。又恐乱军溃散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373858_comment'></div>于诸处劫杀。河阴兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373858_comment'></div>切不可抽。亦须稍加警备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373858_comment'></div>石雄忠勇。思虑恐未周至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373858_comment'></div>伏望赐密诏处分。谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373858_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373858_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约八月，李德裕论昭义军事。作品：《论昭义军事宜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373875?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论昭义军事宜状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373875")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373875_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373875'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373875'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373875_comment'></div>适魏博奏事徐乃文见臣云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373875_comment'></div>昨日闻三道使出城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373875_comment'></div>一道往魏博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373875_comment'></div>恐令宏敬出军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373875_comment'></div>却虑三州不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373875_comment'></div>实非稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373875_comment'></div>臣当时说向圣意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373875_comment'></div>只令石雄至潞州界首搜索恶人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373875_comment'></div>恐三州未谕朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373875_comment'></div>知宏敬忠荩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373875_comment'></div>故令中使先往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373875_comment'></div>遣宏敬安存三州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373875_comment'></div>并不徵发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373875_comment'></div>乃文称若如此处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373875_comment'></div>至为切当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373875_comment'></div>缘涉县正当山东系口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373875_comment'></div>绝是要地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373875_comment'></div>有镇兵五百人已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373875_comment'></div>去潞府一百六十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373875_comment'></div>军粮至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373875_comment'></div>潞州官健月粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373875_comment'></div>皆在此请受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373875_comment'></div>恐潞府叛兵急则投窜涉县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373875_comment'></div>摇动三州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373875_comment'></div>切要国家先遣兵把捉此镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373875_comment'></div>有昭义旧都押衙焦长楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373875_comment'></div>是本军旧人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373875_comment'></div>刘从谏降黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373875_comment'></div>令往山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373875_comment'></div>今在邯郸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373875_comment'></div>若朝廷特赐一诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373875_comment'></div>令镇守涉县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373875_comment'></div>兼把捉潞河徽子口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373875_comment'></div>至为稳便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373875_comment'></div>如焦长楚不可委信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373875_comment'></div>朝廷专拣一武将速去亦得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373875_comment'></div>古人云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373875_comment'></div>耕当问奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373875_comment'></div>织当问婢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373875_comment'></div>盖以其虽是下贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373875_comment'></div>能识耕织之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373875_comment'></div>臣不谙泽潞界内山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373875_comment'></div>见乃文所说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373875_comment'></div>稍似有理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373875_comment'></div>不敢不便密状闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373875_comment'></div>望赐留中不出。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1373875_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年8月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。八月六日前，李德裕撰状请立东都太微宫。作品：《请立东都太微宫状》<span
