ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年9月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。九月，李德裕撰状请淮南、浙西、宣歙、江西、鄂岳五道置游奕船，以对付江道劫匪。作品：《请淮南等五道置游奕船状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_1373900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373900?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请淮南等五道置游奕船状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373900'>淮南<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>浙西宣歙江西鄂岳<span class='inlineComment2'>（各出一百人）</span>。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373900_comment'></div>访闻自有还僧以来。江西劫杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373900_comment'></div>比常年尤甚。自上元至宣池地界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373900_comment'></div>商旅绝行。缘所在长吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373900_comment'></div>掩闭道路。颇甚怨嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373900_comment'></div>望每道令拣前件人解弓弩又谙江路者。每一百人置游奕将一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373900_comment'></div>须清白强干稍有见会者充。如法造游奕船船五十只。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373900_comment'></div>一百人分为两番。长须在江路来往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373900_comment'></div>淮南游奕至池州界首。浙西游奕至宣州界首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373900_comment'></div>江西游奕至鄂州界首。常须每月一度至界首交牌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373900_comment'></div>各知界内平安。申报本使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373900_comment'></div>其下番人便于沿江要害处置营。不得抽归使下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373900_comment'></div>其粮饷春冬衣。委使司差人就营所支给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373900_comment'></div>如三度以下擒捉得贼。委使司超与职名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373900_comment'></div>其官健以下。便以贼赃物赏给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373900_comment'></div>务令优厚。如两度有贼不觉察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373900_comment'></div>游奕将科责差替。如容纵贼盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373900_comment'></div>不问有赃无赃。并委本道差人所在集众决杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373900_comment'></div>如贼大段巢穴去处。仰数道计会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373900_comment'></div>一时掩捉。倘去根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373900_comment'></div>军将授官酬赏。所贵邻接之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373900_comment'></div>同力叶心。江路盗贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373900_comment'></div>因此断绝。臣等今月二十五日已于延英殿面奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373900_comment'></div>伏蒙圣恩允许。未审可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373900_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373900_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373900'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1373900_0'>⑴ 缘疆界阔远请令出三百人</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373900_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。李德裕撰状请在孟州汜水县立昭武庙，以昭高祖、太宗武功之盛。作品：《请立昭武庙状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十。）</span><div id='poem_1373962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373962' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373962?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请立昭武庙状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373962")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373962_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373962'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373962'>孟州汜水县高祖太宗塑像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373962_comment'></div>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373962_comment'></div>汜水武牢关是太宗擒王世充窦建德之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373962_comment'></div>关城东峰有高祖太宗塑像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373962_comment'></div>在一堂之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373962_comment'></div>伏以山河如旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373962_comment'></div>城垒犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373962_comment'></div>威灵皆畏于轩台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373962_comment'></div>风云还疑于丰沛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373962_comment'></div>诚宜百代严奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373962_comment'></div>万邦所瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373962_comment'></div>西汉故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373962_comment'></div>祖宗尝所行幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373962_comment'></div>皆令郡国立庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373962_comment'></div>今缘定觉寺例合毁拆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373962_comment'></div>望取寺中大殿材木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373962_comment'></div>于东峰改造一殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373962_comment'></div>四面兼置宫墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373962_comment'></div>伏望号为昭武庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373962_comment'></div>以昭圣祖武功之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373962_comment'></div>委孟怀节度使差干事判官一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373962_comment'></div>勾当修造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373962_comment'></div>缘圣像彩色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373962_comment'></div>颇已故暗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373962_comment'></div>望令李石于东都差拣绝好画手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373962_comment'></div>就加严饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373962_comment'></div>初兴功日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373962_comment'></div>望令东都差分司郎官一人荐告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373962_comment'></div>至功程毕日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373962_comment'></div>别差使展敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373962_comment'></div>未审可否。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1373962_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。秋冬之际，帝赐橘，李德裕撰赋。作品：《瑞橘赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷二十。）</span><div id='poem_1373735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瑞橘赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373735")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373735_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373735'>清霜始降。上命中使赐宰臣等朱橘各三枚。盖灵囿之所植也。臣伏以度淮而枳。由地气而不迁。吹谷生黍。信阳和之所感。昔汉武致石榴于异国。灵根遐布。此西域柔服之应也。魏武植朱橘于铜雀。华实莫就。乃吴人未格之兆也。考于前史。昭晰可知。岂非天地和同。灵物效祉。去蛮夷之陋。获近太阳。感王化之盛。更承膏露。草木尚尔。况乎人心。汉宣帝宫馆山泽。意有所感。必诏近臣赋之。臣幼学为文。忝列枢近。敢稽首献赋曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373735'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373735'>美南州之嘉树。受烈气于炎德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373735_comment'></div>固一志于殊方。遂不迁于上国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373735_comment'></div>贞枝凝碧。蔚湘岸之夕阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373735_comment'></div>华实变黄。动江潭之秋色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373735_comment'></div>杂丹枫于溪畔。映绿筱于岩侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373735_comment'></div>翡翠以之列巢。鹓雏于焉栖息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373735_comment'></div>虽同沾于雨露。窃自得于彫饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373735_comment'></div>终获誉于皇明。岂因人而羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373735_comment'></div>感洪钧之独运。斡造化之元力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373735_comment'></div>思六合之同风。采孤根而移植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373735_comment'></div>播元气之茂育。谅英灵之不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373735_comment'></div>逮乎霜飞文囿。风落秦川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373735_comment'></div>金茎炫耀于朝日。玉树青葱于霁天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373735_comment'></div>峨方壶之翠岛。列灵沼之清涟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373735_comment'></div>上郁松柽。下秀荪荃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373735_comment'></div>赩朱草与屈轶。华灵芝与宾连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373735_comment'></div>灵卉毕植。而嘉橘在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373735_comment'></div>冰心独润。金衣更鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373735_comment'></div>天汉之华星焜耀。阆风之珠树粲然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373735_comment'></div>香若团于野露。色疑炫于江烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373735_comment'></div>既而大官献新。奇果列筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373735_comment'></div>非厥包之自远。何菲陋之莫传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373735_comment'></div>树隐方塘。比丹萍之初实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373735_comment'></div>盘映皎月。与赤瑛而共妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373735_comment'></div>东鄙孤臣。谬陈三事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373735_comment'></div>既乏和羹之用。犹沾可口之味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373735_comment'></div>并食不割。窃愧晏婴之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373735_comment'></div>捧之以拜。重感桓荣之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373735_comment'></div>庶不朽于雪霜。永酬恩于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373735_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1373735_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。秋冬之际，帝赐橘，李德裕撰赋并进呈。作品：《进瑞橘赋状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1373883' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373883' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373883?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进瑞橘赋状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373883")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373883_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373883'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373883'>今月十九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373883_comment'></div>圣恩赐臣朱橘三颗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373883_comment'></div>伏以远自湘山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373883_comment'></div>移根清籞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373883_comment'></div>蒙雨露之渥泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373883_comment'></div>庇日月之休光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373883_comment'></div>始发素荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373883_comment'></div>俄成丹实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373883_comment'></div>诚宜奉金华之宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373883_comment'></div>助玉食之甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373883_comment'></div>岂谓恩及贱微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373883_comment'></div>获观嘉瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373883_comment'></div>臣久参纶命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373883_comment'></div>常效雕虫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373883_comment'></div>仰荷皇慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373883_comment'></div>辄献小赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373883_comment'></div>轻黩宸扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373883_comment'></div>倍积兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373883_comment'></div>臣又伏见玄宗朝种柑结实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373883_comment'></div>宣付史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373883_comment'></div>祖宗故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373883_comment'></div>敢不奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373883_comment'></div>其赋谨随状上进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373883_comment'></div>臣不任感恩踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373883_comment'></div>谨奉状以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373883_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。秋冬之际，帝赐橘，李德裕撰状谢恩。作品：《谢所进瑞橘赋宣付史馆状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_1373915' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373915")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373915'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373915'>高品刘传奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373915_comment'></div>赐臣批示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373915_comment'></div>以臣所请宣示史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373915_comment'></div>特赐允从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373915_comment'></div>伏以橘性不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373915_comment'></div>楚词所载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373915_comment'></div>圣情封植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373915_comment'></div>禁篽结根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373915_comment'></div>此六合同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373915_comment'></div>九州共贯之应也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373915_comment'></div>玄宗朝种柑结实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373915_comment'></div>亦是乘太平之休气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373915_comment'></div>道德之仁风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373915_comment'></div>事协祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373915_comment'></div>实光册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373915_comment'></div>臣目睹佳瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373915_comment'></div>惭无润色之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373915_comment'></div>心感<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1373915", 1373915, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>元猷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373915_comment'></div>莫尽揄扬之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373915_comment'></div>岂谓天慈曲被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373915_comment'></div>特允微衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373915_comment'></div>击壤庸音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373915_comment'></div>获知于皇鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373915_comment'></div>雕虫薄技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373915_comment'></div>谬列于青编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373915_comment'></div>千古光荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373915_comment'></div>百生何幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373915_comment'></div>不任感恩踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373915_comment'></div>谨奉状陈谢以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1373915_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年11月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。十一月，李德裕奏请两京用户诸道悲田坊改为养病坊。作品：《论两京及诸道悲田坊状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_1373901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论两京及诸道悲田坊状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373901")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373901'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373901'>臣等闻恤贫宽疾。著于周典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373901_comment'></div>无告常饩。存于王制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373901_comment'></div>国家立悲田养病。置使专知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373901_comment'></div>开元五年。宰臣宋璟苏颋奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373901_comment'></div>所称悲田。乃关释教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373901_comment'></div>此是僧尼职掌。不合定使专知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373901_comment'></div>请令京兆按此分付其家。玄宗不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373901_comment'></div>至二十二年十月。断京城乞儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373901_comment'></div>悉令病坊收管。官以本钱收利以给之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373901_comment'></div>今缘诸道僧尼。尽已还俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373901_comment'></div>悲田坊无人主管。必恐病贫无告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373901_comment'></div>转致困穷。臣等商量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373901_comment'></div>缘悲田出于释教。并望更为养病坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373901_comment'></div>其两京及诸州。合于子录事耆年中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373901_comment'></div>拣一人有名行谨信为乡闾所称者。专令勾当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373901_comment'></div>其两京望给寺田十顷。大州镇望给田七顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373901_comment'></div>其他诸州。望委观察使量贫病多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373901_comment'></div>给田五顷三二顷。以充粥饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373901_comment'></div>如州镇有羡馀官钱。量与置本收利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373901_comment'></div>最为稳便。若可如此方圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373901_comment'></div>不在更望给田之限。各委长吏处置讫闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373901_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1373901_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年12月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。十二月，李德裕为星变陈乞，并请辞官。作品：《为星变陈乞状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十八。）</span><div id='poem_1373907' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373907_comment'></div>伏以谪见天文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373907_comment'></div>以警在位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373907_comment'></div>稽于前史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373907_comment'></div>皆有明徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373907_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373907_comment'></div>臣才非时须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373907_comment'></div>量乖公器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373907_comment'></div>因缘门荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373907_comment'></div>遂忝华资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373907_comment'></div>出入藩宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373907_comment'></div>已逾三纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373907_comment'></div>早负素餐之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373907_comment'></div>常愧周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373907_comment'></div>老无黄发之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373907_comment'></div>空窃高位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373907_comment'></div>夙夜思省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373907_comment'></div>冰炭在心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373907_comment'></div>近伏见荧惑顺行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373907_comment'></div>稍逼上相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373907_comment'></div>实惧天谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373907_comment'></div>以致身灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373907_comment'></div>武德七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373907_comment'></div>荧惑犯左执法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373907_comment'></div>右仆射萧瑀逊位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373907_comment'></div>贞观十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373907_comment'></div>荧惑犯上相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373907_comment'></div>左仆射高士廉逊位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373907_comment'></div>国史之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373907_comment'></div>此例至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373907_comment'></div>臣人微才轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373907_comment'></div>位忝上相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373907_comment'></div>倘冒恩宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373907_comment'></div>犹自怀安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373907_comment'></div>忽至颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373907_comment'></div>必伤元化。<div id='poem_sentence_37_1373907_comment'></div>尽礼事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373907_comment'></div>志实贯于冰雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373907_comment'></div>所虑物忌其满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373907_comment'></div>天与之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373907_comment'></div>跼蹐兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373907_comment'></div>不知所据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373907_comment'></div>伏望圣慈察臣单绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373907_comment'></div>海内孤根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373907_comment'></div>百口童蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373907_comment'></div>仰臣覆露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373907_comment'></div>一门宗祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373907_comment'></div>须臣主持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373907_comment'></div>特免上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373907_comment'></div>退归私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373907_comment'></div>所冀中衢击壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373907_comment'></div>复比于尧君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373907_comment'></div>旧里悬车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373907_comment'></div>不惭于汉相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373907_comment'></div>臣不任祈恩皇迫之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1373907_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年12月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。十二月，李德裕辞官不允，撰状谢恩。作品：《会昌五年十二月三日宰相对后就宅宣示谢恩不许让官表状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_1373921' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373921'>今日奉宣。纵累陈情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373921_comment'></div>终不允遂者。臣荏苒六年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373921_comment'></div>徒竭丹款。竟无一善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373921_comment'></div>稍补皇猷。腼冒难居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373921_comment'></div>屡祈退免。面请则每虑烦渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373921_comment'></div>口陈则莫尽肺肝。频以恳诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373921_comment'></div>托于同列。因臣不对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373921_comment'></div>得为上闻。岂意天慈矜愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373921_comment'></div>圣德念旧。尚取涓尘之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373921_comment'></div>未徵尸素之尤。累降近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373921_comment'></div>再宣慈旨。寔恐罄蜉蝣之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373921_comment'></div>无以报天。所冀尽犬马之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373921_comment'></div>惟知恋主。仰戴皇泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373921_comment'></div>倍切微衷。不任荷恩兢惕之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373921_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1373921_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年12月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。十二月，李德裕撰状谢恩问疾。作品：《谢恩问疾状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_1373925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢恩问疾状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1373925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373925'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373925'>高品王克谏至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373925_comment'></div>奉宣圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373925_comment'></div>卿小有违裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373925_comment'></div>昨日于延英面奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373925_comment'></div>乞假将息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373925_comment'></div>实疚余怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373925_comment'></div>宜善颐养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373925_comment'></div>当就痊平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373925_comment'></div>所要内库食物及药物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373925_comment'></div>无致嫌疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373925_comment'></div>但具数奏来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373925_comment'></div>即令宣赐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373925_comment'></div>臣缘常服冷药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373925_comment'></div>十五馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373925_comment'></div>属蒲柳年侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373925_comment'></div>衰惫日甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373925_comment'></div>风毒脚气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373925_comment'></div>往往上冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373925_comment'></div>顷刻之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373925_comment'></div>心腹闷痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373925_comment'></div>饭食至少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373925_comment'></div>筋力渐羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373925_comment'></div>所以冒昧上陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373925_comment'></div>请三数日在家将息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373925_comment'></div>陛下恩深覆育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373925_comment'></div>轸父母唯疾之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373925_comment'></div>德过生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373925_comment'></div>念犬马至微之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373925_comment'></div>恤问稠叠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373925_comment'></div>沉痼顿痊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373925_comment'></div>臣食物未得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373925_comment'></div>更无所阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373925_comment'></div>天慈下降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373925_comment'></div>感极涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373925_comment'></div>不任感恩兢惕之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1373925_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年12月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。十一月、十二月，李德裕奏状驳斥白敏中、韦弘质等云其专权。作品：《论侍讲奏孔子门徒事状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十。）</span>《论朝廷事体状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十。）</span><div id='poem_1373964' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373964' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373964?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论侍讲奏孔子门徒事状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373964")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373964_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373964'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373964'>右。今月十三日于延英殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373964_comment'></div>陛下谓臣等云。侍讲称孔子其徒三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373964_comment'></div>亦可谓之朋党。臣等自元和以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373964_comment'></div>尝闻此语。幸因圣慈下问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373964_comment'></div>辄敢覼缕而言。西汉刘向云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373964_comment'></div>昔孔子与颜回子贡更相称誉。不为朋党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373964_comment'></div>禹稷与皋陶转相汲引。不为比周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373964_comment'></div>何则。忠于为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373964_comment'></div>无邪心也。臣尝以鲧共工驩兜与舜禹杂处尧朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373964_comment'></div>共工驩兜则为党。舜禹则不为党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373964_comment'></div>何者。共工驩兜相与比周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373964_comment'></div>迭为掩蔽也。如贤人君子则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373964_comment'></div>忠于国则同心。闻于义则同志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373964_comment'></div>退而各自行已。不可交以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373964_comment'></div>是以赵宣子随会继而纳谏。司马侯叔向比以事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373964_comment'></div>不为党也。公孙宏每与汲黯请间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373964_comment'></div>黯先发之。宏推其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373964_comment'></div>武帝所言皆听。汲黯虽与公孙宏并进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373964_comment'></div>然庭诰云。齐人少情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373964_comment'></div>讥其布被为诈。则知先发后继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373964_comment'></div>不为党矣。国史称太宗尝与房玄龄图事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373964_comment'></div>则曰非杜如晦莫能筹之。及杜如晦至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373964_comment'></div>竟推玄龄之策。此又同心图国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373964_comment'></div>不为党也。何者为党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373964_comment'></div>汉书称朱博陈咸相为腹心。背公死党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373964_comment'></div>东汉周福房植。各以其党相倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373964_comment'></div>议论相轧。故汉朝朋党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373964_comment'></div>始于甘陵二部。及其甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373964_comment'></div>谓之钩党。继受诛夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373964_comment'></div>以王制言之。非不幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373964_comment'></div>魏朝何晏丁谧。依附曹爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373964_comment'></div>祖尚浮虚。使有魏风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373964_comment'></div>由兹大坏。此皆为朋党也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373964_comment'></div>略举数节。以明其类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373964_comment'></div>至于历代朋党。不可殚言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373964_comment'></div>仲尼知季路之不免。子游识子张之未仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373964_comment'></div>曾子罪卜商丧亲无闻。夫子罪宰我钻燧为久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373964_comment'></div>恶既不掩。善固宜称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373964_comment'></div>此又不可为党也。班固称周室既微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373964_comment'></div>由是列国公子。魏有信陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373964_comment'></div>赵有平原。齐有孟尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373964_comment'></div>楚有春申。抵掌而游谈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373964_comment'></div>以四豪为称首。于是背公死党之议成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373964_comment'></div>守职奉上之义废矣。此四豪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373964_comment'></div>各有门客三千。而谓之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373964_comment'></div>仲尼三千。则不为党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373964_comment'></div>盖仲尼之徒。惟务仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373964_comment'></div>不以爵禄为贵。四豪之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373964_comment'></div>惟务谲诈。尝以势力相高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373964_comment'></div>今侍讲欲以奔走权势之徒。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1373964", 1373964, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>攫拿</span>名利之辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373964_comment'></div>比方孔门上哲。实罔圣聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373964_comment'></div>臣未知元和以来。所谓党者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373964_comment'></div>为国乎。为身乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373964_comment'></div>若以为国。则随会叔向汲黯房玄龄之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373964_comment'></div>可得行矣。不必聚党成群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373964_comment'></div>以臣观之。今所谓党者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373964_comment'></div>进则诬善蔽忠。附下罔上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373964_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_57_1373964", 1373964, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>歙歙</span>相是。态不可容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373964_comment'></div>退则车马驰驱。唯务权势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373964_comment'></div>聚于私室。朝夜合谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373964_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1373964", 1373964, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>清美</span>之官。尽须其党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373964_comment'></div>华要之选。不在他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373964_comment'></div>阴附者羽翼自生。中立者抑压不进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373964_comment'></div>孔门颜冉。岂有是哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373964_comment'></div>陛下以此察之。则奸伪自见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373964_comment'></div>臣恐更有小人。妄陈此说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373964_comment'></div>辄举事例。庶裨聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373964_comment'></div>伏望陛下留臣此状。时赐览阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373964_comment'></div>所冀小臣瞽说。免惑圣心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373964_comment'></div>臣不任恳激之至。谨录奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373964_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1373964_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373965' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373965?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论朝廷事体状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373965")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373965'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373965'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373965_comment'></div>臣等每蒙延英殿召对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373965_comment'></div>获闻圣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373965_comment'></div>常欲朝廷尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373965_comment'></div>臣下肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373965_comment'></div>此则是陛下深究为理之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373965_comment'></div>伏以管仲古之大贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373965_comment'></div>明于理国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373965_comment'></div>其言可以为百代之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373965_comment'></div>管仲云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373965_comment'></div>凡军国之重器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373965_comment'></div>莫重于令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373965_comment'></div>令重则君尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373965_comment'></div>君尊则国安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373965_comment'></div>故安国在乎尊君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373965_comment'></div>尊君在乎行令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373965_comment'></div>明君察于理人之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373965_comment'></div>莫要于令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373965_comment'></div>故曰亏令者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373965_comment'></div>益令者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373965_comment'></div>不行令者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373965_comment'></div>留令者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373965_comment'></div>不从令者死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373965_comment'></div>五者死而无赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373965_comment'></div>又曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373965_comment'></div>令虽在上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373965_comment'></div>而论可与不可者在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373965_comment'></div>是上失其威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373965_comment'></div>下系于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373965_comment'></div>自太和以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373965_comment'></div>风俗大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373965_comment'></div>令出于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373965_comment'></div>非之者在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373965_comment'></div>此弊不除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373965_comment'></div>无以理国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373965_comment'></div>韦宏质所论宰相不合兼领钱谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373965_comment'></div>臣等敢以事体闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373965_comment'></div>昔匡衡云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373965_comment'></div>所以为大臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373965_comment'></div>国家之股肱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373965_comment'></div>万姓所瞻仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373965_comment'></div>明王所慎择也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373965_comment'></div>传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373965_comment'></div>下轻其上爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373965_comment'></div>贱人图柄臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373965_comment'></div>则国家动摇而人不静矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373965_comment'></div>今韦宏质受人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1373965", 1373965, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>教导</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373965_comment'></div>辄献封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373965_comment'></div>则是贱人图柄臣矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373965_comment'></div>臣等又以萧望之是汉朝名儒重德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373965_comment'></div>为御史大夫奏云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373965_comment'></div>今首岁日月少光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373965_comment'></div>咎在臣等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373965_comment'></div>上以望之意轻丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373965_comment'></div>乃下侍中御史中丞诘问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373965_comment'></div>又贞观中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373965_comment'></div>监察御史陈师合上书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373965_comment'></div>人之思虑有限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373965_comment'></div>一人不可兼总数职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373965_comment'></div>太宗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373965_comment'></div>此人妄有毁谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373965_comment'></div>止欲离间我君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373965_comment'></div>流师合于岭表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373965_comment'></div>又贾谊云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373965_comment'></div>人主之尊譬如堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373965_comment'></div>群臣如陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373965_comment'></div>众庶如地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373965_comment'></div>故陛九级上廉远地则堂高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373965_comment'></div>陛无级廉近地则堂卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373965_comment'></div>亦由将相重则君尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373965_comment'></div>其势然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373965_comment'></div>如宰相有奸媒隐慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373965_comment'></div>则人人皆得上论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373965_comment'></div>至于制置职业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373965_comment'></div>固是人主之柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373965_comment'></div>非小人所得干议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373965_comment'></div>古者朝廷之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373965_comment'></div>各守其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373965_comment'></div>思不出位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373965_comment'></div>况韦宏质贱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373965_comment'></div>岂得以非所宜言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373965_comment'></div>上黩明主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373965_comment'></div>此是轻宰相矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1373965_comment'></div>后汉太学诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1373965_comment'></div>颇干时政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1373965_comment'></div>其时谓之处士横议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1373965_comment'></div>皆是乱风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1373965_comment'></div>深要惩绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1373965_comment'></div>伏望陛下知其邪计从朋党而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1373965_comment'></div>每事明察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1373965_comment'></div>遏绝将来之渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1373965_comment'></div>则朝廷安静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1373965_comment'></div>邪党自销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1373965_comment'></div>臣等不胜感愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1373965_comment'></div>辄具闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1373965_comment'></div>伏望特赐省览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1373965_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1373965_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年12月</a>　时李德裕在京为相。约十二月，李德裕奏请，除机密及诸镇奏请戎事、有司支遣钱粮等外，其他诸事应令中书舍人依故事商量。作品：《请复中书舍人故事状》<span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373972'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373972_comment'></div>伏见天宝以前中书舍人六员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373972_comment'></div>率由旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373972_comment'></div>前汉魏相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373972_comment'></div>好观故事。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进幽州纪圣功碑文状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373879")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373879'>奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373879_comment'></div>令臣撰述者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373879_comment'></div>伏以北狄强悍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373879_comment'></div>轻黩宸扆<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作严）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373879_comment'></div>不任惶越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373879_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1373879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。李德裕撰纪圣功碑，表彰幽州节度使张仲武讨杀回鹘乌介可汗。作品：《幽州纪圣功碑铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1374071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>幽州纪圣功碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374071")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1374071_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1374071'>幽州卢龙军帅检校尚书右仆射张公仲武。往年修献捷之礼。今岁有铭勋之请。二者君子韪之。岂不以诸侯有四夷之功。献其戎捷。春秋旧典也。宗周纳肃慎之贡。铭于楛矢。天子令德也。斯可以为元侯表。可以为后世法。圣上嘉其动而中礼。乃命宰臣采其元功。传于惇史。臣德裕乃敢飏言曰。夫兵者。所以除暴害也。爱人则恶其为害。禁暴则恶其为乱。虽睿智不杀。化之以神。至德允怀。招之以礼。然书有猾夏之戒。传有修刑之训。虞舜四罪。乃成大功。文王一怒。以至无侮。非德教之助欤。仁圣文武章天成功神德明道大孝皇帝熙我文典。焕乎光明。极象外之微。臻于至道。鼓天下之动。致于中和。虑必钩深。退而藏密。故能神机独照。伐未兆之谋。威光远震。制不羁之虏。当其时也。烽燧迭警。羽书狎至。人心大摇。群师沮气。皇帝以轩后之威神。汉高之大略。光武之雄断。魏祖之机权。合而用之。以定王业。此议臣所以不敢望于清光也。倬哉。天地应而品物生。君臣应而功业成。故龙跃而云从。鹤鸣而子和。方叔伐猃狁。蛮荆来威。安远击车师。西域振服。宜有良将。殿于朔边。张公礼阅战器。书成传癖。张仲孝友。子孺塞泉。流落不偶。光景未耀。明主雅闻奇志。持印而拜将军。遥推赤心。筑坛而命元帅。拔自雄武。授之蓟门。果能精诚奋发。策虑偪臆。千里献筹。一心忧国。则知龙颜善将。任人杰而不疑。日角好谋。叹敌国而强意。回鹘者。本北狄之裔也。或曰獯狁。或曰山戎。五帝所不能臣。三王所不能制。前史载之详矣。暨薛延陁之败也。酋帅吐迷度率众款塞。太宗幸灵武纳降。立回鹘部落。置瀚海都督。因我封殖。遂雄北方。代宗之戡内难也。叶护以射雕之士。亲护戎旌。亦由羌髳率师以翼周。北貊枭骑以助汉。既殄大憝。乃畴厥庸。特拜叶护司空。岁赐缯二万疋。厥后饰宗女以配之。立宫室以居之。其在京师也。瑶祠云构。甲第棋布。栋宇轮焕。衣冠缟素。交利者风偃。挟邪者景附。其翎侯贵种。则被我文绘。带我金犀。悦和音。厌珍膳。蝎蠹上国。百有馀年。既而桀骜无亲。天命不佑。僭侈极欲。神道恶盈。本国荐饥。畜产耗半。黠戛斯蹙因利乘便。遂焚龙庭。区落萧条。阴燐青荧。今之乌介可汗。亡逃失国。窃号沙漠。非我册命。自为假王。其来也。羡漫阴山。睥睨高阙。元塞之下。氛雾蔽天。质贵主以前驱。依大国而求援。或丐我米糒。救其饥人。或邀我甲兵。复其故地。外虽柔服。内有桀心。因行人致辞。徵呼韩故事。愿居光禄塞。急保受降城。其下有二部。曰赤心宰相那颉啜特勒。赤心者。天性忿鸷。戎马尤盛。初与名王嗢没斯首谋内附。俄而负力怙气。潜图厉阶。为嗢没斯所绐。诱以俱谒可汗。戮于帐下。其众大溃。东逼渔阳。上乃赐公玺书。授以方略。公以室韦悍亟之兵。近我边鄙。俾其侦逻。且御内侵。寻以徵役不供。为虏所败。由是介马数万。连亘幽陵。伏精甲于松樠。布穹庐于碛卤。散若飞鸟。止如长云。火燎于原。不可向迩。公激义气以虹贯。发精诚而石开。奇计兵权。密授髦俊。乃命介弟仲至与裨将游奉寰王如清左敌万李君庆张自荣高守素李志操。率锐兵三万。建旆而前。介冑雪照。戈矛林植。命以义殉。壮由师直。声隆隆而未泄。欲逐逐而不食。戢以听命。严而有威。公曰。险道倾仄。且驰且射。胡兵所以无敌也。致之平原。勒以方陈。我师可以逞志也。于是据于莽平。环以武刚。首尾蛇伸。左右翼张。轻骑既合。奇锋横骛。如摧枯株。如搏畜兔。摄詟者弗取。陆梁者皆仆。虏王侯贵人。计以千数。然后尽众服听。悉数系累。谷静山空。靡有孑遗。橐驼駃騠。风泽而散。旃墙罽幕。布野毕收。马牛几至于谷量。虏血殆同于川决。径路宝刀。祭天金人。奇货珍器。不可殚论。乃命从事李周瞳驰传上奏。又命牙门将周从玘继献戎俘。皇帝受而劳之。群臣毕贺。昔长平七征。骠骑六举。窦宪合氐羌之众。陈汤揽城郭之兵。或生灵减耗。士马物故。或邀功救罪。矫命专征。然犹告类上帝。荐功清庙。顾视二汉。不其恧欤。以公威动蛮貊。功在漏刻。因命为东面招抚回鹘使。先是奚契丹皆有虏使。监护其国。责以岁遗。且为汉谍。自回鹘啸聚。靡不鸱张。公命裨将石公绪等谕意两部。戮回鹘八百人。虽介子讨罪于龟兹。班超行诛于鄯部。未足俦也。回鹘又遣宣门将军等四十七人诡辞结欢。潜伺边隙。公密赂其下。尽得阴谋。且欲驰入五原。尽驱杂虏。公逗留其使。缓彼师期。竟得人病马瘏。缩衄而退。挫锐解纷。繄公善计。今鸟介自绝皇泽。莫敢近边。并丁令以图安。依康居而求活。尽徙馀种。屈意黑车。寄托远遁。流离饥冻。黑车亦倚其威重。迫胁诸戎。造谋藉兵。解仇交质。自谓约赍深入。汉将取而未期。渡幕轻留。王师往而不利。公以壮猷远驭。长计羁縻。不媮避嫌之便。终尽致敌之术。将时动而得隽。岂岁数而胜微。矧乎明主仗将帅为爪牙。视戎狄为鼠彘。方猎猛敌。不玩细娱。非周宣无以成召虎之勋。非汉宣无以听营平之计。勖哉上将。光我中兴。公前后受降三万人。特勒二人。可汗姊一人。都督外宰相四人。其他侯王骑将。不可备载。王褒以日逐归德。称为人瑞。班固以稽落荡寇。大振天声。孰若天子神武。百蛮振慑。乘其蹙困。临以兵锋。刈单于之旗。纳休屠之附。非万里之伐。无三年之勤。巍乎成功。辉焯后代。宜刻金石。以扬鸿休。铭曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1374071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374071'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374071'>太和之初，赤气宵兴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1374071'>开成之末，彤云暮凝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1374071'>异鸟南来，胡灭之徵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1374071'>北夷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1374071", 1374071, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>飙扫</span>，厥国土崩。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1374071'>逼迫迁徙，震我边鄙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1374071'>长蛇去穴，奔鲸失水。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1374071'>上都蓟门，兵连千里。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1374071'>曾不畏天，犹为骄子。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1374071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1374071'>丐我边谷，邀我王师。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1373908_comment'></div>送前件书并信物等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373908_comment'></div>已闻奏讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373908_comment'></div>臣素具恳诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373908_comment'></div>实非饰让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373908_comment'></div>臣登朝序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373908_comment'></div>垂三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373908_comment'></div>未曾为宰相撰碑所悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373908_comment'></div>盖缘雕虫薄技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373908_comment'></div>已忝荣名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373908_comment'></div>不愿鬻文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373908_comment'></div>更受财货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373908_comment'></div>比见文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373908_comment'></div>或已居重位。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1373908_comment'></div>只望酬报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373908_comment'></div>臣心鄙耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373908_comment'></div>所不乐闻。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1373908_comment'></div>敛取太过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373908_comment'></div>军乱之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373908_comment'></div>怨词颇甚。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1373908_comment'></div>文德迈于羲轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373908_comment'></div>武功高于周汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373908_comment'></div>河朔节将。<div id='poem_sentence_32_1373908_comment'></div>令知法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373908_comment'></div>臣忝居台铉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373908_comment'></div>过受殊恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373908_comment'></div>若不守廉隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373908_comment'></div>坐受厚赂。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。李德裕上状，论振武节度使李忠顺与其论回鹘事。作品：《进振武节度使李忠顺与臣状一道状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_1373873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>振武节度使李忠顺与臣状一道</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373873")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373873'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373873'>右。今日振武奏事官闾邱宏到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373873_comment'></div>云却收到河东没落官健杨惟清等二人。称回鹘可汗在天德北三百里已下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373873_comment'></div>臣昨日已见李思忠下军将阎禺。说思忠意缘朝廷册命黠戛斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373873_comment'></div>恐回鹘可汗必怀嫉妒。与诸小番合势遮截汉使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373873_comment'></div>请令汉兵且于天德住。待计会黠戛斯兵马迎接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373873_comment'></div>方可进发。今忽近天德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373873_comment'></div>已似有验。其边界事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373873_comment'></div>李思顺皆自有表进讫。李思顺别有状一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373873_comment'></div>称回鹘合禄哈等一人投降。赍得款云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373873_comment'></div>可汗见在兵只有一千五百人。衣甲约六七十领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373873_comment'></div>角有三只。鼓有四面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373873_comment'></div>每度与诸番打得羊马数亦至少。旋自分却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373873_comment'></div>据此通款。事皆诣实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373873_comment'></div>李忠顺疑蕃人诈妄。未敢奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373873_comment'></div>其别状谨封进上。伏望圣慈早加警备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373873_comment'></div>以戒不虞。臣此状请留中不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373873_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1373873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。李德裕撰状，论田肇、田群犯法事。作品：《论田群状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷十七。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　时李德裕在京为相。会昌中，李德裕撰《赠右卫将军李安静制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1373755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠右卫将军李安静制</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373755")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373755'>敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373755_comment'></div>昔班固有言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373755_comment'></div>何武王嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373755_comment'></div>区区以一篑障江河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373755_comment'></div>用殁其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373755_comment'></div>朕常以固作一代之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373755_comment'></div>非所以垂法劝后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373755_comment'></div>若观时以避祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373755_comment'></div>量力以图全。<div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374073")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374073_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374073'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374073'>惟神作镇中土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374073_comment'></div>据于西陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374073_comment'></div>积高炳灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374073_comment'></div>宅神明之奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374073_comment'></div>少阴协德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374073_comment'></div>成天地之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374073_comment'></div>恭闻烈祖玄宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374073_comment'></div>御历永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374073_comment'></div>祭必受福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374073_comment'></div>秘䃭昭赛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374073_comment'></div>金刻犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374073_comment'></div>近者阴泽稍愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374073_comment'></div>宿种未茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374073_comment'></div>精意才达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374073_comment'></div>甘液骤零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374073_comment'></div>既纾播种之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374073_comment'></div>巳获流根之润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374073_comment'></div>今因报德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374073_comment'></div>再竭至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374073_comment'></div>某缵奉丕图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374073_comment'></div>勤劳七载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374073_comment'></div>恭已思道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374073_comment'></div>岂敢怠荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374073_comment'></div>属黠虏南侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374073_comment'></div>震惊朔野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374073_comment'></div>兵烽一举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374073_comment'></div>毳幕皆焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374073_comment'></div>潞子婴儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374073_comment'></div>枭首魏阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374073_comment'></div>参墟叛将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374073_comment'></div>面缚垒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374073_comment'></div>成此武功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374073_comment'></div>无非幽赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374073_comment'></div>又以释氏之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374073_comment'></div>出于西夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374073_comment'></div>弃五常之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374073_comment'></div>绝三纲之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374073_comment'></div>殚竭财力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374073_comment'></div>耗蠹生人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374073_comment'></div>黜其异端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374073_comment'></div>以正王度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374073_comment'></div>庶可复古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374073_comment'></div>谅非近名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374073_comment'></div>属以忽于所慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374073_comment'></div>寒暑成疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374073_comment'></div>旷时且乖于勿药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374073_comment'></div>昧旦徒切于求衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374073_comment'></div>如某政教不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374073_comment'></div>永保宗庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374073_comment'></div>以安邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374073_comment'></div>所疾日瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374073_comment'></div>平复如旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374073_comment'></div>昔成汤自咎者六。<div class='inline' -----title
宁波（鄮县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7035fd74b34d4af590a4d59464aa632e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7035fd74b34d4af590a4d59464aa632e");'><span id='7035fd74b34d4af590a4d59464aa632e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=795')">792-795年</a>，6-9岁</div><div id='7035fd74b34d4af590a4d59464aa632e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=792&endYear=792')">792年</a>　父李吉甫被贬明州，李德裕随父至贬所。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=793&endYear=794')">793-794年</a>　父李吉甫任明州员外长史，李德裕随父居明州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　父李吉甫由明州员外长史迁为忠州刺史，夏，赴任，李德裕随父至忠州。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
忠县（临江）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='38529e5dcb2442818071a04c1effa508_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("38529e5dcb2442818071a04c1effa508");'><span id='38529e5dcb2442818071a04c1effa508_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=803')">795-803年</a>，9-17岁</div><div id='38529e5dcb2442818071a04c1effa508' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=795&endYear=795')">795年</a>　父李吉甫由明州员外长史迁为忠州刺史，李德裕随父居忠州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=796&endYear=800')">796-800年</a>　父李吉甫为忠州刺史，李德裕随父居忠州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=801&endYear=801')">801年</a>　父李吉甫因病罢忠州刺史，但仍住忠州，李德裕随父居忠州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=802&endYear=802')">802年</a>　父李吉甫本年除郴州刺史，因病未赴任，李德裕随父居忠州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　父李吉甫于本年夏赴任郴州刺史，七月，改授饶州刺史，约本年冬赴任，李德裕随父迁居。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
鄱阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='be0451a1a6e84d89b7d3c57a9dedf15c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("be0451a1a6e84d89b7d3c57a9dedf15c");'><span id='be0451a1a6e84d89b7d3c57a9dedf15c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=805')">803-805年</a>，17-19岁</div><div id='be0451a1a6e84d89b7d3c57a9dedf15c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=803&endYear=803')">803年</a>　父李吉甫于本年夏赴任郴州刺史，七月，改授饶州刺史，约本年冬赴任，李德裕随父迁居。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=804&endYear=804')">804年</a>　父李吉甫为饶州刺史，李德裕随父居饶州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=805&endYear=805')">805年</a>　父李吉甫为饶州刺史，李德裕随父居饶州。八月，李吉甫由饶州召入为考功郎中、知制诰，十二月，为中书舍人，充翰林学士。李德裕随父入京。<br /></div>
-----end

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=839&endYear=839')">839年</a>　李德裕在淮南节度使任。春，游孔融故台，得奇木，植于庭，作赋咏之。四月，加检校尚书左仆射。秋，赵嘏有诗献李德裕。作品：《金松赋并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。傅璇琮《李德裕年谱》又谓《金松赋》作于开成五年。）</span><div id='poem_1373731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金松赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（839年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373731")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373731_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373731'>广陵东南。有颜太师犹子旧宅。其地即孔北海故台。予因晚春夕景。命驾游眺。忽睹奇木。植于庭际。枝似柽松。叶如瞿麦。迫而察之。则翠叶金贯。粲然有光。访其名。曰金松。询其所来。得于台岭。乃就主人。求得一本。列于平泉。今闻封植得地。枝叶茂盛。叙其所自。作此赋焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373731'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373731'>青春已暮。白日将夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373731_comment'></div>经颜子之故巷。访孔公之旧宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373731_comment'></div>美珍木之在庭。得嘉名于樵客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373731_comment'></div>曩擢本于台岭。近徙根于檐隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373731_comment'></div>其柯肃肃。可比于贞松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373731_comment'></div>其叶纤纤。实侔于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1373731", 1373731, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>瞿麦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373731_comment'></div>风入叶而成韵。露垂柯而流液。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373731_comment'></div>不受命于严霜。谅同心于寒柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373731_comment'></div>含<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373731", 1373731, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>春霭</span>而葱茜。映夕阳而的皪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373731_comment'></div>疑翠尾之群翔。若金潭之旁射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373731_comment'></div>杂爽籁于篁竹。混晶光于瑶碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373731_comment'></div>奇树以垂珠而擅名。金松以潜㯋而莫觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373731_comment'></div>亦犹处子在于隐沦。奇才遗于草泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373731_comment'></div>我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1373731", 1373731, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>衡宇</span>。依山岑寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373731_comment'></div>类仲长之清旷。如萧宰之穷僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373731_comment'></div>托根此地。似在崖壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373731_comment'></div>殊橘柚之不迁。同甘棠之可惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373731_comment'></div>庶封植于园林。永爱玩而无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373731_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373731_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_30298_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　在扬州，春，作赋咏金松。作品：《金松赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。傅璇琮《李德裕年谱》又谓《金松赋并序》作于开成四年。）</span><div id='poem_1373731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金松赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（839年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373731")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373731_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373731'>广陵东南。有颜太师犹子旧宅。其地即孔北海故台。予因晚春夕景。命驾游眺。忽睹奇木。植于庭际。枝似柽松。叶如瞿麦。迫而察之。则翠叶金贯。粲然有光。访其名。曰金松。询其所来。得于台岭。乃就主人。求得一本。列于平泉。今闻封植得地。枝叶茂盛。叙其所自。作此赋焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373731'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373731'>青春已暮。白日将夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373731_comment'></div>经颜子之故巷。访孔公之旧宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373731_comment'></div>美珍木之在庭。得嘉名于樵客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373731_comment'></div>曩擢本于台岭。近徙根于檐隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373731_comment'></div>其柯肃肃。可比于贞松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373731_comment'></div>其叶纤纤。实侔于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1373731", 1373731, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>瞿麦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373731_comment'></div>风入叶而成韵。露垂柯而流液。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373731_comment'></div>不受命于严霜。谅同心于寒柏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373731_comment'></div>含<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373731", 1373731, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>春霭</span>而葱茜。映夕阳而的皪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373731_comment'></div>疑翠尾之群翔。若金潭之旁射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373731_comment'></div>杂爽籁于篁竹。混晶光于瑶碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373731_comment'></div>奇树以垂珠而擅名。金松以潜㯋而莫觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373731_comment'></div>亦犹处子在于隐沦。奇才遗于草泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373731_comment'></div>我有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1373731", 1373731, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>衡宇</span>。依山岑寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373731_comment'></div>类仲长之清旷。如萧宰之穷僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373731_comment'></div>托根此地。似在崖壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373731_comment'></div>殊橘柚之不迁。同甘棠之可惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373731_comment'></div>庶封植于园林。永爱玩而无斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373731_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373731_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: 太原

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=817&endYear=817')">817年</a>　约于本年，李德裕应张弘靖之辟，为河东节度使掌书记。本年，作《祭唐叔文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1374074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭唐叔文</a><span class='authorDate'>（817年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374074")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374074'>维元和十二年岁次丁酉六月己未朔二十一日已卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374074_comment'></div>河东节度使检校吏部尚书平章事张宏靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374074_comment'></div>敢昭告于晋唐叔之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374074_comment'></div>惟神娠母发祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374074_comment'></div>手文为信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374074_comment'></div>殪徒林之兕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374074_comment'></div>以启夏墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374074_comment'></div>受密须之鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374074_comment'></div>以疆戎索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374074_comment'></div>岂止削桐无戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374074_comment'></div>归禾有典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374074_comment'></div>宜在晋蕃育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374074_comment'></div>与周盛衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374074_comment'></div>况式瞻西山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374074_comment'></div>神灵是宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374074_comment'></div>每廷烟夜簇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374074_comment'></div>岚气朝隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374074_comment'></div>必肤寸而合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374074_comment'></div>油然以遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374074_comment'></div>蓄泄在我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374074_comment'></div>神宜主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374074_comment'></div>属淮雨为灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374074_comment'></div>粢盛将废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374074_comment'></div>是用率兹祀典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374074_comment'></div>以荣閟官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374074_comment'></div>伏愿降福蒸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374074_comment'></div>撤兹阴沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374074_comment'></div>俾三农有望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374074_comment'></div>万庾斯丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374074_comment'></div>永储牺牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374074_comment'></div>以答神贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374074_comment'></div>尚享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374074_comment'></div>余元和中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374074_comment'></div>掌记戎幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374074_comment'></div>时因晋祠止雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374074_comment'></div>太保高平公命余为此文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374074_comment'></div>尝对诸从事称赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374074_comment'></div>以为徵唐叔故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374074_comment'></div>迨无遗漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374074_comment'></div>今遇尚书博陵公移镇北都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374074_comment'></div>辄敢寄题庙宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374074_comment'></div>会昌四年三月十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374074_comment'></div>司徒兼门下侍郎平章事李德裕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1374074_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　李德裕在河东军幕，为河东节度使掌书记，本年代张弘靖撰进书画表。作品：《代高平公进书画状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span>《进玄宗马射图状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373951' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373951'>伏以前代帝王。多求遗逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373951_comment'></div>朝观夕览。取鉴于斯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1373951_comment'></div>前件书画。历代共宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373951_comment'></div>是称珍绝。其陆探微萧史图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373951_comment'></div>妙冠一时。名居上品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373951_comment'></div>所希睿鉴。别赐省览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373951_comment'></div></div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=818&endYear=818')">818年</a>　李德裕在河东军幕，为河东节度使掌书记。有诗赠僧人圆明上人。作品：《赠圆明上人》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷三。）</span><div id='poem_30205' /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_30205_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_30205'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30205'>今日导师闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_30205", 30205, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>佛慧</span>，始知前路化成<span "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>世氛</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30204'>饭色不应殊宝器，树香皆遣入禅薰。<div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_30280_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_30280'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9652, "poem_allusion_30280")'>羊公</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_30280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30280'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30280'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9652, "poem_sentence_0_30280")'>羊公</span>追胜概，兹地暂逍遥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30280'>风景同南岘，丹青见北朝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30280'>石渠清夏气，高树激鲜飙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30280'>念法珍禽集，闻轻醉象调。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30280'>偶分甘露味，偏觉众香饶<span class='inlineComment2'>（便食僧饭，故云）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_30280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_30280'>为问毗城<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作田）</span>内，馀薰几日销。<div id='poem_sentence_5_30280_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_30280'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_30280_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=819&endYear=819')">819年</a>　李德裕在河东军幕，为河东节度使掌书记。五月，随张弘靖入朝，除监察御史。作品：《掌书记厅壁记》文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1374001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>掌书记厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（819年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374001")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374001'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374001'>续汉书百官志称三公及大将军皆有记室。主上表章报书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374001_comment'></div>虽列于上宰之庭。然本为从军之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374001_comment'></div>故杨雄称军旅之际。飞书驰檄用枚皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374001_comment'></div>非夫天机殊捷。学源浚发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374001_comment'></div>含思而九流委输。挥毫而万象骏奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374001_comment'></div>如庖丁提刃。为之满志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374001_comment'></div>师文鼓瑟。效不可穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374001_comment'></div>则不能称是职也。昔安丰侯窦融徵还京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374001_comment'></div>光武问曰。所上表章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374001_comment'></div>谁与参之。融曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374001_comment'></div>皆从事班彪所为。及窦宪贵宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374001_comment'></div>班固傅毅之徒。皆置之戎幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374001_comment'></div>以典文章。宪邸文章之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374001_comment'></div>冠于当代。魏氏以陈琳阮瑀管记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374001_comment'></div>自东汉以后。文才高名之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374001_comment'></div>未有不由于是选。其简才之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374001_comment'></div>亦金马石渠之亚。况河东精甲十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374001_comment'></div>提封千里。半杂胡骍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374001_comment'></div>遥制边朔。惟师旅之威容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374001_comment'></div>为列藩之仪表。典兹羽檄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374001_comment'></div>代有英髦。间者吴少微富嘉谟王翰孙逖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374001_comment'></div>咸有制作存于是邦。其所不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374001_comment'></div>盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1374001", 1374001, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>阙如</span>也。暨太尉临淮王总节制之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374001_comment'></div>德裕叔父尝与斯职。寻以才识英妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374001_comment'></div>肃宗召拜监察御史。厥后仆射高贞公今河阳节度令狐公以人文掌宸翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374001_comment'></div>国子司业郑公给事河南尹杜公以才华登贵仕。继斯躅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374001_comment'></div>不亦盛欤。丙申岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374001_comment'></div>丞相高平公始自枢衡以膺谋帅。以右拾遗杜君为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1374001", 1374001, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>主记</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374001_comment'></div>明主惜其忠规。复拜旧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374001_comment'></div>寻参内庭视草之列。次用殿中侍御史崔君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374001_comment'></div>德裕获接崔君之后。文学空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374001_comment'></div>才术莫逮。继清尘于吾祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374001_comment'></div>挹芬烈于前贤。先是庑廊之下有丰碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374001_comment'></div>纪其名氏而不书职业。今再刊斯记于本署西垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374001_comment'></div>以高平公统戎为始。元和十四年四月十一日记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374001_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1374001_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
镇江（丹徒）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='abaae4b8d8cc47feaeee422601093cba_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("abaae4b8d8cc47feaeee422601093cba");'><span id='abaae4b8d8cc47feaeee422601093cba_link'
