href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=822&endYear=822')">822年</a>　任润州刺史、浙西观察使。辟李蟾为观察判官，辟郑亚为幕府从事。本年在润州纳徐盼为妾。作品：《丞相邹平公新置资福院记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。赵明诚《金石录》卷九谓本年李德裕作《题怪石诗》，诗已佚。）</span><div id='poem_1374002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374002?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丞相邹平公新置资福院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（822年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374002")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374002'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374002'>夫威凤之炳然。非海晏则不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374002_comment'></div>卿云之蔼然。非气和则不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374002_comment'></div>故君子藏器抱璞。含忠毓德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374002_comment'></div>不遭遇其时。则光名不𣈫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374002_comment'></div>是以干木之退也。高于千乘君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374002_comment'></div>曼容之仕也。止于六百石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374002_comment'></div>先仆射佩虎符而知足。视蝉冕而蔑如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374002_comment'></div>由斯志矣。先仆射苞文武之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374002_comment'></div>有清直之德。良玉美润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374002_comment'></div>徒蓄宝于荆岑。乔木幽深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374002_comment'></div>不呈材于廊庙。知者所以叹息也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374002_comment'></div>丞相邹平公钟是馀庆。为唐宝臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374002_comment'></div>公天挺奇表。角犀特秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374002_comment'></div>居五岳也。禀太华削成之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374002_comment'></div>方四时也。得清秋爽朗之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374002_comment'></div>森子戟以耀㯋。粲圭璋而洞照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374002_comment'></div>盖人之桀欤。宪宗皇帝以神武之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374002_comment'></div>垦除菑害。睿虑澹以泉默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374002_comment'></div>英威赫而电断。奇权秘计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374002_comment'></div>皆中诏决之。参宸算者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374002_comment'></div>惟公与二三髦士。揣摩润色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374002_comment'></div>繄公称首。既平淮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374002_comment'></div>荡齐寇。四罪咸服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374002_comment'></div>八表晏然。虽则武力之拘原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374002_comment'></div>亦由谋臣之决策。洎今上之宅忧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374002_comment'></div>衮龙未袭。向明未位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374002_comment'></div>召公于东宫含春殿。歔欷前席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374002_comment'></div>付以大柄。公乃请偃武论道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374002_comment'></div>与天下休息。上若涉水而得舟楫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374002_comment'></div>驭马而有衔辔。始拜言以命咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374002_comment'></div>即其时而相说。君臣之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374002_comment'></div>古无俦也。公之为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374002_comment'></div>贞以制动。平以称物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374002_comment'></div>其志在于识相体宏。简易而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374002_comment'></div>尝以为用京房之法。则烦碎而乱理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374002_comment'></div>听啬夫之辨。则捷给而伤化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374002_comment'></div>由是遵坦夷之路。窒邪枉之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374002_comment'></div>不勤人以务远。耻竭泽以言利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374002_comment'></div>矧夫洞虚明之境。应必以诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374002_comment'></div>端不言之蹊。孰不归我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374002_comment'></div>故奉圣者称公为良相焉。公之趋丹戺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374002_comment'></div>侍紫垣。名冠近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374002_comment'></div>宠加赠典。先仆射自珥貂而升左揆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374002_comment'></div>先夫人由赵郡而启大国。金印石窌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374002_comment'></div>当代荣之。建中初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374002_comment'></div>先仆射以柱下史参梓潼军计。典昌荣二部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374002_comment'></div>益部之内。有林居一廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1374002_comment'></div>庾氏诛茅。始伤于寄寓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1374002_comment'></div>仲长树果。终见于繁蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1374002_comment'></div>公年才佩觿。志拾青紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1374002_comment'></div>方覃思于经籍。未驰骛于文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1374002_comment'></div>游焉息焉。必在于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1374002_comment'></div>及钟家难。乃入为官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1374002_comment'></div>暨韦太尉镇是邦也。公释褐从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1374002_comment'></div>在宾幄之间。逮兹抗戎旌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1374002_comment'></div>佩相印。曾未一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1374002_comment'></div>继为三公。下车逾月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1374002_comment'></div>访于旧馆。邵伯之树未剪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374002_comment'></div>武侯之庐犹在。于公邑里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374002_comment'></div>遂见高车。龙骧门闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1374002_comment'></div>竟容长戟。公瞻构洒泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1374002_comment'></div>循陔永思。以为徵坏壁者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1374002_comment'></div>夫子之居尚毁。固朽宅者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1374002_comment'></div>如来之乘斯远。孰若归于净土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1374002_comment'></div>环以香林。乃购之于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1374002_comment'></div>以为精舍。又以桑门之上首者七人居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1374002_comment'></div>所以證迷途而资夙植也。殿堂层立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1374002_comment'></div>轩房四柱。镕金作绘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1374002_comment'></div>髣髴诸天。况乎蜀山葱茜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1374002_comment'></div>下临于雉堞。锦江明灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1374002_comment'></div>近缭于郊坰。红树倚槛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1374002_comment'></div>青蕖傍砌。海雏乍来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1374002_comment'></div>灵草长秀。彼之听和音者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1374002_comment'></div>不惟于寂虑。闻异香者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1374002_comment'></div>自入于禅薰。公之孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1374002_comment'></div>永代作则。岂止何充之宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1374002_comment'></div>独入檀那。将与文公之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1374002_comment'></div>俱为不朽。某藐焉孤生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1374002_comment'></div>流落于代。辱公感旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1374002_comment'></div>遂不见遗。爰自内庭升台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374002_comment'></div>居视草之列。二三年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1374002_comment'></div>位阶先达。由是议人伦者归公之盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1374002_comment'></div>不陪密坐。骤变寒暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1374002_comment'></div>迂悬榻之念。忝授简之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1374002_comment'></div>且尝典纶綍。获备官寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1374002_comment'></div>报德不让。惧斯文之阙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1374002_comment'></div>长庆二年十月二十三日。朝议大夫御史中丞上柱国赞皇县开国男食邑三百户赐紫金鱼袋李德裕撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1374002_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_87_1374002_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。在任期间，注意改革旧俗。四月，李德裕撰文记访求张志和《渔歌》事。九月，元稹由同州刺史改为越州刺史、浙东观察使，赴任途中，与李德裕会晤于润州，有诗唱和。李德裕在浙西，辟刘三复为掌书记。作品：《玄真子渔歌记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。此年，与元稹在润州会晤，有诗唱和，元诗存，李诗佚。）</span><div id='poem_1374006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374006?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元真子渔歌记</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374006")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374006_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374006'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374006'>德裕顷在内庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374006_comment'></div>伏睹宪宗皇帝写真求访元真子渔歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374006_comment'></div>叹不能致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374006_comment'></div>余世与元真子有旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374006_comment'></div>早闻其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374006_comment'></div>又感明主赏异爱才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374006_comment'></div>见思如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374006_comment'></div>每梦想遗迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374006_comment'></div>今乃获之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374006_comment'></div>如遇良宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374006_comment'></div>于戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374006_comment'></div>渔父贤而名隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374006_comment'></div>鸱夷智而功高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374006_comment'></div>未若元真隐而名彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374006_comment'></div>显而无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374006_comment'></div>不穷不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374006_comment'></div>其严光之比欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374006_comment'></div>处二子之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374006_comment'></div>诚有裕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374006_comment'></div>长庆三年甲寅岁夏四月辛未日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374006_comment'></div>润州刺史兼御史大夫李德裕记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1374006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=823&endYear=823')">823年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。年底，撰文论丧葬礼制。作品：《论丧葬逾制疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》文集补遗。）</span><div id='poem_1373818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论丧葬踰制疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（823年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373818")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373818'>应百姓厚葬。及于道途盛陈祭奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373818_comment'></div>兼设音乐等。闾里编氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373818_comment'></div>罕知教义。生无孝养可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373818_comment'></div>没以厚葬相矜。器仗僭差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373818_comment'></div>祭奠奢靡。仍以音乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373818_comment'></div>荣其送终。或结社相资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373818_comment'></div>或息利自办。生产储蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373818_comment'></div>为之皆空。习以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373818_comment'></div>不敢自废。人户<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373818", 1373818, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>贫破</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373818_comment'></div>抑此之由。今百姓等丧葬祭奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373818_comment'></div>并请不许以金银锦绣为饰。其陈设乐音者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373818_comment'></div>及葬物稍涉僭越者。并勒毁除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373818_comment'></div>结社之类。任充死亡丧服粮食等用使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373818_comment'></div>如有人犯者。并准法律科罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373818_comment'></div>其官吏已上不能纠察。请加惩责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373818_comment'></div>仍请委出使郎官御史察访。台司伏请令文及故实不载者令更条检校官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373818_comment'></div>令文不载令请检校官一品二品请同五品。五品已下并请同九品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373818_comment'></div>如有曾任正官。依本官品第仪则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373818_comment'></div>其准敕试官亦仝九品仪。如升朝官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373818_comment'></div>请据本官品第升降□例。凡丧皆有品第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373818_comment'></div>恐或无知之人。妄称官秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373818_comment'></div>自今以后。除升朝官见任官亡殁外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373818_comment'></div>馀官去事前五日。须除将告语或敕牒于本巡使呈过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373818_comment'></div>判押文状。行人方可供应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373818_comment'></div>佐命殊功。当朝立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373818_comment'></div>名传遐迩。特敕优旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373818_comment'></div>准会典例。本品数十分加三分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373818_comment'></div>不得别为华饰。右具本朝旧本例如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373818_comment'></div>今后令两巡使祗据官秩品级与判状。其馀一物已上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373818_comment'></div>不得增加。兼勒驱使官与金吾司并门司同力辖钤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373818_comment'></div>如有大段踰越。即请据罪科断行人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373818_comment'></div>兼不得追领。丧葬之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373818_comment'></div>别有勘责。奉敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373818_comment'></div>如过制度。不许尺寸事数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373818_comment'></div>其假赁行人徒二年。丧葬之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373818_comment'></div>即不问罪。仍付所司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373818_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1373818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。正月壬申，穆宗因服方药暴卒，敬宗即位。七月，李德裕上疏言罢进事，有《奏银妆具状》。九月，复上疏。十二月，李德裕上疏言请禁泗州度僧尼。元稹本年有诗寄李德裕。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏银妆具状</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373953")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373953'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373953'>臣有生多幸。获遇昌期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373953_comment'></div>受寄名藩。每忧旷职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373953_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1373953", 1373953, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>孜孜</span>夙夜。上报国恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373953_comment'></div>数年以来。灾旱相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373953_comment'></div>罄竭微虑。粗免流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373953_comment'></div>物力之间。尚未完复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373953_comment'></div>臣伏准今年三月初三日赦文。常贡之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373953_comment'></div>不令进献。此则陛下至圣至明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373953_comment'></div>细微洞照。一恐聚敛之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373953_comment'></div>缘以成奸。彫瘵之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373953_comment'></div>不胜其弊。上宏俭约之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373953_comment'></div>下敷恻悯之仁。万国群氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373953_comment'></div>鼓舞未息。昨奉五月二十三日诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373953_comment'></div>令访茅山真隐。将欲师处谦守约之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373953_comment'></div>敦务实去华之美。虽无人上塞丹诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373953_comment'></div>实率土已偃元风。岂止微臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373953_comment'></div>独怀忭贺。况进献之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373953_comment'></div>臣子之常心。虽有敕文不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373953_comment'></div>亦合竭力上贡。惟臣当道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373953_comment'></div>素号富饶。近年以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373953_comment'></div>比旧则异。贞元中李锜任观察使日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373953_comment'></div>职兼盐铁。百姓除实出<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1373953", 1373953, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>榷酒钱</span>外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373953_comment'></div>更置官酤。两重纳榷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373953_comment'></div>获利至厚。又访闻当时进奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373953_comment'></div>亦兼用盐铁羡馀。贡献繁多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373953_comment'></div>自后莫及。至薛苹任观察使时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373953_comment'></div>又奏置榷酒。上供之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373953_comment'></div>颇有馀财。军用之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373953_comment'></div>实为优足。自元和十四年七月三日敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373953_comment'></div>却停榷酤。又准元和十五年五月七日赦文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373953_comment'></div>诸州羡馀。不令送使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373953_comment'></div>惟有留使钱五十万贯支用。犹欠十三万贯不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373953_comment'></div>须自诸事节用。百计补填。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373953_comment'></div>经费之中。未免悬阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373953_comment'></div>至于绫纱等物。犹是本州所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373953_comment'></div>易于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1373953", 1373953, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>方圆</span>。金银不出当州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373953_comment'></div>皆须外处回市。去年二月中奉宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373953_comment'></div>令进<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1373953", 1373953, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>盝子</span>。计用银九千四百馀两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373953_comment'></div>其时贮备都无二三百两。乃诸头收市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373953_comment'></div>此时亦稍优饶。悉力上供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373953_comment'></div>幸免败阙。昨又奉宣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373953_comment'></div>令进妆具二十件。计用银一万三千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373953_comment'></div>金一百三十两。寻令并合圣节进奉金银造成两具进纳讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373953_comment'></div>今差人于淮南收买。旋到旋造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373953_comment'></div>星夜不辍。竭力营求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373953_comment'></div>深忧不迨。臣若因循不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373953_comment'></div>则负陛下任使之恩。若分外诛求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373953_comment'></div>又累陛下慈俭之德。伏乞陛下览前件榷酤及诸州羡馀之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373953_comment'></div>则知臣军用短阙。本末有由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373953_comment'></div>伏料陛下见臣论奏。必赐详悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373953_comment'></div>知臣竭爱君守官之节。尽纳忠罄直之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373953_comment'></div>伏乞圣慈宣令宰臣商议。何以遣臣得上不违宣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373953_comment'></div>下不阙军储。不困疲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373953_comment'></div>不招物议。前后诏敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373953_comment'></div>并可遵承。辄冒宸严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373953_comment'></div>敢陈丹恳。无任战汗之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373953_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1373953_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。七月，李德裕上疏言罢进事，九月，复上疏，有《奏缭绫状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373954'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373954'>臣昨缘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1373954", 1373954, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>宣索</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373954_comment'></div>已具军资岁计及近年物力闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373954_comment'></div>伏料圣慈必垂省览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373954_comment'></div>又奉诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373954_comment'></div>令织定罗纱袍段及可幅盘绦缭绫等一千匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373954_comment'></div>伏读诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373954_comment'></div>倍增惶灼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373954_comment'></div>臣伏见太宗朝台使至凉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373954_comment'></div>见名鹰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373954_comment'></div>讽李大亮令献之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373954_comment'></div>大亮密表陈诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373954_comment'></div>太宗赐诏报云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373954_comment'></div>有臣如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373954_comment'></div>朕<span class='inlineComment2'>（一本有复字）</span>何忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373954_comment'></div>再三嘉叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373954_comment'></div>事载史书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373954_comment'></div>又玄宗令中使于江南采鵁鶄诸鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373954_comment'></div>汴州刺史倪若水抗表陈论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373954_comment'></div>玄宗亦赐诏嘉纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373954_comment'></div>其鸟即时皆放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373954_comment'></div>又令皇甫询于益州织半臂背子琵琶釬拨镂牙合子等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373954_comment'></div>苏颋不奉诏书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373954_comment'></div>辄自停织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373954_comment'></div>玄宗皆不加罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373954_comment'></div>忻纳所陈。<div id='poem_sentence_35_1373954_comment'></div>侯伯有位之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373954_comment'></div>无或弃予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373954_comment'></div>谓不可谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373954_comment'></div>其有违道伤理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373954_comment'></div>徇欲怀安。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373954_comment'></div>增光祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373954_comment'></div>不尽忠规。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373954_comment'></div>文彩珍奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373954_comment'></div>只合圣躬自服。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=824&endYear=824')">824年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。十二月，李德裕上疏言请禁泗州度僧尼。元稹本年有诗寄李德裕。作品：《王智兴度僧尼状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373956' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373956' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373956?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王智兴度僧尼状</a><span class='authorDate'>（824年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373956")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_1373956'>王智兴于所属泗州置僧尼戒坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373956_comment'></div>自去冬于江淮以南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373956_comment'></div>所在悬榜招置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373956_comment'></div>江淮自元和二年后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373956_comment'></div>不敢私度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373956_comment'></div>闻泗州有坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373956_comment'></div>户有三丁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373956_comment'></div>必令一丁落发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373956_comment'></div>意欲规避王徭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373956_comment'></div>影庇资产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373956_comment'></div>自正月以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373956_comment'></div>落发者无虑数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373956_comment'></div>臣今于蒜山渡点其过者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373956_comment'></div>一日一百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373956_comment'></div>勘问惟十四人是旧人沙弥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373956_comment'></div>馀是苏常百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373956_comment'></div>亦无本州<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1373956", 1373956, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>文凭</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373956_comment'></div>寻已勒还本贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373956_comment'></div>访闻泗州置坛次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373956_comment'></div>凡瞢夫到者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373956_comment'></div>人纳二缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373956_comment'></div>给牒即回。<div id='poem_sentence_28_1373956_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。二月，李德裕上《丹扆六箴》以规谏敬宗。<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。李德裕于洛阳伊川建山庄（即后之平泉山庄），本年寄诗与元稹，求青田胎化鹤。李德裕于今明年内与元稹、刘禹锡、白居易有诗唱和，刘禹锡后来编为《吴蜀集》。李德裕于润州创建甘露寺。作品：《近于伊川卜山居，将命者画图而至，欣然有感，聊赋此诗，兼寄上浙东元相公大夫，使求青田胎化鹤》<span id='poem_sentence_12_30279'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_30279_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。李德裕霜夜听小童吹觱篥歌有感作诗，与白居易等唱和。作品：《霜夜对月听小童薛阳陶吹觱篥歌》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《全唐诗》卷四七五，残存六句。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=825&endYear=825')">825年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。作述梦诗。作品：《述梦诗四十韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷三。此年，李德裕作《晚下北固山，喜径松成阴，怅然怀古，偶题临江亭》，诗已佚。）</span><div id='poem_30281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>述梦诗四十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（825年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30281")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_30281_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_30281'>去年七月，溽暑之后，骊降。其夕五鼓未尽，凉风凄然，始觉枕簟微冷。俄而假寐斯熟，忽梦赋诗怀禁掖旧游，凡四十馀韵。初觉尚忆其半，经时悉已遗忘。今属岁杪无事，羁怀多感，因缀其所遗，为〈述梦诗〉，以寄一二僚友。</div><div id='poem_preface_30281_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_sentence_39_30281_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_30281'></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_30281_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_30281'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_30281_0'>⑴ 时西戎乞盟，幽镇二帅，束身赴阙，海内无事累月。诗称赤豹黄罴，盖蛮貊之贡物</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_30281_0'>⑵ 学士各有一室，西垣有小楼，时宴语于此</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_30281_1'>⑶ 内署垣壁，皆画松鹤。先是西壁画海中曲龙山，宪宗曾欲临幸，中使惧而涂焉</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_13_30281_0'>⑷ 此八句悉是内署物色，惟尝游者，依然可想也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_30281_0'>⑸ 每学士初上赐食，皆是蓬莱池鱼鲙。夏至后，颁赐冰及烧香酒，以酒味稍浓，每和冰而饮，禁中有郢酒坊也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_30281_1'>⑹ 先朝初临御，南方曾献荔枝，亦蒙颁赐，自后以道远罢献也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_30281_0'>⑺ 此八句以述恩赐。每有赐与，常携挈而归</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_18_30281_0'>⑻ 每梨园猎回，或抵暮夜，院门常见归骑</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_22_30281_1'>⑼ 曾蒙赐锦袍。曳者，盖取诗人不曳不娄之义也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_24_30281_0'>⑽ 学士皆蒙借飞龙马</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_25_30281_0'>⑾ 普济寺与芙蓉苑相连，常所游眺，芙蓉亦谓之南苑也</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_26_30281_1'>⑿ 此八句述休浣日游戏</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_29_30281_0'>⒀ 代称海涛是伍子愤气所作</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_30_30281_0'>⒁ 此两句又是梦中所作</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_30281_0'>⒂ 余自到此，绝无夜宴，酒器中大者呼为舠。宾僚顾形迹，未曾以此相劝</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_30281_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=826&endYear=826')">826年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。上疏劝谏敬宗勿信润州人周息元神仙方术之说。撰《三圣记》（《茅山三象记》）。李德裕妻刘氏约于本年前后在茅山燕洞宫传授上清法箓。李德裕上疏言勿信亳州出圣水能疗疾。李德裕妾徐氏生子烨，字季常。作品：《谏敬宗搜访道士疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1373816' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373816' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373816?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏敬宗搜访道士疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（826年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373816")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373816_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373816'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373816'>臣闻道之高者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373816_comment'></div>莫若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1373816", 1373816, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>广成</span>元元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373816_comment'></div>人之圣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373816_comment'></div>莫若轩黄孔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373816_comment'></div>昔轩黄问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1373816", 1373816, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>广成</span>子理身之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373816_comment'></div>何以长久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373816_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1373816", 1373816, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>广成</span>子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373816_comment'></div>无视无听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373816_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373816", 1373816, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>抱神</span>以静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373816_comment'></div>形将自正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373816_comment'></div>神将自清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373816_comment'></div>无劳子形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373816_comment'></div>无摇子精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373816_comment'></div>乃可长生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373816_comment'></div>慎守其一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373816_comment'></div>以处其和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373816_comment'></div>故我修身千二百岁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373816_comment'></div>吾形未尝衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373816_comment'></div>又云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373816_comment'></div>得吾道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373816_comment'></div>上为皇而下为王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373816_comment'></div>元元语孔子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373816_comment'></div>去子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1373816", 1373816, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>骄气</span>与多欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373816_comment'></div>态色与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1373816", 1373816, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>淫志</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373816_comment'></div>是皆无益于子之身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373816_comment'></div>吾所告子者是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373816_comment'></div>故轩皇发谓天之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373816_comment'></div>孔子兴犹龙之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373816_comment'></div>前圣之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373816_comment'></div>不其至乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373816_comment'></div>伏惟文武大圣广孝皇帝陛下稽元祖之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373816_comment'></div>修轩皇之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373816_comment'></div>凝神閒馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373816_comment'></div>物色异人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373816_comment'></div>将以觌冰雪之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373816_comment'></div>屈顺风之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373816_comment'></div>恭惟圣感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373816_comment'></div>必降真仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373816_comment'></div>若使<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1373816", 1373816, ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=826&endYear=826')">826年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。李德裕撰《三圣记》（《茅山三象记》）。李德裕妻刘氏约于本年前后在茅山燕洞宫传授上清法箓。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1374003' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374003")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_1374003'>有唐宝历二年岁次丙午八月丙申朔十五日庚戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374003_comment'></div>玉清元都大洞三道弟子正议大夫使持节润州诸军事守润州刺史兼御史大夫充浙西道都团练观察处置等使上柱国赞皇县开国男食邑三百户赐紫金鱼袋李德裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374003_comment'></div>上为九庙圣主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374003_comment'></div>次为七代先灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374003_comment'></div>下为一切含识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374003_comment'></div>于茅山崇元观南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374003_comment'></div>敬造老君殿院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374003_comment'></div>及造老君孔子尹真人象三躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374003_comment'></div>皆按史籍遗文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374003_comment'></div>庶垂不朽。<div id='poem_sentence_285_1374069_comment'></div>寻除内宅使鸿胪礼宾等使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1374069_comment'></div>前代特进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1374069_comment'></div>位次三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1374069_comment'></div>居骠骑仪同之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1374069_comment'></div>非茂勋俊德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1374069_comment'></div>曷以处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1374069_comment'></div>迁左神策军中尉兼左街功德使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1374069_comment'></div>汉氏京师有南北军之屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1374069_comment'></div>武帝既平百粤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1374069_comment'></div>内增七校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1374069_comment'></div>今之中尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1374069_comment'></div>实司其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1374069_comment'></div>公说礼敦诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1374069_comment'></div>深知将帅之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1374069_comment'></div>安人和众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1374069_comment'></div>实有经武之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1374069_comment'></div>以清净礼缁黄。<div id='poem_sentence_304_1374069_comment'></div>不肃而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1374069_comment'></div>北落之卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1374069_comment'></div>隐然难犯。<div 1374069, "Clauses/311/Comments/0")'>风雨如晦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1374069_comment'></div>权虽侔于卫霍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1374069_comment'></div>主意益亲。<div id='poem_sentence_321_1374069_comment'></div>展报国之壮图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1374069_comment'></div>恢致君之远略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1374069_comment'></div>劳而生疾。<div id='poem_content_30230'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30230'>玉蕊天中树，金闺昔共窥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30230'>落英闲舞雪，密叶乍低帷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30230_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>　本年八月前，李德裕仍在浙西观察使任。在浙西时，李德裕曾“下令禁桑门皈佛以眩人者”。并请宣赐鹤林寺僧谥号。作品：《请宣赐鹤林寺僧谥号奏》<span class='label1' id='25d879093aad48c1bc42cb00b125a305_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("25d879093aad48c1bc42cb00b125a305");'><span id='25d879093aad48c1bc42cb00b125a305_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　李德裕在浙西，辟杜牧之弟杜顗为巡官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年4月</a>　王璠、李汉等诬李德裕曾阴结漳王，图谋不轨，赖宰相路隋解救，四月，免浙西观察使，改宾客分司。未行，即因对文宗“大不敬”贬为袁州刺史。初夏，作赋咏白芙蓉。作品：《白芙蓉赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373708' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373708' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373708?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白芙蓉赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373708")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373708_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373708'>金陵城西池有白芙蓉。素𦹛盈尺。皎如霜雪。江南梅雨麦秋后。风景甚清。漾舟绿潭。不觉隆暑。与嘉客泛玩。终夕忘疲。古人惟赋红蕖。未有斯作。因以抒思。庶得其彷佛焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373708_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373708'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373708'>朱明夕霁。佳木凝阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373708_comment'></div>兰未歇其秀色。鸟尚流其好音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373708_comment'></div>泛回塘兮清景暮。环修渚兮碧流<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作云）</span>深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373708_comment'></div>诚有感于逝节。思更新于赏心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373708_comment'></div>是时黛叶已繁。琼英始发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373708_comment'></div>摇瑞彩于波上。挺纤茎于蘋末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373708_comment'></div>忽疑巨蚌濯<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作捧）</span>漪。暂睹其明月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373708_comment'></div>复似处子映松。遥觌其冰雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373708_comment'></div>焕列宿于长河。耀良玉于方折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373708_comment'></div>点白露于葭菼。散飞鸿于林樾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373708_comment'></div>余乃鼓轻枻。入澄●。（8DF6原注楚词曰楚人呼池泽中曰●8DF6。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373708_comment'></div>）度柳杞<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作杞柳）</span>。越兰蘅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373708_comment'></div>徘徊容与。放志遗荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373708_comment'></div>近汀洲而菱密。出莲径而潭平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373708_comment'></div>飞鸂𪆟。起鵁鶄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373708_comment'></div>挥水珠而溅叶。动波纹而抗茎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373708_comment'></div>传羽卮而适性。合金丝而写情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373708_comment'></div>管度风而音远。歌临流而转清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373708_comment'></div>既而稍憩<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作出）</span>川阴。暂游霄外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373708_comment'></div>极望漪澜。静无夕霭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373708_comment'></div>又如游女解佩于汉曲。宓采莲<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作芝）</span>于湍濑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373708_comment'></div>舒蕴藻以为席。倚立荷以为盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373708_comment'></div>发巧笑之芬芳。感嘉期之来会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373708_comment'></div>嗟夫。楚泽之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373708_comment'></div>无莲不红。惟斯华以素为绚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373708_comment'></div>犹美人以礼防躬。银辉光而流烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373708_comment'></div>玉精气而舒虹。虽有贵其符采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373708_comment'></div>且未匹其华容。由是南国之姝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373708_comment'></div>以为丽观。延华颈于沼沚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373708_comment'></div>曳罗裾于矶岸。且谓降元实于瑶池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373708_comment'></div>徙灵根于天汉。怅霄路兮永绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373708_comment'></div>与时芳兮共玩。听高柳之早蝉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373708_comment'></div>悲此岁之过半。彼妍姿之昭灼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373708_comment'></div>待风雨而消散。乃为歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373708_comment'></div>秋水阔兮秋露浓。盛华落兮叹芙蓉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373708_comment'></div>菖花紫兮君不识。萍实丹兮君不逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373708_comment'></div>想佳人兮密静处。颜如玉兮无冶容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373708_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1373708_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　李德裕在浙西观察使任。作品：《重台芙蓉赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重台芙蓉赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373709")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373709_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373709'>吴兴郡南白蘋亭有重台芙蓉。本生于长城章后旧居之侧。移植蘋洲。至今滋茂。余顷岁徙根于金陵桂亭。奇秀芬芳。非世间之物。因为此赋。以代美人托意焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373709'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373709'>昔柳恽为吴兴太守。顾座客而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373709_comment'></div>游汀洲以采蘋。忆潇湘之故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373709_comment'></div>悲白日之已晚。惜青春之不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373709_comment'></div>且欲拾琼蕊于桂山。折瑶华于兰畹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373709_comment'></div>客乃称曰。彼有清川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373709_comment'></div>爰生瑞莲。红葩炜而𣈫𣈫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373709_comment'></div>翠叶小而田田<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注此花大于常莲而叶小于众荷）</span>。愿得荐佳名于君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373709_comment'></div>悦丽色于当年。于是纵兰棹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373709_comment'></div>泛沦涟。吟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373709", 1373709, "Clauses/17/Comments/1")'>朱鹭</span>于篴<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作箫）</span>管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373709_comment'></div>鸣鹍鸡于瑟弦。临漪澜以远望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373709_comment'></div>叹华艳之何鲜。是日际海澄廓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373709_comment'></div>微风不起。涵丽景于碧湍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373709_comment'></div>烂朝霞于清沚。鲜肤秀㯋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373709_comment'></div>攒立丛倚。疑西子之颜酡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373709_comment'></div>自馆娃而戾止。远以意之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373709_comment'></div>若珠阙玲珑。叠映昆峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373709_comment'></div>粲玉女之光色。抗霓旗以相从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373709_comment'></div>迫而察之。若桂裳重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373709_comment'></div>郁挠丹谷。思江之窈窕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373709_comment'></div>发红罗之纷郁。尔其映兰芷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373709_comment'></div>出蘋萍。掩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1373709", 1373709, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>萋萋</span>之众色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373709_comment'></div>挺袅袅之修茎。泫清露以擢秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373709_comment'></div>流鲜飙而发精。虽草木之无情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373709_comment'></div>亦独立而倾城。若乃行潦既收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373709_comment'></div>秋光始静。见凉野之夕阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373709_comment'></div>怅回塘之馀景。思摘芳以赠远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373709_comment'></div>更临流而引领。翡翠失其辉鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373709_comment'></div>珠玑夺其光㯋。惟斯物之特丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373709_comment'></div>宜独秀于寥天。在灵境而何降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373709_comment'></div>居下泽而何偏。有繁华而不实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373709_comment'></div>嗟淑类而莫传。念庄姜之无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373709_comment'></div>非巧笑之未妍。彼天意之所属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373709_comment'></div>谅难得而知焉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。乃为歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373709_comment'></div>吴山秀兮烟景媚。因淑女兮感斯瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373709_comment'></div>莲虽多兮无厥类。兰徒芳兮何足贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373709_comment'></div>人已去兮代不留。独含情兮托兹地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373709_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1373709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373709'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_32_1373709_0'>⑴ 原注此花无实徙根又不三数年故人间罕有</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373709_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c2dcc17509d04b57ba766a3d2a0e1430_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c2dcc17509d04b57ba766a3d2a0e1430");'><span id='c2dcc17509d04b57ba766a3d2a0e1430_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>，51岁</div><div id='c2dcc17509d04b57ba766a3d2a0e1430' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年5月</a>　本年五月前，李德裕在浙西观察使任，五月改为淮南节度使，代牛僧孺，牛僧孺任东都留守。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>　本年春，李德裕在浙西观察使任，作诗忆洛阳平泉别业。作品：《早春至言禅公法堂忆平泉别业》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷十。）</span><div id='poem_30220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早春至言禅公法堂忆平泉别业<span class='inlineComment2'>（金陵作）</span></a><span /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_30220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30220'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30220'>松盖低春雪，藤轮倚暮山。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30220'>永怀桑梓邑，衰老若为还。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30220'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_30220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>　本年春，李德裕在浙西观察使任，作诗忆洛阳伊川别业。作品：《峡山亭月夜独宿对樱桃花有怀伊川别墅》<span -----title
华阴
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b101ff543d064dc1808d61b3d2cb7e01_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b101ff543d064dc1808d61b3d2cb7e01");'><span id='b101ff543d064dc1808d61b3d2cb7e01_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年</a>，43岁</div><div id='b101ff543d064dc1808d61b3d2cb7e01' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年8月16日</a>　赴京途中，经华山，八月十六日，于华山留题名。作品：《兵部侍郎李德裕题名》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见于毛凤枝《关中金石文字存逸考》卷九。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0ec216b8ff41422d9f1040384d20c86a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0ec216b8ff41422d9f1040384d20c86a");'><span id='0ec216b8ff41422d9f1040384d20c86a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>，44岁</div><div id='0ec216b8ff41422d9f1040384d20c86a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年11月1日</a>　本年十月，李德裕改任西川节度使，途经华山，十一月初一，在华山华岳庙（又名西岳庙）留题名。作品：《剑南西川节度使李德裕题名》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见于毛凤枝《关中金石文字存逸考》卷九。）</span><br /></div>

-----title
滑县（白马）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b4acc7e4433c4293abe60470bb4a8b0c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b4acc7e4433c4293abe60470bb4a8b0c");'><span id='b4acc7e4433c4293abe60470bb4a8b0c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=830')">829-830年</a>，43-44岁</div><div id='b4acc7e4433c4293abe60470bb4a8b0c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=829&endYear=829')">829年11月</a>　十一月，李德裕妾徐氏卒于滑州，十二月，葬于洛阳邙山，李德裕为撰墓志。作品：《滑州瑶台观女真徐氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见于《唐代墓志汇编》，乃洛阳出土。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年</a>　本年春，李德裕作《上巳忆江南禊事》，刘禹锡和之。十月前，李德裕任义成节度使。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见于《全唐诗》卷四七五。）</span><div id='poem_30189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳忆江南禊事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（830年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30189")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_30189_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_30189_0'>① （一作上巳日忆江南禊事）。（一作张志和诗）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30189'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30189'>黄河西绕郡城流，上巳应无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_30189", 30189, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>祓禊</span>游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30189_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
剑阁（剑门）
-----detail

href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30278")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_30278_comment'></div><div id='poem_allusion_30278_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30278'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30278'>奇峰百仞悬，清眺出岚烟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30278'>迥若戈回日，高疑剑倚天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30278'>参差霞壁耸，合沓翠屏连。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30278'>想是<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2203, "poem_sentence_3_30278")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_30278", 30278, "Clauses/6/Comments/1")'>三刀梦</span></span>，森然在目前。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30278_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30278'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_30278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年十月，李德裕改任西川节度使。约十一、十二月间，经剑门关，作文。作品：《剑门铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷八。）</span><div id='poem_1374068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374068' class='poemTitle id='poem_content_1374068'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374068'>群山西来，波积云屯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1374068'>地险所会，斯为蜀门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1374068'>层岑峻壁，森若戈戟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1374068'>万壑奔东，双飞高阙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1374068'>翠岭中横，黵然黛色。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1374068'>树兹雄屏，以卫王国<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1374068'>拔井干，溪回沟洫。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1374068'>严守重扃，隐如临敌。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1374068'>运有隆替，地无险阨。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1374068'>闭于昏顽，开于有德。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1374068'>马错西伐，蜀侯败绩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1374068'>艾出阴平，禅亦来格。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1374068'>粤在宪祖，英威四克。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1374068'>始剪蜀妖，遂靖邛僰。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1374068'>蛮夷轨道，诸侯述职。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1374068'>武臣铭之，金石乃刻。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1374068'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1374068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1374068'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_1374068_0'>⑴ 原注剑门当中有一峰峻岭横峙望若列屏此一峰为最奇而说者未尝及之也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1374068_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
广汉（雒县）
-----detail

-----title
成都（蜀县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7233500dd1cc4c67b7b19050f1a782f0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7233500dd1cc4c67b7b19050f1a782f0");'><span id='7233500dd1cc4c67b7b19050f1a782f0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=832')">830-832年</a>，44-46岁</div><div id='7233500dd1cc4c67b7b19050f1a782f0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=830&endYear=830')">830年12月18日</a>　本年十月，李德裕改任西川节度使。应于约十二月到达任所。闰十二月十八日，作《重写前益州五长史真记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1374004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374004' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374004?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重写前益州五长史真记</a><span class='authorDate'>（830年12月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374004")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374004_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374004'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374004'>益州草堂寺<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>列画前长史一十四人<span class='inlineComment2'>（节度职不带尹则带长史非今宾佐也）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374004_comment'></div>代称绝笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374004_comment'></div>余尝于数公子孙之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374004_comment'></div>获见图状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374004_comment'></div>乃知草堂缋事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374004_comment'></div>靡不造真者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374004_comment'></div>昔岩野旁求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374004_comment'></div>徒闻审像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374004_comment'></div>嵇山高遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374004_comment'></div>惟止镕金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374004_comment'></div>孰若记之丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374004_comment'></div>妙尽神照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374004_comment'></div>楚国祠庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374004_comment'></div>鲁王宫室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374004_comment'></div>洎此邦文翁旧馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374004_comment'></div>皆图历代卿相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374004_comment'></div>粲然可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374004_comment'></div>虽有慕于前良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374004_comment'></div>曾莫究于形似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374004_comment'></div>岂与夫年代已远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374004_comment'></div>遗像犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374004_comment'></div>入虚室而烟霞暂披。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374004_comment'></div>拂浮埃而瑶林斯觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374004_comment'></div>余以精舍甚古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374004_comment'></div>貌像将倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374004_comment'></div>乃选其功德尤盛者五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374004_comment'></div>模于郡之厅所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374004_comment'></div>追维二汉台阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374004_comment'></div>皆有图写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374004_comment'></div>黄霸于定国之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374004_comment'></div>虽宰相名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374004_comment'></div>不得在画像之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374004_comment'></div>卓子康德行君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374004_comment'></div>而在功臣之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374004_comment'></div>今之所取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374004_comment'></div>意在斯乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374004_comment'></div>□既新光灵可想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374004_comment'></div>俨若对神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374004_comment'></div>吾将与归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374004_comment'></div>因叙其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374004_comment'></div>诏诸来哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374004_comment'></div>太和四年闰十二月十八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374004_comment'></div>西川剑南节度副大使知节度事银青光禄大夫检校兵部尚书兼成都尹御史大夫赞皇县开国伯李德裕记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1374004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1374004'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1374004_0'>⑴ 成都记云在府西七里去浣花亭三里</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1374004_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　李德裕在西川节度使任，至南召访查被俘民人约四千人归成都，巩固关防、训练士卒，招降吐蕃之维州守将。牛僧孺反对李德裕招降维州主张。李德裕本年作《黄冶赋》，反对方士炼丹长生之术。工部侍郎庾敬休约于本年前后奏议茶税钱，并遣使与李德裕商量制置。七月，元稹卒，李德裕与刘禹锡有诗往来，悼念元稹。冬，李德裕又作诗悼念元稹、韦处厚，及怀杜元颍，并寄沈传师。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span>《画桐花凤扇赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span>《忆金门旧游奉寄江西沈大夫》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷四。）</span>《锦城春事忆江南五言三首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1373704' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373704' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373704?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄冶赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373704")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373704_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373704'>蜀道有青城峨眉山。皆隐沦所托。辛亥岁。有以铸金术干余者。窃叹刘向累世懿德。为汉儒宗。其所述作。根于圣道。犹爱信鸿宝。几婴时僇。况流俗之士。能无惑于此乎。因作赋以正之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373704_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373704'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373704'>汉武帝遭世承平。百蛮以宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373704_comment'></div>自谓德成尧禹。功高汤武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373704_comment'></div>闻升龙于鼎湖。乃甘心于斯语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373704_comment'></div>有方士李少君。谲诈丕诞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373704_comment'></div>乘邪进取。盛称化丹砂为黄金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373704_comment'></div>可以登青霄而轻举。时董大夫侍侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373704_comment'></div>帝曰。子知其术乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373704_comment'></div>仲舒进曰。臣惟闻天地变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373704_comment'></div>圣人镕范。方士之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373704_comment'></div>臣以为谄。至如圆方为炉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373704_comment'></div>造化为冶。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1373704", 1373704, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>鼓风</span>为橐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373704_comment'></div>炽阳为火。元黄之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373704_comment'></div>絪缊和粹。禀而生者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373704_comment'></div>为仁为智。是以生宝实繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373704_comment'></div>终古不匮。天地之镕范鼓铸也如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373704_comment'></div>及夫尧舜之化。大道为炉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373704_comment'></div>中和为冶。声教为橐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373704_comment'></div>文明为火。以法天为造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373704_comment'></div>以得贤为宝。是以得其鸿名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373704_comment'></div>后天难老。至于仲尼无位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373704_comment'></div>大莫能致。犹铸颜与冉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373704_comment'></div>底于极智。圣人之镕铸也取类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373704_comment'></div>若乃不务德业。营信秘箓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373704_comment'></div>祈年永久。以极嗜欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373704_comment'></div>斯则不由于正道。无益于景福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373704_comment'></div>帝曰善。乃罢方士而去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373704_comment'></div>故得汉道隆盛。令名不亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373704_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1373704_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1373705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373705?labeling=true' target='_blank'>画桐花凤扇赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（831年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373705")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373705_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373705'>成都夹岷江。矶岸多植紫桐。每至暮春。有灵禽五色。小于元鸟。来集桐花。以饮朝露。及华落。则烟飞雨散。不知其所。往有名工。绘于素扇。以赉稚子。余因作小赋。书于扇上。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373705'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373705'>桐始华兮绿江曙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373705_comment'></div>粲鲜葩兮泫朝露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373705_comment'></div>树煜煜兮霞舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373705_comment'></div>鸟烂烂兮星布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373705_comment'></div>彼嘉桐兮贞且猗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373705_comment'></div>当暮春兮发英蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373705_comment'></div>岂鹓雏之珍族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373705_comment'></div>又栖托乎琼枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373705_comment'></div>被零露兮甘且白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373705_comment'></div>涵晓月兮洒鲜泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373705_comment'></div>岂青鸟之灵俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373705_comment'></div>常饮吮乎玉液。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373705_comment'></div>有嘉谷而不啄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373705_comment'></div>有乔松而不适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373705_comment'></div>独美露而爱桐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373705_comment'></div>非人间之羽翮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373705_comment'></div>逮花落而春归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373705_comment'></div>忽雨散而川寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373705_comment'></div>怅丹穴之何远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373705_comment'></div>想瑶池而已隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373705_comment'></div>爰有妙工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373705_comment'></div>图其丽容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373705_comment'></div>宛宛兮若餐珠于芳蕊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373705_comment'></div>飘飘兮疑振羽于光风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373705_comment'></div>感班姬之素扇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373705_comment'></div>空皎洁兮如霰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373705_comment'></div>亦有美人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373705_comment'></div>增华<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1373705", 1373705, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>点绚</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373705_comment'></div>雀伺蝉而轻骛<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注南朝画扇尤重蝉雀）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373705_comment'></div>女乘鸾而微眄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373705_comment'></div>未若绘斯禽于珍箑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373705_comment'></div>动凉风于罗荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373705_comment'></div>非欲发长袂之清香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373705_comment'></div>掩高歌之孤啭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373705_comment'></div>庶玉女之提携。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373705_comment'></div>列昆墟之瑶宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373705_comment'></div>乃为歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373705_comment'></div>青春晚兮芳节阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373705_comment'></div>敷紫华兮荫碧湍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373705_comment'></div>美斯鸟兮类鹓鸾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373705_comment'></div>具体微兮容色丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373705_comment'></div>彼飞翔于霄汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373705_comment'></div>此藻绘于冰纨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373705_comment'></div>虽清秋之已至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373705_comment'></div>常爱玩而忘餐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1373705_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_30218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30218' class='poemTitle -----title
临汝
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='439b6fb5e2914f929bfd11de20c36fbd_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("439b6fb5e2914f929bfd11de20c36fbd");'><span id='439b6fb5e2914f929bfd11de20c36fbd_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>，48岁</div><div id='439b6fb5e2914f929bfd11de20c36fbd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　李德裕赴浙西，经汝州，汝州刺史刘禹锡有诗送之。李德裕约年底到达浙西，辟杜牧之弟杜顗为巡官。<br /></div>

-----title
和县（历阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c12e1cc4de5c451288a256a303f6fb7d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c12e1cc4de5c451288a256a303f6fb7d");'><span id='c12e1cc4de5c451288a256a303f6fb7d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>，49岁</div><div id='c12e1cc4de5c451288a256a303f6fb7d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　李德裕四、五月从润州启程，走陆路至历阳，改走水路。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='47c6665cf3254c5f8af486a674e02f49_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("47c6665cf3254c5f8af486a674e02f49");'><span id='47c6665cf3254c5f8af486a674e02f49_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>，50岁</div><div id='47c6665cf3254c5f8af486a674e02f49' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　李德裕从袁州刺史改任滁州刺史，赴任途中在和州。作品：《项王亭赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373730?labeling=true' target='_blank'>项王亭赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373730")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373730_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373730'>丙辰岁孟夏。余息驾乌江。晨登荒亭。旷然远览。因睹太尉清河公刻石。美项氏之材。叹其屈于天命。且曰。汉祖困阨之时。生计非萧张所出。余以为不然矣。自古聪明神武之主。未尝不应天顺人。以定大业。项氏纵火咸阳。失秦中之固。迁主炎裔。伤义士之心。违天违人。霸业隳矣。汉皆反是。故能成功。据秦遗业。东制区夏。数败于外。常有关中。为旧主缟素。以义动天下。虽项氏犹存。而王业基矣。若乃蠖屈鸿门。龙潜天汉。始降志于一人。终申威于四海。则萧张之计。不亦远乎。余尝论之。汉祖犹龙。项氏如虎。龙虽困而其变不测。虎虽雄而其力易摧。一神一鸷。宜乎夐绝。然𫇢舟不渡。留骓报德。亦可谓知命矣。自汤武以干戈创业。后之英雄。莫高项氏。感其伏剑此地。因作赋以吊之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373730'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373730'>登彼高原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373730_comment'></div>徘徊始曙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373730_comment'></div>尚识舣舟之崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373730_comment'></div>焉知系马之树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373730_comment'></div>望牛渚以怅然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373730_comment'></div>叹乌江之不渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373730_comment'></div>想山川之未改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373730_comment'></div>嗟斯人之何遽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373730_comment'></div>思项氏之入关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373730_comment'></div>按秦图而割据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373730_comment'></div>恃八千之剽疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373730_comment'></div>弃百二之险固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373730_comment'></div>咸阳不留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373730_comment'></div>王业已去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373730_comment'></div>将衣锦于旧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373730_comment'></div>遂扬旌而东顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373730_comment'></div>虽未至于阴陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373730_comment'></div>谁不知其失路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373730_comment'></div>耻沐猴之丑诋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373730_comment'></div>乃烹韩而泄怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373730_comment'></div>谓天命之可欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373730_comment'></div>何霸王之不寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373730_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373730_comment'></div>楚声既合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373730_comment'></div>汉围已布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373730_comment'></div>歌既阕而甚悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373730_comment'></div>酒盈樽而不御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373730_comment'></div>当其盛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373730_comment'></div>天下侯伯自我而宰制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373730_comment'></div>及其衰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373730_comment'></div>帐中美人寄命而无处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373730_comment'></div>季数遁而不亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373730_comment'></div>羽一败而终仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373730_comment'></div>岂非独任于威力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373730_comment'></div>不由于智虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373730_comment'></div>追昔四隤之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373730_comment'></div>风烟将暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373730_comment'></div>大咤雷奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373730_comment'></div>重瞳电注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373730_comment'></div>叱汉千骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373730_comment'></div>如猎狐菟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373730_comment'></div>谢亭长而依然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373730_comment'></div>愧父兄兮不渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373730_comment'></div>既伏剑而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373730_comment'></div>彼群帅兮犹惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373730_comment'></div>虽霸业之无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373730_comment'></div>亦终古而独步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373730_comment'></div>周视陈迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373730_comment'></div>缅然如素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373730_comment'></div>听乔木之悲风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373730_comment'></div>感高秋之零露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373730_comment'></div>因献吊于兹亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373730_comment'></div>庶神灵之可遇。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1373730_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
九江（浔阳）
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　李德裕经江州，访陶渊明故里。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='3ea55453383941e3a4f6169b90185996_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3ea55453383941e3a4f6169b90185996");'><span id='3ea55453383941e3a4f6169b90185996_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>，50岁</div><div id='3ea55453383941e3a4f6169b90185996' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>李德裕从袁州刺史改任滁州刺史，赴任途中在鄱阳湖。作品：《望匡庐赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373728' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373728' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373728?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望匡庐赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373728")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373728_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373728'>沧湖口北望匡庐二山。影入澄潭。峰连清汉。江水无际。烟景相鲜。沿流而东。若在世表。因怀远公陆先生。怅然成赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373728_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373728'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373728'>春水湖平。霁天景旭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373728_comment'></div>眇赴海之清澜。映干霄之翠岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373728_comment'></div>波鳞烂而势微。帆雁引而相续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373728_comment'></div>轻烟冒于炉峰。若香散于空谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373728_comment'></div>飞流洒于星湾。疑虹饮于曾曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373728_comment'></div>想远公之平昔。比孟绰之不欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373728_comment'></div>谈精义于松间<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。寄虚怀于岩足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373728_comment'></div>喜濯缨而旋返。悲负鼎而放逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373728_comment'></div>耻随屈贾之波。不同宗雷之躅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373728_comment'></div>整襟带于瑶席。望元师于林麓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373728_comment'></div>徒佩紫青之书。未脱朱丹之毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373728_comment'></div>感明主之嘉惠。荷天地之覆育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373728_comment'></div>既复扶阳之爵。又剖专城之竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373728_comment'></div>被金组于薄躬。昭皇明于荒服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373728_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1373728", 1373728, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>豹文</span>忽变。蔚然以姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373728_comment'></div>蝉緌更新。倏然而脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373728_comment'></div>虽澡身于沧浪。终有愧于玷辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373728_comment'></div>念大福兮不再来。归东皋兮供黍粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373728_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1373728_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373728'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_1373728_0'>⑴ 原注东林寺有远公与殷仲堪说易松犹在</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_1373728_0'>⑵ 原注余受法于茅山无师则传法祖师也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373728_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>李德裕从袁州刺史改任滁州刺史，赴任途中在九江。作品：《大孤山赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大孤山赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373729")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373729_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373729'>余剖符淮甸。道出蠡泽。属江天清霁。千里无波。点大孤于中流。升旭日于匡阜。不因佐官。岂遂斯游。谢康乐尤好山水。尝居此地。竟阙词赋。其故何哉。彼孤屿乱流。非可俦匹。因为小赋。以寄友朋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373729'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373729'>川渎巇道。人心所恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373729_comment'></div>必有穹石。御其横骛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373729_comment'></div>势莫壮于滟滪。气莫雄于砥柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373729_comment'></div>惟大孤之角立。掩二山而磔竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373729_comment'></div>高标九派之冲。以捍百川之注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373729_comment'></div>耽若虎视。蚴如龙据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373729_comment'></div>靡摇巨浪。神明之所扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373729_comment'></div>不倚群山。上元之所固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373729_comment'></div>必迤逦而何多。信嶷然而有数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373729_comment'></div>念前世之独立。知君子之难遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373729_comment'></div>如介石者袁杨。制横流者李杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373729_comment'></div>观其侧秀灵草。旁挺奇树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373729_comment'></div>宁忧梓匠之斤。岂有樵人之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373729_comment'></div>想江之乍游。疑水仙之或驻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373729_comment'></div>嗟瀛洲与方丈。盖髣髴如烟雾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373729_comment'></div>据神鳌而臲卼。逐风涛而沿溯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373729_comment'></div>未若根连坤轴。终古而长存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373729_comment'></div>迹寄夜川。负之而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373729_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1373729", 1373729, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>愚叟</span>之复生。焉能移其咫步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373729_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1373729_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
宜春
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1c55b039c0314a41a4e6f5cf4cec3981_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1c55b039c0314a41a4e6f5cf4cec3981");'><span id='1c55b039c0314a41a4e6f5cf4cec3981_link'
