href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　约本年年中到宜春，任袁州刺史。作赋咏山凤凰。作品：《山凤凰赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373710?labeling=true' target='_blank'>山凤凰赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373710")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373710_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373710'>仰山在郡之坤隅。高松翳景。名翚所集。有丽鸟殊色。(原注殊色出应瑞鹦鹉赋)文如缛绣。邑人呼为山凤凰。爱其毛羽。重于身命。虽遭矰缴。终不奋飞。比夫雄鸡断尾。则殊知异心矣。余感而赋之。以贻亲友。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373710_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373710'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373710'>懿灵山之岑寂。实珍禽之可依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373710_comment'></div>何文章之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1373710", 1373710, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>英丽</span>。信羽族之所稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373710_comment'></div>混赤霄而一色。与白日而增辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373710_comment'></div>焕若玉女携宓。凌丹壑兮游翠微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373710_comment'></div>振桂裳兮垂组绶。腾镳驾兮曳鸾旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373710_comment'></div>粲若夭桃发兮山已春。朝霞烂兮露欲晞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373710_comment'></div>或饮于涧。或集于矶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373710_comment'></div>糅芙蕖之绛采。掩虹霓之夕霏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373710_comment'></div>既而衡网高悬。虞人合围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373710_comment'></div>身挂纤缴。足履骇机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373710_comment'></div>畏采毛之摧落。不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1373710", 1373710, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>凌厉</span>而奋飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373710_comment'></div>乃知玉之败也。以致其琼弁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373710_comment'></div>翠之焚也。犹袭其宝衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373710_comment'></div>何异夫怀禄耽宠。乐而忘归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373710_comment'></div>玩轩冕而不去。惜印绶而无时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373710_comment'></div>嗟乎乘君子之器。与兹鸟而同讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373710_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1373710_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　约本年年中到宜春，任袁州刺史。作赋咏孔雀尾。作品：《孔雀尾赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373711' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373711' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373711?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孔雀尾赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373711")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373711_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373711'>故人以孔雀见遗。死于中途。将命者提挈(一作携)空笼。与翠尾皆至。余悯而为赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373711_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373711'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373711'>感君子之嘉惠。意未忘于所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373711_comment'></div>携珍禽以赠余。谅有贵乎羽仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373711_comment'></div>去旧国之岑寂。历三湘之崄巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373711_comment'></div>念未飞之众雏。怀独宿之羁雌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373711_comment'></div>忽哀鸣而望绝。遂委翼而长辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373711_comment'></div>异黄鹄之高翔。揭空笼而载驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373711_comment'></div>想綷羽而不见。睹修尾而增悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373711_comment'></div>兰色芊郁。金华陆离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373711_comment'></div>垂之兮疑拖绿盭<span class='inlineComment2'>（音戾绶名）</span>。举之兮如飞翠緌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373711_comment'></div>嗟绂冕之寄身。与锻翮而一概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373711_comment'></div>虽暂荣而可乐。终以饰而贾害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373711_comment'></div>况复德輶如毛而鲜举。福轻乎羽而莫载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373711_comment'></div>何必负斯尾之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1373711", 1373711, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>翘翘</span>。冒长途而效爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373711_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1373711_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　约本年年中到宜春，任袁州刺史。作《智囊赋》，流露些许归隐之意。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>智囊赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373712")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373712_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373712'>余尝感汉晁错魏桓范。皆号为智囊。不能全身。竟罹大患。扬子称或问多以智杀身。雄对曰。皋陶以其智为帝谟。箕子以其智为武王陈洪范。杀身者远矣。余久欲赋之。比属逾纪总戎。愿言不暇。今俟罪江徼。徬徨岁深。筐箧之中。典籍皆阙。聊以所记古今兴败。粗成此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373712'>夫天之清气为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373712_comment'></div>而人之清气为智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373712_comment'></div>苟虚心而冲用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373712_comment'></div>必穷神而索至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373712_comment'></div>况恬养以保身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373712_comment'></div>岂忧患之能累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373712_comment'></div>何与败之相诡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373712_comment'></div>乃躁静而殊致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373712_comment'></div>或明远而无疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373712_comment'></div>或驰骛而役思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373712_comment'></div>故由于彼而入圣门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373712_comment'></div>出于此而争利器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373712_comment'></div>若乃淡然<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1373712", 1373712, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>元默</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373712_comment'></div>应变无方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373712_comment'></div>韬随和而不耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373712_comment'></div>匣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1373712", 1373712, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>干越</span>而宝藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373712_comment'></div>虽不止如炙輠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373712_comment'></div>犹渊然如括囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373712_comment'></div>君子所以有斯号者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373712_comment'></div>盖欲保无咎于末光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373712_comment'></div>夫智可以养生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373712_comment'></div>乃能周物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373712_comment'></div>道无夷险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373712_comment'></div>用有工拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373712_comment'></div>得于身也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373712_comment'></div>祭以免而荀以全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373712_comment'></div>失于邦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373712_comment'></div>臧不容而汤不没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373712_comment'></div>彼前轨之昭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373712_comment'></div>曾未戒于危辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373712_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373712_comment'></div>水济舟以致远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373712_comment'></div>亦覆舟于畏途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373712_comment'></div>智排患以解纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373712_comment'></div>亦有患于不虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373712_comment'></div>将不殆于无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373712_comment'></div>信莫尚于冥枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373712_comment'></div>或有好学务敏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373712_comment'></div>择仁乃庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373712_comment'></div>斯先哲之所履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373712_comment'></div>亦庶几于不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373712_comment'></div>然则天智闲闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373712_comment'></div>不婴世故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373712_comment'></div>举始终而后入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373712_comment'></div>先奔沉而预虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373712_comment'></div>或卫足之无术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373712_comment'></div>故离形而尽去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373712_comment'></div>吕易宗于奇货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373712_comment'></div>疾知来于武库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373712_comment'></div>虽乘势与亿中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373712_comment'></div>非淑人之所务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373712_comment'></div>鸱夷子喟然叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373712_comment'></div>昔我经世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373712_comment'></div>徒闻智忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373712_comment'></div>索遗珠而不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373712_comment'></div>复明烛其焉求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373712_comment'></div>与万物而道夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373712_comment'></div>又何谟于大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373712_comment'></div>今我所谓智者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373712_comment'></div>乘五湖之浩荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373712_comment'></div>永终老于扁舟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1373712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　约本年年中到宜春，任袁州刺史。怀平泉林居，作诗。作品：《夏晚有怀平泉林居》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_30321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏晚有怀平泉林居<span class='inlineComment2'>（宜春作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30321")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_30321_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_30321'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(443, "poem_allusion_30321")'>班荆</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(854, "poem_allusion_30321")'>庄舄吟</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1969, "poem_allusion_30321")'>环玦</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3387, "poem_allusion_30321")'>公旦思周</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3945, "poem_allusion_30321")'>衡门</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5612, "poem_allusion_30321")'>子牟存阙下</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9472, "poem_allusion_30321")'>宣尼念鲁</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_30321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30321'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30321'>孟夏守畏途，舍舟在徂暑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30321'>愀然何所念，念我龙门坞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30321'>密竹无蹊径，高松有四五。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30321'>飞泉鸣树间，飒飒如度雨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30321'>菌桂秀层岭，芳荪媚幽渚。<div id='poem_sentence_4_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_30321'>稚子候我归，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3945, "poem_sentence_5_30321")'>衡门</span>独延伫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_30321'>谁言圣与哲，曾是不怀土。<div id='poem_sentence_6_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_30321'>公旦既思周，宣尼亦念鲁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_30321'>矧余窜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_30321", 30321, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>炎裔</span>，日夕谁晤语。<div id='poem_sentence_8_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_30321'>眷阙悲子牟，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(443, "poem_sentence_9_30321")'>班荆</span>感<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_30321", 30321, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>椒举</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_30321'>悽悽视<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1969, "poem_sentence_10_30321")'>环玦</span>，恻恻步庭庑。<div id='poem_sentence_10_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_30321'>岂待<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(854, "poem_sentence_11_30321")'>庄舄吟</span>，方知倦羁旅。<div id='poem_sentence_11_30321_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_30321'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_30321_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　约本年年中到宜春，任袁州刺史。忆龙门山居，作诗寄崔张旧从事。作品：《早秋龙兴寺江亭闲眺忆龙门山居寄崔张旧从事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_30293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早秋龙兴寺江亭闲眺忆龙门山居寄崔张旧从事<span class='inlineComment2'>（宜春作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30293")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_30293_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_30293'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3802, "poem_allusion_30293")'>仲蔚蒿</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_30293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30293'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30293'>江亭感秋至，兰径悲露泫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30293'>粳稻秀晚川，杉松郁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作蔚）</span>晴巘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30293'>嗟予有林壑，兹夕念原<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作繁）</span>衍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30293'>绿筱<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作竹）</span>连岭多，青莎近溪浅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30293'>渊明菊犹在，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3802, id='poem_sentence_6_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_30293'>苍翠双阙间，逶迤清滩<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作溪）</span>转。<div id='poem_sentence_7_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_30293'>故人在乡国，岁晏路悠缅。<div id='poem_sentence_8_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_30293'>惆怅此生涯，无由共<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_30293", 30293, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>登践</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_30293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_30293'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_30293_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，结识当地士人卢肇。由于固疾缠身，不适卑湿袁州气候，叹归期无日，怀有急流勇退、韬晦保身之意，作赋伤流年。作品：《伤年赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373718' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373718' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373718?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤年赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373718")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373718_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373718'>余兹年五十。久婴沉痼。楚泽卑湿。杳无归期。恐田园将芜。不遂悬车之适。乃为此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373718_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373718'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373718'>五十已至。生涯可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373718_comment'></div>在安乐而犹叹。况形神之支离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373718_comment'></div>伤寿有贾生之痛。招魂无宋玉之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373718_comment'></div>邈故园之寥远。念归途之未期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373718_comment'></div>顾稚子而悽恻。想田庐而涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373718_comment'></div>有客戾止。问我何悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373718_comment'></div>仲尼晚而喜易。郤縠老而敦诗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373718_comment'></div>苟朝闻于圣道。虽年往而未衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373718_comment'></div>余乃对曰。心之忧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373718_comment'></div>子岂知之。嗟世路之险隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373718_comment'></div>矧驽骀之已疲。法先哲以行止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373718_comment'></div>经险阻而勿违。阳息驾于折坂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373718_comment'></div>思保身于不危。文飞辔于崤道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373718_comment'></div>若遗风<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作大风）</span>而载驰。幸回车之未晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373718_comment'></div>与此路而长辞。嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373718_comment'></div>亢必有悔。盈难久持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373718_comment'></div>李耽宠而忘返。岂黄犬之可思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373718_comment'></div>种婴患而且<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作乃）</span>寤。渺沧波而莫追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373718_comment'></div>隽畏势<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作畏形势）</span>而自引。非罻罹之所羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373718_comment'></div>宜见险而高举。顾轩冕其如遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373718_comment'></div>虽高华之难企。在哲人之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373718_comment'></div>何必求季主之尽性。访詹尹而决疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373718_comment'></div>商有山兮逶迤。从园公兮采芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373718_comment'></div>湘有水兮涟漪。继渔父兮维丝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373718_comment'></div>既已觉于今是。岂遑遑于路歧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373718_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1373718_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373718'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_1373718_0'>⑴ 原注国语公问元帅于赵衰对曰郤縠可行年五十矣守学弥笃</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373718_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕在袁州刺史任，临江远眺有感。作品：《观钓赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观钓赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373720")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373720_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373720'>余所居在江流之上。每值清景。必杖策独游。见芦人渔子。则乐而忘返。庄生称就薮泽。乐閒旷。钓鱼闲处。此江湖之士。避世之人也。班嗣亦称渔钓一壑。则万物不奸其志。是知古之贤人。皆乐于此。彼之垂钓者。未可量焉。因为观钓赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373720'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373720'>临江皋以四望。爱春水以悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373720_comment'></div>赴沧海以东会。引清湘而北流<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注此水北流）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373720_comment'></div>想鸱夷而可觌。冀渔父之出游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373720_comment'></div>将欲访行止于二子。永栖迟于一邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373720_comment'></div>徘徊春渚。忽值钓舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373720_comment'></div>奏小海之悲曲。发阿激之棹讴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373720_comment'></div>观其垂纶川上。或纵或收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373720_comment'></div>悟直针之莫致<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注直针楚词）</span>。察芳饵之自求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373720_comment'></div>追感夫子。遑遑岁暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373720_comment'></div>麟凤不来。弦歌谁愬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373720_comment'></div>客有皓发。愕而招路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373720_comment'></div>问孔氏之何治。独危真而未悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373720_comment'></div>悲闻道之已晚。乃引舟而远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373720_comment'></div>子寂听其拿音。季授绥而不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373720_comment'></div>逮乎屈平既放。飘尔南征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373720_comment'></div>不汎汎以随波。或皎皎而扬清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373720_comment'></div>渔父叹其违俗。大夫甘其徇名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373720_comment'></div>遂鼓枻而孤往。犹放歌乎濯缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373720_comment'></div>若乃川雾始收。秋光向夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373720_comment'></div>兰露泫而风清。竹烟散而潭碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373720_comment'></div>映微月于湍濑。向哀猿于岩壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373720_comment'></div>喜良夜而不归。更鸣桹而远适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373720_comment'></div>或有略小务大。邈乎难量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373720_comment'></div>任公期年而钓鳌。吕望何时而得璜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373720_comment'></div>且夫一竿之说。所贵不纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373720_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1373720", 1373720, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>九罭</span>未具。难希鳟鲂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373720_comment'></div>顾余情之无欲。彼大小而皆忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373720_comment'></div>虽饵食而不取。思寄适于濠梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373720_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1373720_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕在袁州刺史任，所居精舍前有山石榴等，有感作赋。作品：《二芳丛赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二芳丛赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373724")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373724_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373724'>余所居精舍前。有山石榴黄踯躅。春晚敷荣。相错如锦。因为小赋。以状其繁丽焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373724'>鷤鴂鸣矣。众芳已衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373724_comment'></div>美嘉木之并植。惜繁荣之后时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373724_comment'></div>观其擢纤柯以相糺。糅鲜葩而如织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373724_comment'></div>金散袅蹄之辉。玉耀鸡冠之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373724_comment'></div>一则含情脉脉。如有思而不得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373724_comment'></div>类西施之容冶。服红罗之盛饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373724_comment'></div>复似朱草发其英蕤。长离奋其羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373724_comment'></div>一则凝思怅怅。若将翱而未翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373724_comment'></div>疑嬴女之性情。媠郁金之薄妆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373724_comment'></div>又似黄星烂于霄汉。瑞鹄来于建章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373724_comment'></div>彼红荣之𣈫𣈫。丽幽丛而有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373724_comment'></div>其舒焰也。朝霞之映白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373724_comment'></div>其含彩也。丹砂之生雪床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373724_comment'></div>彼缃蕊之灿灿。隐众叶而闲芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373724_comment'></div>其繁姿也。时菊之被秋霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373724_comment'></div>其秀色也。鸣鹂之集荑杨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373724_comment'></div>由是楚泽放臣。小山游客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373724_comment'></div>厌杜蘅之靃靡。忘桂花之洁白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373724_comment'></div>玩此树而淹留。倚幽岩而将夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373724_comment'></div>嗟衰老之已遽。念流芳之可惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373724_comment'></div>况鳞悲失浪。羽畏虚弹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373724_comment'></div>有杨朱之危涕。无越石之暂欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373724_comment'></div>岂独琴感猗兰之晓。诗嗟蕙草之残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373724_comment'></div>思欲揖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1373724", 1373724, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>金膏</span>而驻魄。扳珠树而辍餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373724_comment'></div>顾人间之华艳。何足幽赏而盘桓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373724_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1373724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，以放臣自比，感仕途不顺，叹仕途中危机四伏。作品：《积薪赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>积薪赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373713")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373713_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373713'>此郡岩壑重复。榛林郁盛。樵采之子。未尝辍音。往往沿流而下。诣余求售。余因积薪于庭。窃有所叹。乃为积薪赋。赋曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373713'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373713'>邈岩居之幽远。有楚泽之放臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373713_comment'></div>方绝学以自爨。诚未暇于披榛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373713_comment'></div>悲颜子之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1373713", 1373713, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>饭煤</span>。感莱芜之生尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373713_comment'></div>时束蕴<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作缊）</span>以请火。访蓬茨于善邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373713_comment'></div>乃遇樵客。维舟水滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373713_comment'></div>余讯之曰。樵采贱业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373713_comment'></div>常栖隐沦。诗既嘉于刈楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373713_comment'></div>传亦叹于析薪。尔岂延濑之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373713_comment'></div>不取金而且贫。又岂叔敖之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373713_comment'></div>以好廉而苦辛。何乃负担不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373713_comment'></div>其生实勤。客顾余而叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373713_comment'></div>贵则近祸。富多不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373713_comment'></div>寄迹于此。以养吾真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373713_comment'></div>善大雅之知言。信刍荛之可询。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373713_comment'></div>既而交加累积。高下齐均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373713_comment'></div>矗若井干。叠似龙鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373713_comment'></div>避氿泉而无浸。先曲突以斯陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373713_comment'></div>苟知防患之术。终无焦烂之宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373713_comment'></div>嗟长孺之昧道。常喻此而求伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373713_comment'></div>虽后来而高处。亦居上而先焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373713_comment'></div>使薪为能言之物。岂容入爨而扬芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373713_comment'></div>未若生幽崖之侧。纠芳桂之轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373713_comment'></div>不近野田之燎。免罹匠者之斤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373713_comment'></div>冒霰雪以终岁。齐天年于大椿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373713_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373713_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，自比放臣，且路隋去世，忆其曾遗欹器，有感而作。作品：《欹器赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373714' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373714?labeling=true' target='_blank'>欹器赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373714")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373714_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373714'>癸丑岁。余时在中枢。丞相路公见遗欹器。赠以古人之物。永怀君子之心。尝欲报以词赋。属力小(一作少)任重。朝夕尽瘁。固未暇于体物。今者公已殁世。余又放(一作旋)逐。忽睹兹器。悽然怀旧。因追为此赋。置公灵筵。词曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373714_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373714'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373714'>昔周道砥平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373714_comment'></div>既安且宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373714_comment'></div>赫赫公旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373714_comment'></div>配德阿衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373714_comment'></div>谓难守者成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373714_comment'></div>难持者盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373714_comment'></div>始作兹器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373714_comment'></div>告于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373714_comment'></div>至仲尼宪文武之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373714_comment'></div>思周公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373714_comment'></div>入太庙而观器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373714_comment'></div>睹<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作见）</span>遗法而叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373714_comment'></div>且曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373714_comment'></div>月满而亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373714_comment'></div>日中<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作盈）</span>则昃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373714_comment'></div>彼天道而常然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373714_comment'></div>欲久盛而焉得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373714_comment'></div>乃沃水于器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373714_comment'></div>微<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作俯）</span>察要终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373714_comment'></div>挹彼注兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373714_comment'></div>受<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作授）</span>之若冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373714_comment'></div>虚则臲卼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373714_comment'></div>似君子之困蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373714_comment'></div>中则端平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373714_comment'></div>若君子之中庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373714_comment'></div>既满则跌<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作满则倾跌）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373714_comment'></div>霆流电发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373714_comment'></div>器如坻隤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373714_comment'></div>水若河决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373714_comment'></div>非神鼎之自盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373714_comment'></div>异衢樽之不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373714_comment'></div>盖欲表人道之隆替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373714_comment'></div>明百事之有节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373714_comment'></div>然兹器也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373714_comment'></div>不以中而自藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373714_comment'></div>不以跌而自伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373714_comment'></div>其过也如彼薄蚀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373714_comment'></div>其更也浸发辉光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373714_comment'></div>得其道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373714_comment'></div>居则念于丰蔀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373714_comment'></div>动乃思于谦受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373714_comment'></div>颜既复而不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373714_comment'></div>惠屡黜而何咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373714_comment'></div>知任重之必及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373714_comment'></div>悟物盈之难久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373714_comment'></div>虽神道之无形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373714_comment'></div>常参然于前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373714_comment'></div>昔与君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373714_comment'></div>同秉国钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373714_comment'></div>公得之为贤相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373714_comment'></div>余失之为放臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373714_comment'></div>睹遗物之犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373714_comment'></div>怀旧好而悲辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373714_comment'></div>思欲克巳以复礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373714_comment'></div>永报德于仁人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1373714_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任。作品：《蚍蜉赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蚍蜉赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373715")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373715_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373715'>此郡多蚍蜉。余所居临流。实繁其类。或聚于衽席。或入于盘盂。终日厌苦。而不知可御之术。因戏为此赋。令稚子煜和之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373715'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373715'>惟江潭之下国。况幽居于泽畔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373715_comment'></div>何蝼蚁之微物。亦有徒而凌乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373715_comment'></div>或泮散于经笥。或夤缘于食案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373715_comment'></div>余乃戏而问之曰。尔能居厚地而漏山阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373715_comment'></div>无乃处吾身而为大患。蚁不能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373715_comment'></div>辞以意宣。其旨曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373715_comment'></div>我禀形于造化。亦一气之所甄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373715_comment'></div>尝济齐师之乏。亦闻妫德之膻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373715_comment'></div>睹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373715", 1373715, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>封穴</span>而知雨。验<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1373715", 1373715, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>寸壤</span>而得泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373715_comment'></div>出以时而不息。故学者得而称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373715_comment'></div>戴粒而游。若巨鳌之冠神岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373715_comment'></div>绕磨而行。若日月之丽清天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373715_comment'></div>若乃依垤缘壁。淫淫奕奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373715_comment'></div>其聚无声。其行无迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373715_comment'></div>值晏温而出游。当祁寒而入隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373715_comment'></div>迅雷作而不骇。微雨洒而自适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373715_comment'></div>生虽琐细。亦有行藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373715_comment'></div>止若群羊之聚。进加旅雁之翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373715_comment'></div>乘其便也。虽鳣鲸而可制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373715_comment'></div>无其势也。虽蛭蟥而不伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373715_comment'></div>今愿悔过。戢于垣墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373715_comment'></div>岂同青蝇之点白。污君子之衣裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373715_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1373715_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，居处在峰岑之上，远眺能见白鹭群飞，有感而作。作品：《振鹭赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1373716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>振鹭赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373716")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373716_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373716'>此郡带江缘岭。野竹成林。每向夕。有白鹭群飞。集于林杪。今所居在峰岑之上。临眺一川。玩其往来。有以自适。因为此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373716'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373716'>日之夕矣。川陆载阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373716_comment'></div>有群飞之振鹭。顾俦匹而弄音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373716_comment'></div>始遵渚以乱下。若涛起于清浔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373716_comment'></div>俄矫翼以归来。疑霰集于平林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373716_comment'></div>尔其游止有度。不徐不疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373716_comment'></div>散雪彩于江烟。皎霜容于寒日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373716_comment'></div>映枫叶而暂见。入芦花而还失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373716_comment'></div>叹美羽之翩翻。感余生之忧慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373716_comment'></div>若乃不为鹢退。常与鸿冥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373716_comment'></div>乍回合兮如练。忽寥落兮如星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373716_comment'></div>陋汀葭之靡靡。栖岸竹之青青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373716_comment'></div>又似素旄陈于旷野。白笔森于广庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373716_comment'></div>悲夫。绿筱枝弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373716_comment'></div>巢非所据。既萧瑟而多风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373716_comment'></div>亦扶疏而受露。岂不知陂泽可宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373716_comment'></div>荆榛易固。恶下流而不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373716_comment'></div>恐抟兽之当路。逮乎天清潦收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373716_comment'></div>独立涟漪。意态閒暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373716_comment'></div>羽毛襂襹。或暂往而得游鯈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373716_comment'></div>或终夕而守空陂。隐青沙以延伫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373716_comment'></div>若田父之辍菑。重曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373716_comment'></div>振鹭于飞。于彼沧洲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373716_comment'></div>聊自适于遐旷。本无心于去留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373716_comment'></div>思有客于微子。愧植羽于宛邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373716_comment'></div>信兹禽之可玩。何必从海上之群鸥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373716_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1373716_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，怀念沈传师，有感而作。作品：《问泉途赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373717?labeling=true' target='_blank'>问泉途赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373717")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373717_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373717'>问泉途。思沈侯也。(原注沈使传师也)余与沈侯同侍禁林。俱守藩翰。出入光宠。垂二十年。君性乐山水。尤好丝竹。良辰美景。不废赏心。常叹人世险艰。多言可畏。固未得尽其所怀也。昔尚子平称吾已知富不如贫。贵不如贱。未知存亡何如耳。陶靖节亦称人生实难。生如之何。今作赋以问之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373717'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373717'>昔我与子。同升玉堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373717_comment'></div>回先帝之英盼。被霄汉之辉光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373717_comment'></div>君耸驾于长沙。余建旆于朱方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373717_comment'></div>且欲极山水之临泛。尽人生之乐康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373717_comment'></div>谢既好于丝竹。陶亦间于壶觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373717_comment'></div>虽爵服之已贵。何忧思之未忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373717_comment'></div>宝瑟独奏于门庭。玉颜不畜<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作出）</span>于洞房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373717_comment'></div>今则逝矣。前荣可伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373717_comment'></div>于是托意宵梦。久而乃寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373717_comment'></div>问冥昧于故人。求神道之髣髴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373717_comment'></div>或曰生特在于行乐。死何用于虚谥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373717_comment'></div>或言唯令名之不泯。非苦节而安致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373717_comment'></div>彼终古之茫茫。竟斯言之谁是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373717_comment'></div>又曰君有瑶席。尚可陈兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373717_comment'></div>君有清香。尚可焚兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373717_comment'></div>昔之艳姬。复得见兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373717_comment'></div>昔之哀歌。复得闻兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373717_comment'></div>谁为朋友。展戏谑兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373717_comment'></div>岂有樽酒。接殷勤兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373717_comment'></div>余闻神之清者。上为列星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373717_comment'></div>德之粹者。复为贤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373717_comment'></div>万化转续。如在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1373717", 1373717, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>镕钧</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373717_comment'></div>或寿或夭。或鄙或仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373717_comment'></div>亦受气于蛮貊。仍托形于介鳞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373717_comment'></div>独谗人没于泉下。不得同于物化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373717_comment'></div>怀君子之素风。方俟命于昊穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373717_comment'></div>无乃困武叔而见宏石。迫无极而值充躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373717_comment'></div>有明龙而害正。有仪尚之蔽忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373717_comment'></div>苟不罹于此患。固无伤于道穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373717_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1373717_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，所居处在岑壑之上，常见飞鸮，有感而作。作品：《怀鸮赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373719' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀鸮赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373719")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373719_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373719'>荆楚多飞鸮。余所居在岑壑之中。盖兹鸟族类所托。不足叹其蕃也。天宝末。韦郇公谪守蕲春。时李邺公亦以处士放逐。尝中夜同宴。屡闻鸮音。郇公执爵流涕叹曰。长沙下国。邺公曰。此鸟之声。人以为恶。此好音听之。则无足悲矣。请饮酒。不闻鸮音者。浮以大白。坐客皆企其声。终夕不厌。余因其夜鸣不已。感前贤亦罹其患。乃为此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373719_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373719'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373719'>我乐遐深。幽居北岑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373719_comment'></div>积杉松之翠霭。蔽箘簬之清阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373719_comment'></div>风气常合。颓阳易沉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373719_comment'></div>何飞鸮之茂族。尽栖息乎繁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373719_comment'></div>余以修短委命。行藏纵心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373719_comment'></div>既无情于忌鵩。非有叹于巢鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373719_comment'></div>初未尝张罗于丛薄。射宿于川浔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373719_comment'></div>诚不忍于思炙。惟载怀于革音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373719_comment'></div>嗟夫。天地之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373719_comment'></div>禽有万类。彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1373719", 1373719, "Clauses/19/Comments/1")'>鹓<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作雏）</span>凤</span>之灵姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373719_comment'></div>故特禀于间气。标静素于鸿鹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373719_comment'></div>赋妍华于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373719", 1373719, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>孔翠</span>。独兹鸟之可伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373719_comment'></div>无一美而自庇。或曰人之所处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373719_comment'></div>不宜来萃。故闻其音而凄惨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373719_comment'></div>睹其貌而眙。由是翔集无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373719_comment'></div>摧颓逼威。昼戢翼于蒙笼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373719_comment'></div>夜相鸣而悲思。余乃叹曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373719_comment'></div>天有定命。圣不能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373719_comment'></div>彼冥数之未兆。非畏之而可移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373719_comment'></div>枭集牙而战胜。蛇入笥而福绥<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作复绥）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373719_comment'></div>造化默以潜运。倚伏难以预祈<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作期）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373719_comment'></div>况乎爱子及室。恩斯勤斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373719_comment'></div>齐万物以遂性。岂美恶而异宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373719_comment'></div>至人入鸟而不乱。至治层巢而不窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373719_comment'></div>我若不容于深谷。使其伏窜而何之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373719_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1373719_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，所居精舍，有湘中守赠斑竹笔管，奇彩烂然，爱玩不足，赋以报之。作品：《斑竹管赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373721' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>斑竹笔管赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373721")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373721_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373721'>余寓居郊外精舍。有湘中守赠以斑竹笔管。奇彩烂然。爱玩不足。因为小赋以报之。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373721'>山合沓兮潇湘曲。水潺湲兮出幽谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373721_comment'></div>缘层岭兮茂奇筱。夹澄澜兮耸修竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373721_comment'></div>鹧鸪起兮钩辀。白猿悲兮断续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373721_comment'></div>实璀璨兮来凤。根连延兮倚鹿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373721_comment'></div>往者二不从。独处兹岑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373721_comment'></div>望苍梧以日远。抚瑶琴兮怨深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373721_comment'></div>洒思泪兮珠已尽。染翠茎兮苔更侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373721_comment'></div>何精诚之感物。遂散漫于幽林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373721_comment'></div>爰有良牧。采之岩址。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373721_comment'></div>表贞节于苦寒。见虚心于君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373721_comment'></div>始裁<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作操）</span>截以成管。因天资而具美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373721_comment'></div>疑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1373721", 1373721, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>贝锦</span>之濯波。似馀霞之散绮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373721_comment'></div>自我放逐。块然岩中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373721_comment'></div>泰初忧而绝笔。殷浩默而书空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373721_comment'></div>忽有客以赠鲤。遂起予以雕虫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373721_comment'></div>念楚人之所赋。实周诗之变风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373721_comment'></div>昔汉代之方侈。增其炳焕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373721_comment'></div>缀明玑以为柙。饰文犀以为玩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373721_comment'></div>徒有贵于繁华。竟何资于藻翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373721_comment'></div>曾不知择美于江潭。访奇于湘岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373721_comment'></div>况乃彤管有炜。列于诗人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373721_comment'></div>周得之以操牍。张得之以书绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373721_comment'></div>维兹物之日用。与造化之齐均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373721_comment'></div>方资此以终老。永躬耕于典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373721_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1373721_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373721'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_1373721_0'>⑴ 原注傅子曰汉末一笔之柙雕以黄金饰以和璧缀以随珠装以翡翠此笔非文犀之饰必象牙之管也</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373721_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，叹袁州柳柏，可与松竹相映，风姿异常。作品：《柳柏赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373722?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳柏赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373722")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373722_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373722'>夫受天地之正者。惟松柏而已。故圣人称其有心。美其后凋。岂无他木。莫可俦匹。予尝叹柏之为物。贞苦有馀。而姿华不足。徒植于精舍。列于幽庭。不得处园池之中。与松竹相映。独此郡有柳柏。风姿濯濯。宛然荑杨。而冒霜停雪。四时不改。斯得为之具美矣。惜其生而遐远。人罕知之。偶为此赋。以贻亲友。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373722_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373722'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373722'>惟天地之生物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373722_comment'></div>均覆载而不私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373722_comment'></div>虽草木之殊性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373722_comment'></div>皆荣落之有时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373722_comment'></div>感松柏兮<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作之）</span>得真<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作自得）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373722_comment'></div>经隆冬而乃知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373722_comment'></div>常集霰于穷节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373722_comment'></div>终秉心而不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373722_comment'></div>观夫竹婵娟以挺秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373722_comment'></div>松英茂以含滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373722_comment'></div>可荫蔚于台榭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373722_comment'></div>故封植于园池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373722_comment'></div>嗟绿柏之贞苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373722_comment'></div>爰自托于幽崖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373722_comment'></div>或森森于寒垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373722_comment'></div>或肃肃于江<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作神）</span>祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373722_comment'></div>何炎徼之僻陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373722_comment'></div>或珍木而在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373722_comment'></div>齐蓊蔚于兰若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373722_comment'></div>俪芬芳<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作贞姿）</span>于桂枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373722_comment'></div>远而象之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373722_comment'></div>耸干参差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373722_comment'></div>疑翠旌之陆离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373722_comment'></div>迫而玩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373722_comment'></div>布叶低垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373722_comment'></div>若羽<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作孔）</span>盖之威蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373722_comment'></div>又似翠列巢以群栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373722_comment'></div>鸾奋翼而来仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373722_comment'></div>含轻烟于夕景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373722_comment'></div>泣零露于朝曦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373722_comment'></div>待<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作逮）</span>秋实之繁衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373722_comment'></div>缀青珠以累累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373722_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373722_comment'></div>材不可备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373722_comment'></div>人亦如斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373722_comment'></div>子张之容虽盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373722_comment'></div>柳惠之贞则亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373722_comment'></div>有长孺之正色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373722_comment'></div>无思曼之风姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373722_comment'></div>叹此物之具美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373722_comment'></div>以幽深而见遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373722_comment'></div>非欲企琼林于尘外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373722_comment'></div>方玉树于前墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373722_comment'></div>望旧国兮无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373722_comment'></div>思故人兮未期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373722_comment'></div>曾不得倚树而<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作琼树）</span>泛瑶瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373722_comment'></div>攀条而献兰芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373722_comment'></div>慨路远而莫致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373722_comment'></div>抑毫端而孔悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373722_comment'></div>顾谓稚子煜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373722_comment'></div>起为谣曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373722_comment'></div>楚山侧兮湘水源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373722_comment'></div>美斯柏兮托幽根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373722_comment'></div>条总翠兮冬转茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373722_comment'></div>实垂珠兮秋始繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373722_comment'></div>彼变化兮不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373722_comment'></div>焉知非张绪之精魂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1373722_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任，叹袁州多白猿，作赋以咏。作品：《白猿赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373723' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白猿赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373723")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373723_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373723'>此郡多白猿。其性驯而仁爱。所止榛林不瘁。果熟乃取。不敢与猴相狎。猴亦畏而避之。昔傅休奕有猿猴赋。但悦其变态似优。以为戏玩。且不言二物殊性。余今作赋以辨之尔。赋曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373723'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373723'>昔周穆之南迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373723_comment'></div>将奋旅于湘沅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373723_comment'></div>既只轮而无返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373723_comment'></div>化君子以为猿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373723_comment'></div>嗟物变而何常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373723_comment'></div>故族类而始蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373723_comment'></div>或哀吟于永夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373723_comment'></div>或清啸于朝暾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373723_comment'></div>峰合沓以连响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373723_comment'></div>水潺湲而共喧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373723_comment'></div>矧三声之未绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373723_comment'></div>感行客之销魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373723_comment'></div>观其虽为异物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373723_comment'></div>而犹善处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373723_comment'></div>动不为暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373723_comment'></div>止皆择所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373723_comment'></div>柽松郁而不残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373723_comment'></div>楂梨熟而后取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373723_comment'></div>顾狖鼯与猱狿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373723_comment'></div>信莫得而俦侣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373723_comment'></div>若乃灵变难测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373723_comment'></div>神通有知<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注淮南子称有神曰猿）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373723_comment'></div>女试剑而方接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373723_comment'></div>举修簻而止驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373723_comment'></div>养矫矢而未发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373723_comment'></div>眄乔柯而已悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373723_comment'></div>凌峻壑而电耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373723_comment'></div>挂长萝而匏垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373723_comment'></div>避侧足而不履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373723_comment'></div>尚有畏于阽危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373723_comment'></div>施于射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373723_comment'></div>则李控弦而盈贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373723_comment'></div>用于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373723_comment'></div>则华养形而不衰<span class='inlineComment2'>（原讨华陀五禽戏中有戏猿也）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373723_comment'></div>彼沐猴之佻巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373723_comment'></div>虽貌同而心异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373723_comment'></div>既贪婪而鲜让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373723_comment'></div>亦躁动而不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373723_comment'></div>嗟斯物之既驯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373723_comment'></div>有仁爱而可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373723_comment'></div>故邓生以违性兴感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373723_comment'></div>齐后以望恩掩泪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373723_comment'></div>嗟乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373723_comment'></div>人之化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373723_comment'></div>实可悲辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373723_comment'></div>或少贵而老贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373723_comment'></div>或始富而终贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373723_comment'></div>中行之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373723_comment'></div>困于畎亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373723_comment'></div>叔敖之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373723_comment'></div>疲于负薪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373723_comment'></div>何止鲧化熊而为厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373723_comment'></div>哀成虎而不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373723_comment'></div>变钦鸮于瑶席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373723_comment'></div>鸣杜魄于巴岷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373723_comment'></div>乃知人世之可厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373723_comment'></div>不足控抟而自珍。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1373723_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任。三月壬寅，改任滁州刺史，离袁州时作。作品：《畏途赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>畏途赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373725")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373725_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373725'>乙卯岁孟夏。余俟罪南服。自历阳登舟。五月届于蠡泽。当隆暑赫曦之候。涉浔阳不测之川。亲爱闻之。无不挥泪。今明主祝网。幸得生去炎方。或有勉余改辕而陆者。因答此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373725'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373725'>余以轩冕来寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373725_comment'></div>庙堂非据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373725_comment'></div>贺客旋轸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373725_comment'></div>吊宾在户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373725_comment'></div>自淮服而载驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373725_comment'></div>贯岷山而上溯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373725_comment'></div>歊气溢于大浸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373725_comment'></div>温风发于中路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373725_comment'></div>于时行潦猥至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373725_comment'></div>百川皆注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373725_comment'></div>望九派而无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373725_comment'></div>横扁舟而径度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373725_comment'></div>非如渔父之勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373725_comment'></div>已忘胥靡之惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373725_comment'></div>神将骇而还伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373725_comment'></div>蛟欲绝而自去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373725_comment'></div>岂有幼安之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373725_comment'></div>幸无杜侯之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373725_comment'></div>访浔阳之故里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373725_comment'></div>怀靖节之旧居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373725_comment'></div>陈一樽以遥奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373725_comment'></div>悲三径之久芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373725_comment'></div>当其辞簪组。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373725_comment'></div>返蓬庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373725_comment'></div>逸妻宾敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373725_comment'></div>稚子欢娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373725_comment'></div>临流赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373725_comment'></div>卧壑观书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373725_comment'></div>对南山之幽霭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373725_comment'></div>荫嘉木之扶疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373725_comment'></div>不为轩冕之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373725_comment'></div>焉得风波之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373725_comment'></div>何夫子之早悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373725_comment'></div>居一世之不如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373725_comment'></div>然代有覆舟之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373725_comment'></div>皆由任其智力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373725_comment'></div>比鹢舳为轻禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373725_comment'></div>以席帆为快翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373725_comment'></div>载已重而皆积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373725_comment'></div>途既远而未息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373725_comment'></div>志扰扰以争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373725_comment'></div>日冥冥而作慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373725_comment'></div>既而戕风鼓怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373725_comment'></div>氛祲改色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373725_comment'></div>深则困于巨浪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373725_comment'></div>浅则触于危石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373725_comment'></div>虽有神人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373725_comment'></div>莫能拯溺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373725_comment'></div>谈者未知患难之所来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373725_comment'></div>常以川流为怵惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373725_comment'></div>今余所谓畏途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373725_comment'></div>且作蠡泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373725_comment'></div>敬仲以为□□蒙庄以为衽席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373725_comment'></div>苟能虑于几微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373725_comment'></div>又何畏于行役。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1373725_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　本年春，李德裕仍在袁州刺史任。三月壬寅，改任滁州刺史。北归时作赋，再次流露知止保身思想。作品：《知止赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知止赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373726")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373726_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373726'>古人称山林之士。往而不能返。朝廷之士。入而不能出。先哲所以趋舍异怀。隐显殊迹。盖兼之者鲜矣。今余自春秋至西汉。取其卿大夫进能知止退不失正者。缀为此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373726'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373726'>观春秋与汉册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373726_comment'></div>求知止之大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373726_comment'></div>鲁莫高于柳惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373726_comment'></div>卫莫贵于宁俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373726_comment'></div>吴乃得于延州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373726_comment'></div>楚乃尚于于菟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373726_comment'></div>虽至圣无轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373726_comment'></div>超然不拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373726_comment'></div>犹叹行藏以与颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373726_comment'></div>称卷舒而善蘧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373726_comment'></div>则由圣门而进退者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373726_comment'></div>岂不勇于知止乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373726_comment'></div>在汉留侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373726_comment'></div>与道为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373726_comment'></div>厌华屋而不处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373726_comment'></div>思赤松以游娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373726_comment'></div>清则两龚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373726_comment'></div>美则二疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373726_comment'></div>父子欣以相顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373726_comment'></div>衰老至而归欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373726_comment'></div>祁祁青衿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373726_comment'></div>载负经书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373726_comment'></div>蔼蔼元冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373726_comment'></div>祖我城隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373726_comment'></div>叹冥鸿之不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373726_comment'></div>皆雪涕以涟如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373726_comment'></div>嗟余生之疲病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373726_comment'></div>念寄世之须臾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373726_comment'></div>曾涉险而知惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373726_comment'></div>痛摧轮之不虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373726_comment'></div>谅难复于玷缺<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注韦元成作诗自著复玷缺之艰难）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373726_comment'></div>且覃思于元虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373726_comment'></div>聊挥金于馀日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373726_comment'></div>乃回驾于迷途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373726_comment'></div>况乎托北阜以为宅<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373726_comment'></div>就东山而结庐<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373726_comment'></div>仲既得于清旷<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑶</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373726_comment'></div>陶岂叹于将芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373726_comment'></div>其远眺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373726_comment'></div>则伊出陆浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373726_comment'></div>北绕皇居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373726_comment'></div>度双阙之苍翠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373726_comment'></div>若天泽之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1373726", 1373726, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>逶迂</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373726_comment'></div>少室东映于原隰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373726_comment'></div>鸣皋西对于林闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373726_comment'></div>其近玩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373726_comment'></div>则槛泉流于一壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373726_comment'></div>嘉木盈于万株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373726_comment'></div>径被芳荪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373726_comment'></div>沚映芙蕖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373726_comment'></div>听求友之鸣禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373726_comment'></div>见自乐之鯈鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373726_comment'></div>徙奇树于台岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373726_comment'></div>隐翠叶而垂珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373726_comment'></div>得怪石于震泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373726_comment'></div>耸青岑而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1373726", 1373726, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>韬瑜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373726_comment'></div>昔有淮侯种瓜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373726_comment'></div>陶相灌蔬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373726_comment'></div>窃比君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373726_comment'></div>亦能荷锄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373726_comment'></div>或引蔓于长坂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373726_comment'></div>或遵流于清渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1373726_comment'></div>傲情人世之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1373726_comment'></div>寄迹羲皇之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1373726_comment'></div>望夕景于平林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1373726_comment'></div>眺寒烟于故墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1373726_comment'></div>麇麚远而腾倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1373726_comment'></div>凫雁去而相呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1373726_comment'></div>酌盈樽而自慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1373726_comment'></div>赖鸣琴而不孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1373726_comment'></div>怀绮皓而披素卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1373726_comment'></div>想瀛洲而观画图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1373726_comment'></div>何必尚遍游于名岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1373726_comment'></div>蠡长往于五湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1373726_comment'></div>嗟夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1373726_comment'></div>世于知止之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1373726_comment'></div>若存若无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1373726_comment'></div>李斯忘于税驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1373726_comment'></div>惠子疲于据梧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1373726_comment'></div>尽生涯以自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1373726_comment'></div>何智力之有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1373726_comment'></div>庶收光之未晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1373726_comment'></div>期终老于桑榆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_82_1373726_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1373726'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_1373726_0'>⑴ 原注应璩书曰南临洛水北据邙山托崇岫以为宅因茂林以为荫</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_35_1373726_0'>⑵ 原注左思徙居洛城东著经始东山庐诗</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_36_1373726_0'>⑶ 原注仲长统论曰欲卜居清旷以乐吾志</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1373726_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
丰城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='145208a8769941208bda57952cd045fa_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("145208a8769941208bda57952cd045fa");'><span id='145208a8769941208bda57952cd045fa_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>，50岁</div><div id='145208a8769941208bda57952cd045fa' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　李德裕从袁州刺史改任滁州刺史，赴任途中在丰城。作品：《剑池赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1373727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>剑池赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373727")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373727_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373727'>丙辰岁孟夏月。余届途丰城。弭楫江渚。问埋剑之地。则有池存焉。感其至灵之物。亦有沦弃。非遇识者。无由振发。虽人亡剑去。而故事可悲。因维舟俄顷。以为此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373727'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373727'>天地神物。龙泉太阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373727_comment'></div>光耀时促。沉埋日多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373727_comment'></div>往者紫气冲星。时人莫识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373727_comment'></div>吴已亡而气存。宝乃隆于敌国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373727_comment'></div>既精感而上达。当龙变而不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373727_comment'></div>未遭风雨之会。尚假雷生之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373727_comment'></div>岂通塞之有时。何显晦之难测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373727_comment'></div>我不自振。掘之而得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373727_comment'></div>虽潜朽壤之中。每受莓苔之蚀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373727_comment'></div>诚宜英主用之。提携指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373727_comment'></div>内以靖诸侯。外以服四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373727_comment'></div>为东序之秘宝。备有国之光仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373727_comment'></div>一见留于邑长。一获佩于台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373727_comment'></div>始谓伸于知已。终乃屈于不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373727_comment'></div>既而长鸣玉匣。跃入涟漪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373727_comment'></div>化锋锷兮奋迅。焕晶光兮陆离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373727_comment'></div>垂尾沧波。断鲸鲵之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373727_comment'></div>矫首清汉。詟江海之祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373727_comment'></div>昔时在狱。今成废池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373727_comment'></div>宝常弃于兹地。人载怀而孔悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373727_comment'></div>况乎耶溪水涸。赤堇山闭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373727_comment'></div>巧冶既没。作者旷世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373727_comment'></div>风胡已远。壮武复逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373727_comment'></div>斯物倘存。知之者谁氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373727_comment'></div>惟人代兮去不留。嗟双剑兮焉可求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373727_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1373727_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
滁州（清流）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2ff1c3187e89460d9615a8c9ce11153c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2ff1c3187e89460d9615a8c9ce11153c");'><span id='2ff1c3187e89460d9615a8c9ce11153c_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　李德裕从袁州刺史改任滁州刺史，在滁州任，作赋以表怀归嵩洛之义。作品：《怀崧（或嵩）楼记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1374005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1374005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1374005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀崧楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1374005")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1374005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1374005'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1374005'>怀崧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1374005_comment'></div>思解组也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1374005_comment'></div>元和庚子岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1374005_comment'></div>予获在内庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1374005_comment'></div>同僚九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374005_comment'></div>丞弼者五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374005_comment'></div>数十年间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1374005_comment'></div>零落将尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1374005_comment'></div>今所存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1374005_comment'></div>惟三川守李公而已<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1374005_comment'></div>洎太和已丑岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1374005_comment'></div>复接旧老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1374005_comment'></div>同升台阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1374005_comment'></div>或才叹止舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1374005_comment'></div>已协<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1374005", 1374005, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>白鸡之梦</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1374005_comment'></div>或未闻税驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1374005_comment'></div>遽有黄犬之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1374005_comment'></div>向之荣华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1374005_comment'></div>可以悽怆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1374005_comment'></div>况余忧伤所侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1374005_comment'></div>疲薾多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1374005_comment'></div>常惊北叟之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1374005_comment'></div>岂忘东山之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1374005_comment'></div>此地旧隐曲轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1374005_comment'></div>傍施⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（土堄）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1374005_comment'></div>竹树阴合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1374005_comment'></div>檐槛昼昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1374005_comment'></div>喧雀所依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1374005_comment'></div>凉飙罕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1374005_comment'></div>余尽去危堞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1374005_comment'></div>敞为虚楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1374005_comment'></div>剪榛木而始见前山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1374005_comment'></div>除密筱而近对嘉树<span class='inlineComment2'>（厅事前有大辛夷树方为草木所蔽）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1374005_comment'></div>延清辉于月观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1374005_comment'></div>留爱景于寒荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1374005_comment'></div>晨憩宵游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1374005_comment'></div>皆有殊致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1374005_comment'></div>周视原野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1374005_comment'></div>永怀崧峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1374005_comment'></div>肇此佳名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1374005_comment'></div>且符夙尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1374005_comment'></div>尽庾公不浅之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1374005_comment'></div>写仲宣极望之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1374005_comment'></div>贻于后贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1374005_comment'></div>斯乃无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1374005_comment'></div>丙辰岁丙辰月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1374005_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫守滁州刺史李德裕记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1374005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1374005'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_1374005_0'>⑴ 已殁者西川杜公武昌元公中书韦公镇海路公吏部沈公左丞庾公舍人李公</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1374005_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
