-----title
洛阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7f1ecf252b7e4141ad69e4c346093085_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7f1ecf252b7e4141ad69e4c346093085");'><span id='7f1ecf252b7e4141ad69e4c346093085_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>，50岁</div><div id='7f1ecf252b7e4141ad69e4c346093085' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年9月</a>　李德裕九月抵达洛阳，居平泉别墅。作品：《灵泉赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷九。）</span><div id='poem_1373732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灵泉赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373732")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373732_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1373732'>予林居西岭。平壤出泉。广不逾寻。而深则盈尺。自东邻故丞相崔公至谷口故丞相司徒李公。凡别墅五六。皆谓之平泉。实发源于此。观其涌不胜沸。淡然冽清。冬温夏寒。明媚可鉴。其灵泉之蕴也。予往岁获戾放逐。再罹谤伤。泉必变色。久而后复。昔傅长虞庭有涌泉。以其色在夏则冷。涉冬而温。乃为神泉赋。况潜灵蕴异。美过神泉。因效长虞所作。偶成此赋。</div><div id='poem_preface_1373732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373732'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373732'>山下出泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373732_comment'></div>厥壤非石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373732_comment'></div>随浅深而见底。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373732_comment'></div>实秋毫之可析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373732_comment'></div>其莹若纤埃之映琉璃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373732_comment'></div>微虫之潜琥珀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373732_comment'></div>玉瑕瑜而不掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373732_comment'></div>镜妍媸而尽觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373732_comment'></div>且夫动则广大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373732_comment'></div>止则虚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373732_comment'></div>如君子之绝德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1373732_comment'></div>乃望表而见情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1373732_comment'></div>发源而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1373732_comment'></div>百谷皆盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1373732_comment'></div>既处高而就下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1373732_comment'></div>虽遇坎而亦平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1373732_comment'></div>曩者方骋康衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1373732_comment'></div>俄惊覆辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1373732_comment'></div>泉色暂晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1373732_comment'></div>含晶不发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1373732_comment'></div>又如尘掩悬黎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1373732_comment'></div>雾昏秋月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1373732_comment'></div>累夕而翳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1373732_comment'></div>盈旬乃澈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1373732_comment'></div>尔其脉引清泚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1373732_comment'></div>环匝荆扉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1373732_comment'></div>沦涟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1373732", 1373732, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>写照</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1373732_comment'></div>物色殊晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1373732_comment'></div>孕蘋藻为苍碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1373732_comment'></div>涵沙砾为珠玑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1373732_comment'></div>历长坂而鳞烂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1373732_comment'></div>度小山而雪披。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1373732_comment'></div>若乃砥石于宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1373732_comment'></div>析波入沼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1373732_comment'></div>凝虚白而逶迤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1373732_comment'></div>浮缥清而缭绕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1373732_comment'></div>气润蘅兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1373732_comment'></div>色滋松筱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1373732_comment'></div>含逸响于桐林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1373732_comment'></div>动孤光于溪鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1373732_comment'></div>于是列植芳菊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1373732_comment'></div>华艳芊绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1373732_comment'></div>渍漪兰而更馥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1373732_comment'></div>摇霁景而相鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1373732_comment'></div>叶凝夕露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1373732_comment'></div>丛霭秋烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1373732_comment'></div>美楚人之餐英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1373732_comment'></div>慕胡公之饮泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1373732_comment'></div>况复自亭徂溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1373732_comment'></div>夤缘数里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1373732_comment'></div>悬瀑溜于碧潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1373732_comment'></div>散浮湍于清沚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1373732_comment'></div>乘鹢舳以晨泛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1373732_comment'></div>听菱歌而夜起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1373732_comment'></div>见蒹葭之始香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1373732_comment'></div>疑沅湘之在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1373732_comment'></div>重曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1373732_comment'></div>原隰既平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1373732_comment'></div>泉流既清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1373732_comment'></div>三径未荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1373732_comment'></div>万木向荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1373732_comment'></div>感棣华之零落。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1374008_comment'></div>三守吴门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1374008_comment'></div>一涖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1374008", class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1374007_comment'></div>杳无归期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1374007_comment'></div>留此林居。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1374007_comment'></div>然后已焉可也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1374007_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9453ea8097b749feae2331084d40e9ed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9453ea8097b749feae2331084d40e9ed");'><span id='9453ea8097b749feae2331084d40e9ed_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=848')">846-848年</a>，60-62岁</div><div id='9453ea8097b749feae2331084d40e9ed' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　九月，李德裕由荆南节度使改东都留守，解平章事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年2月</a>　二月，白敏中使其党李咸论李德裕执政时阴事，李德裕由东都留守改为太子少保，分司。二月，郑亚坐李德裕之党，由给事中出为桂管观察使，辟李商隐为掌书记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年</a>　李德裕在洛阳编定会昌中所撰文，并于八、九月间寄与郑亚，请其作序。郑亚请李商隐起草，自加改定。并由李商隐起草致书与李德裕，盛称其功业文章。作品：《与桂州郑中丞书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1373992' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1373992' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1373992?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与桂州郑中丞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1373992")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1373992_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1373992'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1373992'>某当先圣御极。再参枢务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1373992_comment'></div>两度册文及宣懿太后祔庙制圣容赞幽州纪圣功碑讨回纥制讨刘稹制五度黠戛斯书两度用兵诏敕及先圣改名制告昊天上帝文并奏议等。勒成十五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1373992_comment'></div>正观初有颜岑二中书。代宗朝常相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1373992_comment'></div>元和初某先太师忠懿公。一代盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1373992_comment'></div>皆所润色。小子<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1373992", 1373992, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>词业</span>浅近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1373992_comment'></div>获继家声。武宗一朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1373992_comment'></div>册命典诰。军机羽檄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1373992_comment'></div>皆受命撰述。偶副圣情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1373992_comment'></div>伏恐制序之时。要知此意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1373992_comment'></div>伏惟详悉。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1373992", 1373992, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>谨状</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1373992_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1373992_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年10月</a>　十月，李德裕撰《唐故博陵崔君夫人李氏墓志铭》。十二月，李德裕被贬为潮州司马。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文乃千唐志藏石。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年1月</a>　去年冬十二月，李德裕被贬潮州司马，约本年正月初起行，由洛阳沿水路南下，经江淮赴潮州。温庭筠有伤李德裕远贬诗《题李相公敕赐屏风》。李德裕南贬，妻刘氏，子浑、钜及女同行。正月初五，右补阙丁柔立上疏为李德裕辨冤，贬南阳县尉。正、二月间，白敏中等所兴覆勘吴湘狱结案，李回、郑亚、魏铏、元寿、蔡京等皆被贬。崔嘏、刘濛等亦被贬。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='fe3a24e8d36b42a4a236c180c6624f79_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fe3a24e8d36b42a4a236c180c6624f79");'><span id='fe3a24e8d36b42a4a236c180c6624f79_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>，卒后3年</div><div id='fe3a24e8d36b42a4a236c180c6624f79' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　李德裕子李烨护李德裕、李德裕妻刘氏灵柩，自崖州返葬于洛阳。<br /></div>
-----end

-----title
澧县（澧阳）

-----title
潮州（潮阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a144209d119a49349f9d8388550a622b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a144209d119a49349f9d8388550a622b");'><span id='a144209d119a49349f9d8388550a622b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>，62岁</div><div id='a144209d119a49349f9d8388550a622b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>　夏，李德裕在潮州，作《舌箴》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷八。）</span><div id='poem_1290150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1290150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1290150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>舌箴</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_1290150")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1290150_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1290150'>戊辰岁仲春月戊申夜。余宿于洞庭西。梦与中书令姚公偶坐。如旧相识。问余曰。君见仆所作口箴乎。余对曰。去岁居守东周。于公曾孙谏议某处睹金石之刻。遂莞尔而笑曰。孙子犹能记之。余以仲夏月达于海曲。尝窃思之。圣哲之言。上可以动天地。成典谟。次可以正人伦。明得失。默而不言。后代何述焉。系辞云。不善则千里之外违之。在慎其所言而已矣。岂必缄其口。铭其背。以矫当世哉。杨子称孰有书不由笔。言不由舌。张仪以舌存而交乱。亦善不善之效也。余感姚公之梦。乃为舌箴云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1290150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1290150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1290150'>粤有帝舜，洎于殷宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1290150_comment'></div>龙命惟允<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，说言乃雍<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1290150_comment'></div>周有良弼，王之喉舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1290150_comment'></div>鼓舞而生，涣汗乃发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1290150_comment'></div>传以言旋作乂，《易》以讲习施悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1290150_comment'></div>天以卷舌屏谗，儒以金口驾说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1290150_comment'></div>伯阳之戒，刚存柔缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1290150_comment'></div>言贵无瑕，辩贵若讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1290150_comment'></div>则知门犹善闭，囊不在括。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1290150_comment'></div>是以扬雄悼谗者之冤，梅福痛忠臣之烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1290150_comment'></div>善乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1290150_comment'></div>先圣之言，既明且清，国以之宁，人之不朽，犯无隐情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1290150_comment'></div>无恃尔言，驷马不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1290150_comment'></div>嗟尔君子，念兹在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1290150_comment'></div>勿以寤一言而取宰相，以三寸舌而为帝师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1290150_comment'></div>徒见娄敬掉而获爵，不以魏其齰以可悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1290150_comment'></div>虽言必有中，而适其时，子房用其策，难以争立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1290150_comment'></div>爱奉春善建不拔，无以免系缧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1290150_comment'></div>卫武警夫莫扪，叔向哀于是出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1290150_comment'></div>惟敬仲之难明，由匠石之无质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1290150_comment'></div>杨子曰：「重则有法，轻则招尤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1290150_comment'></div>言能如是，可以寡忧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1290150_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1290150'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_1290150_0'>⑴ 原注舜命九官自禹至龙允以龙出纳朕命故曰龙命</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_1290150_0'>⑵ 原注殷高宗梦傅说其代予言故曰说言</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1290150_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年9月</a>　九月，李德裕再贬为崖州司户参军。十一月，李德裕子李烨被贬蒙州立山尉。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>　李德裕被贬崖州司户参军，途中，作《谪迁岭南道中作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_30273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谪岭南道中作</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30273")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_30273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30273'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30273'>岭水争分路转迷，桄榔椰叶暗蛮溪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30273'>愁冲毒雾逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_30273", 30273, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>蛇草</span>，畏落<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_30273", 30273, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>沙虫</span>避<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_30273", 30273, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>燕泥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30273'>五月畬田收<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_30273", 30273, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>火米</span>，三更津吏报<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_30273", 30273, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>潮鸡</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30273'>不堪肠断思乡处，红槿花中越鸟啼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30273'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_30273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_30273'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(30273)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>　李德裕被贬崖州司户参军，路恶溪，作《到恶溪夜泊芦岛》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《会昌一品集》别集卷四。）</span><div id='poem_30227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_30227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/30227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到恶溪夜泊芦岛</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16661, "唐", "李德裕", "poem_title_30227")'>李德裕</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_30227_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_30227'><span "poem_allusion_30227")'>远公</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7068, "poem_allusion_30227")'>青蝇悲虞氏</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_30227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_30227'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_30227'>甘露花香不再持，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4344, "poem_sentence_0_30227")'>远公</span>应怪负前期。<div id='poem_sentence_0_30227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_30227'>青蝇岂独悲虞氏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(583, "poem_sentence_1_30227")'>黄犬应闻笑李斯</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_30227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_30227'>风雨瘴昏蛮日月，烟波魂断恶溪时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_30227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_30227'>岭头无限相思泪，泣向寒梅近北枝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_30227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_30227'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_30227_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
海口（珠崖）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8b5425a1338340ad9e55129d97c6b50d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8b5425a1338340ad9e55129d97c6b50d");'><span id='8b5425a1338340ad9e55129d97c6b50d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>，63岁</div><div id='8b5425a1338340ad9e55129d97c6b50d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年1月</a>　正月，李德裕至贬所崖州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年12月10日</a>　李德裕至崖州后，曾作书与段成式，叙及崖州生活。八月，李德裕妻刘氏卒。十一月、十二月间，李德裕曾致书与姚勖.十二月十日，李德裕卒，年六十三。<br /></div>
